en-mt: You said you have this chest pain

sourceString: Rapidly increasing cumulative incidence of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in the European Union/European Economic Area and the United Kingdom, 1 January to 15 March 2020
targetString: ቅልጡፍ ምውሳኽል ናይ ሕማም ኮሮና-ቫይረስ (ኮቪድ-19) ኣብ ሕብረት ኤውሮጳን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን፡ ካብ 1 ጥሪ ክሳብ 15 መጋቢት 2020።
en-mt: Rapid increase in coronavirus (COVID-19) cases in the EU and UK, from 1 January to 15 March

sourceString: The cumulative incidence of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) cases is showing similar trends in European Union/European Economic Area countries and the United Kingdom confirming that, while at a different stage depending on the country, the COVID-19 pandemic is progressing rapidly in all countries.
targetString: እቲ እክብካብ ጽልዋ ናይ ሕማም ኮሮናቫይረስ (ኮቪድ-19) ኣብተን ናይ ሃገራት ኤውሮጳ ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን ኢኮኖምያዊ ከባቢ`ውን ሓደ ዓይነት ኣንፈት/ምልክት ኢዩ ዝገብር ዘሎ፡ ኣብተን ሃገራት ብምምርካስ ግን ብ ዝተፈላለየ ደረጃ፡ እዚ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ለበዳ ብናህሪ ናብ ኩለን ሃገራት ይላባዕ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The cumulative impact of the coronavirus (COVID-19) is also making the same trend/signal in the European countries UK and Economic Area, but depending on the countries to varying degrees, this COVID-19 pandemic is spreading rapidly to all countries .

sourceString: Based on the experience from Italy, countries, hospitals and intensive care units should increase their preparedness for a surge of patients with COVID-19 who will require healthcare, and in particular intensive care.
targetString: ኣብቲ ናይ ጣልያን ተመክሮ ምርኩስ ብምግባር፡ ሆስፒታላትን ናይ ክንክን ክፍሊታትን ነቲ ዝዓበየ ብዝሒ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ካብ ሕጂ ክዳለዋሉ ኣለወን፡ እዚ ድማ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክንን ብፍላይ ድማ ጽዑቕ ክንክን ይሓትት።
en-mt: Based on the Italian experience, hospitals and care facilities must prepare for the larger number of cases of COVID-19 from now on, which requires health care, especially intensive care.

sourceString: On 31 December 2019, a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown aetiology was reported in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: ኣብ 31 ታሕሳስ 2019 ክላስተራት ሕሙማት ነድሪ ሳንቡእ ኣብ ዉሃን ኣውራጃ Hubei ቻይና ተረኺቦም እዮም።
en-mt: On December 31, 2019, clusters of pneumonia cases were reported in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

sourceString: On 9 January 2020, the China Center for Disease Control and Prevention reported the causative agent as being a novel coronavirus now referred to as severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: ብ 9 ጥሪ 2020 ማእከል ምቊጽጻርን ምክልኻልን ሕማማት ቻይና እቲ ነዚ ሕማም ዘኸትል ቫይረስ Acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ከም ዝኾነ ጸቢጺቡ።
en-mt: On January 9, 2020, the Chinese Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reported that the virus that causes the disease is Acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: Since, the illness resulting from SARS-CoV-2 infection has been named coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
targetString: እዚ ብ ሕማም ተላገብ SARS-COV-2 ካብዚ ንደሓር COVID-19 ዝብል ስም ተዋሂብዎ እዩ።
en-mt: This infectious disease SARS-COV-2 is hereinafter named COVID-1

sourceString: Evidence to date is that ca 80% of individuals with COVID-19 have a mild disease, i.e. a respiratory tract infection with or without pneumonia, and most of these recover.
targetString: ክሳብ ሎሚ ዘሎ መርትዖ 80% ካብቶም COVID-19 ዘለዎም ሰባት ቅልል ዝበለ ምልክታት ማለት ኒሞንያ ይሃልዎ ኣይሃልዎ ከም ረኽሲ ትቦ መተንፈሲ ዝሕዞ ኮይኑ ቀልጢፉ ናይ ምሕዋይ ኲነታት ይህሉ።
en-mt: Evidence to date is that 80% of people with COVID-19 have mild symptoms such as pneumonia or not, such as a respiratory tract infection, and recover quickly.

sourceString: In ca 14% cases, COVID-19 develops into a more severe disease requiring hospitalisation while the remaining 6% cases experience critical illness requiring intensive care.
targetString: 14% ካብ ጉዳያት COVID-19 ናብ ሆስፒታል ምድቃስ ዘምርሕ ጽኑዕ ሕማም ከም ዝማዕበለን 6% ዝኾኑ ድማ ጽዑቕ ክንክን ናብ ዘድልዮ ጽኑዕ ሕማም ኣጋጢምዎም።
en-mt: 14% of COVID-19 cases developed severe illness leading to hospitalization and 6% developed severe illness requiring intensive care.

sourceString: The mortality of patients hospitalised due to COVID-19 is ca 4%.
targetString: መጠነ ሞት ናይቶም ተሓከምቲ ልኹፋት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 4% ኢዩ።
en-mt: The mortality rate of patients infected with COVID-19 is 4%.

sourceString: In this study, we assess the trends in the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 in each European Union/European Economic Area (EU/EEA) country and the United Kingdom (UK) and compare them to that of Hubei Province, China.
targetString: ኣብዚ መጽናዕቲ ንእኩብ ኣጋጣሚታት COVID-19 ኣብ ነፍሲወከፍ ሃገር EU/EEA (ኤውሮጳ ሕብረት/ኤውሮጳዊ ቁጠባዊ ዞባ) ከምኡውን ብሪጣንያን ብምርኣይ ምስ ኣውራጃ Hubei ናይ ቻይና ከነወዳድሮ ኢና።
en-mt: In this study, we will look at the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 in each EU/EEA (European Union/European Economic Area) country and the UK and compare it with Hubei Province of China.

sourceString: We also compare the current number of COVID-19 cases in EU/EEA countries and the UK with that in Italy during 31 January–15 March 2020.
targetString: ሕሉው ቑጽሪ ናይ ሕሙማት ኣብ ሃገራት ኤውሮጳን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን ምስ ናይ ጥልያን ልኹፋት፡  ካብ 31 ጥሪ 15-መጋቢት 2020፡ ኣነጻጺርና።
en-mt: We compared the current number of cases in European countries and the UK with those in Italy, from 31 January 15-March

sourceString: COVID-19 cases in EU/EEA countries and the UK
targetString: ሕማም COVID-19 ኣብ ሃገራት EU/EEA ከምኡውን ብሪጣንያ
en-mt: COVID-19 in EU/EEA countries and the UK

sourceString: Subsequent to China, COVID-19 underwent further geographical spread and the dynamic of the COVID-19 pandemic in the rest of the world currently follows that of this country.
targetString: ን ቻይና ብምክታል፡ ኮቪድ-19 ሰፊሕ ጀኦግራፍያዊ ቦታ ሸፊኑ ከምኡውን ምንቅስቃስ ናይ ለበዳ ኮቪድ-19  ኣብ ዝተረፈ ክፋል ዓለም ናይ ቻይና መልክዕ ብምሓዝ የስፋሕፍሕ ኣሎ፡፡
en-mt: Following China, COVID-19 has covered a large geographical area and the movement of the COVID-19 pandemic is spreading in the rest of the world taking the form of China.

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, the Director General of the World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 11 ናይ 2020፡ ዳይረክቶር ጀነራል ወይ ሓላፊ ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ን ኮቪድ-19 ለበዳ ብምባል ጸዊዕዎ።
en-mt: On March 11, 2020, the Director-General or head of the World Health Organization (WHO) called the COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: In the 5 March issue of Eurosurveillance 2020, Spiteri et al. reported on the first European confirmed COVID-19 cases according to the WHO case definition.
targetString: ብመሰረት ምትርጓም ሕማማት ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO ) ኣብ ናይ መጋቢት 5 ሕታሙ ዩሮሰርቬይላንስ 2020 ስፒተሪን ካልኦትን: ናይ ፈለማ ናይ ኣውሮጳ ምዃኑ እተረጋገጸ ሕሙም ናይ COVID-19 ረኺቦም።
en-mt: According to the World Health Organization (WHO ) definition of diseases in its March 5 issue of Eurosurveillance 2020, Spiteri et al: found the first confirmed European case of COVID-1

sourceString: In the EU/EEA, the first three confirmed cases were reported by France on 24 January 2020 in persons returning from Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: ኣብ ሕብረት ኤውሮጳን፡ 24,ጥሪ  2020 ናይ መጀመርያ ሰለስተ ልኹፋት ግዳያት ኣብ ፈረንሳ ተረኺቦም፡ እዞም ልኹፋት ካብ ከተማ ዉሃን ኣውራጃ ሁበይ ቻይና ዝተመልሱ ኢዮም።
en-mt: In the European Union and, on January 24,2020, the first three infected victims were found in France, who returned from Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

sourceString: As at 15 March 2020, COVID-19 cases had been detected in all 30 EU/EEA countries and the United Kingdom (UK), whereby between 31 December 2019 and that date included, 39,768 cases and 1,727 deaths had been reported, with 17,750 cases and 1,441 deaths from Italy alone.
targetString: ክሳብ 15 መጋቢት 2020፡ ግዳያት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ኩለን 30 ናይ ኤውሮጳዊ ሕብረት ሃገራት (EU/EEA countries) ተረኺቡ፡ ከምኡ`ውን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ፡ ኣብ መንጎ  ዕለት 31 ታሕሳስ 2019 ከምኡ`ውን ነታ መዓልቲ ዘጠቃለለ፡ 39,768 ግዳያት ከምኡ`ውን 1,727 ሞት ተመዝጊቡ፡ ካብዚኣቶም ድማ 17,750 ግዳያት ከምኡ`ውን 1,441 ሞት፡ ካብ ጣልያን ኢዮም።
en-mt: As of 15 March 2020, cases of COVID-19 have been reported in all 30 EU/EEA countries, and the UK, between 31 December 2019 and including that date, 39,768 cases and 1,7 Deaths were recorded, of which 17,750 victims and 1,441 deaths, were from Italy.

sourceString: Obtaining cumulative number and cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases
targetString: ነቲ ድምር ቁጽሪን፡ ድምር  ፍጻሜታት/ተርእዮታት ናይ ግዳያት ኮቪድ-19፡
en-mt: the total number and, the total incidents/phenomena of COVID-19 victims:

sourceString: At the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), the notified COVID-19 case counts in each country worldwide, obtained from only official sources such as the countries’ Ministry of Health, national and regional health authorities and the WHO, are updated each day at 8:00 a.m.
targetString: ኣብቲ ኤውሮጳዊ ማእከል ናይ ምክልኻልን ምቁጽጻራትን ሕማማት (ECDC)፡ ቁጽሪ ናይ ተለከፍቲ ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ዓለም ሙሉእ ምስ ግዜ ይቆቅርን ይውስኽን፡ እዚ ሓበሬታ ድማ ካብቲ ወግዕዊ ሚኒስትሪታት ናይ ጥዕና፡ ከባብያዊ ናይ ጥዕና ማእከል፡ ከምኡ`ውን ወከልቲ ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ብዝሃብዎ ሓበሬታ ኢዩ ዝሰርሕ፡ እዚ ጸብጻብ ኣብ ነፍሲ ወከፍ መዓልቲ መዓልቲ 8 ንግሆ ይሕደስ።
en-mt: At the European Center for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), the number of COVID-19 cases worldwide is steadily increasing over time, according to data from official ministries of health, local health centres, and WHO representatives Working: This report is updated every day day 8 am.

sourceString: These data were used for assessing the trends of COVID-19 in EU/EEA and the UK, and comparing them to that in Italy.
targetString: እዚ ጸብጻብ ን ሓቅታት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ሃገራት ኤውሮጳን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን  ንምምርማር ጠቂሙ፡ ምስ ናይ ጣልያን ውን ተነጻጺሩ።
en-mt: This report was used to examine the facts of COVID-19 in European countries and the UK, and compared them with those of Italy.

sourceString: As a proxy of the prevalence of active COVID-19 cases, we calculated the 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases, thus taking into account the natural course of COVID-19, in each EU/EEA country and the UK, during the 1 January–15 March 2020 period.
targetString: ከም ውክልና ናይ ምግሃድ ኮቪድ-19 ግዳያት፡ ኣብ ውሽጢ  14 መዓልታት ድምር ናይ ተጋጥሞታት ግዳያት ኮቪድ-19 ግዳያት ጸብጺብና፡ ስለዚ ነቲ ባህርያዊ ጠንቂ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ግምት ብምእታው፡ ኣብ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ሃገራት ሕብረት ኤውሮጳን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን፡ ኣብ ውሽጢ 1 ጥሪ- 15 መጋቢት 2020 ዘሎ ግዜ።
en-mt: As a representation of the manifestation of COVID-19 victims, we reported the total number of cases of COVID-19 victims within 14 days, so taking into account the natural cause of COVID-19, in each EU country and the UK, between 1 January and The time is March

sourceString: We also presented the cumulative number of notified cases of each country as at 15 March 2020 8:00 a.m. compared with that of Italy for the 31 January–15 March 2020 period.
targetString: ነቲ ድምር ቁጽሪ ናይቶም ዝተሓበሩ ግዳያት ክሳብ 15 መጋቢት 2020፡ 8.00 ቅ.ቀ ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ፡ ምስቲ ናይ ጥልያን ካብ 31 ጥሪ-15 መጋቢቲ 2020 ዘሎ ግዜ ብምንጽጻር ኢዩ።
en-mt: Comparing the total number of reported victims as of 15 March 2020, 8.00 am, with Italy's 31 January-15 March

sourceString: Trends of COVID-19 in EU/EEA countries and the UK
targetString: ተርእዯታት COVID-19 ኣብ EU/EEA ን ብሪጣንያን
en-mt: COVID-19 outbreaks in the EU/EEA and the UK

sourceString: The trends in the 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases in EU/EEA countries and the UK generally followed that of Hubei Province (China) (Figure 1).
targetString: እቶም ኣብ  14-መዓልቲ ዘለዉ ምዕባለታ፡ ድምር ቁጽርታት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ግዳያት ኣብ ኤውሮጳዊ ሕብረት ሃገራት (EU/EEA countries)፡ ከምኡውን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ፡ ን ኣውራጃ ሁበይ ተኸቲለን(ቻይና)(ስእሊ 1)።
en-mt: Its 14-day developments, total numbers of COVID-19 victims in the European Union (EU/EEA countries), and the UK, followed Hubei Province(China)(Figure 1).

sourceString: For the EU/EEA and the UK overall, the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 started to increase around 21 February and then increased sharply around 28 February 2020 (Supplementary material).
targetString: ኣብ EU/EEA ክምኡ’ውን ብሪጣንያ ድምር/ጠቅላላ-ብዝሒ ናይ ሕሙማት ካብ 21 ለካቲት ንደሓር COVID-19 ክውስኽ ምጅማሩን ኣብ ከባቢ ለካትት 28 2020 ብናህሪ ምውሳኽ ኣርእዩ (ተወሳኺ ንጥረ ነገራት)።
en-mt: In the EU/EEA and UK the total/total-number of cases of COVID-19 started to increase after 21 February and showed a sharp increase around 28 February 2020 (appendix).

sourceString: This was mostly driven by the rapid increase in the number of reported cases from Italy, but all other EU/EEA countries and the UK showed similar increasing trends of the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 (Supplementary material).
targetString: እዚ በቲ ዝበዝሐ  ቅልጡፍ ምውሳኽ ናይ ቁጽሪ ልኹፋት ኣብ ዓዲ ጥልያን ዝረአ ዘሎ ኢዩ ዝምራሕ፡ እንተኾነ ኩለን ካልኦት ሃገራት ናይ ኤውሮጳዊ ሕብረትን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን ተመሳሳሊ ምውሳኽ ብምርኣየን ነቲ ድምር ምውሳኽ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ኣንሂርዎ (ሓጋዚ ንብረት/ሓበሬታ)።
en-mt: This is driven by the fastest increase in the number of infections in Italy, but all other EU countries and the UK have seen similar increases, slowing the total increase in cases (helpful material/information).

sourceString: Figure 2 shows the cumulative number of COVID-19 cases, in EU/EEA countries and the UK compared with that in Italy for the 31 January–15 March 2020 period.
targetString: ስእሊ 2 ኣብ ሃገራት EU/EEA (ኣውሮጳዊ ሕብረትን ቀጽሪ ኣውሮጳዊ ቁጠባን) ብሪጣንያን ዘሎ እኩብ ኣሃዝ ሕሙማት COVID-19 ምስቲ ካብ 31 ጥሪ ክሳብ 15 መጋቢት 2020 ኣብ ሃገረ ጣልያን ዝነበረ መጠን ለበዳ ዘወዳድር እዩ።
en-mt: Figure 2 compares the cumulative COVID-19 cases in the EU/EEA (European Union and European Economic Area) countries and the UK with the outbreak rate in Italy from 31 January to 15 March

sourceString: It highlights that, as at 15 March 8:00 a.m., 15 other EU/EEA countries and the UK had already reported a total number of cases comparable to that of Italy just 3 weeks prior or less.
targetString: ኣብ 15 መጋቢት ሰዓት 8:00 ቅድሚ ቀትሪ 15 ካልኦት ሃገራት EU/EEA ከምኡውን ብሪጣንያ ቅድሚ 3 ሳምንታትን ወይ ቅድሚኡ ኣብ ሃገረ ኢጣልያ ምስ ዝነበረ ዝወዳደር ኣሃዝዊ ጸብጻብ ግዳያት ኣቕሪቦም እዮም።
en-mt: At 8:00 am on 15 March, 15 other EU/EEA countries and the UK reported victim figures comparable to those in Italy three weeks ago or earlier.

sourceString: Our results indicate that the number of notified cases of COVID-19 is rapidly increasing in the EU/EEA and the UK.
targetString: ውጽኢትና ከም ዘነጽሮ፡ ብዝሒ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ግዳያት ኣብ ) ኣብ ሕብረት ኤውሮጳን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን ብቅልጡፍ ይውስኽ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Our results show that the number of COVID-19 victims in ) in the EU and UK is increasing rapidly.

sourceString: The observed trends in the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 suggest that the pandemic is progressing at a comparable speed in all countries.
targetString: ኣብ ድንገታት COVID-19 ዝተዋህልሉ ኣጋጣሚታት ከም ዘመልክትዎ እዚ ሕማም ብተመሳሳሊ ናህሪ ኣብ ኲለን ሃገራት ይላባዕ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The accumulated cases of COVID-19 emergencies show that the disease is spreading at the same pace in all countries.

sourceString: This is despite countries being at different stages, variations in national public health responses, and possibly different case definitions in countries and different protocols for selecting patients that must be tested for confirmation of COVID-19, including catch-up testing.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ወላካ ሃገራት ኣብ ዝተፈላለየ ደረጃ ይሃልዋን፡ ዝተፈላለየ ግብረመልሲ  ይሃባን፡ ከምኡውን ዝተፈላለየ ናይ ግዳያት መግለጺ ይሃባን፡ ዝተፈላለየ ኣገባብ/ፕሮቶኮል ብምጥቃም ኮቪድ-19 ዝምርመሩ ዝምርመሩ ይምረጻ (ነቲ ናይ ምክትታል መርመራ ዘጠቃለለ)።
en-mt: This means that even though countries are at different levels, respond differently, and describe different victims, they choose to test for COVID-19 using different methods/protocols (including the follow-up test).

sourceString: Early March 2020, doctors in the affected regions of Italy described a situation in which ca 10% of patients with COVID-19 required intensive care and media sources reported that hospitals and intensive care units in these regions had already reached their maximum capacity.
targetString: ኣብ ፈለማ ወርሒ መጋቢት 2020 ኣብ ብሕማም ዝተጠቕዐ ከባብታት ኢጣልያ ዝዓዩ ዶክተራት ነቲ ኩነታት እንክግልጽዎ 10% ኣብ ሕሙማት COVID-19 ጽዑቕ ክንክን ከም ዝድልዮም እንተኾነ ግና ብመሰረት ጸብጻባት ሚድያ: ኣሃዱታት ጽዑቕ ክንክን ብሰብ መሊአን ምንባረን የምልክታ።
en-mt: In early March 2020, doctors working in affected areas of Italy described the situation as 10% of COVID-19 patients requiring intensive care, but according to media reports, intensive care units were overcrowded.

sourceString: Data on admission of COVID-19 cases in a hospital and/or an intensive care unit are currently available at EU/EEA level for only 6% and 1% cases, respectively (data not shown).
targetString: ጸብጻባት ሓበሬታ ናይ  ግዳያት  ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ሆስፒታላት ከምኡውን/ወይውን ክፍሊ ጽዑቕ ክንክን፡ ናይዚ ሕጂ እዋን ብኤውሮጳ ደራጃ ናይ 6%  ን 1%  ግዳያት ጥራይ  ኣብዚ ረኣይ ፡፡
en-mt: For information reports of COVID-19 victims in hospitals and/or intensive care units, see only the current European rate of 6% to 1% of victims here.

sourceString: They should, however, be collected in a systematic fashion to complement current surveillance data that focus on the number of reported cases and the number of deaths.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ነዚ ናይ ህሉው ምክትታል ናይ ሓበሬታ ጸብጻብ ንምቕራብ፡ ብንጹር ቁጽሪ ናይ ምዉታትን ልኹፋትን ዘተኮረ ሓበሬታ`ውን ንምቕራብ፡ ሓደ ሲስተማቲካዊ  ጥበብ ናይ ምእካብ ሓበሬታ ክስራሕ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: However, a systematic data collection technique must be developed to provide this current surveillance information report, as well as information focused on clear numbers of deaths and infections.

sourceString: A study performed in 2010–11 showed a large variation in the availability of intensive care and intermediate care beds in Europe, ranging from 29.2 in Germany to 4.2 beds per 100,000 population in Portugal.
targetString: ኣብ 2010-11 ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ ፍልልይ ዘለዎ ናይ ጽዑቅ ክንክንን ህላውነት ዓራትን ኣብ ሃገራት ኤውሮጳ ተራእዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ጀርመን 29.2 ን 100,000 ብዝሒ ናይ ህዝቢ ክኸውን እንከሎ፡ ኣብ ፖርቱጋል ድማ 4.2 ትርእይ ኔሩ።
en-mt: A 2010-11 survey showed that there was a huge difference in intensive care and bed availability in European countries, with 29.2 per 100,000 population in Germany and 4.2 per 100,000 in Portugal.

sourceString: This means that countries may have more or less resources than Italy (12.5 intensive care and intermediate care beds per 100,000 population in 2010–11).
targetString: አዚ ማለት ሃገራት ካብ ናይ ጣልያን ዝበዝሕ ወይ ዝውሕድ ጸጋትት ክህልወን ይኽእል እዩ (ኣብ 2010-11 12.5 ናይ ጽዑቕ ክንክንን ማእከላይ ክንክንን ዓራውቲ ን 100000 ህዝቢ እዩ ኔሩ)።
en-mt: This means that countries may have more or less resources than Italy (in 2010-11 there were 12.5 intensive care and intermediate care beds per 100,000 population).

sourceString: Modelling scenarios related to healthcare capacity saturation, with estimates for each EU/EEA country and the UK of the prevalence of hospitalised COVID-19 cases associated with a > 90% risk of exceeding intensive care bed capacity, are provided in the sixth update of the ECDC rapid risk assessment on COVID-19.
targetString: ናይ ንድፊ ኣምር፥ ምስ ዝቕባበ ዓቕሚ ክንክን ጥዕና ነፍሲወከፍ ሃገር EU/EEA (ሕብረት ኤውሮጳ) ከምኡውን ብርጣንያ ኣብ ሆስፒታል ናይ ዝእለዩ ሕሙማት COVID-19፡ ምስ a &gt ብዝተሓሓዝ፡ 90% ሓደጋ ናይ ጽዑቕ ክንክን ዓራት ዓቀን ኣብ ሻዱሻይ ምሕዳስ ናይ ECDC ቅልጡፍ ምሕደራ ሓደጋ ኣብ COVID-19 ተዋሂቡ።
en-mt: Design concept: With the decline in healthcare capacity of each EU/EEA (European Union) country and the UK of hospitalized COVID-19 patients, with a > 90% risk of intensive care bed size in the sixth renewal of the ECDC emergency risk management given in COVID-1

sourceString: Since cases have so far clustered in certain regions in EU/EEA countries and the UK, and hospitals and intensive care units usually serve a defined regional catchment population, information about cases and intensive care beds should preferably be made available at the Nomenclature of territorial units for statistics 2 (NUTS-2) level.
targetString: ብዙሓት ግዳያት ኣብ ገለ ክፋላት ናይ ሃገራት ኤውሮጳን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን፡ ከምኡ`ውን ሆስፒታላትን ጽዑቅ ክንክን ዝህብ ክፍሊን፡ ዝበዝሐ ግዜ ፍሉጥ ዝኾነ ቁጽሪ ዘለዎ ቦታ ይሕዝ፡ ሓበሬታ ብዛዕባ ግዳያትን ክፍሊ ጽዕቅ ክንክንን ኣብቲ ኒሞክለቸር (ናይ ስማ ምውሃብ መስርሕ) ናይ ከባብያዊ ክፍሊ ን ጸብጻብ ደረጃ 2 (NUTS-2) ክወሃብ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Many victims in some parts of European countries and the UK, and hospitals and intensive care units, often occupy a well-known number of places (NUTS-2) should be given.

sourceString: The experience from Italy and the current trends in other countries show that the COVID-19 pandemic is progressing rapidly in the EU/EEA and the UK.
targetString: ካብ ጣልያን እተረኽበ ተመኲሮን ተርእዮ ካልኦት ሃገራት ከም ዘመልክቶ እዚ ሕማም COVID-19 ኣብ ሃገራት EU/EEA ከምእውን ብሪጣንያ የስፋሕፍሕ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Experience from Italy and other countries show that COVID-19 is spreading in EU/EEA countries as well as the UK.

sourceString: Countries, hospitals and intensive care units should thus prepare themselves for a scenario of sustained community transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and an increase in the number of patients with COVID-19 requiring healthcare, and in particular intensive care, such as the one occurring in the affected regions of Italy.
targetString: ሃገራት፡ ሆስፒታላትን ናይ ክንክን ማእከላትን ነቲ ቀጻሊ ምምሕልላፍ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስ ክዳለዋ ኣለወን፡ ምውሳኽ ናይ ተሓከምቲ ኮቪድ-19 ድማ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ይሓትት፡ ብፍላይ ድማ ጽዑቕ ክንክን ናይ ጥዕና፡ ከምቲ ኣብቲ ዝተጎደአ ክፋላት ናይ ጣልያን ዝተረኣየ።
en-mt: Countries, hospitals and care centers must prepare for the continued transmission of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, and the increase in COVID-19 patients requires health care, especially intensive health care, as seen in the affected parts of Italy.

sourceString: As pointed out in the recent ECDC rapid risk assessment, a rapid, proactive and comprehensive approach is essential to delay the spread of SARS-COV-2, with a shift from a containment to a mitigation approach, as the anticipated rapid increase in the number of cases may not provide decision makers and hospitals enough time to comprehend, accept and adapt their response accordingly if not implemented ahead of time.
targetString: ከምቲ ኣብ ናይ ቀረባ እዋን ECDC ከም እተመልከተ ቅልጡፍን ኣቐዲምካ ዝግበርን ኣጠቓላል ኣቀራርባ ዘለዎ ምግምግም ሓደጋ ንምድንጓይ ለበዳ SARS-COV-2 ኣዝዩ ሓጋዚ እዩ።ካብ ምዕጋት ናብ ምቁጽጻር ዝኸይድ ኣታሕዛ እዩ: ምኽንያቱ ምስ ምብዛሕ ሕሙማት ሆስፒታላት ነቲ ሕማም ብግቡእ ክርዳኦኦ ዋላኳ ቅድሚ ግዜ ኣየተግብራ ግብረመልሰን ከሰማምዓን እኹል ግዜ ከይህበን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: As noted in the recent ECDC, a rapid and early comprehensive risk assessment is very helpful in delaying the SARS-COV-2 outbreak He may not give them enough time.

sourceString: The rapid risk assessment also lists the public health measures to mitigate the impact of the pandemic.
targetString: እቲ ቅልጡፍ ናይ ሓደጋ ምርምራት፡ ነቲ ህዝባዊ ናይ ጥዕና ተበግሶታት፡ ን ጽልዋ ናይ ለበዳ ክኣልዮ ይኽእል ኢሉ ገሚቱ ።
en-mt: He assumed that the rapid risk assessments could mitigate the impact of the epidemic on public health initiatives.

sourceString: There is a short window of opportunity during which countries have the possibility to further increase their control efforts to slow down the spread of SARS-CoV-2 and decrease the pressure on healthcare.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ንምቊጽጻር፡ ኣብ ክንክን ጥዕና ዘሎ ጸቕጢ ንምንካይን ሃገራት ገለ ናይ መስኮት ዕድል ክህልወን እዩ።
en-mt: Countries will have some window of opportunity to control SARS-CoV-2 and reduce the pressure on health care.

sourceString: Failing this, it is likely that the healthcare systems of other EU/EEA countries will face a surge of patients that require intensive care within the coming days or weeks.
targetString: እዚ ብምውዳቑ፡ እቲ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ሲስተም ናይ ሃገራት ኤውሮጳን ካልኦት ሃገራትን ብዝሒ ዘለዎም ተሓከምቲ (ጽዕቅ ክንክን ናይ ጥዕና ዘድልዮም) ኣብ ዝመጽእ ሰሙን ውይ መዓልታት ክመጹ ትጽቢት ይግበር።
en-mt: With this collapse, the health care system of European countries and other countries is expected to receive a large number of patients (in need of intensive care) in the coming weeks or days.

sourceString: The outbreak of Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), has thus far killed over 3,000 people and infected over 80,000 in China and elsewhere in the world, resulting in catastrophe for humans.
targetString: እዚ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ 2019 (ኮቪድ-19)፡ በቲ ከቢድ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሲንድሮመ (SARS)  ኮሮናቫይረስ-2 (SARS-CoV-2), ዝስዕብ፡ ክሳብ ሕጂ ልዕሊ 3,000 ሰባት ቀቲሉ ኣ፡ ከምኡ`ውን ልዕሊ 80.000 ሰባት ኣብ ቻይናን ካልእ ክፋል ዓለምን ለኺፉ ኣሎ፡ በዚ ድማ ኣብ ደቂ-ሰባት መቅዘፍቲ ኢዩ ኣስዒቡ።
en-mt: This outbreak of coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), followed by the severe respiratory syndrome (SARS) coronavirus-2 (SARS-CoV-2), has killed more than 3,000 people so far a, and more than 80.000 people in China and other parts of the world, thus causing disaster in humans.

sourceString: Similar to its homologous virus, SARS-CoV, which caused SARS in thousands of people in 2003, SARS-CoV-2 might also be transmitted from the bats and causes similar symptoms through a similar mechanism.
targetString: SARS-CoV ምስቲ ናቱ ዓሌት ተመሳሳሊ ዝኾነ ዓይነት ቫይረስ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብ 2003 SARS ኣብ ኣሽሓት ሰባት ኣስዒቡ፡ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ መንካዕ`ውን ተመሓላሊፉ ክኸውን ይክእል ኢዩ፡ ብሓደ ዓይነት መስርሕ ድማ ሓደ ዓይነት ምልክታት ኣርእዩ ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV is a virus similar to its strain, which caused SARS in thousands of people in 2003. SARS-CoV-2 may also have been transmitted from contact, and may have shown the same symptoms through the same process.

sourceString: However, COVID-19 has lower severity and mortality than SARS but is much more transmissive and affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ኮቪድ-19 ካብ SARS፡ ዝተሓተ ጉድኣትን ምጣነ-ሞትን ኣለዎ፡ እንተ ኾነ ዝለዓለ ናይ ምልባዕ ባህሪ ኣለዎ፡ ን ብዕደመ ዝደፍኡ ሰባት ድማ ካብ መንእሰያት ንላዕሊ የጥቅዕ፡ ከምኡ`ውን ን ደቂ-ተባዕትዮ ካብ ደቂ-ኣንስትዮ ንላዕሊ።
en-mt: However, COVID-19 has lower injury and mortality than SARS, but has a higher incidence, and affects older people more than young people, and men more than women.

sourceString: In response to the rapidly increasing number of publications on the emerging disease, this article attempts to provide a timely and comprehensive review of the swiftly developing research subject.
targetString: ከም ግብረመልሲ ናይቲ ብዛዕባዚ እናሰፍሐ ዝመጽእ ዘሎ ሕማም ዘጽሕያ ሕታማት እዛ ዓንቀጽ እዋናዊን ኣጠቓላሊን ገምጋም ናይዚ ብቕልጡፍ ዝምዕብል ዘሎ መጽናዕታዊ ኣርእስቲ ክትህብ እያ።
en-mt: In response to the publications on this expanding disease, this article will provide an up-to-date and comprehensive review of this rapidly evolving research topic.

sourceString: We will cover the basics about the epidemiology, etiology, virology, diagnosis, treatment, prognosis, and prevention of the disease.
targetString: መሰረታዊ ኣምራት ባሀርያት እዚ ለበዳ፡ ጠንቂ፥ ባህሪ እቲ ቫይረስ፡መርመራ፡ ሕክምናን ምክልኻልን እዚ ሕማም ሸፈነ ክንህቦ ኢና።
en-mt: We will cover the basic symptoms of this epidemic, causes, nature of the virus, diagnosis, treatment and prevention of this disease.

sourceString: Although many questions still require answers, we hope that this review helps in the understanding and eradication of the threatening disease.
targetString: ወላ`ካ ብዙሓት መልሲ ዘድልዮም ሕቶታት እንተለዉ፡  እዚ ምርምር/ትዕዝብቲ ኣብ ምርዳእን ምጥፋእን/ምድምሳስን ናይዚ ፈታኒ/ኣስጋኢ ሕማም ተራ ክጻወት ተስፋ ንገብር።
en-mt: Although there are many questions that need to be answered, we hope that this research will play a role in understanding and eradicating this challenging disease.

sourceString: The Spring Festival on January 25, 2020 has become an unprecedented and unforgettable memory to all Chinese who were urged to stay indoors for all the holiday and for many weeks after due to the outbreak of a novel viral disease.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ጽድያ ፈስቲቫል ኣብ 25 ጥሪ, 2020፡ ንኩሎም እቶም ብሰንኪ ለበዳ ኖቨል ቫይረስ ኣብ ግዜ ዕረፍቲ ኣብ ገዛ ክዕጸዉ ዝተነግሩ ነበርቲ ቻይና፡ ዘይትርሳዕን ተራእዩ ወይ ተሰሚዑ ዘይፈልጥ ዝኽሪ ኢያ ገዲፋትሎም።
en-mt: The spring festival on January 25, 2020, left unforgettable memories for all Chinese residents who were told to stay home during the holidays due to the novel virus outbreak.

sourceString: The virus is highly homologous to the coronavirus (CoV) that caused an outbreak of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) in 2003; thus, it was named SARS-CoV-2 by the World Health Organization (WHO) on February 11, 2020, and the associated disease was named CoV Disease-19 (COVID-19).
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ ነቲ ኣብ 2003 ምልዓል ሕማም ምስትንፋስ (SARS) ዘስዓበ ቫይረስ ኮሮና ኣጸቢቑ ዝዛመድ ኮይኑ b 11 ለካቲት 2020 ብውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) SARS-CoV-2 ተባሂሉ ከም እተሰምየን ምስኡ ዝተኣሳሰር ሕማም ድማ ሕማም-19 (COVID-19) ተባሂሉ ከም እተጸውዐን ይፍለጥ።
en-mt: The virus is closely related to the 2003 respiratory syndrome (SARS) outbreak and was named b 11 February 2020 by the World Health Organization (WHO) as SARS-CoV-2 and the associated disease as COVID-1 It is known.

sourceString: The epidemic started in Wuhan, China, and quickly spread throughout the entire country and to near 50 others all over the world.
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ዉሃን፡ ቻይና ተጀሚሩ፡ ብቅልጡፍ ድማ ናብ ምሉእ ክፋል ሃገር ተዘርጊሑን ናብ ካልእ 50 ሃገራት ዓለም ድማ ፋሕ ኢሉን።
en-mt: The outbreak began in Wuhan, China, and quickly spread across the country and to 50 other countries.

sourceString: As of March 2, 2020, the virus has resulted in over 80,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, with more than 40,000 patients discharged and over 3,000 patients who died.
targetString: ክሳብ መጋቢት 2,2020፡ እዚ ቫይረስ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ከባቢ  80,000 ሰባት ለኺፉ፡ ካብዝ ኢኣቶም ድማ ልዕሊ 40,000 ካብ ሕክምና ክወጹ እንከለዉ ልዕሊ 3000 ሰባት ድማ ሞይቶም።
en-mt: As of March 2,2020, the virus has infected around 80,000 people, of whom more than 40,000 have been discharged and more than 3,000 have died.

sourceString: WHO warns that COVID-19 is “public enemy number 1” and potentially more powerful than terrorism.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO)፡``1ይ ናይ ህዝቢ ጸላኢ`` ወላ`ውን ካብ ግብረ-ሽበራ ዝኸፍእ ክብል ኣጠንቒቑ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has warned that it is the ``1st enemy of the people`` even worse than terrorism.

sourceString: According to PubMed (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/), in less than two months, over 200 papers have been published on COVID-19 including its virology, epidemiology, etiology, diagnosis, and treatment since the first report on January 7, 2020 that determined the sequence of the virus isolated from multiple patients.
targetString: ብ መሰረት ናይ PubMedwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/), ኣብ ውሽጢ 2 ወርሒ፡ ን ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝምልከት ናይ ቫይሮሎጂ፡ አፒዶሞሎጂ፡ አቶሎጂ፡ ምሕካም፡ ከምኡውን ምክንኻን ካብቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ጸብጻብ ዝወጻሉ መዓልቲ ጥሪ 7,2020፡ መስርዕ ናይቲ ቫይረስ ካብ ብዙሓት ተሓከምቲ ዝተፈልየሉ መዕልቲ፡ ጀሚሩ 200 ጽሑፋት ተሓቲሞም ኣለዉ
en-mt: According to PubMedwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/), within 2 months, of the virology, epidemiology, ontology, treatment, and care date of the first report on January 7,2020, 200 articles have been published since the day the virus was isolated from many patients

sourceString: This review attempts to summarize the research progress in the new and swiftly developing subject area.
targetString: እቲ ትዕዝብቲ/ትንታነ፡ ነቲ ናይ መጽናዕቲ ቀጻሊ መስርሕ ኣብቲ ሓድሽን ብናህሪ ዝዓቢ ዘሎ ዓውዲ ኣስተዋጽኦ፡ ክገብር ፈቲኑ።
en-mt: The observation/analysis attempted to contribute to the ongoing process of research in the new and rapidly growing field.

sourceString: Whenever possible, we will try to compare COVID-19 with SARS and another CoV-caused disease, Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS, an outbreak in 2012).
targetString: ኣድላዪ ኣብ ዝኾነሉ ን COVID-19 ምስ SARS ን ካልእ CoV ዘስዓቦ ሕማማት እንተላይ ናይ ማእከላይ ምብራቕ ሕማም ምስትንፋስ (MERS) ከነወዳድር ክንፍትን ኢና (2012)
en-mt: Where appropriate, we will attempt to compare COVID-19 with SARS and other CoV-caused diseases including Middle Eastern Respiratory Syndrome (MERS) (2012)

sourceString: We will also discuss what we have learned so far regarding the prevention and prognosis of the disease as well as some remaining yet urgent questions.
targetString: ነቲ ብዛዕባ ምክልኻልን ምፍዋስን ናይዚ ሕማም ክሳብ ሕጂ ዝተመሃርናዮ ውን ክንዘራረበሉ ኢና፡ ከምኡ`ውን ካልእ ኣዝዮም ኣገደስቲ ቀልጢፎም ክምለሱ ዘለዎም ሕቶታት።
en-mt: We will also discuss what we have learned so far about the prevention and treatment of this disease, as well as other very important questions that need to be answered soon.

sourceString: CoVs have been traditionally considered nonlethal pathogens to humans, mainly causing approximately 15% of common colds 4.
targetString: CoVs ከም ባህሊ: ን ደቂ-ሰባት: ከም ቀተልቲ ሕማም ክረኣዩ ከምዘይጸንሑን: ከምኡውን ኣስታት 15% ሰዓል 4 በዚ እዩ ዝኽሰት።
en-mt: CoVs have not been traditionally seen as fatal to humans, and this is why about 15% of influenza 4 cases occur.

sourceString: However, in this century, we have encountered highly pathogenic human CoVs twice, i.e., SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, which caused an outbreak originally in China in 2003 and Saudi Arabia in 2012, respectively, and soon spread to many other countries with horrible morbidity and mortality.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግና ኣብዚ ሚእቲ ዓመት ኣዝዮም ሓደገኛታትን ንሰብ ዘጥቅዑን: CoVs ከምኡውን MERS-CoV ፈለማ ኣብ 2003 ኣብ ቻይና ጸኒሑ ኣብ 2012 ኣብ ስዑዲ ዓረብያ ብተኸታታሊ ክልተሳዕ ተኸሲቶም: ሞትን ሕማምን ኣስዒቦም እዮም።
en-mt: However, the most dangerous and infectious in this century: CoVs and MERS-CoV first appeared in China in 2003 and then in Saudi Arabia in 2012, causing death and illness.

sourceString: Therefore, the current COVID-19 is the third CoV outbreak in the recorded history of humans.
targetString: ስለዚ: እዚ ህሉው COVID-19: ሳልሳይ ናይ CoV ምስፍሕፋሕ ኣብ ሪከርድ ናይ ዓለምና ኢዩ።
en-mt: So: this current COVID-19: is the third CoV outbreak on record in the world.

sourceString: As shown in Fig. ​Fig.1,1, clusters of pneumonia that had unknown origins were first reported from Wuhan on December 31, 2019 to the China National Health Commission.
targetString: ከምቲ ኣብ ስእሊ.ስእሊ.1.1, ዝረአ ዘሎ፡ እኩባት ናይ ኒሞንያ፡ ዘይፍሉጥ መበገሲ ዘለዎም፡ ኣብ 31 ታሕሳስ 2019 ኣብ ዉሃን ተራእዮም ድሕሪኡ ድማ፡ ናብ ናይ ቻይና ሃገራዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኮሚሽን ተሓቢሮም።
en-mt: As shown in Figure 1.1, clusters of pneumonia of unknown origin were reported in Wuhan on December 31, 2019 and subsequently reported to China's National Health Commission.

sourceString: Seven days later the sequence of the CoV was released.
targetString: ድሕሪ 7 መዓልታት፡ እቲ መስርዕ (ሰክወንስ) ናይ CoV ወጽዩ።
en-mt: After 7 days, the sequence of CoV was released.

sourceString: On January 15, 2020 the first fatal case from Wuhan was reported.
targetString: ኣብ ጥሪ 15 2020፡ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ኦት ግዳይ ኣብ ዉሃን ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: On January 15 2020, the first oat case was reported in Wuhan.

sourceString: Meanwhile, the epidemic rapidly spread to the neighboring cities, provinces, and countries.
targetString: ኣብቲ ግዜ እቲ፡ ለበዳ ብናህሪ ናብተን ጎረባብቲ ሃገራት ኣውራጃታትን ዓድታትን ተስፋሕፊሑ።
en-mt: During that time, the epidemic spread rapidly to neighboring provinces and villages.

sourceString: On January 20, the infection of health-care providers was reported, suggesting that human-to-human transmission was possible.
targetString: ኣብ ጥሪ 20፡ ምትሕልላፍ ናይዚ ሕማም ናብቶም ናይ ጥዕና ኣገልግሎት ዝህቡ ተሓቢሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ምምሕልላፍ ከም ዝከኣል ኣረጋጊጹ።
en-mt: On January 20, transmission of the disease was reported to health care providers, confirming the possibility of human-to-human transmission.

sourceString: On January 23, the city of Wuhan was locked down with all its public transportation stopped.
targetString: ኣብ ጥሪ 2፡ ከተማ ዉሃን ምስ ኩሉ ምዕጻው ናይ መጎዓዝያ፡ ኣብ ወሸባ ኣትያ።
en-mt: On January 2, Wuhan was placed under quarantine, with all travel closures.

sourceString: On January 24 the first clinical study on the disease reported that, out of 41 patients with confirmed cases, only 21 had direct contact with the Wuhan seafood market that was considered the starting site of the infection from an unknown animal source.
targetString: ኣብ ጥሪ 24፡ ናይ መጀመርያ ክሊኒካዊ መጽናዕቲ ኣብቲ ሕማም ጸብጻብ ከምዘቅረቦ፡ ካብቶም 41 ልኹፋት ተሓከምቲ፡ እቶም 21 ጥራይ ቀጥታዊ ርክብ ምስቲ ናይ ዉሃን ናይ ባሕሪ መሸጢ ዕዳጋ(እቲ መጀመሪ ቦታ ናይዚ ተመሓላላፊ ሕማም ካብ ዘይተፈልጠ እንስሳ ብምንቃል)፡ ቐከም ዘለውፕም ገሊጹ።
en-mt: On January 24, the first clinical study in the disease reported that of the 41 infected patients, only 21 had direct contact with the Wuhan seafood market (based on the origin of the infectious disease from an unknown animal), Kekem said.

sourceString: On January 30, WHO declared the outbreak a global health emergency.
targetString: ኣብ ጥሪ 30፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ነቲ ምስፍሕፋሕ፡ ዓለማዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኢመርጀንሲ ብምባል ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On January 30, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the outbreak a global health emergency.

sourceString: By the time of this report, the disease has already spread throughout China and near 50 other countries all over the world (Fig. ​(Fig.2).2).
targetString: ኣብዚ ጸብጻብ እንህበሉ ዘለና እዋን፡ እዚ ሕማም ኣብ መላእ ቻይና ን 50 ካልኦት ሃገራትን ዓለምን ተዘርጊሑ ኢዩ (ስእሊ. ​(ስእሊ.2).2)።
en-mt: At the time of reporting, the disease has spread throughout China to 50 other countries and the world (Fig. 2).

sourceString: As the situation is rapidly evolving, the final scope and severity of the outbreak remain to be determined.
targetString: እዚ ኩነታት ብናህሪ ይምዕብል ብምህላዉ፡ ሳዕቤንን ጉድኣትን ናይዚ ምስፍሕፋሕ ክፍለጥን ክግምገምን ኣይከኣልን።
en-mt: This situation is developing so rapidly that the consequences and harms of this expansion cannot be known and assessed.

sourceString: On February 11, 2020, a multi-center study on 8,866 patients including 4,021 confirmed COVID-19 patients presented a more updated illustration of the epidemic as follows (https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UlBi-HX_rHPXa1qHA2bhdA).
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት 11, 2020፡ ሓደ ናይ ብዙሕነት ናይ መጽናዕቲ ማእከል ኣብ 8,866 ተሓከምቲ ኣብ ዝገበሮ መጽናዕቲ ፡ ን 4021 ልኹፋት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ተሓከምቲ ዝሓቆፈ፡ ከምዚ ኣብ ታሕቲ ተዘርዚሩ ዘሎ ዝተሓደሰ ሓበሬታ ኣብዚ ረአ (https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UlBi-HX_rHPXa1qHA2bhdA)።
en-mt: On February 11, 2020, a diversity research center conducted a study of 8,866 patients , including 4021 infected COVID-19 patients, see updated information as listed below here (https://mp.weixin.qq.com /s/UlBi-HX_rHPXa1qHA2bhdA).

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 infected people of all ages, but mainly at the age of 30-65.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ኩሉ ክልል ዕድመ ዘለዉ ሰባት የጥቕዕ፡ ብፍላይ ኣብ ክሊ 30-65 ዘለዉ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 affects people in all age ranges, especially those in the 30-65 range.

sourceString: Almost half (47.7%) of the infected individuals were over 50 years old, very few were under 20, and only 14 infected individuals were under the age of 10.
targetString: ዳርጋ ፍርቒ (47.7%) ካብቶም ልኹፋት ውልቀ-ሰባት ልዕሊ 50 ዓመት ኢዮም ኔሮም፡ ውሑዳት ትሕቲ 20 ዓመት፡ 14 ልኹፋት ውልቀሰባት ድማ ትሕቲ 10 ዕድሚኦም።
en-mt: Almost half (47.7%) of the infected individuals were over 50 years of age, a few were under 20 years of age, and 14 infected individuals were under 10 years of age.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 infected more men (0.31/100,000) than women (0.27/100,000).
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ካብ ደቀንስትዮ (0.27/100000) ንላዕሊ ንደቀተባዕትዮ (0.31/100000) ይልብድ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 is more common in men (0.31/100000) than in women (0.27/100000).

sourceString: COVID-19 expanded in clusters mainly in and around Hubei.
targetString: ኮቪድ-19 ብ ጉጅለ ኣብ ውሽጢን ወጻኢን ናይ ከተማ ሁበይ ተዘርጊሑ።
en-mt: COVID-19 has spread in groups inside and outside Hubei.

sourceString: COVID-19 took an average of 5 (2-9) days from onset to diagnosis.
targetString: COVID-19 ብማእከላይ ገምጋም ካብ ምፍላም ክሳብ መርመራ 5(2-9) መዓልታት ይወስድ።
en-mt: COVID-19 takes an average of 5(2-9) days from onset to diagnosis.

sourceString: The average incubation period was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days.
targetString: እቲ ማእከላይ ገምጋም ናይ ምሕቃፍ ግዜ 4.8 (3.0-7.2) መዓልታት ኔሩ።
en-mt: The mean incubation period was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days.

sourceString: The average time from onset to death was 9.5 (4.8-13) days.
targetString: እቲ ማእከላይ ግዜ ካብ ዝጅምረሉ ክሳብ ሞት 9.5 (4.8-13) መዓልታት ኔሩ።
en-mt: The median time from onset to death was 9.5 (4.8-13) days.

sourceString: The basic reproductive number (R0) was 3.77 (95% CI: 3.51-4.05), and the adjusted R0 was 2.23-4.82.
targetString: እቲ መሰረታዊ ናይ ምፍርይ ቊጽሪ (R0) 3.77 (95% CI; 3.51-4.05) ከምኡውን እቲ ዝተመዓራረየ R0 2.23-4.82 እዩ ኔሩ።
en-mt: The baseline reproductive coefficient (R0) was 3.77 (95% CI; 3.51-4.05) and the adjusted R0 was 2.23-4.82.

sourceString: The number of infected people increased exponentially before 23 Jan. 2020, matching the time of massive transportation before the Spring Festival in China.
targetString: ክሳብ 23 ጥሪ 2020፡ ብዝሒ ናይቶም ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት ብዓቢ ዓቀን ይውስኽ ኣሎ፡ እዚ ድማ ምስቲ ጽቕጥጥቅጥ ናይ መጎዓዝያ ቅድሚ ናይ ጽድያ ፈስቲቫል ኣብ ቻይና፡ ይዛመድ ኢዩ።
en-mt: As of January 23, 2020, the number of infections is increasing dramatically, related to traffic congestion ahead of the Spring Festival in China.

sourceString: The mortality of patients with confirmed cases was 1.44% (95% CI: 1.10-1.86%), and the adjusted mortality of all the patients was 3.06% (95% CI: 2.02-4.59%).
targetString: ዝተረጋገጸ ሕማም ናይ ዘለዎም መጠነ ሞት 1.44% (95%CI: 1.10-1.86% ) ኮይኑ እቲ ምዕሩይ መጠነ ሞት ኩሎም ሕሙማት 3.06% (95% CI: 2.02-4.59) እዩ።
en-mt: The mortality rate of those with confirmed disease was 1.44% (95%CI: 1.10-1.86% ) and the equivalent mortality rate of all patients was 3.06% (95% CI: 2.02-4.59).

sourceString: Three major risk factors for COVID-19 were sex (male), age (≥60), and severe pneumonia.
targetString: ሰለስተ ዓበይቲ ረቛሒታት COVID-19 ጾታ (ደቂተባዕትዮ)ን ዕድመ (60ን ልዕሊኡን) ከምኡውን ሕማም ሳንቡእ እዮም።
en-mt: The three major factors of COVID-19 are gender (men) and age (60 and older) and lung disease.

sourceString: CoVs are a subfamily of large and enveloped viruses containing a single strand of sense RNA.
targetString: CoVs ንኡስ-ስድራቤት ናይቲ ዓብን ዝተሸፈነን ቫይረስ ኮይኑ፡ ንጽል ክፋል (strand) ናይ ሰንስ ኣር ኢን ኤ  (sense RNA) ድማ ይሽፍን።
en-mt: CoVs are a subfamily of the large, enveloped virus, and encapsulate a single strand of sense RNA.

sourceString: They can be divided into four genera, i.e., alpha, beta, gamma, and delta, of which alpha- and beta-CoVs are known to infect humans.
targetString: ናብ ኣርባዕተ ክፍልታት ክፈላለዩ ይኽእሉ፡ እዚ ድማ፡ ኣልፋ (alpha)፡ ቤታ (beta)፡ ጋማ (gamma)፡ ከምኡውን ደልታ (delta)፡ ካብዚኣቶም ድማ ኣልፋን-በታ-CoVs (alpha- and beta-CoVs) ምስ ሰባት ርክብ ዘለዎም ኢዮም።
en-mt: They can be divided into four classes: alpha, beta, gamma, and delta, of which alpha- and beta-CoVs are human-related .

sourceString: The envelope spike (S) glycoprotein binds to its cellular receptors angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) and dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) for SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, respectively, and then membrane fusion occurs.
targetString: envelop spike (S) celllar receptors angiotensin-converting enzymes 2 (ACE2) ከምኡውን dipeptdyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) ን SARS-CoV ን MERS-CoVብተኸታታሊ ጸኒሑ ድማ ምውህሃድ መምብረን ይኽሰት።
en-mt: envelop spike (S) cellular receptors angiotensin-converting enzymes 2 (ACE2) and dipeptdyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) for SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, respectively, and later membrane fusion occurs.

sourceString: The viral RNA genome is released into the cytoplasm; after replication of the viral genome, genomic RNA accompanied by envelope glycoproteins and nucleocapsid proteins forms virion-containing vesicles, which then fuse with the plasma membrane to release the virus.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረሳዊ RNA ጂኖም (genome) ናብ (cytoplasm) ይነዝዕ፡ ድሕሪ ምብዛሕ ናይ ቫይረሳዊ ጂኖም (genome)፡ ጂኖማዊ (genomic) RNA ብ ሰታሪት ብምስናይ ግሊኮፕሮቲን (glycoproteins)ን ኒክሊሳይድ ፕሮቲንን (nucleocapsid proteins) ነቲ virion-containing ቨሲክልስ (vesicles) ይፈጥሮ፡ ጸኒሑ ድማ ምስ ፕላስማ መምጽረይን ()plasma membrane ይጻመድ/ይሕወስ ነቲ ቫይረስ ክለቆ
en-mt: This viral RNA genome is secreted into the cytoplasm, and after replication of the viral genome, genomic RNA is accompanied by satire with glycoproteins and nucleocapsid proteins to form the virion-containing vesicles , and then couples/combines with the plasma membrane and ()plasma membrane to release the virus

sourceString: The first genomic sequence of SARS-CoV-2 was reported on January 10, 2020.
targetString: ቀዳማይ ጀነቲካዊ ቅርጺ SARS-COV-2 ኣብ 10 ጥሪ 2020 እዩ ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: The first genetic form of SARS-COV-2 was identified on January 10,

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 was found to be a new type of beta-CoV with more than 99.98% genetic identity among 10 sequenced samples collected from the original site of the outbreak, the Huanan Seafood Market in Wuhan.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ካብ 10 ተኸታተልቲ ቅምሶታት ወይ ሳምፕላት 99.98% ጀነቲካዊ መንነት ዘለዎ ሓድሽ ዓይነት beta-CoV ኮይኑ ካብቲ እቲ ሕማም ፈለማ ኣተራእየሉ ኣብ ዉሃን ዝርከብ Huanan Seafood Market እዩ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 is a new strain of beta-CoV with 99.98% genetic identity from 10 consecutive samples from the Huanan Seafood Market in Wuhan, where the disease first appeared.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is genetically more similar to SARS-CoV than to MERS-CoV.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2  ካብ MERS-CoV ንላዕሊ፡ ምስ SARS-CoV  ጀነቲካዊ ምምስሳል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 has genetic similarities to SARS-CoV, rather than MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Through transmission electron microscopy, SARS-CoV-2 particles were found in ultrathin sections of human airway epithelium.
targetString: ብ ምትሕልላፍ ናይ አለክትሮም ሚክሮስቾፒ፡ ክፋላት ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ኡልትራቲን ክፋል ኣብ ወዲ-ሰብ ኣኢርወይ አፒተሊኡም ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: By transmission electron microscopy, fractions of SARS-CoV-2 were detected in the ultrathin fraction of human airway epithelium.

sourceString: Human ACE2 was found to be a receptor for SARS-CoV-2 as well as SARS-CoV.
targetString: ናይ ወዲ-ሰብ ACE2 ተቀባሊ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ን SARS-CoV ሙካኑ ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: Human ACE2 is the receptor of SARS-CoV-2 for SARS-CoV.

sourceString: However, the S protein of SARS-CoV-2 binds to human ACE2 more weakly than that of SARS-CoV, which is coincident with the fact that SARS-CoV-2 causes less severe infection in patients than SARS-CoV.
targetString: እንተኾነ እቲ S ፕሮቲን ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ምስ ወዲ-ሰብ ACE2 ብዉሑድ ደረጃ ዝተሓሓዝ ምስ SARS-CoV ብምዝማድ፡ እዚ ምስቲ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ SARS-CoV ዝተሓተ ደረጃ ዘለዎ ሓደጋ ኣብ ተለከፍቲ የውርድ ዝብል ይጋጠም።
en-mt: However, the S protein of SARS-CoV-2 is minimally associated with human ACE2 relative to SARS-CoV, which coincides with the fact that SARS-CoV-2 poses a lower level of risk to infections than SARS-CoV.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 can also form a novel short protein encoded by orf3b and a secreted protein encoded by orf8.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ብ Orf3b ዝተሻፈረ ሓድሽ ሓጺር ፕሮቲን ብ Orf8 ኮድ ዝረዋህበ: ክፈጥር ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 may form a new short protein shaped by Orf3b encoded by Orf8:.

sourceString: The orf3b of SARS-CoV-2 may play a role in the viral pathogenicity and inhibit the expression of IFNβ; however, orf8 does not contain any known functional domain or motif.
targetString: እቲ orf3b ናይ SARS-COV-2 ኣብ ቫይረሳዊ ሕማማትን ምዕጋት IFNβ ተራ ክጻወት ይኽእል እዩ; ይኹንምበር orf8 ፍሉጥ ዝዓየሉ ግዝኣትን ድርኽኺትን የብሉን።
en-mt: The orf3b of SARS-COV-2 may play a role in viral diseases and inhibition of IFNβ; However, orf8 has no known functional territory and motivation.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Zhou, et al., reported the cryo-EM structure of the full-length human ACE2 at 2.9 Å resolution in complex with the amino acid transporter B0AT1.
targetString: ኣብ 18 ለካቲት 2020, ዝሆን ካልኦትን (Zhou, et al.) ናይ cryo-EM ቅርጺ ኣብ ምሉእ ቁመት ናይ ወዲ-ሰብ ACE2 ኣብ  2.9 Å ምስጻርን ኮምፕለክስ ምስ ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ መጋዓዝያ B0AT1፡ ጸብጻብ ኣቅሪቦም።
en-mt: On February 18, 2020, Zhou et al. (Zhou, et al.) reported the cryo-EM structure of the full-length structure of human ACE2 at 2.9 Å crossing and complex with the amino acid transporter B0AT1.

sourceString: They found that the complex, which had open and closed conformations, was assembled as a dimer and the ACE2-B0AT1 complex can bind two S proteins, which provides evidence for CoV recognition and infection.
targetString: እዚ ዝተረኽቡ ኮምፕክስ ክፉትን ዕጹውን ኣሰራርሓ ዘለዎ ኮይኑ፡ ከም ዲመርን ACE2-B0AT1 ን ክልተ S ፕሮቲናት ዝሓዘ ኮይኑ ተጠርኒፉ፡ ነቲ ናይ CoV ተፈላጥነትን ምትሕልላፋትን ድማ መረጋገጺ የቅርበሉ።
en-mt: These derived complexes have both open and closed functionality, assembled as a dimer and ACE2-B0AT1 containing two S proteins, and offer confirmation for the CoV recognition and translocations.

sourceString: B0AT1 may become a therapeutic target for drug screening to suppress SARS-CoV-2 infection.
targetString: B0AT1 ኣንፈት ናይ መድሃኒት ክህበና ወይኢውን ባዕሉ መድሃኒት ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ  SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳ ንምግታእ ኢዩ።
en-mt: B0AT1 could give us the direction of a drug or it could be a drug itself to contain the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak.

sourceString: The origin and intermediate host
targetString: እቲ መበቆልን ማእከላይ ኣኣንጋዲ
en-mt: The origin and intermediate host

sourceString: It has been known that both SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV originated from bats and were transmitted to humans via civet cats and camels, respectively.
targetString: ክሊቲኦም SARS-CoV ን  MERS-CoV፡ ካብ መንካዕ ከም ዝተበገሱን ብ ሲቨትን ገመልን ድማ ናብ ወዲ-ሰብ ከም ዝተመሓላለፉን ተፈሊጡ  ኢዩ።
en-mt: Both SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, originated from ticks and were transmitted to humans by civets and camels.

sourceString: Through a phylogenetic comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with other CoVs, bats were considered the native host of SARS-CoV-2 as the new virus is 96% identical to two SARS-like CoVs from bats called bat-SL-CoVZX45 and bat-SL-CoVZX21.
targetString: ብ ናይ ፋይሎገነቲክ ምንጽጻር ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ፡ ምስ ካልኦት CoVs፡ መንካዕ ከም መበገሲ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ተገሚተን፡ እዚ ድማ 96% ምስቲ ናይ ቅድሚ ሕጂ ካብ መንካዕ ዝተበገሰ SARS-like CoVs ካብ መንካዕ bat-SL-CoVZX45 ን bat-SL-CoVZX21 ምምስሳል ስለ ዘለዎ ኢዩ።
en-mt: By the phylogenetic comparison of SARS-CoV-2 , with other CoVs, ticks were inferred as the origin of SARS-CoV-2, which is 96% with that of previous tick-originated SARS-like CoVs from the tick bat-SL-CoVZX45 for bat -SL-CoVZX21 because it has similarities.

sourceString: However, what intermediate host helped the virus cross the species barrier to infect humans remains unknown, and the transmission route is yet to be elucidated.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ እቲ ኣኣንጋዲ ብኸመይ ነቲ ቫይረስ ናብቲ ናይ ስፒሽስ ክፋል ነጢሩ ንኽኣቱን ንሰባት ክለኽፎምን ከም ዝሕግዞ ኣይተፈልጠን፡ እቲ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ መንገዲ ውን ብሕጂ ኢዩ ክድህሰስ።
en-mt: However, it is not known how the host helps the virus penetrate the species and infect people, and the route of transmission remains to be explored.

sourceString: Ji, et al., proposed snakes as a carrier of the virus from bats to humans which involved homologous recombination within the S protein.
targetString: ጂ ን ካልኦትን (Ji, et al.,)፡ ን ተመን ከም መመሓላለፊ ናይቲ ቫይርስ ካብ መንካዕ ናብ ሰብ  ብምግባር፡ ነቲ ናይ S ፕሮቲን ሆሞሎጎዝ ምትሕውዋስ ፈጢሮም።
en-mt: Ji et al (Ji, et al.,) generated the homologous fusion of the S protein by using snakes as the vector of the viruses from apes to humans.

sourceString: According to a study, researchers in Guangzhou, China, suggested that pangolins - long-snouted, ant-eating mammals often used in traditional Chinese medicine - are the potential intermediate host of SARS-CoV-2 based on 99% genetic homology in a CoV discovered in pangolins and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ብመሰረት ኣብ ጉዋንዙ ቻይና ዝተገብረ መጽናዕትታት፡ ፓንጎሊን--ነዊሕ ኣፍንጫ፡ በላዕቲ ጻጸ ዝኾኑ መጥበውቲ ሓደ ሓደ ኣብ ግዜ ባህላዊ ፍወሳ ናይ ቻይና ይጥቀሙ ኢዮም (እዚኦም ድማ ከም ቀንዲ ኣኣንገድቲ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ፡  99% ገነቲካዊ ምምስሳል ናይ CoV ኣብ ፓንጎሊን ን SARS-CoV-2 ተረኺቡ )።
en-mt: According to studies in Guangzhou, China, pangolins--long-nosed, ant-eating mammals are sometimes used during traditional Chinese medicine (and these may serve as primary hosts for SARS-CoV-2, 99% genetic similarity of CoV in pangolins). found for SARS-CoV-2 ).

sourceString: However, 1% difference spread all over two genomes is still a big difference; thus, conclusive results for concrete evidence are awaited (Fig. ​(Fig.33).
targetString: እንተኾነ ግና ኣብ ክልተ genomes ዝህሉ ናይ 1% ፍልልይ ዓብዪ ፍልልይ ስለዝኾነ ደምዳሚ ውጽኢት ንጭቡጥ መርትዖ ገለ ትጽቢት ይሓትት እዩ (ስእሊ 33)።
en-mt: however, a 1% difference in two genomes is a large difference and conclusive results require some waiting for actual evidence (Figure 33).

sourceString: The physicochemical properties of SARS-CoV-2 are largely not yet known.
targetString: ፍዝዮከሚክላዊ ባህርያት SARS-CoV-2 ዛጊት ብዙሕ ኣይተፈልጡን።
en-mt: Little is known about the physiochemical properties of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV can survive in vitro for 48 hours in a dry environment and up to 5 days under 20 °C and 40%-50% humidity.
targetString: SARS-CoV ን MeRS-CoV ን ኣብ vitro ን 48 ሰዓታት ኣብ ድሩቕ ኣከባቢ ኣብ ካብ 40%-50% ጠሊ ኣብ ዘለዎን 20 ዲግሪ ሰልሴስን ከኣ ን 5 መዓልታት ክጸንሕ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV and MeRS-CoV can survive in vitro for 48 hours in a dry environment at 40%-50% humidity and 20°C for 5 days.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 may possess similar properties.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ውን ተመሳሳሊ ምልክታት ክህልዎ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 may have similar symptoms.

sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 is sensitive to ultraviolet rays and heat at 56 °C for 30 minutes; ether, 75% ethanol, chlorine-containing disinfectant, peracetic acid, chloroform, and other fatty solvents, but not chlorhexidine, can effectively inactivate the virus.
targetString: ጸብጻባት ከም ዝሕብርዋ፡ SARS-CoV-2 ን ኡልትራ-ቫይለት ጩራ ብቅልጡፍ የለልዮ፡ ደረጃ ሙቀት 56 °C ን  30 ደቃይቅ ኣብ ዝህልወሉ፡ ነዚ ቫይረስ ምሉእ ብምሉእ ካብ ስራሕ ወጻ ኢ ክገብርዎ ዝኽእሉኬሚካላት እዞም ዝስዕቡ ኢዮም 75% ethanol, chlorine-ዝሓዘ መምከኒ, peracetic acid, chloroform, ከምኡ`ውን ካልኦት መሕቀቕቲ ስብሒ, እንተኾነ chlorhexidine ኣይቀትሎን ኢዩ።
en-mt: Reports suggest that SARS-CoV-2 recognizes ultraviolet rays quickly, at a temperature of 56 °C for 30 minutes, and the chemicals that can completely inactivate the virus are 75% ethanol, chlorine-containing disinfectant, peracetic acid, chloroform, and other fatty acids, but chlorhexidine does not kill it.

sourceString: The entire human population generally lacks immunity to SARS-CoV-2 and hence is susceptible to the novel virus.
targetString: እቲ መላእ ናይ ዓለምና ህዝቢ ሓፈሻዊ  ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቅሚ ን SARS-CoV-2 ስኢኑ፡ በዚ ድማ ነዚ ኖቨል ቫይረስ ቃልዕ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The entire world population has lost its overall immunity to SARS-CoV-2, and is thus vulnerable to this novel virus.

sourceString: Currently, no detailed study has been reported regarding the immunological response to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ዛጊት ንግብረመልሲ ባህርያዊ ስርዓተ ምክልኻል SARS-CoV-2 ኣመልኪቱ ዝተገብረ ዝርዝራዊ መጽናዕቲ የለን።
en-mt: There are no detailed studies on the innate immune response to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Thus, we can only refer to previous studies on other CoVs, especially SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV (Fig. ​(Fig.4).4).
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ነቲ ናይ ቀደም መጽናዕቲ ናይ CoVs፡ ብፍላይ ድማ ኣብ SARS-CoV ን MERS-CoV ዝተገብሩ መጽናዕትታት ጥራይ ኢና ከም መወከሲ ክንጥቕመሎም እንኽእል። (ስእሊ. ​(ስእሊ.4).4).
en-mt: Therefore, we can only use the earlier studies of CoVs, especially studies on SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, as references. (Fig. ​ (Fig.4).4).

sourceString: In general, after a virus invades the host, it is first recognized by the host innate immune system through pattern recognition receptors (PRRs) including C-type lectin-like receptors, Toll-like receptor (TLR), NOD-like receptor (NLR), and RIG-I-like receptor (RLR).
targetString: ብሓፈሻ ቫይረስ ንሰብ ምስ ወረሮ ብባህርያዊ ስርዓት ምክልኻል እቲ ሰብ ማለት pattern recognition receptors( PRRs) toll like receptors (TLR) NOD-like receptors (NLR), RIG-I-like RLR እዮም ዘለልይዎ።
en-mt: Generally, when a virus invades a person, it is recognized by the person's innate immune system, namely pattern recognition receptors( PRRs), toll like receptors (TLR), NOD-like receptors (NLR), RIG-I-like RLR.

sourceString: Through different pathways, the virus induces the expression of inflammatory factors, maturation of dendritic cells, and synthesis of type I interferons (IFNs) which limit the spreading of the virus and accelerate macrophage phagocytosis of viral antigens.
targetString: ብዝተፈላለየ ኣገባባት ይኹን እምበር እዚ ቫይረስ ነድሪ ምዕባይ ዋህዮታት Dendritic ከምኡውን ውህደት type I interferons (IFNs) ግብረ-መልሲ ብምቕስቃስ ምልባዕ ናይቲ ቫይረስ ከምዝውሰንን መፍረ ጸረ ቫይረስ ተሃዋስያን macrophage phagocytes ከም ዝቀላጠፍን ይገብር።
en-mt: Through different mechanisms, however, this inflammatory virus stimulates the growth of dendritic cells and a combination of type I interferons (IFNs) response to determine the virulence of the virus and accelerates the production of antiviral sensitive macrophage phagocytes.

sourceString: However, the N protein of SARS-CoV can help the virus escape from the immune responses.
targetString: እንተኾነ እቲ N ፕሮቲን ናይ SARS-CoV ነቲ ቫይረስ ካብቲ ናይ ምክልኻል ሲስተም ንከምልጥ ሓጋዚ ኔሩ።
en-mt: However, the N protein of SARS-CoV helped the virus escape the immune system.

sourceString: Soon, the adaptive immune response joins the fight against the virus.
targetString: ጸኒሑ፡ እቲ ኣዳፕቲቨ (adaptive) ናይ ምክልኻል ሲስተም ነቲ ቃልሲ ኣንጻር ቫይረስ ተሓዊስዎ።
en-mt: Later, the adaptive immune system was incorporated into the fight against viruses.

sourceString: T lymphocytes including CD4+ and CD8+ T cells play an important role in the defense.
targetString: T lymphocytes እንተላይ CD4+ን CD8+ን T ዋህዮታት ኣብ ምከልኻል ኣገዳሲ ተራ ኢዮም ዝጻወቱ።
en-mt: T lymphocytes, including CD4+ and CD8+ T cells, play an important role in protection.

sourceString: CD4+ T cells stimulate B cells to produce virus-specific antibodies, and CD8+ T cells directly kill virus-infected cells.
targetString: CD4+ ዋህዮታት B ብምምንጫው ነቲ ቫይረስ ተባሂሎም ዝስርሑ ጸረ ጓና ኣካል የመንጭዉ እዮም።ዋህዮታት CD8+T ብቐጥት ቫይረስ ዝበከሎም ዋህዮታት ይቐትሉ።
en-mt: CD4+ B cells secrete and produce antibodies to the foreign body processed as the virus.CD8+T cells directly kill virus-infected cells.

sourceString: T helper cells produce proinflammatory cytokines to help the defending cells.
targetString: T ሓገዝቲ ዋህዮታት ነቶም ተኸላኸልቲ ዋህዮታት ንምሕጋዝ ናይ ነድሪ ሳይቶካይንስ የፍርዩ።
en-mt: T helper cells produce inflammatory cytokines to help the immune cells.

sourceString: However, CoV can inhibit T cell functions by inducing apoptosis of T cells.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ CoV ነቲ ናይ T cell ስረሓት ክገትእዎ ይኽእሉ ኢዮም፡ እዚ ድማ ኣፖፖቲስ (apoptosis) T cell ብምፍራይ ኢዩ።
en-mt: However, CoV can inhibit T cell function by producing T cell apoptosis.

sourceString: The humoral immunity including complements such as C3a and C5a and antibodies is also essential in combating the viral infection.
targetString: Humoral immunity እንተላይ ዝኣመሰሉ C3a ን C5a መማልእቲን: ባህርያዊ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ኣካልን ንመልከፍቲ እዚ ሕማም ንምክልኻል ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: Humoral immunity including such as C3a and C5a supplements and: natural antibiotic body is very important to prevent infection of this disease.

sourceString: For example, antibodies isolated from a recovered patient neutralized MERS-CoV.
targetString: ከም ኣብነት፡ ካብ  ዝሕወዩ ተሓከምቲ ዝተነጸሉ ጸረ-ነፍሳት፡ ን MERS-CoV ካብ ስራሕሕ ወጻኢ ጌሮሞ።
en-mt: For example, antibiotics isolated from recovering patients inactivated MERS-CoV.

sourceString: On the other hand, an overreaction of the immune system generates a large number of free radicals locally that can cause severe damages to the lungs and other organs, and, in the worst scenario, multi-organ failure and even death.
targetString: ብኻልእ መገዲ፡ ልዕለ-ግብረ መልሲ ናይ ምክልኻል ሲስተም ብቁጽሪ ብዙሓት ነጻ ራዲካል የፍሪ፡ እዚኦም ከባብያዊ ደረጃ ን ሳንቡእን ካልኦት ህዋሳትን ከቢድ ጉድ ኣት ከውርዱ ይኽእሉ፡ ብዝገደደ ድማ ን ህዋሳት ካብ ስራሕ ወጻኢ ዜሮም ክሳብ ሞት ዘብጽሕ ሓደጋ ከውርዱ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: On the other hand, an overreaction of the immune system produces large numbers of free radicals, which can cause serious damage to the lungs and other organs at the local level, and worse, can cause sensory dysfunction to the point of death.

sourceString: The SARS-CoV-2 infection, featured by clustering onset, is more likely to affect elderly people with comorbidities and pregnant women.
targetString: ለበዳ SARS-CoV-2 ብሓንሳብ ዝበዝሕ ኮይኑ ዝያዳ ን ሽማግለታትን ሕዱር ሕማም ዘለዎምን ነፍሰጾራትን የጥቅዕ፡።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 outbreaks are simultaneous and mostly affect the elderly, the chronically ill and pregnant women.

sourceString: It is common that for people who are exposed to a large number of viruses or whose immune functions are compromised, they have higher chance to be infected than others.
targetString: ንብዙሕ ዝዓይነቶም ቫይረሳት እትቓልዑን ስርዓተ ባህርያዊ ምክልኻል ኣካላቶም ተሃስዩ ዝጸንሐን ሰባት በዚ ቫይረስ ናይ ምጥቓዕ ዕድሎም ዝዓበየ እዩ።
en-mt: People who are exposed to a wide variety of viruses and whose immune systems have been compromised are at increased risk of contracting the virus.

sourceString: The estimated mean incubation period of SARS-CoV-2 is 1-14 days, mostly 3-7 days based on a study of the first 425 cases in Wuhan.
targetString: ናይ ጽፍያ ግዜ ናይ SARS-CoV-2: ካብ 1-14 መዓልታት መብዛሕታኡ ግዜ ድማ ብመሰረት ኣብ ዉሃን ኣብ 425 ሕሙማት ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ካብ 3-7 መዓልታት እዩ።
en-mt: The incubation period of SARS-CoV-2: 1-14 days and usually 3-7 days according to a study of 425 patients in Wuhan.

sourceString: However, a study on 1,099 cases demonstrates that the incubation period was 3 days on average and ranged from 0 to 24 days.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ኣብ 1,099 ግዳያት ብዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ፡ እቲ ናይ ምሕቃፍ ግዚያት ብሓፈሻ 3 መዓልታት ኔሩ፡ ካብ 0-24 መዓልታት ድማ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: however, in a study of 1,099 victims, the incubation periods were generally 3 days and could range from 0-24 days.

sourceString: A more recent study, as described above, demonstrates that the incubation period was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days based on the demography of 8,866 cases.
targetString: ሓደሽ መጽናዕቲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ከምቲ ኣብ ላዕሊ ዝተጠቅሰ፡ እቲ ናይ ምንቃሕ ግዜ፡ ብመሰረት ደሞግራፊ  ናይ 8,866 ሰባት፡ 4.8 (3.0-7.2) መዓልታት ኔሩ።
en-mt: A new study found that, as noted above, the wake time was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days, based on the demographics of 8,866 people.

sourceString: It is very important for health authorities to adjust the effective quarantine time based on the most accurate incubation period, thus preventing infected but symptomless people from transmitting the virus to others.
targetString: ሰብመዚ ጥዕና ምስ ምጽፋይ እዚ ቫይረስ ብዝሰማምዕ ኣገባብ ነቲ ናይ ውሸባ ግዜ ከዳልዉዎ ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ እዩ።ከምዚ ጌሮም ነቶም ዝተለኽፉ ግና ምንም ምልክት ዘየርእዩ ሰባት ካብ መልከፍቲ ክከላኸሉሎም ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: It is very important that health authorities prepare the quarantine period in a way that is consistent with the spread of the virus.This way they can protect those who are infected but show no symptoms from infection.

sourceString: As a common practice, individuals exposed to, or infected by, the virus are usually required to be quarantined for 14 days.
targetString: ከም ልሙድ ንጥፈታት፡ እቶም ብ ቫይረስ ዝተለኽፉ፡ ወይ ዝተቃልዑ፡ ን 14 መዓልታት ክውሸቡ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: As a routine, those infected, or exposed, must be quarantined for 14 days.

sourceString: Should the quarantine time be extended to 24 days?
targetString: እዚ ናይ ውሸባ ግዜ ናብ 24 ሰዓት ክቅጽል ኣለዎ`ዶ ፥
en-mt: Should this quarantine period be extended to 24 hours,

sourceString: Fever is often the major and initial symptom of COVID-19, which can be accompanied by no symptom or other symptoms such as dry cough, shortness of breath, muscle ache, dizziness, headache, sore throat, rhinorrhea, chest pain, diarrhea, nausea, and vomiting.
targetString: ረስኒ ኣብ ገለ ግዚያት እቲ ቀንዲን ዝዓበየን ምልክት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ካልእ ምልክታት ኣብ ዘይህልወሉ ወይ ድማ ደረቅ ሰዓል፡ ሕጽረት ምስትንፋስ፡ ቃንዛ ናይ ጭዋዳ፡ ሕማም ርእሲ፡ ምስልቻው፡ ሕማም ጎሮሮ፡ ሪሆነራ፡ ቃንዛ ኣፍልቢ፡ ውጽ ኣት፡ ናውስያን ተምላስን ኣን ዝረኣየሉ ክከውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: Fever can sometimes be the main and biggest symptom of COVID-19, when there are no other symptoms or when there are no other symptoms or dry cough, shortness of breath, muscle aches, headache, fatigue, sore throat, rheumatism, chest pain, vomiting, Nausea and vomiting may be present.

sourceString: Some patients experienced dyspnea and/or hypoxemia one week after the onset of the disease.
targetString: እቲ ሕማም ድሕሪ ምንታጉ ድሕሪ ሓደ ሰሙን ገለ ሕሙማት ናይ ዳይስፕኒያ ጸገም ኣጓኒፍዎም።
en-mt: A week after the outbreak, some patients developed dyspnea.

sourceString: In severe cases, patients quickly progressed to develop acute respiratory syndrome, septic shock, metabolic acidosis, and coagulopathy.
targetString: ኣብቲ ሓደገኛ ከይዝ (ጉዳይ)፡ እቶም ተሓከምቲ ፡ ከቢድ ምልክታት ናይ ሕማም ምስትንፋስ፡ ከርእዩ ጀሚሮም፡ ሕማቕ ነውጽ/ምንቅጥቃጥ፡ ልዕሊ ዓቀን ኣሲድ፡ ዝኣመሰለ ምልክታት ብቅልጡፍ የማዕብሉ።
en-mt: In the dangerous case, the patients , start to show severe symptoms of respiratory disease, and rapidly develop symptoms such as severe shock/shaking, hyperacidity.

sourceString: Patients with fever and/or respiratory symptoms and acute fever, even without pulmonary imaging abnormalities, should be screened for the virus for early diagnosis.
targetString: ብርቱዕ ረስኒ ወይ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ምልክታት ዘለዎም ሕሙማት ዋላ’ውን ዘይንቡር ናይ ሳናቡእ ስእሊታት ኣብ ዘይብሉ ብእዋኑ መርመራ ኽገብሩ ይግብኦም እዩ።
en-mt: Patients with severe cough or respiratory symptoms should be tested in a timely manner even in the absence of abnormal lung imaging.

sourceString: A demographic study in late December of 2019 showed that the percentages of the symptoms were 98% for fever, 76% for dry cough, 55% for dyspnea, and 3% for diarrhea; 8% of the patients required ventilation support.
targetString: ናይ ዲሞግራፊ (demographic) መጽናዕቲ ኣብ መወዳእታ ናይ 2019 ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ እቶም ሚእታዊት ናይ ምልክታት 98% ናይ ረስኒ, 76% for ደረቅ ሰዓል, 55% ናይ ዲስፊንያ (dyspnea), and 3% ናይ ውጽኣት ከምኡ`ውን 8% ካብቶ ሕምሙት ቨንቲላሽን የድልዮም።
en-mt: A demographic survey at the end of 2019 showed that the percentages of symptoms were 98% for cough, 76% for dry cough, 55% for dyspnea, and 3% for diarrhea and 8% of patients required ventilation .

sourceString: Similar findings were reported in two recent studies of a family cluster and a cluster caused by transmission from an asymptomatic individual.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ቀረባ ግዜ መጽናዕቲታት ተመሳሳሊ ብዘይ ምንም ምልክታት እቲ ሕማም ዘለዎ ሰብ እተመሓላለፈ ተረኽቦታት ፋሚሊ ክላስተር ተጸብጺቡ እዩ።
en-mt: Similar cases of familial cluster transmission without any symptoms of the disease have been reported in recent studies.

sourceString: Comparably, a demographic study in 2012 showed that MERS-CoV patients also had fever (98%), dry cough (47%), and dyspnea (55%) as their main symptoms.
targetString: ብተዛማዲ፡ መጽናዕቲ ናይ ዲሞግራፊ ኣብ 2012 ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ MERS-CoV ተሓከምቲ ብርቱዕ ረስኒ ኣለዎም (98%)፡ ደረቕ ሰዓል (47%),  ከምኡውን ዲስፐንያ  (55%) ከም ቀንዲ ምልክታቶም።
en-mt: Relatively, a survey of demographics in 2012 found that MERS-CoV patients have a high fever (98%), dry cough (47%), and dyspnea (55%) as their primary symptoms.

sourceString: However, 80% of them required ventilation support, much more than COVID-19 patients and consistent with the higher lethality of MERS than of COVID-19.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ 80% ካብኦም ናይ ቨንቲለሽን ደገፍ የድሊዮም፡ ካብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ተሓከምቲ ኣዝዩ ዝዓቢ ጠለብ ኢዩ፡ ከምኡ`ውን MERS ካብ ኮቪድ-19 ዝለዓለ ደረጃ ናይ ምቅታል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: However, 80% of them require ventilatory support, a much higher demand than COVID-19 patients, and MERS has a higher death rate than COVID-1

sourceString: Diarrhea (26%) and sore throat (21%) were also observed with MERS patients.
targetString: ውጽኣት (26%) ከምኡውን ሕማም ጎሮሮ (21%)፡ ኣብ ሕሙማት MERS ተራእይዕም ኢዮም።
en-mt: Diarrhea (26%) and sore throat (21%) were reported in MERS patients.

sourceString: In SARS patients, it has been demonstrated that fever (99%-100%), dry cough (29%-75%), dyspnea (40%-42%), diarrhea (20-25%), and sore throat (13-25%) were the major symptoms and ventilation support was required for approximately 14%-20% of the patients.
targetString: ኣብ ሕሙማት SARS እቶም ቀንዲ ምልክታት: ሕማም ረስኒ (99%-100%): ደረቕ ሰዓል (29%-75%): ዳይስፕንያ (40-42%) ውጽኣት (20-25%):(13-25%) ሓናት ክኾኑ እንከለዉ ንኣስታት 14%-20% ካብ ሕሙማት ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሓገዝ ዘድልዮም እዮም።
en-mt: In SARS patients the main symptoms are: fever (99%-100%), dry cough (29%-75%), dyspnea (40-42%) diarrhea (20-25%):(13-25%) fever while requiring ventilatory assistance for approximately 14%-20% of patients.

sourceString: By February 14, the mortality of COVID-19 was 2% when the confirmed cases reached 66,576 globally.
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት 14፡ ሓደጋ ሞት ናይ ኮቪድ-19፣ 2% ኔሩ፡ እቶም ዝተለኽፉ ግዳያት ብ ዓለም ደረጃ 66,576 ክበጽሑ እንከለዉ።
en-mt: On February 14, the death risk from COVID-19, was 2%, while the number of infected victims worldwide reached 66,5

sourceString: Comparably, the mortality of SARS by November 2002 was 10% of 8,096 confirmed cases.
targetString: ብተዛማዲ፡ ናይ ሞት መጠን ናይ SARS ኣብ ሕዳር 2002፡ 10% ካብ 8,096 ልኹፋት ኔሩ።
en-mt: In comparison, the death rate of SARS in November 2002 was 10% of 8,096 infected.

sourceString: For MERS, based on a demographic study in June 2012, the mortality was 37% of 2,494 confirmed cases.
targetString: ን MERS፡ ኣብቲ ደሞግራፊክ መጽናዕቲ ናይ 2102 ብምሙርካስ፡ እቲ ናይ ሞት መጠን 37% ናይቶም 2,494 ልኹፋት ኔሩ።
en-mt: For MERS, based on the demographic study of 2102, the mortality rate was 37% of the 2,494 infected.

sourceString: An earlier study reported that the R0 of SARS-CoV-2 was as high as 6.47 with a 95% confidence interval (CI) of 5.71-7.23, whereas the R0 of SARS-CoV only ranged from 2 to 4.
targetString: ኣቐድሙ እተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ከም ዘመልክቶ: R0 ናይ SARS-COV-2 ክሳብ 6.47 ን 95% ኮንፊደንስ ኢንተርቫል (CI) 5.71-7.23 ክኸውን እንከሎ R0 ናይ SARS-CoV መጠኑ ካብ 2 ክሳብ 4 እዩ።
en-mt: Previous studies have shown that the R0 of SARS-COV-2 ranges from 6.47 to 6.47 with a 95% confidence interval (CI) of 5.71-7.23, while the R0 of SARS-CoV ranges from 2 to

sourceString: A comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with MERS-CoV and SARA-CoV regarding their symptoms, mortality, and R0 is presented in Table ​Table1.1.
targetString: ምምንጽጻር ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ምስ MERS-CoV ን SARA-CoV ፡ ከምኡውን R0 : ምልክታቶምን: ምጣነ-ሞቶምን፡ ኣብ ግምት ብምእታው፡ ኣብ ሰሌዳ 1.1 ተቐሚጡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: A comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with MERS-CoV taking into account SARA-CoV , and R0 : their symptoms and: their etiology, is given in Table 1.1.

sourceString: The above figures suggest that SARS-CoV-2 has a higher ability to spread than MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV, but it is less lethal than the latter two.
targetString: እዞም ኣብ ላዕሊ ዘለዉ ስእልታት ከምዝሕብርዎ፡ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ MERS-CoV ን SARS-CoV ን፡ ዝለዓለ ተኽእሎ ናይ ምስፍሕፋሕ ኣለዎ፡ እንተኾነ ናይ ምቕታል ዓቅሙ ካብ ክልቲኦም ዝተሓተ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The figures above show that SARS-CoV-2 is more likely to spread than MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV, but has a lower killing potential than both.

sourceString: Thus, it is much more challenging to control the epidemic of SARS-CoV-2 than those of MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ምቁጽጻር ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ለበዳ ካብ ምቁጽጽራ ናይ SARS-CoV ኣዝዩ ዝኸፈአን፡ ብዙሕ ብድሆታት ዘለዎን ኢዩ።
en-mt: Therefore, control of the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak is much worse and more challenging than the control of SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Clustered onset often happens in the same family or from the same gathering or vehicle such as a cruise ship.
targetString: ኣብ ሓደ ቤተሰብ ወይ ኣብ ሓደ ዓይነት ምትእኽኻባት ወይ ናይ ምዝንጋዕ መራኽብ ጅምላዊ መጥቃዕቲ የጋጥም እዩ።
en-mt: Mass attacks happen in the same family or at the same gatherings or recreational vessels.

sourceString: Patients often have a history of travel or residence in Wuhan or other affected areas or contact with infected individuals or patients in the recent two weeks before the onset.
targetString: ሕሙማት ዝበዝሐ ኣዋን ናይ ጒዕዞ ታሪኽ ዘለዎም ወይ ኣብ ቅድሚ ምጅማር እቲ ሕማም ኣብ ዉሃን ወይ ካልኦት በዚ ቫይረስ እተጠቕዓ ከባቢታት ዝተንቀሳቐሱ እዮም።
en-mt: Patients most often have a travel history or moved to Wuhan or other affected areas before the onset of the disease.

sourceString: However, it has been reported that people can carry the virus without symptoms longer than two weeks and cured patients discharged from hospitals can carry the virus again, which sends out an alarm to increase the time for quarantine.
targetString: ይኹን ምበር ሰባት ዝኾነ ምልክታት እቲ ሕማም ከየርኣዩ ንልዕሊ ክልተ ሳምንቲ ነዚ ሕማም ክስከምዎ ከም ዝኽእሉን: እቶም ሓውዮም ካብ ሆስፒታል ዝፋነዉ ሰባት ነቲ ቫይረስ ንደገ ሒዞሞ ክወጹ ስለዝኽእሉ ናይ ውሸባ ግዜ ንምውሳኽ ተወሳኺ መጠንቀቕታ ዝህብ እዩ።
en-mt: However, it is an additional warning to extend the quarantine period as people can carry the disease for more than two weeks without showing any symptoms.

sourceString: Patients have normal or reduced number of peripheral white blood cells (especially lymphocytes) at the early stage.
targetString: ሕሙማት ኣብ ፈለማ ደረጃ እቲ ሕማም ንቡር ወይ ጎደሎ ቁጽሪ ጸዓዱ ዋህዮታት ደም ብፍላይ ድማ lymphocytes ይህልዎም።
en-mt: Patients have normal or deficient white blood cell counts, especially lymphocytes, in the early stages of the disease.

sourceString: For example, lymphopenia with white blood cell count < 4×109/L including lymphocyte count < 1×109/L, and elevated aspartate aminotransferase levels and viremia were found in 1,099 COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ከም ኣብነት፡ ሊምፎቢንያ (lymphopenia) ወይ ዋሕዲ ናይ ዋህዮታት ደም ቁጽሪ፡ < 4×109/L፡ ን ሊምፋቲክ ቁጽሪ ዘጠቃለለ < 1×109/L፡ ከምኡ`ውን ልዕል ኣስፓርትረይት ኣሚኖትራንስፈረስ (aspartate aminotransferase)ን ቨርሚያ (viremia)ን ኣብቶም 1,099 ተሓከምቲ ኮቪድ-19 ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: For example, lymphopenia or low blood cell count, < 4×109/L, including lymphatic count < 1×109/L, and elevated aspartate aminotransferase and viremia in the 1,0 COVID-19 patients were found.

sourceString: The levels of liver and muscle enzymes and myoglobin were increased in the blood of some patients, and C-reactive protein and erythrocyte sedimentation were increased in the blood of most patients.
targetString: ኣብዞም ዝተጠቕሱ ሕሙማት መጠን አንዛይማት ጭዋዳን myglobin ምውሳኹን C-reactive ከምኡውን ተነጻፍነት ቀያሕቲ ዋህዮታት ደም ኣብ ዝበዝሑ ሕሙማት ምውሳኹን ድማ ተራእዩ።
en-mt: The levels of muscle enzymes and myglobin were increased in these patients and C-reactive and red blood cell sensitivity were increased in most patients.

sourceString: In patients with severe cases, the level of D-dimer, a fibrin degradation product present in the blood, was elevated, and lymphocyte count was progressively reduced.
targetString: ኣብቶም ብዙሕ ጸገማ ዘለዎም ተሓከምቲ፡ ዓቀን ናይቲ D-dimer (ውጽ ኢት ናይ ፋይብሪን (fibrin) ድርቅምቃም) ይውስኽ፡ ቁጽሪ ናይ ላይምፎሳይት (lymphocyte) ድማ ይጎድል።
en-mt: In patients with multiple complications, the amount of D-dimer (the product of fibrin clotting) increases and the number of lymphocytes decreases.

sourceString: Abnormalities in chest radiography are found in most COVID-19 patients and featured by bilateral patchy shadows or ground glass opacity in the lungs.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ደረት ራድዮግርፊ ዝህሉ ዘይንቡር ኲነታት ኣብ ዝበዝሑ ሕሙማት COVID-19 ዝርከቡ ኮይኖም ክልተኣዊ ልጥፍጣፍ ጽላሎታት ወይ ናይ ባይታ ጥርሙስ ዝመስል ጋራድነት ኣብ ሳንቡእ ይረአ።
en-mt: Abnormalities on chest radiography are found in most patients with COVID-19 and include bilateral flattened shadows or ground bottle-like guardrails in the lungs.

sourceString: Patients often develop an atypical pneumonia, acute lung injury, and acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: ሕሙማት ዘይተለምደ ነድሪ ሳናቡእ መጒዳእቲ ሳናቡእን ሕማም ምስትንፋስ (ARDS) የማዕብሉ።
en-mt: Patients develop atypical pneumonia, lung injury and acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).

sourceString: When ARDS happens, uncontrolled inflammation, fluid accumulation, and progressive fibrosis severely compromise the gas exchange.
targetString: ARDS ኣብ ዝፍጠረሉ፡ ዘይግታእ ነድሪ፡ ምእካብ ፈሳሲ፡ ከምኡውን ቀጻሊ ጸሓጎት ብምፍጣር ነቲ ናይ ጋዝ ምልውዋጥ ኣዝዩ ይቃወሞ።
en-mt: When ARDS occurs, it severely resists gas exchange by causing uncontrollable inflammation, fluid accumulation, and persistent secretions.

sourceString: Dysfunction of type-I and type-II pneumocytes decreases the surfactant level and increases surface tension, thus reducing the ability of the lungs to expand and heightening the risk of lung collapse.
targetString: ናይ type-I ን  type-II ነሞሳይትስ (pneumocytes) ካብ ስራሕ ወጻኢ ሙኻን ነቲ ደረጃ ናይ ሳርፋክታንት (surfactant) የጉድሎን ከምኡ`ውን ን ውጥረት ናይ መናርቕ ይውስኾ፡ በዚ ድማ ሰናቡእ ከይንፈሓ ይኽልኽል፡ ነቲ ሓደጋ ናይ ሳናቡእ ውን ይውስኽ።
en-mt: Dysfunction of type-I and type-II pneumocytes reduces surfactant levels and increases alveolar tension, thus preventing lung inflammation and increasing the risk of pneumonia.

sourceString: Therefore, the worst chest radiographic findings often parallel the most severe extent of the disease.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ እቲ ዝኸፈአ ናይ ርኽበት ናይ ኣፍልቢ ራድዮ-ግራፍ፡ ወላውን ምስቲ ዝኸፈአ ደረጃ ናይቲ ሕማም ምምስሳል ዘለዎ።
en-mt: Thus, the worst of the findings chest radiograph, even with parallels to the worst stage of the disease.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of COVID-19 demonstrated the desquamation of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation, and interstitial lymphocyte infiltration, and multinucleated syncytial cells in the lungs of a patient who died of the disease, consistent with the pathology of viral infection and ARDS and similar to that of SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: ኣብ 18 ለካቲቲ 2020፡ ናይ መጀመርያ መርመራ ጠንቂ ሕማም ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተገብረ ምቕላጥ ናይ ሽፋን ናይ ነሞሳይትስ (pneumocytes)፡ ሂይላይን (hyaline) ሽፋን ምስራሕን ምጽራይ ናይ ኢንተርስቲሻል ሊምፎሳይትንን (interstitial lymphocyte)፡ ከምኡ`ውን   እቶም ሙልቲኒክለታይድ ሲንሲሻል (multinucleated syncytial) ዋህዮታት ናይቶም ብሰንኪ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝሞቱ ተሓከምቲ ምስቶም ናይ SARS ን  MERS ተሓከምቲ ተመሳሳሊ ፓተሎጂን (ሰበብ-ሕማም) ናይ ቫይረሳዊ ምትሕልፍን ARDS፡ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: On February 18, 2020, the first diagnosis of the cause of COVID-19 was peeling of the membrane of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation and purification of interstitial lymphocyte, and the multinucleated syncyti al) cells Patients who die from the virus have the same pathology (cause-of-disease) of viral transmission and ARDS, as patients with SARS and MERS.

sourceString: The detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA via reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) was used as the major criteria for the diagnosis of COVID-19.
targetString: እቲ ምልላይ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 RNA ብ ኣንጻር-ትራንስችሪፓተአይስ ፖሊመረይስ ቻይን ረኣክሽን (reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR)) ን ምፍዋስ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ከም ቀንዲ መምዘኒ ተወሲዱ።
en-mt: The detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA by reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) was considered the main criterion for the cure of COVID-1

sourceString: However, due to the high false-negative rate, which may accelerate the epidemic, clinical manifestations started to be used for diagnosis (which no longer solely relied on RT-PCR) in China on February 13, 2020.
targetString: ይኹንምበር ብስንኪ ልዑል ናይ ሓሶት ኣሉታዊ ኣሃዛትን እዚ ከስዕቦ ዝኽእልን ምግዳድ ለበዳ እቲ ሕማም ኣብ ቻይና ኣብ ለካቲት 13, 2020 ኣብ RT-PCR ጥራይ ዘይምርኮስ ክሊኒካዊ ግልጸታት ኣብ ጠቕሚ ክውዕሉ ተጌሮም።
en-mt: However, due to the high false negative figures and the potential exacerbation of the outbreak in China on February 13, 2020, clinical manifestations that do not rely solely on RT-PCR were introduced.

sourceString: A similar situation also occurred with the diagnosis of SARS.
targetString: ምስ ምምርማር ናይ SARS ውን ሓደ ዓይነት ኩነታት ተፈጢሩ።
en-mt: The same situation occurred with the investigation of SARS.

sourceString: Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical manifestations, laboratory tests, and radiological findings is essential and imperative for making an effective diagnosis.
targetString: ስለዚ ጥሙር ሓበሬታ ታሪኽ ሕማም፥ ክሊኒካዊ ግልጸት እቲ ሕማም፡ መርመራ ላቦራቶሪን ሬድዮሎጂን ኣድላዪ መርመራ ንምግባር ኣገደስቲ እዮም።
en-mt: Therefore, a comprehensive history, clinical presentation, laboratory and radiological tests are essential to make the necessary diagnosis.

sourceString: On February 14, 2020, the Feng Zhang group described a protocol of using the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detects synthetic SARS-CoV-2 RNA fragments at 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 copies per microliter of input) using a dipstick in less than an hour without requiring elaborate instrumentation.
targetString: ለካቲት 14 2020 ጒጅለ FengZhang ምስ CRISPR ዝመደብሩ ተክኒክ SHERLOCK ሕማም SARS-CoV-2 ንምድህሳስ ፕሮቶኮል ምእታዉን: እዚ ፕሮቶኮል ድማ ሲንተቲክ SARS-CoV-2 ቁርጽራጻት RNA ብመጠን 20 x10-18 mol/L ከሳብ 200x10-18 mol/L (10-100 ኮፒታት ኣብ ማይክሮሊተር እታው) ጥምዙሕ መሳርሒ ከይተጠቀምካ ኣብ ውሽጢ ሰዓት ድፕስቲክ እናተጠቐምካ ዝካየድ ኣገባብ እዩ።
en-mt: February 14 2020 FengZhang's team introduced a protocol to explore SARS-CoV-2 disease with the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique: this protocol uses synthetic SARS-CoV-2 RNA fragments in the range of 20 x10-18 mol/L to 200x10-18 mol/L (1 -100 copies per microliter of input) is a method that is performed within an hour using a dipstick without the use of a twisted instrument.

sourceString: Hopefully, the new technique can dramatically enhance the sensitivity and convenience if verified in clinical samples.
targetString: ብተስፋ፡ እዚ ሓዲሽ መንገዲ ነዚ ውጽኢታውነት ክውስኸሉ ንጽበ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ክሊኒክ እንተተረጋጊጹ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Hopefully, this new approach will increase this effectiveness if it is proven in the clinic.

sourceString: Due to the lack of experience with the novel CoV, physicians can mainly provide supportive care to COVID-19 patients, while attempting a variety of therapies that have been used or proposed before for the treatment of other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other viral diseases (Table ​(Table2).2).
targetString: ብሰምኪ ሕጽረት ናይ ተመክሮ ምስ ኖቨል CoV፡ ፊዚሽያናት ውን ን ተሓከምቲ ኮቪድ-19 ዘድሊ ሕክምናን ክንክንን ክገብሩሎም ይኽእሉ ኢዮም፡ እዚ ድማ ነቶም ዝተፈላለዩ ቅድሚ ሕጂ ን ኮልኦት CoVs ከም SARS-CoVን ከምኡውን  MERS-CoVን ካልኦት ዝኣመሰሉ ዝወሃብ ዝነበረ ተራፒታት/መድሃኒታት ብምፍታን ኢዩ ዝግበር (ሰንጠረጅ ​((ሰንጠረጅ2).2)።
en-mt: Due to lack of experience with novel CoV, physicians may also provide the necessary treatment and care to COVID-19 patients by testing the various therapies/drugs previously given for other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and others ( Table ((Table2).2).

sourceString: These therapies include current and potential treatments with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine, and psychological support.
targetString: እዞም ናይ ሕክምና ኣገልግሎታት፡ ህሉውን ጽፉፍን ኣገባብ ናይ ሕኽምና ምስ ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት፡ ኢምሚኖሱፕረሳንት (immunosuppressants)፡ ስተሮይድ (steroids)፡ ፕላስማ ካብ ዝሓወዩ ሕሙማት፡ ቻይናዊ መዳኒት ከምኡ`ውን ሳይኮሎጂካዊ (psychological) ደገፍ ይሓትት።
en-mt: These treatment services require current and efficient treatment with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine and psychological support.

sourceString: Even plasma from recovered patients was proposed to be used for treatment.
targetString: ወላ`ውን እቲ ፕላስማ ካብ ዝሓወዩ ሰባት ን ክንክን/መድሃኒት ክጠቅም ከም ዝኽእል ይንገር።
en-mt: Even the plasma from recovered people is said to be useful for care/medicine.

sourceString: Pharmaceutical companies are racing to develop antibodies and vaccines against the virus.
targetString: እተን ናይ መድሃኒት ዘፍርያ ትካላት (Pharmaceutical companies) ነቲ ኣንጻር ቫይረስ ዝኾነ ጸረ-ነፍሳትን ክታበታትን ከፍርያ ይቃለሳን ይወዳደራን ኣለዋ።
en-mt: The pharmaceutical companies are struggling and competing to produce the antiviral antibiotics and vaccines.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 mainly attacks the lungs in the beginning and probably also attacks, to a lesser degree, other organs that express ACE2, such as the gastrointestinal system and the kidneys.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ብቀዳምነት ን ሳንቡእ የጥቅዕ፡ ነተን ካልኦት  ህዋሳት ድማ፡ ACE2 ዝኽዝኑ ከም ከስዐ-መዓናጡ (gastrointestinal)ን ኩሊትን፡ ብዉሑድ ዓቀን ይጎድእ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 primarily attacks the lungs, and to a lesser extent damages the other organs, such as the gastrointestinal and kidneys, which store ACE2

sourceString: Nevertheless, respiratory dysfunction and failure are the major threat to the patients and the major cause of death.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፡ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ካብ ስራሕ ወጻኢ ሙኻን ወይ ስራሕ ምቁራጽ፡ ቀንዲ ጠንቒ ሓደጋ ን ሕሙም ኮይኑ ክሳብ ሞት ድማ ከብጽሖ ይኽእል።
en-mt: However, respiratory dysfunction or cessation of function is the main cause of accident for the patient and can lead to death.

sourceString: Thus, respiratory support is critical to relieve the symptoms and save lives and includes general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, noninvasive ventilation, and invasive mechanical ventilation depending on the severity of the disease.
targetString: ስለዚ፣ ደገፍ ኣብ ምስትንፋስ ነቲ ምልክታት ኣብ ምዕጋዝን ብ ሂወት ኣብ ምቕጻልን ዝዓበየ ተራ ኢዩ ዝጻወት፡ እዚ ድማ ሓፈሻዊ  ኦክሲጅናዊ ክንክን፡ ልዑል መጠን ናይ ኦክሲጅን፡ ዘይተጋዳኢ ቨንቲሌሽን ዘጠቃለለ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብቲ ደረጃ ናይቲ ሕማም ብምሙርካስ ድማ ይወሃብ ።
en-mt: Therefore, respiratory support plays an important role in helping the symptoms and staying alive, including general oxygen care, high oxygen levels, and non-invasive ventilation, depending on the stage of the disease.

sourceString: Patients with severe respiratory symptoms have to be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used for the treatment of life-threatening cardiac or respiratory failure.
targetString: እቶም ብርቱዕ ናይ ሕማም ምልክታት ዘለዎም ተሓከምቲ፡ በቲ አክስትራሰርፖራል መምብረይን ኦክሲጊኔሽን (extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO)) ክድገፍ ኣለዎ፡ ዝተመዓራረየ ካርድዮፓልሞናሪ ናይ ምሕላፍ መንገዲ፡ እዚ ድማ ከቢድ ናይ ልቢ ወይ ምስትንፋስ ጸገም ኣብ ዘጋጥመና ይድግፈና።
