sourceString: The RBD of SARS-CoV is capable of recognizing the ACE2 receptors of various animals, including bat, civet, mouse and raccoon dog, allowing interspecies transmission of the virus.
targetString: እቲ RBD ናይ SARS-CoV ነቲ ACE2 ናይ እንስሳታት ተቀበልቲ ፡ ክፈልጦ ተኽእሎ ኣለዎ፡ እዚ ድማ ን መንካዕ ፡ ሲቨ፡ ኣንጭዋ፡ ረኮን ከልቢ ዘጠቃለለን ነቲ ናይ ቫይረስ ምምሕልላፍ ዘፍቅድን ኢዩ
en-mt: The RBD of SARS-CoV is likely to recognize the ACE2 of animal receptors , which includes monkeys , seagulls, ducks, raccoons and dogs and allows for the transmission of the virus

sourceString: In fact, only 6 amino acid residues were observed to be different from human and civet viral isolates in the RBD and 4 of them locate in the receptor-binding motif for interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: ከም ሓቂ፡ 6 ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ ጥራይ ተረፍ መረፍ ንካብ ሰባትን ዝባድን ቫይራል ዝተፈላለየ ኣብ ኣርቢዲ ን ዝተፈላለዩ ክኾኑ ትዕዝብቲ ነይሩ።ኣርባዕቲኦም ኣብ ተቀባሊ መዛዘሚ ኩነት ምዉስሳእ ምስ ACE2 ተቀባሊ ይርከብ።
en-mt: In fact, only 6 amino acid residues were observed to differ from human and viral variants in RBD. All four are found in the receptor end state of interaction with the ACE2 receptor.

sourceString: Civet SARS-CoV has K479N and S487T mutations in its RBD, which might increase the affinity of the interaction of spike protein with human ACE2 receptor.
targetString: ካብ SARS-CoV ዝርከብ K479N ን S487T  ለውጢ  ኣብ RBD ኣለዎ፡ እዚ ድማ ንምቅርራባት ናይ ስፓይክ ፕሮቲን (spike protein) ምስ ናይ ሰባት ACE2 ተቀባሊ ስሕበት ፈጢሩ።
en-mt: K479N and S487T from SARS-CoV have changes in the RBD that attracted the affinities of the spike protein to the human ACE2 receptor.

sourceString: In other words, these two amino acid substitutions might be critical to viral adaption to humans.
targetString: ብካልእ ኣዘራርባ፡ እዞም ክልተ ምቅይያራት ናይ ኣሚኖ ኣሲድስ፡ ነቲ ናይ ቫይራል ምምስሳል ምስ ሰባት ኣስጋኢ ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ
en-mt: In other words, these two amino acid changes may be a threat to viral replication in humans

sourceString: It is noteworthy that SARS-CoV-2 shares the same cellular receptor with SARS-CoV.
targetString: እቲ SARS-CoV-2 ምስ SARS-CoV ተመሳሳሊ ወይ ሓደ ዓይነት ናይ ዋህዮ ተቀበልቲ ከም ዘለዎም ክግንዘብ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: The SARS-CoV-2 must be recognized as having the same or the same cell receptors as SARS-CoV.

sourceString: A 30% difference between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV in the S1 unit of the S protein implicates that the binding affinity of its S protein with human ACE2 might have altered.
targetString: እዚ 30% ናይ S ፕሮቲን ፍልልይ ኣብ መንጎ SARS-CoV-2 ን SARS-CoV S1 ናይ መዕቅኒ ኣሃዱ፡ እቲ ምምስሳል ናይ S ፕሮቲን ምስ ናይ ሰባት ACE2 ተቀይሩ ወይ ድማ ተለዊጡ ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ
en-mt: This 30% difference in S protein between the SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV S1 measurement units may be due to the fact that the homology of the S protein to human ACE2 has been altered or mutated

sourceString: Indeed, a cryo-EM study indicates a 10- to 20-fold higher affinity of this binding than that between human ACE2 and SARS-CoV S protein.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ናይ ሰባት አይሲኢ 2 ን SARS-CoV S ፕሮቲን ዘሎ ምትእሳር 10 ክሳብ 20 ናይ ምትዕጻፍ ዝላዓለ ድሌታቱ ከም ዝኮነ cryo-EM  መጽናዕቱ የመልክት።
en-mt: His cryo-EM studies indicate that the binding between human ICE 2 and SARS-CoV S protein is 10 to 20 times its maximum requirements.

sourceString: It will also be of interest to determine whether any other coreceptor might be required for SARS-CoV-2 transmission.
targetString: ካልእ ብሓባር ዝቕበል ን SARS-CoV-2  ከማሓላልፍ ምልላይ ኣገዳሲ ኮይኑ።
en-mt: It became important to identify another co-recipient to transmit SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Intriguingly, HCoV-NL63 also binds to ACE2 but with a different part of S.
targetString: ውዲት፡ከምኡ'ውን HCoV-NL63  ናብ ACE2 ይእሰር፡ግን ምስ ዝተፈላለየ ክፋል ናይ ኤስ እዩ።
en-mt: Conspiracy: Also, HCoV-NL63 binds to ACE2, but with a different portion of the S.

sourceString: There exist many other HCoV receptors, such as aminopeptidase N for HCoV-229E, and 9-O-acetylated sialic acid for HCoV-OC43.
targetString: ብዙሕ ካልእ ዝህሉ HCoV ፡ከም ባዓል aminopeptidase  (ኣሚኖፐፕታይዳዝ)  N ናይ HCoV-229E ኢ ን 9-0 ኣሰቲሌትድ ሲያሊክ ኣሲድ ናይ ኤች ኮሮናቫይረስ ን ናይ HCoV-OC43።
en-mt: Many other HCoVs exist, such as the aminopeptidase (aminopeptidase) N of HCoV-229E and the 9-0 acetylated sialic acid of H coronavirus and HCoV-OC4

sourceString: They might also account for successful adaptation of these CoVs in humans after interspecies transmission from their animal hosts.
targetString: እዚ ኮሮናቪረስ ኣብ ሰባት ካብ መዕቆቢ እንስሳታት ድሕሪ ምትሕለላፍ ዕዉት ዝኾነ ልምምድ ኣቑጺሩ።
en-mt: The coronavirus has been a successful practice after being transmitted to humans from animal shelters.

sourceString: In addition to cellular receptors, the outcome of interspecies transmission of HCoVs is also governed by other host dependency and restriction factors.
targetString: ከም ተወሳኺ ናይ ዋህዮታዊ ተቀበልቲ፡ እቲ ውጽኢት ናይ ኣብ መንጎ ሓደ ዓይነት ዓሌት ዘለዎም እንስሳታት ዝካየድ ናይ ሕማም ምትሕልላፍ ምስ HCoVs፡ ብ ካልኦት ኣአንገድቲ ተሞርኮስቲ ናይ ሓጹር ረቃሒታት ዝመሓደር ኢዩ።
en-mt: As additional cellular receptors, the outcome of disease transmission between animals of the same species with HCoVs is governed by other host-dependent barrier factors.

sourceString: The divergence of these host proteins between humans and natural reservoir hosts of HCoVs such as bats, dromedary camels and rodents might constitute a barrier to interspecies transmission.
targetString: እቲ ምፍንጣሕ ናይ ኣኣንገድቲ ፕሮቲን ኣብ መንጎ ደቂ ሰባትን ባህርያዊ ናይ ምቅባል ተኽእልቶታ ዘለዎም ኣኣንገድቲ HCoVs፡ ከም መንካዕ፡ ድሮመዳርይ ዓሌት ገመል፡ ከምኡ’ውንምንጽጹላይን፡ እቲ ኣብ መንጎ ሓደ ዓሌት ናይ እንስሳ ጥራይ ክኸውን ዝነበሮ ምምሕልላፍ ከልኪልዎ ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: The cleavage of host proteins between humans and host HCoVs with natural receptivity, such as ticks, dromedary camels, and mussels, may have prevented transmission that should have been between only one animal species.

sourceString: HCoVs have to usurp host dependency factors and subvert host restriction factors for a successful interspecies transmission.
targetString: HCoVs ዕዉት ዝኾነ ንናይ ሓድሕድ  ምትሕለላፍ ንኽገብር ናይ ማዕቑቦ ተጸጋዕነትን ናይ ማዕቑቦ ቅየዳ ረቛሕን ክምንጥል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: For HCoVs to undergo successful mutual transmission it must assume host dependency and host constraint factor.

sourceString: In this regard, molecular determinants in this important area of virus-host interaction remain to be identified and characterized.
targetString: በዚ መንጽር፡ሞለክዩላር ወሳኒ መዕቆቢህይወታውያንን ቫይረስንምርኻብ ክልለንባህሪኡ ገላጺ ክኸውን ክኢሉ።
en-mt: In this sense, the molecular critical host of organisms and viruscontact regions became expressive in nature.

sourceString: An unbiased genome-wide screening of host dependency and restriction factors for SARS-CoV-2 using the state-of-the-art technology of CRISPR might be fruitful.
targetString: ወገን ዘይሕዝ ምኽልካል ን ኣኣንጋዲ ናይ ተሞርካሲ ን ሕዙእን ን ናይ SARS-CoV-2፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ናይ ሃገራዊ-ናይ-ጥበብ ተክኖሎጂ CRISPR ብምጥቃም ፍርያም ክኸውን ይኽእል
en-mt: Non-partisan inhibition of the host of target and reservoir of SARS-CoV-2, which can be produced using the state-of-the-art CRISPR technology

sourceString: Emergence of novel HCoVs: back to ground zero
targetString: ህጹጽ ኹነት ናይ ዘገርም HCoVs ፡ናብ ዝታሓተ ዜሮ ወሪዱ።
en-mt: The emergency of surprising HCoVs , has dropped to a low of zero.

sourceString: The diversity of bat CoVs provides ample opportunities for the emergence of novel HCoVs.
targetString: ፍልልያት ናይባት ኮሮናቫይረስ ን ናይ ኣገራሚ HCoVs ዕድል ሂቦም።
en-mt: Variations of Naibat coronaviruses have given rise to surprising HCoVs.

sourceString: In this sense, bat CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoVs.
targetString: በዚ መልክዕ፡ ናይ መንካዕ CoVs ከም ናይ ጂን ፑል ናይ HCoVs ኮይኑ የገልግል።
en-mt: In this form, mouse CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoVs.

sourceString: In addition, rapid mutation and genetic recombination also drive HCoV evolution and serve as two important steps in this process.
targetString: ከም ተወሳኺ፡ ቅልጡፍ ለውጢን ናይ ጂናት ምትሕውዋስን ፡ ከም ናይ HCoV ፍልቀት ኮይኑ ከገልግል ይኽእል፡ ብተወሳኺ’ውን ከም ክልተ ኣገደስቲ ደረጃታት ናይ መስርሕ ኮይኑ ከገልግል ይኽእል።
en-mt: In addition, rapid change and gene shuffling , may serve as HCoV evolution, and may also serve as two important stages of the process.

sourceString: For example, the acquisition or loss of novel protein-coding genes has the potential to drastically modify viral phenotypes.
targetString: ከም ኣብነት፡ እቲ ናይ ኖቨል ፕሮቲን-ኮድ ጊን ርኽበት ወይ ጥፍኣት ነቲ ቫይራል ፈኖታይፕ ብዓብኡ ወይ ብሰፊሕ ክቕይሮ ተኽእሎታት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: As an example, the discovery or loss of a novel protein-coding gene has the potential to dramatically or extensively alter the viral phenotype.

sourceString: Among SARS-CoV accessory proteins, ORF8 has been thought to be important in adaptation to humans, as SARS-CoV-related bat viruses were isolated but found to encode divergent ORF8 proteins.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ሓጋዚ ፕሮቲናት ናይ SARS-CoV ፡ ORF8 ሰባት ንምልምማድ ኣድላዪ ከምዝኸውን ትኩረት ተጌርሉ።ከም SARS-CoV -ዝዛመድ ናይ መንካዕ ቫይረሳት ተፈልዮም ኔሮም ግን ንዝተፈላለየ ORF8 ፕሮቲን ከመስጥር ተርኺቡ።
en-mt: Among the accessory proteins of SARS-CoV, it was noted that ORF8 would be necessary for human adaptation.Such as SARS-CoV -related tick viruses were isolated but found to encode a different ORF8 protein.

sourceString: A 29-nucleotide deletion characteristic of SARS-CoVs has been found in strains isolated at the beginning of the human epidemic.
targetString: ኣብ መጀመርያ ናይ ሰባት ለበዳ፡29ንዩክሎታይድ ጠባያዊ ድምሰሳ ናይ SARS-CoVs ኣብ ፍሉይ መጉዳእቲ ተረኺቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: In early human epidemics,29nucleotide characteristic deletion of SARS-CoVs has been found in specific lesions.

sourceString: This deletion splits ORF8 into ORF8a and ORF8b and is thought to be an adaptive mutation that promotes the switch of hosts.
targetString: እዚ ምድምሳስ እዚ ን ORF8 ናብ ORF8a ን ORF8b ክፈላልዮም ይኽእል፡ ሓደ ኣዋሃሃዲ ለውጢ ን ምቅይያር ናይ ኣኣንገድቲ ዘቀድም ድማ ተባሂሉ ይጽዋዕ
en-mt: This deletion can segregate ORF8 into ORF8a and ORF8b, and is referred to as a coordinating change that precedes the switch of hosts

sourceString: Besides, SARS-CoV has a possible recombination history with lineages of alpha- and gamma-CoVs, where a large number of smaller recombinant regions were identified in the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: ጎድኒ ጎድኑ ድማ፡ SARS-CoV ናይ ከም እንደገና ናይ ምትእኽኻብ ታሪኽ ኣብ ወለዶታት ናይ alpha-ን gamma-CoVs ኣለዎም፡ ኣብቲ RNA-ተወካሊ ናይ RNA ፖሊመረይስ ድማ ብዝሒ ቁጽሪ ዘለዎ ናይ ንኢሽተይ መተኣኻኻቢ ተረኺቢ ወይ ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: In parallel, SARS-CoV have a history of reassembly in generations of alpha- and gamma-CoVs, and a large number of small reassemblers have been detected or identified in the RNA-representative RNA polymerase.

sourceString: Recombination locations were also identified in the nsp9, most of nsp10, and parts of nsp14.
targetString: ዳግማይ ምሕዋስ ቦታታት ኣብ nsp9፡ዝበዝሕ ኣብ nsp10 ን ክፋል ናይ nsp14 ውን ተገሊጹ ኔሩ እዩ።
en-mt: Reinsertion sites in nsp9, mostly in nsp10 and part of nsp14 were also reported.

sourceString: Likewise, it has been shown that the epidemic MERS-CoV experienced recombination events between different lineages, which occurred in dromedary camels in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: ከምኡ’ውን ፡ እዚ ናይ MERS-CoV ምልባዕ ፡ ኣብ ዝተፈላለየ ግዚያት ናይ ወለዶታት ዝተፈላለዩ ምትሕውዋሳት ከርኢ ክኢሉ ኢዩ፡ ከም ኣብነት ናይ ድሮምዳርይ ዓሌት ገመል ኣብ ስዑዲ-ዓረብ።
en-mt: Also , this MERS-CoV outbreak has been able to show different mixtures of generations at different times, such as the Dromdary breed of camel in Saudi-Arabia.

sourceString: Besides SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, recombination events have also been observed in other HCoVs, in which the HCoVs recombine with other animal CoVs in their non-structural genes.
targetString: SARS-CoV ከምኡውን  MERS-CoV ኣነጻጺሪካ፡ኣብ ካልእ ኤችኮቭ ፍጻሜ ናይ ዳግም ምትሕውዋስ ተራእዩ።ኣብቲ ናይ ዘይቅርጻዊ ጅን እቲ HCoVs  ምስ ናይ ካልእ እንስሳ HCoVs  ይሓብር።
en-mt: Comparing SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, there was an event of recombination in another HCOV.

sourceString: It should also be cautioned that artificial selection can contribute to unintended changes in viral genomes, most likely resulting from relieving viruses from selection pressures exerted, such as by the host immune system.
targetString: ዝበዝሕ ተማሳሳሊ ወጽኢት ካብ ዝነበሩ ቫይረሳት ከም በዓል መዕቆቢ ስርዓት ኢምንዮ ካብ ጸቕጥታት ምርጫ ተደሪኾም ኣርተፊሻዊ  ምርጫ ናብ ዘይተደለየ ለውጥታት ኣብ ጂኖም  ከበርክት ስለዝኽእል ክጥንቀቐሉ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Much of the same outcome must be avoided as artificial selection can contribute to undesirable changes in the genome driven from selection pressures from existing viruses such as the harboring immune system.

sourceString: An example of these effects is the loss of a full-length ORF4 in the HCoV-229E prototype strain, owing to a two-nucleotide deletion.
targetString: ንኣብነት ናይዞም ውጽኢታት ክሳራ ናይ ሙሉእ ንውሓት ORF4 ኣብ HCoV-229E  መጉዳእቲ ቀዳማይ ስራሓት እዩ።እዚ ንክልተ ናይ ኒዩክሎታይድ ድምሰሳ ይእዉዶ።
en-mt: An example of these results is the loss of full-length ORF4 in HCoV-229E injury.

sourceString: While intact ORF4 could be observed in bat and camel viruses related to HCoV-229E, the alpaca alpha-CoV displays a single nucleotide insertion, resulting in a frameshift.
targetString: ኣብ መንካዕን ገመልን ዘሎ ቫይረስ ምስ HCoV-229E ብምዝማድ ORF4 ብምልኣት ክረአ ክኢሉ።ኣልፓካ alpha-CoV ምእታው ንጽል ኒዩክሎታይድ ኣብ ዓንኬል ለውጢ ክርአ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The virus in rabbits and camels was able to visualize the ORF4 in its entirety relative to HCoV-229E.Alpaca alpha-CoV insertion of single nucleotides can be visualized in the circle of change.

sourceString: Last but not least, the evolution of novel HCoVs is also driven by the selection pressure in their reservoir hosts.
targetString: መወዳእታ ግን ከኣ ዘይዉሕድ፡ እዚ ፍልቀት ናይ ኖቭል ኤችኮቭ ብምርጫ ጸቅጢ ኣብ መዕቆሪ መዕቆቢታቶም  ይወጽእ።
en-mt: Last but not least, this evolution of novel Hcov emerges by selective pressure on their buffer reservoirs.

sourceString: Asymptomatic or only mild symptoms were detected when bats were infected with CoVs, indicating the mutual adaptation between CoVs and bats.
targetString: ፈኪስ ምልክታት ወይ ዳርጋ ዘይረ እዩ ምልክታት እቶም መናካዕ ብ CoVs ምስተለኽፉ ክረኣይ ጀሚሩ ፡ እዚ ድማ ተማላላኢ ምውህሃድ ኣብ መንጎ CoVs ን መናክዕን ዘርኢ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Mild symptoms or almost no symptoms began to appear when the parasites were infected with CoVs, indicating complementary interactions between CoVs and parasites.

sourceString: It appeared that bats are well adapted to CoVs anatomically and physiologically.
targetString: ከምቲ ተበጺሑ ዘሎ ጸብጻብ መንካዕ ነዚ CoVs ብ ኣካልን ብውሽጢን ተወሃሂዳቶ ከም ዘላ ኢዩ።
en-mt: As reported, Menka has integrated these CoVs physically and internally.

sourceString: For example, defects in the activation of pro-inflammatory response in bats efficiently reduce the pathology triggered by CoVs.
targetString: ከም ኣብነት፡ ኣንጻር ቁጥዐን ነድሪን ዝከላኸል መስርሕ ኣብ መንካዕ ናይ ጸረ ሕማም ዝግበር ንጥፈታት ውን ብ CoVs ብምጅማር ይጸልዎ፡፡
en-mt: As an example, protective processes against irritation and inflammation are also affected by triggering CoVs at the touch of anti-disease activity.

sourceString: Besides, the natural killer cell activity in bats is suppressed due to upregulation of inhibitory natural killer cell receptor NKG2/CD94 and low expression level of major histocompatibility complex class I molecules.
targetString: ጎኒ ጎኒ ድማ፡ እቲ ቀታሊ ዋህዮ መስርሕ ኣብ ውሽጢ መንካዕ ተዓቢጡ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ በቲ ባህርያዊ ዓንቃፊን ቀታሊን ዋህዮ NKG2/CD94 ባህርያት ዝመጸ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብ መንጎ እቶ ሓደ ዓይነት ቲሹ ዘለዎም ውልቀኛታት ናይ ምውህሃድን ዝተሓላለኸ ደረጃ 1 ዘለዎ ናይ ሞሎኪላት መስርሓትን ዘጠቃለለ ኢዩ።
en-mt: In parallel, the killer cell process is suppressed in the mouse, resulting from the inherent inhibitory and killer cell NKG2/CD94 properties, including the integration of individuals with the same tissue and complex level 1 molecular processes.

sourceString: Moreover, the high level of reactive oxygen species (ROS) generated from high metabolic activity of bats could both suppress CoV replication and affects proofreading by exoribonuclease, thus providing the selection pressure for the generation of virus strains highly pathogenic when introduced into a new host.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ እቲ ዝለዓለ ጽፍሒ ናይ ጂር ግብረመልሳዊ ኦክስጂን (ROS) ልዑል ንጥፈታት ካብ metabolic  (ሜታቦሊክ) ናይ መንካዕ ይወጽእ። ንናይ CoV  ምድቓል ክጸቅጥን ዳግመ ግምት ብ ኤግዞሪቦንዩክሊዝ ክጸሉን ይኽእል።ኣብ ሓድሽ መዕቆቢ ክኣቱ እንከሎ ዝለዓለ ሰበብ ሕማም የምጽእ።
en-mt: In addition, the highest density of reactive oxygen (ROS) high activity is derived from the metabolic of ruminants. It can suppress CoV hybridization and affect review by exoribonuclease.It brings a higher cause of disease when it enters a new host.

sourceString: More pathogenic CoV strains might also evolve by recombination, leading to the acquisition of novel proteins or protein features for host adaptation.
targetString: ዝበዝሐ ሰበብ ሕማም CoV  ብ ዳግመ ምትሕውዋስ ክፈልቕ ይኽእል፡እዚ ናብ ምግዛእ ናይዘደንቕ ፕሮቲንስ ወይ ባህርያት ናይ ፕሮቲን መዕቆቢ ሂወታውያን ንምርዓም ይመርሕ።
en-mt: Most causes of CoV disease can arise by recombination, which leads to the acquisition of remarkable proteins or the adoption of properties of protein host organisms.

sourceString: Thus, it is not by chance that three novel HCoVs have emerged in the past two decades.
targetString: እምብኣርከስ፡እቶም 3 ኣደነቕቲ HCoVs ኣብ ዝሓለፈ 2 ዓሱረ-ዓመት ዝተቐልቀለ ብ ኣጋጣሚ ዝመጸ ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: So,the 3 remarkable HCoVs that have emerged in the last 2 decades are not a coincidence.

sourceString: CoVs are non-pathogenic or cause mild symptoms in their reservoir hosts such as bats and camels.
targetString: CoVs  ወይ ኩሎም ዓይነታት ኮሮናቫይረሳት ነቶም ከም መመሓላለፍቲ ዝጥቀምሎም እንስሳታት ከም በዓል መንካዕ፡ ገመል ዝኾነ ሕማም ኣየምጽኡሎምን እዮም ንገሊኦም ከኣ  ቀሊል ሕማም የምጽእለሎም።
en-mt: CoVs or all types of coronaviruses do not cause any illness to the animals they use as vectors such as monkeys, camels and some cause mild illness.

sourceString: They replicate robustly without eliciting a strong host immune response.
targetString: ጹኑዕ ዝኾነ ናይ ምቍዋም መስርሕ ከየማዕበሉ፡ ኣዝዮም የስፋሕፍሑ።
en-mt: Without developing a strong resistance process, they spread too much.

sourceString: Herein lie the secrets of why asymptomatic carriers are seen and what causes the severe cases in human infection.
targetString: ንምንታይ እዩ ሕቡእ፡ምልክታት ዘይብሎም ሕሙማትዝረኣዩን እቲ ጽንኩር ኩነት ኣብ ናይ ሰባት መልከፍቲ ጠንቁ እንታይ እዩዝብለ ሄርይን ጌጋ ሓበሬታ ሂቡ።
en-mt: Harry gave the wrong information about why latent, asymptomatic patients are seen and what causes the severe condition in human infections.

sourceString: The severe symptoms are mainly due to the hyperactivation of immune response and the cytokine storm wherein the stronger the immune response, the more severe the lung damage.
targetString: እቲ ኣዝዩ ጽንኩር/ኣጸጋሚ ምልክታት ድማ በቲ ኣዝዩ ንጡፍ።ውዑይ ናይ ምክልኻል መስርሕ ን ናይ ሲይቶኪን ማዕበልን፡ ዘምጽኦ ሳዕቤን ኢዩ፡ በዚ መልክዕ ድማ እቲ ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ክዓቢ እንከሎ እቲ ሳንቡእ ክጉዳእ ዘለዎ ተኽእሎ ድማ ዓቢ ይኸውን።
en-mt: The most severe/difficult symptoms are the consequences of the most active.hot immune process and cytokine waves, thus increasing the immune system and increasing the likelihood of lung damage.

sourceString: In contrast, in asymptomatic carriers, the immune response has been de-coupled from CoV replication.
targetString: ብ ኣንጻሩ፡ ኣብቶም ምልክታት ሕማም ዘይብሎም ተሰከምቲ ናይዚ ሕማም፡ እቲ ናቶም ናይ ምጽዋር ዓቕሚ ካብ ናይ CoV ምርባሕ ዝተዋሰበ ኢዩ።
en-mt: In contrast, in asymptomatic carriers of the disease, their resistance is derived from CoV reproduction.

sourceString: The same strategy of delinking the immune response might have beneficial effects in anti-SARS-CoV-2 therapy.
targetString: ሓደ ዓይነት ስትራተጂ ናይ ሕማም ነጻ ዝኾነ ግብረ መልሲ ዘይምርኻብ ኣብ ናይ ጸረ- SARS-CoV-2 ብዘይመድሃኒት ፍወሳ ጠቃሚ ውጽኢት ክህሉዎ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The same strategy of not meeting a disease-free response may have beneficial effects in of anti- SARS-CoV-2 non-drug therapy.

sourceString: The interferon response is particularly strong in bats.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ኢንተርፈሮን ግብረ መልሲ ብፍላይ ኣብ መንካዓት ሓያል እዩ።
en-mt: This interferon reaction is particularly strong in ticks.

sourceString: Thus, administration of type I interferon at least in the early phase of SARS-CoV-2 infection in humans should be beneficial.
targetString: እዞም ምሕደራ ናይ ጉጅለ 1 እንተወሓደ ኣብ መጀመርያ ገጽ ናይ SARS-CoV-2  ኣብ ሰባት ጠቓሚ ክኸውን ኣለዎ ኢሎም ኢዶም የእትዉ።
en-mt: These intervene that the management of group 1 should be beneficial at least in the initial phase of SARS-CoV-2 in humans.

sourceString: In addition, NLRP3 inflammasome activation in bats is defective.
targetString: ከምተወሳኺ፡ NLRP3 ትሑት ምንቅስቓስ ነድሪኣብ መንክዓት ኣበረኛ  እዩ።
en-mt: In addition, NLRP3 is a low-activity inflammatory agent.

sourceString: By this reasoning, inhibition of NLRP3 inflammasome with MCC950 might be useful in the treatment of COVID-19.
targetString: በዚ ምኽንያት ድማ ምሕላክ ወይ ምእሳር ናይ NLRP3 ነድሪ ብ MCC950 ኣዝዩ ጠቃሚ ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ ን ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ምፍዋስን ምሕካምን።
en-mt: For this reason, inhibition or arrest of NLRP3 inflammation by MCC950 may be very useful in the treatment and treatment of COVID-1

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 follows the general theme by which SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV arose.
targetString: ምቕልቃል ናይ SARS-CoV-2  ነቲ ሓፈሻዊ ኣርእስቲ ይስዕቦ፡ብእኡ  ውን SARS-CoV  MERS-CoV ተላዒሉ።
en-mt: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 follows the general theme,by which SARS-CoV also emerged MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Whereas a bat beta-CoV sharing 95% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV has been found, there also exists a bat-CoV sharing 96% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ብኣንጻሩ beta-CoV ምስ SARS-CoV  95% ዝምድና nucleotide  (ንዩክሎታይድ) ከምዝካፈል ተረኺቡ ኣሎ፡ኣብኡ ውን ከምተወሳኺ ምስ SARS-CoV-2 96% ይህልዎ።
en-mt: In contrast, beta-CoV has been found to share 95% nucleotide identity with SARS-CoV, where it also has 96% with SARS-CoV-2

sourceString: Whereas civets and other animals in the markets have been found to harbour viruses identical to SARS-CoV, immediate intermediate hosts for SARS-CoV-2 have not been identified.
targetString: ከምኡ ኸኣ ዝባዳትን ካለኦት እንስሳታት ኣብ ዕዳጋን ተመሳሳሊ መዕቆቢ ቫይረስ ን ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ተረኺቡ።ቀጥታዊ ማእከላይ መዕቆቢ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ክሳብ ሕጂ ኣይተገልጸን።
en-mt: However, zebras and other animals in the market have been found to harbor the same virus for SARS-CoV-2. The direct harborage of SARS-CoV-2 has not yet been described.

sourceString: Pangolin beta-CoVs strikingly homologous to SARS-CoV-2 have been found, indicating that pangolins might serve as one of intermediate hosts or pangolin beta-CoVs could contribute gene fragments to the final version of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ፓንጎሊን ቤታ-CoVs እቲ ቀንዲ ዘመድ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ተረኺቡ ኣሎ፡እዚ ድማ ፓንጎሊን ሓደ ካብቶም ቀዳሞት ኣኣንገድቲ ክኸውን ይኽእል፡ ወይውን ፓንጎሊን ቤታ-CoVs ፡ ናብቲ ናይ መወዳእታ ገጽ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ናይ ጂን ፍንጫላት ክቅርበሉን ከበርክተሉን ይኽእል
en-mt: Pangolin beta-CoVs The major relative of SARS-CoV-2 has been discovered, which suggests that pangolins may be one of the first hosts, or pangolin beta-CoVs , to provide and contribute gene fragments to the final surface of SARS-CoV-2

sourceString: Although questions remain, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 is man-made either deliberately or accidentally.
targetString: ሽሕ'ኳ ሕቶ እንተሃለወ፡ሳርስኮቪድ2 ኮነ ኢሉ ዝመጸ ድዩ ወይስ ሰብ ዝሰርሖ ሃንደበት ዝመጸ ዘረድእ ጭብጢ የለን።
en-mt: Despite the question, there is no evidence to suggest whether SARSCOVID2 came about deliberately or man-made suddenly.

sourceString: CoVs have returned to the limelight due to the recent outbreak of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ብምኽንያት ናይዚ ቀረባ እዋን ምልባዕ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 CoV  ማእከል ኣቓልቦ ንምስሓብ ተመሊሱ።
en-mt: Due to the recent outbreak of SARS-CoV-2 the CoV center has returned to draw attention.

sourceString: The study of CoVs in bats and other animals has drastically changed our perception of the importance of zoonotic origins and animal reservoirs of HCoVs in human transmission.
targetString: መጽናዕቲ ናይ CoVs  ኣብ መንካዕን ካለኦት እንስሳታትን ን ኣረኣእያና ኣገዳስነት ናይ መበቆል ዙኖቲክ ብሓይሊ ቀይሩ፡ከምኡ'ውን ሓጽቢ እንስሳ ናይ HCoVs  ምትሕልላፍ ሰባትን።
en-mt: Studies of CoVs in monkeys and other animals have drastically changed our view of the importance of zoonotic origins, and the animal pool of HCoVs transmission to humans.

sourceString: Pervasive evidence has shown that SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 have a bat origin and are transmitted to humans via intermediate hosts.
targetString: ዝተኣኻኸበ መርትዕታት ከም ዝሕብሮ SARS-CoV ፡ MERS-CoV ን SARS-CoV-2 ናይ መንካዕ መበቆል ዘለዎም ኮይኖም ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ድማ ብ መተሓላለፊ ኣኣንጋዲ ክመሓላለፉ ይኽእሉ
en-mt: Accumulated evidence suggests that SARS-CoV , MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are of mosquito origin and can be transmitted from person to person by host transmission

sourceString: Given that SARS-CoV infection originates from the contact between humans and civets in the markets, closing wet markets and killing civets therein could have effectively ended the SARS epidemic.
targetString: ከም ዝተዋህበ እቲ መልከፍቲ ናይ SARS-CoV ኣብ ዕዳጋታት ካብ ምትንካፍ ኣብ መንጎ ሰባትን ዝባድን ዘሎ ይብገስ።ምዕጻው ጥሉል ዕዳጋታትን ምቅታል ዝባድን ኣብቲ ቦታ እቲ ለበዳ SARS  ክጠፍእ ይገብሮ።
en-mt: As given, the infection of SARS-CoV in markets originates from contact between people and zebras. Closing hidden markets and killing zebras will eliminate the SARS outbreak in the area.

sourceString: By the same reasoning, pangolins should be removed from wet markets to prevent zoonotic transmission, in view of the discovery of multiple lineages of pangolin beta-CoVs closely related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ብሓደ ዓይነትምኽንያት ምትሕልላፍ ዙኖቲክ ንምክልኻል ጽሒራ ካብ ጠሊ ዘለዎ ዕዳጋታት ክርሕቑ ኣለዎም።ብ ዓይኒ ድህሰሳ ኣብ ብዙሓት ናይ ጽሒራ ወለዶታት beta-CoVs ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ጥቡቕ ዝምድና ኣለዎ።
en-mt: For the same reason, to prevent zoonotic transmission, Tzhira should stay away from wet markets.From a visual perspective, beta-CoVs in many Tzhira generations are closely related to SARS-CoV-2

sourceString: However, whether and how SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted to humans through pangolins and other mammals remain to be clarified in future investigations.
targetString: ብዝኾነ ብከመይ SARS-CoV-2  ናብ ሰባት ብመንገዲ ጽሒራን ካለኦት መጥበውትን ናብ ሰባት የማሓላልፉ ኣብ ናይ መጻኢ መጽናዕቲ ክንጽር እዩ።
en-mt: However, how SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted to humans through ticks and other mammals will be clarified in future studies.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has existed in dromedary camels for a long time.
targetString: በቲ ሓደ ወገን፡ MERS-CoV ኣብ ኣግማል ንነዊሕ ግዜ ጸንሑ ኣሎ።
en-mt: On the one hand, MERS-CoV has been around for a long time in camels.

sourceString: These camels serve as an important tool for transportation as well as a main source of meat, milk, leather and wool products for the local people.
targetString: እዘን ኣግማል ከም ኣገደስቲ መሳርሒ ናይ መጎዓዝያ ማዕረ ማዕሪኡ ከም ቐንዲ ምንጪ  ናይ ስጋ፡ጸባ፡ቆርበት ጸብሪን ንናይ ውሽጢ ሰባት የገልግል።
en-mt: These camels serve as important means of transportation as well as a major source of meat, milk, hides and skins for the locals.

sourceString: They are widely distributed across the Middle East and Africa.
targetString: ኣብ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕን ኣፍሪቃን ብሰፊሕይ ዝርግሑ።
en-mt: Widely distributed in the Middle East and Africa.

sourceString: It is therefore impossible to sacrifice all camels for the control of MERS, as what was done in wild animal markets in China to prevent the spreading of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ን መስርሕ ምቁጽጻር ናይ MERS ንምትግባር ን ኩለን ኣግማል ክትስውኣን ከቢድ ኢዩ፡ ልክዕ ከምቲ ኣብቲ ናይ እንስሳ ዘገዳም ዕዳጋ ዝተገብረ ኣብ ቻይና፡ ን መስርሕ ምቁጽጻር ናይ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ SARS-CoV ን SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: Therefore, it is difficult to sacrifice all camels to control the spread of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2, as was done in the wildlife market in China.

sourceString: To stop the recurrent outbreaks of MERS, a comprehensive approach should be taken to develop effective vaccines against MERS-CoV for camels, in combination with other infection control measures.
targetString: እዋናዊ ለበዳ ናይ CoVs ንምቁራጽ  እናማዕበለ ዝኸደ ኣድማዒ ክታበት ን ናይ ኣግማል MERS-CoV ኣብ መዐቀኒ መቆጻጸሪመልከፍቲ ብምሕዋስክውሰድ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: To stop the current outbreak of CoVs, an increasingly effective vaccine should be developed by including camel MERS-CoV in the infection control standard.

sourceString: As we are not able to eliminate these viruses, new genotypes might emerge to cause outbreaks.
targetString: ነዚ ናይ ሕጂ ቫይረስ ክንኣልዮ ክሳብ ዘይከኣልና፡ ሓደሽቲ ዓይነት ጂኖትይፐ ተፈጢሮም ኣዝዮም ከስፋሕፍሑ ድማ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: Unless we can eradicate the current virus, new genotypes may emerge and spread rapidly.

sourceString: A variety of zoonotic CoVs are circulating in the wild.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ዞኖቲክ ኮሮናቫይረስ ኣብ እንስሳ መሮር ይመሓላለፉ።
en-mt: Various zoonotic coronaviruses are transmitted in wildlife.

sourceString: Particularly, bat CoVs with zoonotic potential are so diverse.
targetString: ብፍላይ ድማ፡ መንካዕ CoVs ምስ ዞኖቲካዊ ዓቅሚ ኣዝዮም ሰፋሕቲ ኢዮም
en-mt: In particular, touch CoVs are very widespread with zoonotic potential

sourceString: There are plenty of opportunities that these zoonotic CoVs evolve and recombine, resulting in the emergence of new CoVs that are more transmissible and/or deadly in humans in future.
targetString: እዞም ዙኖቲክ ኮቭ ዝፈልቁሉን እንደገናዝሕወሰሉን ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ ዕድላት ኣሎ።ዉጽኢት ናይዚ ምቅልቃል ሓድሽ ኮሮናቫይረሳት ኣብ ሰባት ብዙሕ ኪመሓላለፍ ዚከኣልን ቀተልትን እዮም።
en-mt: There are so many opportunities for these zoonotic coves to emerge and re-incorporate.The result of this emergence of new coronaviruses is highly transmissible and deadly in humans.

sourceString: The culture of eating wild animals in some places of China should be abandoned to reduce unnecessary contact between humans and animals.
targetString: እዚ ኣብ ገለ ከባቢታት ናይ ቻይና፡ ብ ባህሎም ናይ መሮር እንስሳታት/ እንስሳ-ዘገዳም ክበልዑ ዝጸንሑ፡ ነዚ ዘይተደልየ ካብ እንስሳ ናብ ሰብ ዝመሓላለፍ ተላባዒ ሕማም ንሙግዳል፡ ክእገድ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: This should be banned in some parts of China, where they have traditionally eaten wild animals/ wildlife, to combat this unwanted animal-to-human infection.

sourceString: With the ordeals of SARS, MERS and COVID-19, a better preparedness and response plan should be in place.
targetString: ምስ ፈተነታት ናይ SARS, MERS ከምኡ’ውን COVID-19፡ ሓደ ጽፉፍ ምድላውን ናይ መልሲ መደብን ኣብ ባይታ ክህሉ ኣለዎ
en-mt: With the attempts of SARS, MERS and COVID-19, there must be a sound preparedness and response plan in place

sourceString: In fact, many viruses have existed in the planet for a very long time.
targetString: ግደ ሓቂ ብዙሓት ቫይረሳት ኣብ ዓለም ንነዊሕ  ዓመታት ነይሮም እዮም።
en-mt: In fact, many viruses have existed in the world for many years.

sourceString: They stay in their own natural reservoirs until there is a chance for spillover.
targetString: ክሳብ ሓደ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ውይ ምስዓግ ባይታ ዝፍጠረሎም፡ ኣብቲ ባህርያዊ መንበሪኦም ይቅመጡ
en-mt: They remain in their natural habitat until a transmission or relocation platform is created

sourceString: Although bats have many features that favours the spreading of viruses, the chance for humans to be in contact with bats and other wildlife species can be minimized if people are educated to stay away from them.
targetString: ሽሕ እኻ መንካዕ ነቲ ቫይረስ ንምስፍሕፋሕ ዘክእል ብዙሕ ጠባይ እንተለዎ፡ሰባት ካብ መንካዕን ካልአትጅር እንስሳ መሮርንዝራከብሉ ዕድላት ክዉሕድ ይካእልእዩ፡እንተ ደኣ ሰባት ካብኣቶምክርሕቁ ተማሂሮም።
en-mt: Although ticks have many characteristics that allow them to spread the virus, the chances of people coming into contact with ticks and other wildlife may be reduced if people learn to stay away from them.

sourceString: Continuous surveillance in mammals is necessary for better understanding of the ecology of CoVs and their natural hosts, which will prove useful in preventing animal-to-human transmission and future outbreaks.
targetString: ቀጻሊ ጽኑዕ ሓለዋ ኣብ መጥበውቲ ምሕደራዊ ናይ CoVs  ባህርያዊ መዕቆቢታቶምን ንብሉጽ ምርዳአ ኣድላዪ እዩ፡እዚካብ እንስሳ ናብ ሰባት ምትሕልላፍ ንመጻኢ ለብዒ ንምክልኻል ይጠቅም።
en-mt: Continued strict surveillance in mammals is necessary for a better understanding of the management of CoVs and their natural reservoirs, which will help prevent future outbreaks from animal to human transmission.

sourceString: To conclude, the most effective way to prevent viral zoonosis is for humans to stay away from the ecological niches of the natural reservoirs of the zoonotic viruses.
targetString: ንምጥቕላል እቲ ቐንዲ ውጺኢታዊ ዝኾነ መንገዲቫይራል ዙነሲስ ንምክልኻል፡ሰባት ክጥንቀቑሉ ዘለዎም ካብ ኢኮሎጂካል ምድግጋፍ ናይ መዕቆቢ ዞነቲክ ቫይረሳት ምርሓቕ እዩ።
en-mt: In summary, the most effective way to prevent viral zoonosis is to avoid ecological support of harboring zoonotic viruses.

sourceString: Several pieces in the puzzle of the zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 are still missing.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ጭራማት ናይ ግድላት ናይ ዞኖቲካዊ መበቆል ናይ SARS-CoV-2፡ ክሳብ ሕጂ ኣይተረኽቡን ወይ ጠፊኦም ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Some monsters of the conundrums of the zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2, have not yet been found or are missing.

sourceString: First, if bats transmit an ancestral virus of SARS-CoV-2 to pangolins, it will be of interest to see under what circumstances bats and pangolins could share the same ecological niche.
targetString: መጀመርያ፡ እንተ ድኣ መንካዓት ንጥንታዉያን ቫይረስ ናይ SARS-CoV-2  ናብ ጺሕራታት ኣማሓላሊፈን፡ኣብ ትሕቲ ከመይ ዝበለ ኩነታት መንካዓትን ጽሒራታትን ሓደ ዓይነት ሓድሕዳዊ ዝምድና ናይ ከባቢኦም ክካፈሉ ይኽእሉ ክትፈልጥ ኣገዳሲ ይገብሮ።
en-mt: First, if ticks transmitted the ancient SARS-CoV-2 virus to ticks, it makes it important to know under what circumstances ticks and ticks can share the same interrelationship of their environment.

sourceString: Second, if bats play a more direct role in human transmission, how humans get into contact with bats should be determined.
targetString: ካልአይ፡ናብ ሰባት ንምትሕልላፍ መንካዕ ቀጠታዊ ተራ ትጻወት እንተደኣ ኮይና፡ሰባትብከመይ ምስ መንካዕ ይራኸቡ ክውሰን ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Second, if mosquitoes play a direct role in transmitting them to people, how people interact with them must be determined.

sourceString: Third, if a third mammal acts as the true intermediate host, how it interacts with the different species including humans, bats and pangolins has to be clarified.
targetString: ሳልሳይ፡ እንተድኣ እቲ 3ይ መጥበዊ ከም ማእከላይ ኣኣንጋዲ መመሓላለፊ ተቀሚጡ ፡ ምስ ዝተፈላለዩ ዓሌታት ከም ፡ ሰባት፡ ዓሌት መንካዕን ፓንጎሊን ዝሓወሰ፡ ከመይ ይተሓባበርከም ዝኾነ ክፍለጥ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Third, if the 3rd mammal is positioned as the central host vector , it must be known how it interacts with different species such as , including humans, ape species and pangolins.

sourceString: Finally, since many mammals including domestic animals might be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, both surveillance and experimental infection should be conducted.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ፡ ወላ’ካ ዝበዝሑ መጥበውቲ ን እንስሳ ዘቤት ዘጠቃለሉ ን SARS-CoV-2 ቁዓት እንተኾኑ፡ ኩሎም ናይ መጽናዕቲን ቅየሳን መልከፍቲ ፈተነታት ክግበሩ ኣለዎም
en-mt: Finally, although most mammals, including pets, are eligible for SARS-CoV-2, all research and survey infection tests should be conducted

sourceString: Should it be a bat, a pangolin or another mammal, it is expected that SARS-CoV-2 or its parental viruses that are almost identical will be identified in its natural hosts in future.
targetString: ክኸዉን ዘለዎ መንካዕ ድያ፡ጽሒራ ወይ ካልእ መጥበዉቲ ትጽቢት ይግበረሉ ፡እዚ SARS-CoV-2  ወይ ወለዳዊ ቫይረሳቱ ዳርጋ ተመሳሳልቲ ዝኾኑ ኣብ ተፈጥራዊ መዕቆቢኡ ክፍለጡ እዮም
en-mt: Whether it is expected to be a mouse, lizard or other mammal, this SARS-CoV-2 or its parent viruses that are almost identical will be known in its natural habitat

sourceString: Continued investigations in this area will elucidate the evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, with important implications in the prevention and control of COVID-19 in humans.
targetString: ቀጻሊ መርመራታት ኣብዚ ዓውዲ ነቲ ፍልቀትታዊ መንገዲ ን መስርዕ ን ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ እንስሳታት፡ ምስ ኣገዳሲ ኣፋፍኖታትን ናይ ምቁጹጻር መስርህሓትን ኣብ ኮቪድ-19 ናይ ሰባት፡ መብርሂ ክህብ ኢዩ
en-mt: Further research in this field will shed light on the evolutionary pathway and sequence of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, along with important thresholds and control processes in human COVID-1

sourceString: Updating the diagnostic criteria of COVID-19 “suspected case” and “confirmed case” is necessary
targetString: ምሕዳስ ናይ መርመራዊ መዐቀኒ/መምዘኒ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ‘’ዝጥርጠር ተርእዮ’’ ከምኡውን ‘’ልኹፋት ግዳያት’’ ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Updating the diagnostic criteria/criteria for COVID-19 ''suspected cases'' and ''infected victims'' is critical.

sourceString: On 6 February 2020, our team had published a rapid advice guideline for diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection, and this guideline provided our experience and make well reference for fighting against this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት 6, 2020፡ ጉጅለና፡ ሓደ ቅልጡፍ ናይ ምዕዶ መምርሒ ምርመራን ምፍዋስን ናይ 2019 ኖቨል ኮሮና-ቫይረስ (2019-nCoV) መልከፍቲ፡ ዝብል ጽሑፍ ሓቲማ፡ እዚ መምርሒ ድማ ኩሉ ናትና ተመክሮ ዝሓቆፈን ብሉጻት ዝኾኑ መወከሲትስት ብምቅራብ ድማ ዓለማዊ ናይ ለበዳ ቃልሲ ኣኵስክ ኣተባቢዑ።
en-mt: On February 6, 2020, our team published a quick advisory guide to the diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infections, which incorporates all of our experience and provides excellent references to encourage the global pandemic fight .

sourceString: However, the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge are gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ እዚ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ሕማም 2019 (ኮቪድ-19) ለበዳ፡ ሓድሽ ጉዳይ ኢዩ፡ ኣብቲ ዝካየድ ዘሎ መሰረታዊ ናይ መርመራ መጽናዕቲን ክሊኒካዊ ንጥፈታትን ብምምርካስ ድማ ፍልጠትናን ንቕሓትናን ይውስኽ ኣሎ፡ በዚ ድማ እቶም ኣገባባት ናይ ሕክምና በብቅሩብ ይሕደሱን ይምዕብሉን ኣለዉ።
en-mt: However, the 2019 coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic is a new issue and our knowledge and awareness is increasing based on ongoing basic diagnostic research and clinical activities, thus the treatment methods are gradually being updated and developed.

sourceString: In this letter, we answered one comment on our guideline and provided the newest diagnostic criteria of “suspected case” and “confirmed case” according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh version) that issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China.
targetString: ኣብዚ ደብዳቢ እዚ፡ ኣብቲ መምርሒታትና ንሓንቲ ርእይቶ መልሲ ሂብና ኣሎና፡ ከምኡውን ብመሰረት ሓዲሽ ናይ መርመራን ሕክምናን መምርሒ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 (ሻብዓይ ቅዳሕ)፡ በቲ ሃገራዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኮሚቴ ናይ ህዝባዊት ሪፓብሊክ ቻይና ዝተዋህበ፡ ዝተሓደሰ/ሓዲስ ናይ መርመራ መዕቀኒ ‘’ጥርጡር ከይዝ’’ ከምኡውን ‘’ልኹፍ ከይዝ’’ ኢልና ኣዳሊና ኣሎና።
en-mt: In this letter, we have responded to a comment on our guidelines, and the updated/new diagnostic criteria ''suspected case' issued by the National Health Committee of the People's Republic of China, in accordance with the New Diagnostic and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (Seventh Edition). ' and ''Infectious Case.

sourceString: In December 2019, the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) has caused an outbreak, which is now officially named as the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus has been named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: ኣብ ታሕሳስ 2019፡ እቲ ናይ 2019 ኣገራሚ ዓይነት ኮሮና-ቫይረስ (2019-nCoV) ሓዲሽ ማዕበል ሕማም ናይ ቫይረስ ኣማዕቢሉ፡ ሕጂ ድማ ብወግዒ ናይ 2019 ሕማም ኮሮና-ቫይረስ (ኮቪድ-19) ተባሂሉ ይጽዋኦ ኣሎ፡ እዚ ቫይረስ እዚ ሓደገጃ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ኣበር ኮሮና-ቫይረስ 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ይጽዋኦ ኣሎ
en-mt: In December 2019, the 2019 surprise strain of coronavirus (2019-nCoV) developed a new wave of viral illness, now officially called the 2019 coronavirus (COVID-19), the dangerous respiratory defect coronavirus -Virus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is being called

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, WHO characterized COVID-19 as a pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ 11 መጋቢት 2020፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ንኮቪድ-19 ከም ዓለማዊ ለበዳ ኣዊጅዎ።
en-mt: On March 11, 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a global pandemic.

sourceString: In order to fight against the SARS-CoV-2 infection, our team has developed a rapid advice guideline and that has been published online in Military Medical Research on 06 February 2020.
targetString: መታን ን SARS-CoV-2 ዝዓይነቱ ሕማም ንክትቃለሶ፡ እዚ ናትና ኣካላ ወይ ጋንታ ሓደ ቅልጡፍ ናይ ሓበሬታ መምርሒ ካብ ለካቲት 06, 2020 ጀሚሩ ኣብ ናይ ወተሃደራዊ ናይ ጥዕና መጽናዕትታት ኣሕቶምዎን ኣቀሚጥዎን ኣሎ።
en-mt: In order to fight SARS-CoV-2, our body or team has asked and put together a quick information guide since February 06, 2020 in military health studies.

sourceString: It has attracted a great attention since published.
targetString: ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ ሰሓብነት ጌራ ኢያ ካብ ትኽፈት።
en-mt: It has been so much more attractive since it opened.

sourceString: Note however that COVID-19 is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge is gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: መዘኻኸሪ፡ ወላ’እካ ኮቪድ-19 ሓድሽ ሕማም እንተኾነ፡ እቲ ናትና ኣፍልጦን ብቕዓትን ቀስ ብ ቀስ ኣብቲ ዝካየድ ዘሎ ምርምራትን ናይ ክሊኒክ ንጥፈታትን ብምሙርካስ ይዓቢ ኣሎ ፡ ስለዚ እቲ ናይ ምሕካምን ምሕዋይን ተኽእሎታት ድማ ቀስ ብ ቀስ ይዓቢ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Reminder: Although COVID-19 is a new disease, our knowledge and competence is slowly growing based on ongoing research and clinical activities , so the possibilities of treatment and recovery are slowly growing.

sourceString: For instance the Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), among 16 January 2020 to 3 March 2020, has issued a total of seven editions with some contexts being substantively changed.
targetString: ከም ኣብነት፡ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ናይ መርመራን ሕክምናዊ ሓገዛትን መምርሒታት ብ ሃገራዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኮሚቴ ናይ ረፑብሊክ ናይ ቻይና ተዋሂቡ፡ (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), ካብ ጥሪ 16 ክሳብ መጋቢት 3 ናይ 2020፡ ክሳብ 7 ዝበጽሑ ሕታማት ምስ ገለ ምቅይያር ናይ ጽሑፋት ተወሂቡ።
en-mt: For example, guidelines for COVID-19 testing and medical assistance were issued by the National Health Committee of the Republic of China, (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), from January 16 to March 3, 2020, up to Editions were issued with some alterations of texts.

sourceString: Now our guideline received a comment by Zhou et al., they introduced a simple scoring proposal based on their clinical experience.
targetString: ሕጂ ግን ዝዊ ኤት ኣል፡ ነቲ ናትና መምርሒታት ሓሳቡ ሂብሉ ኣሎ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣዝዩ ቀሊል ናይ ምክልኻል ኣገባባት ኣብቲ ናይ ክሊኒክ ንጥፈታቶ ዝተሞርከሰ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Now, however, Zwi et al have suggested our guidelines, which are very simple preventive measures based on its clinical practice.

sourceString: Their work added new evidence for our guideline and also make valuable reference for this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: እቲ ስረሓቶም፡ ሓድሽ መርጋገጺ ነዚ ናትና መምርሒ ወሲኽሉ፡ ከምኡውን ጠቃሚ ዝኾነ ዓለማዊ መወከሲ ናይ ለበዳ ውን ክኸውን ክኢሉ።
en-mt: Their work has added new evidence to our guidelines and has become a useful global reference for epidemics.

sourceString: We endorse their significant work and express our thanks.
targetString: ነቲ ኣዝዩ ጠቃሚን ኣገዳሲን ዝኾነ ስራሓቶም ኣፍልጦ ንህብ ምስጋናና ድማ ክንሰደሎም ንፈቱ፡፡
en-mt: We acknowledge their most useful and important work and would like to send them our thanks.

sourceString: However, their work also needs update according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) and recently studies.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ብመሰረት ሓዲሽ ናይ ሕክምና ኣገባብ መምርሒታት ን ኮቪድ-19 (ፈተነ ሻብዓይ ትርጉም)ን ናይ ቀረባ መጽናዕትታትን፡ እቲ ስረሓቶም’ውን ክሕደስ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: However, according to new treatment guidelines for COVID-19 (Trial Seventh Translation) and recent studies, their work also needs to be updated.

sourceString: According to the seventh edition (3 March 2020), to confirm the suspected case needs to combine any one item of epidemiological history features with two items of clinical manifestations to make a comprehensive analysis, or needs to meet three items of clinical manifestations if without clear epidemiological history:
targetString: ብመሰረት ሻውዓይ ሕታም (3 መጋቢት 2020) ንሓደ ግዳይ ናይ ቫይረስ ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ ዝተባህለ ጥርጡር፡ ሓንቲ ካብቲ ናይ ጥዕና ናይ ለበዳ ወይ ሕሉፍ መዝገቡ ምስ ክልተ ናይ ክሊኒክ ዝተራእየሉ ሓዊስካ ሓደ ገምጋም ብምሃብ ወይ ድማ ነቶም ሰለስተ ባእታታት ናይ ክሊኒክ ምብጻሓት እንተኣማሊኡ ቅድሚኡ ድማ ዝኾነ ናይ ለበዳ ታሪኽ እንተዘይብሉ፡ ጥራይ ኢዩ ሕሙም ከምዝኾነን ዘይኮነን ክረጋገጽ ዝኽእል።
en-mt: According to the Seventh Edition (March 3, 2020) a suspected potential victim of the virus is given an assessment including one of his or her health outbreak or past record with two clinical visits or any outbreak prior to that if he or she meets the three elements of clinic visits If he does not have a history, it can only be determined whether he is sick or not.

sourceString: Epidemiological history: (1) a history of travel or residence in Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (with positive nucleic acid test); (3) a history of contacting with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (4) a history of contacting with cluster of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms occurred within 2 weeks in small areas, such as home, office, class of school, etc).
targetString: ናይ ለበዳ ታሪኽ፡ (1) ናይ መገሻ ታሪኽ ወይ መንበሪ ኣብ ከተም ዉሃንን ከባቢኣን፡ ወይ ቅድሚ 14 መዓልቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ግዳያት ጸብጻብ ዘለወን ካልኦት ኮሚኒቲታት ፡ (2) ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ተመሓላላፊ ሕማም ዘለዎም ዓይነት ሰባት ዘለዎ ታሪኻዊ ርክብ (ምስ ኣወንታዊ ናይ ኒክሊክ ኣሲድ መርመራ) ና፡ (3) ምስቶም ረስኒ ወይ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጸገማት ዘለዎም ካብ ከተም ዉሃንን ከባቢኣን ዝመጹ ወይ ካል ኦት ከተማታት ኣብዘን ዝሓለፋ 14 መዓልታት ጸብጻብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተራእየለን፡ (4) ምስ እኩባት ሰባት ዝነበረካ ርክብ (ካብ 2 ንላዕሊ ክኾኑ ይኽእል ከምኡውን/ወይ’ውን ኣብ ውሽጢ 2 ሰሙን ምስ ኣብ ንአሽቱ ከባቢታት፡ መንበሪኻ ከም ኣብነት፡ ኦፊስ፡ ክፍሊ ናይ ትምህርቲ ወዘተ ዝነብሩ፡ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጸገማት ዝነብሩ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጸገም ዘጋጠሞም )
en-mt: Outbreak history: (1) travel history or residence in and around Wuhan, or other communities with reports of COVID-19 victims 14 days ago , (2) historical contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious disease types (with positive nickel acid test), (3) contact with people with fever or respiratory problems from Wuhan and surrounding areas or cal ot cities where there have been reports of COVID-19 in the past 14 days, (4) contact with crowds (more than may be and/or within 2 weeks with respiratory problems living in small areas, your residence such as, office, classroom etc. )

sourceString: Clinical manifestations: (1) fever and/ or respiratory symptoms; (2) with imaging features of COVID-19 infection; (3) total white blood cell counts showing normal, decreased, or reduced lymphocyte count in the early onset stage.
targetString: ናይ ክሊኒክ ምርኣይ (1) ረስኒ ከምኡ’ውን / ወ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ምልክታት፡ (2) ምስ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ገጽ ወይ መልክዕ ናይ ኢንፈኽስን ወይ ምሕላፍ ሕማም (3) ኣብቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ሕማም መልከፍቲ ግዜ እቶም ቁጽሪ ናይ ጸዓዱ ዋህዮታት ደም ስሩዕ ኢዩ፡ ዝጎደለ ኢዩ፡ ወይ ውን ጎዶሉ ቁጽሪ ናይ ልይምፋቲክ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Clinical appearance (1) fever and / w respiratory symptoms, (2) with the face or appearance of COVID-19 infection and or transitional disease (3) at the time of initial infection the white blood cell counts are regular , is deficient, or has a deficient number of lymphatics.

sourceString: Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.
targetString: ምምርማር ናይ ሓደ ልኹፍ ኣብቶም ጥርጡራት ግዳያት ምስ ሓንቲ ኣብነት ናይ ሰበብ ሕማም ወይ ናይ ወይ ሰሮሎጂቻል (ናይ ደም መርኣያ) መረጋገጺ፡ ዝተመርኮሰ ክኸውን ኣለዎ፡ እዚ ድማ፡ (1) ሪል-ታይም PCR መርመራ ኣወንታዊ ን SARS-CoV-2 (real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2) (2) ልዑል ምምስሳላት ዘለዎ ናይ ኖቨል ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ቫይረሳዊ ምሉእ ጂናዊ መስርዕ (3)ኣወንታዊ ን ፍሉይ IgM ጸረ-ነፍሲ ከምኡውን IgG ጸረ-ነፍሲ ኣብ መርመራ ናይ ሰሩም፡ ወይ ለውጢ ናይ SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG ጸረ-ነፍሲ ካብ ኣወንታ ወኡ ኣሉታ፡ ውይ ቅልጡፍ ምውሳኽ፡ ኣብ ግዜ ናይ ሕውየት ገጽ ካብ 4 ዕጽፊ ንላዕሊ ምስ ምግዳድ ገጽ ናይ ሕማም ኣረኣኢኻ።
en-mt: Testing of an infected person in suspected victims with an example of a cause of illness or of or serological (blood sample) confirmation, must be based on: (1) Real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2 (real-time). PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2) (2) Novel coronavirus viral complete genome sequence with high homologies (3)Positive for specific IgM antibodies and IgG antibodies on testing of serum, or changes of SARS- CoV-2-specific IgG antibodies increased from positive to negative, or rapidly, more than 4-fold during the recovery phase compared to the exacerbation phase of the disease.

sourceString: We can see that the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples was added to the second (18 January 2020) and third (22 January 2020) editions.
targetString: ከምዚ ንርእዮ ዘሎና እቲ real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract (ሪል-ታይም መርመራ ናይ ኒክሊክ ኣሲድ ኣብ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጎሮሮ) ወይ ናይ ደም ቅምሶ ኣብቲ ካልኣይ (18 ጥሪ 2020) ከምኡውን ሳልሳይ (22 ጥሪ 2020) ሕታማት ተወሲኹ።
en-mt: As we can see, the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples has been added to the second (January 18, 2020) and third (January 22, 2020) editions.

sourceString: The pathogenic detection of blood sample was added to the fourth (27 January 2020) and fifth (8 February 2020) editions; and then the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ሰበብ ሕማም ምልላይ ናይ ቅምሶታት ደም፡ ናብቲ ራብዓይን (27 ጥሪ 2020) ከምኡውን ሓሙሻይ (8 ለካቲት 2020) ሕታማት ተወሲኹ ኢዩ፡ ቀጺሉ ድማ እቲ መረጋገጺ ናይ መርመራ ናት ደም ቅምሶታት ናብቲ ሻውዓይ ሕታም ተወሲኹ።
en-mt: The cause of disease identification of blood samples has been added to the fourth (January 27, 2020) and fifth (February 8, 2020) editions, followed by the confirmatory test nut blood samples to the seventh edition.

sourceString: These modifications based on the researchers continued work that to search for an optimal nucleic acid detection kit for rapid diagnosis, as well as the samples from respiratory tract including blood sampling, which increased the availability of different specimens, and supported bringing the specific antibody positive result into the confirmed criteria.
targetString: እቲ ምምሕያሽ ኣብዞም ዝስዕቡ ረቃሒታት ዝተሞርከሰ ኢዩ፡ ናይ ተመራመርቲ ዝተናውሐ ስራሕ ነቲ ቅልጡፍ መርመራ/ምልላይ ናይ ኒክሊክ ኣሲድ ክህበና ዝኽእል መሳርሒን፡ ከምኡ’ውን ናይቶም ካብ ጎሮሮ ዝተወስዱ ቅምሶታት፡ ናይ ደም ቅምሶ ዘጠቃለሉን (ነቲ ህላውነትን ብዝሒን ናይ ቅምሶታት ዝወሰኸ)፡ ነቲ ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሲ ዝተረጋገጻ መዐቀኒ ኣወንታዊ ውጽኢት ከም ዝህብ ዝገበረ ሓገዝ።
en-mt: The improvement is based on the following factors: extended researchers' work on the device that can provide rapid detection of nickel acid, and throat samples that include blood samples (increasing the availability and quantity of samples) Help that made the soul a proven criterion yield positive results.

sourceString: Besides, there are more and more evidence that remind us to caution with the atypical symptomatic and asymptomatic patients.
targetString: ጎድኑ ጎድኒ ድማ፡ በቶም symptomatic (ሕሙማት እንከለዉ ምልክት ናይ ሕማም ዘለዎም ) ንasymptomatic (ሕሙማት እንከለዉ ምልክት ናይ ሕማም ዘለዎም ዘይብሎም) ዓይነት ተሓከምቲ ኣዚና ክንጥንቀቕ ከም ዘለና ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ መረጋገጺ የዘኻኽረና ኣሎ።
en-mt: Alongside, there is so much evidence that we need to be very careful with the symptomatic (those who have symptoms when they are sick ) and the asymptomatic (who have no symptoms when they are sick) type of patients.

sourceString: Hence, the flow chart of Zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk”.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ቲ ብ ዝዊ ኤት ኣል ዝተመስረሐ ናይ ሓበሬታ ጸብጻብ ክልወጥ ኣለዎ፡ እዚ ድማ ን ውልቀሰባት ብዘይ ናይ ክሊኒክ ምልክታት ኣብ ‘’ትሑት ሓደጋ’’ ስለ ዝኸፋፈለ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Therefore, the information report developed by Zwi et al should be changed because it categorized individuals without clinical symptoms into “low risk”.

sourceString: The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ውጽኢት ስርዓት በቲ ናይ ክሊኒካል ንጥፈታትን መጽናዕትታትን ክረጋገጽ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: The outcome system must be validated by the clinical activities and studies.

sourceString: To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments.
targetString: ንምድምዳም፡ ብዙሕ ቀጥታ መረጋገጺ ክመጽእ ንጽበ ከምኡ’ውን ደወል ካብ ኣንበብቲ ርኢቶኦም ንምዝራብ።
en-mt: To conclude, we expect a lot of live confirmation to come as well as calls from readers to speak their minds.

sourceString: For the diagnosis of “suspected case” and “confirmed case”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries.
targetString: ን ኩሎም መርመራ ናይ ‘’ዝጥርጠር ተርእዮ’’ ከምኡውን ‘’ልኹፋት ግዳያት’’፡ ኣብ ሃገራቶም ዘሎ መምርሒታት ከኽብሩን ክኽተሉን ነማኽሮም።
en-mt: For all tests of ''suspected cases'' and ''infected victims'', we advise them to respect and follow the guidelines in their countries.

sourceString: Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ፡ ጉጅለና በብግዚኡ ነቲ መምርሒ ከተሕድሶ ኢያ፡ በዚ ድማ ደገፍ ንገብር።
en-mt: In addition, our team will update the guidelines from time to time, so we provide support.

sourceString: Bangladesh reports five new deaths due to COVID-19, a daily highest
targetString: ባንግላዲሽ ብ ኮቪድ-19፡ ናይ 5 ሰባት ሓዲሽ ሞት ጸብጻብ ሂባ።
en-mt: Bangladesh reports five new deaths from COVID-1

sourceString: Yesterday, Bangladesh has confirmed five new deaths due to COVID-19 on the day.
targetString: ትማሊ፡ ባንግላዲሽ፡ ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ፡ ሓሙሽተ ሓደስቲ ምዉታት ብሰንኪ ኮቪድ-19 መዝጊባ።
en-mt: Yesterday, Bangladesh recorded five new deaths from COVID-19 in a single day.

sourceString: This is the highest number of fatalities in a day due to the virus.
targetString: እዚ ድማ እቲ ዝበዝሐ ቁጽሪ ናይ ሞት ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ ብሰንኪ ቫይረስ ኢዩ።
en-mt: This is the highest number of deaths in a single day from the virus.

sourceString: As of yesterday, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) reported the number of recorded infected cases included 114 active cases and 33 recovered cases who were staying home.
targetString: ክሳብ ትማሊ፡ ናይ ባንግላዲሽ ናይ ኢፒዶሞሎጂ ናይ መጽናዕቲ ትካላት፡ ምክልኻል ሕማማትን መጽናዕትን (IEDCR) ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ ኣብ ገዛኦም ዝጸንሑ  ቁጽሪ ናይ ልኹፋት ግዳያት 114 ከምኡ`ውን ናይቶም ዝሓወዩ 33 ሙኻኑ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: As of yesterday, the Bangladesh Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Prevention and Research (IEDCR) said the number of infected victims staying at home was 114 and 33 recovered.

sourceString: A total of 17 deaths have been recorded.
targetString: ብ ድምር 17 ምዉታት ተመዝጊቦም።
en-mt: A total of 17 deaths were recorded.

sourceString: In an online news briefing, the director of IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, said the fatalities included four males and one female.
targetString: ኣብቲ ቀጥታ ናይ ዜና ጸብጻብ፡ ዳይረክቶር ናይ IEDCR፡ ዶክቶር. ማርጀዲ ሳብሪና ፍሎራ (Meerjady Sabrina Flora)  ከም ዝሓበረቶ፡ ሓንቲ ጋል ትርከቦም ኣርባዕተ ናይ ሞት ግዳያት ከም ዘለዉ ኢዩ።
en-mt: In the live news report, IEDCR Director, Dr. Meerjady Sabrina Flora said there were four deaths, including a girl.

sourceString: According to Dr Meerjady, two cases were aged above 60, two between 51 and 60, and one 41-50 years old.
targetString: ዶ/ር ሚርጃዲ (Meerjady) ከም ዝብሎ፡ ክልተ ካብቲ ዝተረኽበ ጉዳያት ዕድሚኦም ልዕሊ 60 ክኾኑ ከለዉ፡ ክልተ ኣብ ሞንጎ ክሊ ዕድመ 51-60፡ ሓደ ድማ 41-50 ኣብ ዘሎ ክሊ ዕድመ ዝርከብ ኢዩ።
en-mt: According to Dr. Meerjady, two of the cases were over 60 years old, two were between the ages of 51-60 and one was between the ages of 41-5

sourceString: She also said two of the victims were from Dhaka.
targetString: ክልተ ካብቶም ግዳያት ካብ ዳካ ከምዝኾነ ሓቢራ።
en-mt: She said two of the victims were from Dhaka.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic on March 11.
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ ውድብ ጥዕና WHO)  ን ኮቪድ-19 ተላባዒ ሕማም ምዃኑ ብ መጋቢት 11 ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 an infectious disease on March

sourceString: A hospital official told Anadolu Agency, a local news outlet, that one of the deceased was Jalal Saifur Rahman, a director of Bengali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was cared for at the Kuwait Maitree Hospital.
targetString: ናይ ሆስፒታል በዓል መዚ ን ኣናዶሉ ወከልቲ ኣብ ዝሃቦ ሓበሬታ (ናይ ዜና ትካል)፡ ሓንቲ ካብቶም መወትቲ ጃላል ሳፉር ራሓም (Jalal Saifur Rahman)፡ ዳይረክቶር ናይ በንጋሊ ጸረ-ብልሽውና ኮይና፡ ኣብ ኩውየት ማይትረ ሆስፒታል ክትእለ ዝጸንሐት ኢያ።
en-mt: The hospital authority told Anadolu Agency that one of the deceased was Jalal Saifur Rahman, director of the Bengali Anti-Corruption Bureau, who was being treated at Kuwait Maitre Hospital.

sourceString: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladeshi Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would be shut down for longer than initially planned, until this coming Saturday.
targetString: ቀዳም፡ ኣብ ናይ ኦንላይን ቪድዮ መግለጺ፡ ናይ ባንግላዲሽ ናይ መጎዓዝያን ድልድላትን ሚኒስተር ኣበዱል ኵዋኣዳር (Obaidul Quader) ከም ዝገለጾ፡ ምዕጻው ናይ ህዝቢ መጎዓዝያ ካብቲ መጀመርያ ዝተመደቦ ንላዕሊ፡ ዝመጽእ ቀዳም፡ ክቅጽል ከም ዝኽእል ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: In an online video statement on Saturday, Bangladesh's Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said the closure of public transport could continue beyond the original schedule next Saturday.

sourceString: This public transport shutdown had initially started on March 26 and was planned to end on Saturday, April 4.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ህዝባዊ መጓዓዝያ ምዕጻው አብ መጋቢት 26 ዝጀመረ ኮይኑ ቀዳም ዕለት 4 ሚያዝያ ክውድእ ተመዲቡ ዝነበረ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The public transportation closure began on March 26 and was scheduled to end on Saturday, April

sourceString: Transport of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.
targetString: መጉዓዝያ ኣገደስቲ ኣቑሑት -- ከም ባዓል ነዳድን መግብን --- ክሳብ ሹዑ ተፈቒዶም ኔሮም።
en-mt: Transportation of essential goods -- such as fuel and food -- was allowed until then.

sourceString: The first recorded incidents of COVID-19 infection in Bangladesh were on March 8, in two people who returned from Italy and also the wife of one of them.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ኣጋጣሚ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ልኽፈት ኣብ ባምግላዲሽ ኣብ 8 መጋቢት ተራእዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብ ክልተ ሰባት ካብ ጣልያን ዝተመልሱን ሰበይቲን ውሉድን ናይ ሓደ ካብኣቶምን ድማ።
en-mt: The first case of COVID-19 infection occurred in Bamgladish on March 8, from two people who had returned from Italy and the wife and child of one of them.

sourceString: As of March 19, these three had already recovered.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 19 እዞም  ሰለስተ ድሮ ሓውዮም እዮም።
en-mt: On March 19, the trio had already recovered.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 surpasses one million infections worldwide
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ መልከፍቲ SARS-CoV-2  ሓደ ሚልዮን ሓሊፍ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Global SARS-CoV-2 infections have passed one million.

sourceString: On Thursday, the total number of cases of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections surpassed one million worldwide, Johns Hopkins University data indicated.
targetString: ጆን ሆፕኪንስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ሓበሬታ ከምዘመልክቶ፡ ሓሙስ ጠቕላላ ቁጽሪ ናይ SARS-CoV-2  ልኹፋት ዝተታሕዙ ብ ዓለም ደረጃ ልዕሊ ሓደ ሚልዮን በጺሑ።
en-mt: The total number of SARS-CoV-2 cases worldwide reached more than one million on Thursday, according to Johns Hopkins University data.

sourceString: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.
targetString: ብውይሑዱ 52 ሺሕ ሞት ምስ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተሓሓዝ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ኢዩ ጠንቁ።
en-mt: At least 52,000 deaths are related to COVID-19, which is caused by the coronavirus.

sourceString: The milestone came the same day Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infections and Zambia had its first coronavirus-related death.
targetString: እቲ ምስፍሕፋሕ በቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ልኹፍ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ኣብ ማላዊን፡ ኣብ ዛምብያ ድማ ብሰንኪ ኮሮናቫይረስ ናይ መጀመርያ ምዉት ኣብ ዝተራእየሉ እዋን ተጀሚሩ።
en-mt: The spread began with the first case in Malawi and the first death from the virus in Zambia.

sourceString: North Korea claimed, as of Thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
targetString: ሰሜን ኮርያ ከም ዝገለጸቶ፡ ካብተን ክሳብ ሕጂ በዚ ቫይረስ ዘይተለኽፋ ውሑዳት ሃገራት ሙኻና ኢዩ።
en-mt: North Korea has said it is one of the few countries not yet infected with the virus.

sourceString: By yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም፡ ክሳብ ትማሊ፡ 1,051,635 ዝተረጋገጸ መልከፍቲ ከም ዘሎ ሓቢሩ፡ እቶም 79,332 ካብዞም ግዳያት ድማ ብ ዕለት 4, ሚያዝያ፡ ብ ናይ ኤውሮጳ ኣቆጻጽራ ድሕሪ ሰዓት (0800 UTC) 10 ቅ.ቀ ኣብ ውሽጢ ዒስራን ኣርባዕተን ሰዓታት ዘጋጠመ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization said there were 1,051,635 confirmed cases as of yesterday, with 79,332 of these victims occurring within twenty-four hours on April 4, 10:00 AM ET (0800 UTC).

sourceString: In the United States, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
targetString: ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ልዕሊ 244 ሽሕ ግዳያት ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ከም ዘለዉ ተሓቢሩ፡ ካብዚኣቶም ድማ 5900 ምውታት ኢዮም።
en-mt: There are more than 244,000 confirmed cases of the virus in the United States, of which 5,900 have died.

sourceString: CBS News reported, citing Johns Hopkins University data, there were over 1,000 US deaths on Wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
targetString: CBS ዜና ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ ጆህን ሆፕኪንስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ብምጥቃስ፡ ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ረቡዕ ጥራይ ብሰንኪ ኮሮናቫይረስ ልዕሊ 1000 ሞት ተመዝጊቡ።
en-mt: More than 1,000 deaths were reported in the United States on Wednesday alone, according to Johns Hopkins University.

sourceString: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
targetString: ኣብ ዓለም ሙሉእ ዘለዋ ሃገራት ኣዝዩ ከቢድ ዝኾነ ሓጹራት ብምትግባር፡ ነዚ ቫይረስ ከይላባዕ ስጉምትታት ይወስዳ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Countries around the world are taking measures to prevent the spread of the virus by implementing strict restrictions.

sourceString: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the city lockdown to May 1.
targetString: ሓሙስ፡ ሰጀይ ሳብያኒን (Sergei Sobyanin) ዝተባህለ ኣማሓዳሪ ናይ ሞስኮ፡ ነቲ ዕጽዋ ናይ ከተማ ክሳብ ግንቦት 1 ኣናዊሕዎ።
en-mt: On Thursday, Moscow Governor Sergei Sobyanin extended the city's curfew until May

sourceString: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin declared Russians would continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.
targetString: ብ ሃገር ደረጃ፡ ፕረሲደንት ሩስያ ቭላድሚር ፑቲን፡ ንነበርቲ ሩስያ ክሳብ 30 መጋቢት ኣብ ዘሎ እዋን ከይሰርሑ ክኽፈሉ ከም ዝኽእሉ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Nationwide, Russian President Vladimir Putin said Russian residents could be paid for not working until March

sourceString: The parliament of Portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
targetString: ፓርላመንት ናይ ፖርቱጋል ነቲ ሃገራዊ ናይ እቶ-እቶ ግዝያት 15 መዓልታት ኵውስኸሉ ወሲኑ፡ እዚ ምርጫ ብ 215 ላዕለዋይ ድምጺ ኢዩ ተወሲኑ፡ ከምኡ`ውን 10 ዘይተሳታፍነትን፡  ሓደ ኣንጻር እዚ ውሳኔ`ውን ኔሮም።
en-mt: The Portuguese parliament decided to extend the national curfew by 15 days, with 215 votes in favour, 10 abstentions and one against.

sourceString: Saudi Arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
targetString: ኣብ ስዑዲ-ዓረብ፡ ኣብተን ቅዱሳት ተባሂለን ዝፍለጣ ከተማታት ሜካን ሜዲናን ኣዋጅ እቶ-እቶ ወይ ድማ ሰዓታት ኮፕሪፎኮ ኣዊጃ ኣላ፡ ቅድሚ ሕጂ እዚ ኣዋጅ ካብ ሰዓት 3 ድ.ቀ ክሳብ 6 ቅ.ቀ ጥራይ ኢዩ ዝጸንሕ ኔሩ።
en-mt: In Saudi Arabia, it has declared a curfew, or coprifoco hours, in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina, which previously lasted only from 3 pm to 6 am.

sourceString: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
targetString: ታይላንድ ኣብ መንጎ ሰዓት 10  ድሕሪ  ቀትርን ሰዓት 4 ቅድሚ ቀትርን ናይ ሰዓታት እቶእቶን ከተተግብር መደብ ኣውጺኣ ኣላ።
en-mt: Thailand plans to implement curfews between 10 pm and 4 am.

sourceString: The governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until May 1.
targetString: ኣማሓዳሪ ኦሃዮ ማይክ ደዋይን (Mike DeWine)፡ እቲ ግዝኣት ክሳብ ግንቦት 1 ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ ናይ ገዛ ምዕጻዋት ከም እትቕጽሎ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine said the state will continue home closures through May

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
targetString: ዱካናት ኣውስትራልያ ኣብ ሓደ ሸመታ ዝግበር መጠን ወረቐት ሽቓቕ ክድርት እዩ።
en-mt: Australian shops will limit the amount of toilet paper per purchase.

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: ቀዳምን ሰንበትን ድሕሪ ቀትሪ ኣብ ዝነበረ ግዜ ፍሉጥ ናይ ኣውስትራልያ ትካል Woolsworth and Coles: ኣብ መላእ ሃገር ኣብ ዝርከባ ጨንፈራቱ ናይ ዓይኒ ምድሪ ወረቐት ዕድጊ ገደብ ናብ ሓደን ክልተን ባኮ ከም ዘጉደለ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Australian retailer Woolsworth and Coles announced on Saturday and Sunday afternoon that it had reduced the purchase limit of eyeglass paper to one and two bags at its branches across the country.

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: ALDI ብወገኑ ናይ ሓንቲ ባኮ ደረት ብሰኑይ ኣጽዲቑ።
en-mt: ALDI, meanwhile, approved a one-bag limit on Monday.

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: እዚ ከምዚ ዝበለ ምድራት ኣብ መውጻኢ ኣፍደገን ኣብ ገጻት ፌይስቡክ እቲ ሰንሰለትን እዩ ተለጢፉ ኔሩ።
en-mt: Such restrictions were posted at the exit and on the chain's Facebook pages.

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ፍርሕታት ናይ COVID-19 ምናልባት ሰባት ርእሰ-ምንጻል ከየድልዮም ዓደግቲ ንብረት ይእክቡ ምንባሮም ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Due to fears of COVID-19, shoppers were collecting goods so that people would not have to isolate themselves.

sourceString: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
targetString: ረቡዕ፡ ዎኦልዎርዝ (Woolworths) ነቲ ናብ ገዛ ብቀጥታ ዝለኣክ ናይ ሽቃቅ መሳርሒ ጠለብ፡ ኣብ ሓደ ጠለብ ዝለዓለ ሓንቲ ባኮ ጥራይ ክኸውን ኣለዎ ኢሉ።
en-mt: On Wednesday, Woolworths said the order for direct-to-home toiletries should be limited to a maximum of one pack per order.

sourceString: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.
targetString: እዚ ለውጥታት ነቲ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙናት ብ Woolworths and Coles ብ4ን 5ን መጋቢት ካብ 4 ባኮ ንላዕሊ ናይ ዘይምግዛእ ዝሓለፈ ውሳነ መቐጸልታ እዩ።
en-mt: The changes follow a decision passed in recent weeks by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 not to buy more than 4 packs.

sourceString: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected".
targetString: Coles፡ ኣብ ናይ 8 መጋቢት ጋዜጣዊ መግሊጺኡ፡ እቲ ናይ ኣርባዕተ-ጥማር ቀይዲ ሃቢሩ፡ “ብዙሓት ድኳናት ገና ኣብ ውሽጢ ናይ ሓደ ሰዓት ምርጋፍ ሸይጠን ይውድኣ ኣለዋ”፣ ነቲ ጠለብ ከኣ “ቅድሚ ሕጂ ተራእዩ ዘይፈልጥ” ኢልዎ፡ ALDI ከኣ ኣብ ናይ ፈይስቡክ ልጣፍ ሰሉስ፡ “ካብ ትጽቢት ወጻኢ” ኢልዎ።
en-mt: Coles, in its March 8 press release, announced the four-stack restriction: “Many stores are still selling out within an hour of unloading,” calling the demand “unprecedented,” and ALDI in a Facebook post Tuesday , “Unexpected,” he said.

sourceString: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson.
targetString: ብመሰረት ወሃቢ ቃል ዉልዎርዝስ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን “ቁልጡፍ ወሰኽ” መሸጣታት ተራእዩ።
en-mt: According to a Woolworths spokesperson there was a “rapid increase” in sales last week.

sourceString: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
targetString: ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ኣብ ካምቤራ ዝርከብ ኮስቶኮ ዝብሃል መክዘን መሸጣ ናብ ክልተ ጥቕላል ጥራይ ደሪትዎ።
en-mt: Last week, the Costoco warehouse in Cambera limited sales to just two rolls.

sourceString: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early.
targetString: ሕጽረት ዝያዳ ንምቅላል ኮለስ ዕብይ ዝበለ ፓኬጃት ካብ ኣቕረብቲ ኣዚዙ ናይ ዕደላ ዙራት ከኣ ወሲኩ’ሎ።ተወሳኺ ዉልዎርዝስ ብርኪ ምእዛዙን ዋልዲ ድማ ናይ ረቡዕ ፍሉይ ፕሮግራም ምኽንይት ብምግባር ናይ ብርኪ ውጥን ኣውጺኡ።
en-mt: To further ease the shortage, Coles has ordered larger packages from suppliers and increased distribution rounds.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
targetString: ሩሰል ዚመርማን፡ ሓላፊ ናይ ኣወስራልያዊ መሸጣ ኣሶሴሽን፡ ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ እቶም ቸርቸርቲ ነቲ ፍርያቶ ኵሱኹሉ ፈቲኖም ፡ እንተኾነ ናይ ግዜ ገደብት ናይ ከባብያዊ ቆንሲል ናይ መብጽሒ ትራክ (ተንቀሳቓሲት ተሽከርካሪት)፡ ነቲ ስራሕ ዓናቂፍዎ።
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman, head of the Australian Sales Association, said the retailers tried to cushion the product , but time constraints on the local council's delivery truck (mobile vehicle) hampered the work.

sourceString: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
targetString: እቶም ኣፍረይቲ ነቲ ጠለባት ከማልኡ ስለ ዘለዎም ከም ኡውን ውሑድ ናይ ፍሉይ ጠለባት ስለ ዘሎን እቶም ኣፍረይቲ ነቲ ዋጋ ናይ ጠለባት ኵውስኹሉ ተጸብዩ ኔሩ።
en-mt: He expected the producers to increase the price of demand because the producers had to meet the demands and there were few special requirements.

sourceString: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special.
targetString: ሰሉስ፡ ALDI ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ ነቲ ብኣጋ ዝተገብረ ቀረባት ብምስዓብ፡ ገሊአን መኽዘናት ረቡዕ ኣገልግሎት ኣይክህባን ኢየን።
en-mt: Tuesday, ALDI said, following early supplies, some warehouses will be out of service Wednesday.

sourceString: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
targetString: ብመሰረት ጸብጻብ News.com.au ኪኢላ ቺርቻሮ ዕዳጋ ዶ/ር ጋሪ ሞርቲመር ካብ ክዊንስላንድ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ተክኖሎጂ: ከም ዝሓበሮ እዘን መኻዝን ብሓደ ለይቲ ነቲ ዕዳጋ ይመልኦኦ።
en-mt: According to News.com.au, retail market expert Dr Gary Mortimer of the Queensland University of Technology said the warehouses fill the market overnight.

sourceString: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
targetString: ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቐት ገዚፍ ነገር ምዃኑን፡ ናብ ትሑት ብዝሒ ናይ ቅሙጥ ቁጽርታት ከምዘምርሕን፡ ከምኡ ድማ፡ ኣብ ዝሽየጠሉ እዋን፡ ብዙሕ ናይ ከብሒ ስፍራታት ጥራዮም ከምዝኾኑ ከምዝገበርን፡ ነቲ ናይ ሕጽረት ስምዒት ከምዘሐይልን ርእይቶ ሂቡ።
en-mt: He commented that toilet paper is a huge thing, leading to low deposit numbers and, when it is sold, leaving many coffee plots empty, reinforcing the sense of scarcity.

sourceString: "Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic" said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News.
targetString: ብመሰረት ጸብጻብ ABC News "Coles and Woolworths ኣብ መደርደሪ ብርክት ዝበለ ኣቕሑ እንተኔሩ ከም ናይ ሸቓቕ ወረቓቕቲን ሳኒታይዘርን ብብዝሒ ክግዝኡ እንድሕር ተኻኢሉን ነዚ ክቱር ራዕዲ ምንካይ ይከኣል እዩ’’ ክብል Russell Zimmerman ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: According to ABC News, "If Coles and Woolworths had a lot of items on the shelves, such as toilet paper and sanitizer, they could be bought in bulk and this extreme panic could be reduced," Russell Zimmerman said.

sourceString: Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock.
targetString: ብ Who Gives a Crap ዝፍለጥ ትካል መፍረ ዳግማይ ዝተመስርሐ ወረቐት ሽቓቕ ፡ ዝሓለፈ ረቡዕ ኩሉ ጥረ ነገራት ከም ዝወድአ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Reprocessed toilet paper manufacturer known as Who Gives a Crap , said last Wednesday it had run out of all raw materials.

sourceString: Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report.
targetString: ብመሰረት News.com.au report.፡ ኪምበርልይ-ክለርክ፡ ን ክለኒክስ (Kleenex) ናይ ሽቃቅ ሶፍት ዝሰርሕ፡ ከምኡውን ሶላር ፐፐር ሰፍነግ ዝሰርሕ፡ ነቲ ጠለብ ንምምላእ 24/7 ይሰርሓ ከም ዘለዋ ሓቢረን፡
en-mt: According to a News.com.au report., Kimberley-Clerke, which makes Kleenex toilet soft, and solar paper sponges, said they are working 24/7 to meet the demand:

sourceString: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day.
targetString: Domain.com፡ ናይ ሪል ኢስተይት ክፋል፡ ገለ ሸየጥቲ ንብረት ኣብ መልቦርን ነቶም ናይ መጀመርያ ዓደግቲ ነጻ ናይ ሽቃቅ ወረቀት ይዕድሉ ክም ዘለዉ ሓቢሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ውሑድ መሸጣ ብሰንኪ እቶም ዓደግቲ ነዊሕ ግዚያት ናይ ስራሕ ምጽንሖም ኢዩ።
en-mt: Domain.com, the real estate section, reports that some property sellers in Melbourne are handing out free toilet paper to first-time buyers, with fewer sales due to the buyers having been working longer.

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ሕሙስ ሕታም ናይ ዜና NT፡ መዓልታዊ ኣብ Darwin ዝሕተም፡ ተቖሪጹ ከም ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቐት ዘገልግል ናይ ሸሞንተ-ገጽ ወሰኽ ኣጠቓሊሉ።
en-mt: Thursday's edition of the News NT, published daily in Darwin, included an eight-page increment that was cut up and served as toilet paper.

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ 3 መጋቢት ጸብጻብ ናይ ABC Australia ድኳናት ኣብ ፈለማ ቀይድታት ንምስግዳድ ድሉዋት ኣይነበራን ኣብቶም ዕድግታት ቀይድታት ንምግባር መደብ ከምዘይብለን ከኣ ሓቢረን።
en-mt: According to a March 3 report by ABC Australia, stores were initially reluctant to impose restrictions and said they had no plans to impose restrictions on purchases.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: ሩሰል ዚመርማን፡ ካልኦት ፍርያትውን ኣብ ልዑል ጠለብ ከም ዘለዉ ወሲኹ፡ እዚ ኣቶም ድማ ማስክ፡ መምከኒ ሳኒታይዘር፡ ድርቃት መሳርሒታት፡ መሕጸቢ ኢድ፡ ከም ኡውን ሓሩጭ።
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitizers, dryers, hand sanitizers, and flour.

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: ብተመሳሳሊ ካብ ኣውስትራልያ ወጻኢ: ኣብ ሰንበት ዝነበረ ናይ ምሸት ኦንላይን ናይ ኢንግሊዝ ኦካዶ ሱፐር ማርኬት ዕድጊ ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቐት ክልተ 12-ሓባ ጥራይ ኣፍቂዱ።
en-mt: Similarly outside Australia: Sunday's evening online purchase of England's Ocado supermarket allowed only two 12-haba toilet paper.

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ለበዳ ኮቪድ-19 ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization has declared a pandemic.

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: ረቡዕ፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ቀጻል ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ኮቪድ-19-- እቲ ብ ኮሮናቫይረስ SARS-CoV-2 ዝማዕበለ---- ለበዳ ከም ዝኾነ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the continued spread of COVID-19-- the one developed by the coronavirus SARS-CoV-2--- an epidemic.

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: ወላ'ኳ "ለበዳ" ዝብል ቃል ዝርግሐ ሕማም እምበር ሓደገኛነት እቲ ሕማም ዘይውክል እንተኾነ፡ WHO ግን መንግስታት ስጉምቲ ክወስዱ የተሓሳስብ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Although the term "epidemic" refers to the spread of a disease, not the severity of the disease, the WHO is urging governments to take action.

sourceString: "All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: ‘’ ኩለን ሃገራት ንምዕባለ ናይዚ ለበዳ ክቕይራ ሕጂውን ዕድል ኣለወን።
en-mt: ''All countries still have the opportunity to change the course of this epidemic.

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response," said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: እንተደኣ ሃገራት ከምቲ ዶክቶር ተድሮስ ኣድሓኖም ገብረየሱስ ዳይረክቶር ጅነራል ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም፡ ዝኣዘዞ ተከቲለንን፡ መርመራታት ኣካይደን፡ ኣወሺበን፡ ተከታቲለን፡ ከምኡውን ከምቲ ግቡእ ን ህዝበን ኣንቀሳቂሰንን፡፡
en-mt: If countries follow the instructions of Dr. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, Director General of the World Health Organization, and conduct tests, quarantine, monitor, and mobilize their people properly.

sourceString: "We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction."
targetString: ‘’ በቲ ደረጃታት ናይ መጠንቀቕታታት ናይ ለበዳን ሓደጋን ከምኡውን ደረጃታት ናይ መጠንቀቕታታት ናይ ተበግሶታት ምድኑጋያት ኣዚና ኢና ተጨኒቕና ዘሎና’’።
en-mt: “We are very concerned about the levels of outbreak and disaster warnings and the levels of delays in warnings and initiatives.”

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: ብመሰረት ዶክተር. ቶም ፍረይደን (Dr. Tom Frieden)፡ ናይ ቅድም ዳይረክተር ናይቲ United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ማእከላት ንቚጽጽርን ምግታእን ሕማም)፡ እቲ ለበዳ “ቅድሚ ሕጂ ተራእዩ ዘይፈልጥ” እዩ።
en-mt: According to Dr. Dr. Tom Frieden, former director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, said the outbreak was "unprecedented.

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት ኣብ CNN ኣብ ዝተዋህበ መግለጺ “ ‘’ካብ ህጹጽ ናብ ቀጻሊ ዓለማዊ ዝርገሐ ዘለዎ ብዘይካ ኢንፍልወንዛ ካልእ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ቫይረስ ከምዘይተረክበ” ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: In February, a statement on CNN said “ ''no respiratory virus other than influenza has been detected from emergency to ongoing global spread.

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: ገብረየሱስ ብወገኑ " ብኮሮና ቫይረስ ዝላባዕ ለበዳ ቅድሚ ሕጂ ርኢና ኣይንፈልጥን ኢና" ክብል ተመሳሳሊ ርእይቶ ሂቡ።
en-mt: Gebreyesus said, "We have never seen an outbreak of the virus before.

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: ንሱ ቀጺሉ፡ ‘’ከምኡውን ኣብ ሓደ ግዜ ክቆጻጸር ዝኽእል ዓይነት ለበዳ ፈጺምና ሪኢና ኣይንፈልጥን ኢና’’።
en-mt: “And we have never seen an outbreak that can be controlled at one time,” he continued.

sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: እዚ ሓዲሽ ህሉው ኩነታት ነቲ ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ኣብ ጥሪ ዝተዋህበ ውሳኔ ናይ ለበዳ ኣዋጅ ናይ ዓለም ለኻዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኢመርጀንሲ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The new current situation is the result of the World Health Organization (WHO) decision in January to declare an epidemic of a global health emergency.

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: ዳይረክተር ሃገራዊ ኢንስቲትዩት ኣለርጂን ተመሓላለፍቲ ሕማማትን፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ ኣንቶኒ ፋውሲ " እዚ ለበዳ ኦሮማይ እናኸፍአ እዩ ክኸይድ" ኢሉ።
en-mt: "This Oromia epidemic is going to get worse," said Anthony Fawcett, director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases.

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: ኣሶሴትድ ፕረስ ከም ዝገለጾ ካብ ሓሙስ ጀሚሩ ኣብ ሙሉእ ዓለም ብውሑዱ 126,000 ብ COVID-19 ዝተለኽፉ ከዘለውን እዚ ድማ ናይ 4,600 ሰባት ሞት ኣስዒቡ።
en-mt: The Associated Press reported that at least 126,000 people have been infected with the virus worldwide since Thursday, killing 4,6

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: 2019-20 ኮሮናቫይረስ ለበዳ፡ ዝቕጽል ዘሎ ለበዳ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ  ሕማም 2019 (ኮቪድ-19) ኮይኑ፡ ብ severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2  (SARS-COV-2) ዝመሓላለፍ ቫይረሳዊ ሕማም እዩ።
en-mt: The 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic is the ongoing pandemic of the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), a viral disease transmitted by the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-COV-2).

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ መጀመርያ ታሕሳስ 2019 ኣብ ዉሃን ቻይና ክርከብ እንከሎ፡ ብ 30 ጥሪ 2020 ድማ ዓለማዊ ጥዕናዊ ስግኣት እዩ ተባሂሉ። ኣብ 11 መጋቢት 2020  ድማ ለበዳ ተባሂሉ ተኣዊጁ።
en-mt: The virus was first detected in Wuhan, China in December 2019 and was declared a global health threat on January 30, On March 11, 2020, it was declared an epidemic.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: ኣብ 10 መጋቢት 2020, ኣስታት 1.61 ሚልዮን ግዳያት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ተመዝጊቦም፡ እዞም ግዳያት ካብ 210 ሃገራት ኮይኖም ኣስታት 97,000 ሞት ድማ ተመዝጊቡ።
en-mt: As of March 10, 2020, there were about 1.61 million registered cases of COVID-19, these victims from 210 countries and about 97,000 deaths.

sourceString: About 364,000 people have recovered.
targetString: ኣስታት 364,000 ሰባት ሓውዮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: About 364,000 people have recovered.

sourceString: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in China, while globally ranging from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ግዳያት ናይ ሞት መጠን ኣብ ቻይና 4% ተጸብጺቡ፡ ብዕለም ደረጃ ድማ ካብቲ ዝዓበየ 13.04% ኣብ ኣልጀርያ ናብቲ ዝተሓተ .08% ኣብ ኒው-ዚላንድ ተጸብጺቡ።
en-mt: The victim mortality rate was reported at 4% in China, and globally ranged from the highest of 13.04% in Algeria to the lowest of .08% in New Zealand.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
targetString: እቶም ልሙዳት ምልክታት፡ ረስኒ፡ ሰዓል ከምኡውን ሕጽረት ምስትንፋስ ከምዝኾኑ ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The most common symptoms are fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ሕዱር ናይ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ ጸገምን፡ ኒሞንያን ካልኦትን ነቲ ሕማም ካብ ዘጋድዱ እዮም።
en-mt: Chronic respiratory problems, pneumonia and others are among the exacerbations of the disease.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: ምልክታት እዚ ሕማም ንክርአ ኣስታት 5 መዓልቲ ዘድሊ'ኳ ተኾነ፡ ኣብ ብዙሓት ግን ካብ ክልተ ክሳብ ዓሰርተ ኣርባዕተ መዓልቲ ይወስድ።
en-mt: It takes about 5 days for symptoms to appear, but in many cases it takes two to fourteen days.

sourceString: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
targetString: ዝኾነ ዝተፈልጠ ክታበት ወይ ፍሉጥ ጸረ-ነፍሲ መከላኸሊ የለን።
en-mt: There is no known vaccine or known antibiotic protection.

sourceString: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
targetString: ቀዳማይ ክንክን ናይ ሕክምና symptomatic (ምትሕልላፍ ምስ ምልክታት)ን ደጋፊን ፍወሳ ኢዩ።እቶም ውጽኢታውያን ናይ ምክልኻል ስጉምትታት እዞም ዝስዕቡ የጠቃልሉ፡ ምሕጻብ ኣእዳው፡ ምዕጻው ኣፍ ኣብ ግዜ ምስዓል፡ ኣካላዊ ምርሕሓቅ ምዝውታር፡ ከም ኡውን ነቶም ጥርጡራት ምምርማርን ምውሻብን፡ ኢዮም።
en-mt: Primary care is medical symptomatic (transmission with symptoms) and supportive therapy.Effective preventive measures include the following: hand washing, mouth closure during coughing, practicing physical distancing, and screening and quarantine of suspects.

sourceString: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures.
