targetString: ኣብ ዓለም ምሉእ ዘለዉ በዓልመዚታት እገዳ ናይ መገሻ ብምግባር፡ ብምውሻብ፡ ብምዕጻው፡ ናይ ስራሕ ሓደጋታት ምቁጽጻር ብምግባር፡ ከምኡውን ወሃብቲ ትካላት ብምዕጻው ግብረ መልሲ ሂቦም።
en-mt: Authorities around the world have responded by imposing travel bans, quarantines, closures, occupational hazard controls, and shutting down providers.

sourceString: The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ ናብ ብዙሕ ማሕበረ-ኢኮኖሚ ሽግራት ኣምሪሑ ኢዩ፡ እቲ ምውንዛፋትን ምቁራጽን ናይ ስፖርት ኣጋጣሚታት፡ ሃይማኖታዊ ምትእኽኻባት፡ ባይላዊ ኣጋጣሚታት፡ ከምኡውን ሕጽረት ናይ ጠለባት ብሰንኪዛይ ተኣደነ ናይ ፍርሒ ምዕዳግ።
en-mt: The epidemic has led to many socio-economic problems, including the cancellations and cancellations of sporting events, religious gatherings, bilingual events, and a lack of demand due to excessive fear shopping.

sourceString: Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent  of the world's student population.
targetString: ቤት-ትምህርትታትን ዩኒቨርሲታትን ብ ሃገር ደረጃ ወይ ከባብያዊ ደረጃ ኣብ 193 ሃገራት ተዓጽየን ኣለዋ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ 99.4% ብዝሒ ናይ ተመሃሮ ኣብ ዓለምና ይሕፍን።
en-mt: Schools and universities are closed at the national or local level in 193 countries, accounting for 99.4% of the world's student population.

sourceString: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been incidents of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese people, other people of East and Southeast Asian descent and appearance, and others from areas with significant virus cases.
targetString: ጌጋ-ሓበሬታ ብዛዕባ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ኦንላይን ይዝርጋሕ ኣሎ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ናይ ዓሌት-ጽል ኢን ዓሌታውነትን ኣብ ልዕሊ ህዝቢ ቻይና ይወርድ ኣሎ፡ ካል ኦትሰባት ናይ ምብራቅን ሰሜናዊ-ምብራቅ ኤስያን ዝዓሌቶምን ካልእ ዝብቲ ቫይረስ ዘጥቅዖ ቦታ ዝመጹን ውን፡ በዚ ዓሌታውነት ተጠቂዖምን ይጥቕዑን ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Misinformation about the virus is spreading online, and racism is being perpetrated against the Chinese people, and others of East and Northeast Asian descent and from other affected areas are also being affected by the racism.

sourceString: Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ዋሕዲ ምንቅስቓስን ምዕጻው ዓበይቲ ኢንዱስትሪታትን፡ ኣብ ብከላ ኣየርን፡ ካርቦን ዳኦክሳይድ ጋዛትን ጎዲሉ።
en-mt: Air pollution and carbon dioxide emissions have declined due to lack of activity and the closure of large industries.

sourceString: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.
targetString: ኣብ Wuhan፡ ቻይና (እታ ርእሲ ከተማ ኣውራጃ Hubei) ዝርከቡ ሰበ ስልጣን ጥዕና ሕልፍ ዝበሉ እኩባት ተርእዮታት ናይ ጠንቁ ዘይተፈልጠ ኒሞንያ ከምዝነበሩ ኣብ 31 ታሕሳስ 2019 ሓቢሮም፡ከምኡውን መርመራ ኣብ መጀመርያ ጥሪ ናይ 2020 ጀሚሩ።
en-mt: Health officials in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei Province) reported excessive clusters of pneumonia of unknown cause on December 31, 2019, and testing began in early January

sourceString: The cases mostly had links to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: እቶም ዝበዝሑ ግዳያት ምስ ሃናን ናይ-ባሕሪ መግቢ መሸጢ ማእከል፡ ምትሕሓዝ ከም ዘለዎም ተፈሊጡ፡ በዚ ድማ እቲ ቫይረስ ካብ እንስሳ ከም ዝፎለቀ ተረጋጊጹ።
en-mt: Most of the victims were in contact with the Hannan seafood outlet, thus confirming that the virus originated from animals.

sourceString: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
targetString: ነዚ ቫይረስ ጠንቂ ዝኮነ ሳርስ (SARS-CoV-2) ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ እካ እንተኾነ እዚ ሓድሽ ዝተረኽበ ቫይረስ ምስ ናይ መንካዕ ኮሮና ቫይረስ፡ ፓንጎሊን ኮሮና ቫይረስ SARS-CoV ብቐረባ ዝተሓሓዝ እዩ።ዲሒሩ ከም ዝተፈልጠ እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ምልክት ዝተራእዮ ሰብ ኣብ 1 ታሕሳስ 2019 ከምዝሓመመ ተፈሊጡ።እዚ ሰብ እዚ ምስ’ቲ ናይ ዕዳጋ ምልጋብ ርኡይ ርክብ ኣይነበሮን።
en-mt: The cause of the virus is known as SARS-CoV-2, but the newly discovered virus is closely related to the mosquito coronavirus, pangolin coronavirus SARS-CoV This person had no apparent connection to the marketplace.

sourceString: Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
targetString: ካብቶም ታሕሳስ 2019 እትሰነዱ ሒደት ሕሙማት፡ ክልተ ሲሶ ኣቢሎም ምስቲ ዕዳጋ ምትእስሳር ጸኒሕዎም እዩ።
en-mt: Of the few patients documented in December 2019, about two-thirds have been linked to the market.

sourceString: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 13, 2020፡ ሓደ ዘይተረጋገጸ ጸብጻብ ካብ ደቡብ ቻይና ሞርኒግ ፖስት ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ ኣብ ኣውራጃ ሁበይ ኣብ 17 ሕዳር 2019 ዝተረኽበት ጋል 55 ዓመት ልኽፍቲ እታ ናይ መጀመርያ ክትከውን ትኽእል ኢያ ኢሉ።ኣብ ሕዳር 26 2020 ፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ከም ዝሐብሮ ሓደሽቲ ልኹፋት ኣብ ቻይና ይጎድሉ ምህላዎምን ኣብ ኢራን፡ ደቡብ ኮርያ፡ ጣልያንን ግን በንጻሩ ይውስኹ ምህላዎም ኢዩ፡ ብተወሳኢ ቁጽሪ ሓደሽቲ ልኹፋት ካብ ቻይና ወጻኢ ምስቶም ሓደሽቲ ልኹፋት ኣብ ቻይና ዘለዉ ንላዕሊ ይውስኽ ኣሎ።
en-mt: On March 13, 2020, an unconfirmed report from the South China Morning Post said a 55-year-old woman found in Hubei Province on November 17, 2019, could be the first case New cases are decreasing in China and increasing in Iran, South Korea and Italy, while the number of new cases outside China is increasing with the number of new cases in China.

sourceString: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
targetString: ብፍላይ ኣብ’ቶም ፎኪስ ምልክታት ሕማም ዘለዎም ገዚፍ ምሕባእ ቁጽሪ ሕሙማት ይረአ እዩ።
en-mt: There is a large latent number of patients, especially in those with focal symptoms.

sourceString: By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
targetString: ብ 26 ለካቲት ብተዛማዲ ዝወሓደ መጠነ ሞት መንእሰያት ከም እተጸብጸበ፥ 19ን ትሕቲኡን ዝዕድሜኦም ክሳብ 2.4% ኣህጒራዊ ኣሃዝ ይሕዙ ኣለዉ።ዋና ኣማኻሪ ሳየንስ ብሪጣንያ ፓትሪክ ቫላንስ ቅድሚ ውጽኢታዊ ሀርድ ኢምዩኒቲ (herd immunity) ክሳብ ዝምዕብል 60% ካብ ህዝቢ ብሪጣንያ በዚ ሕማም ክልከፍ ከም ዝኽእል ግምቱ ሂቡ።
en-mt: Relatively low youth mortality rates were reported on 26 February, with those aged 19 and under accounting for up to 2.4% of the international figure BU .

sourceString: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
targetString: ግዳያት ነቲ ቁጽሪ ናይ ተመርመርቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝነግር ኮይኑ፡ እቲ መርመራ ድማ ኣወንታዊ ምስ ዝኸውን ልኹፋት ግዳያት ንብሎም።
en-mt: Victims tell the number of tests for COVID-19, and if the test is positive, we call them infected victims.

sourceString: As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.
targetString: ክሳብ 23 መጋቢት ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ፡ ዝኾነት ልዕሊ 3% ካብ ብዝሒ ህዝባ ዝመርመረት ሃገር የላን፡ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ከኣ ፎኪስ ምልክታት ሕማም ጥራይ ንዘለዎም ሰባት ናይ ዘይምምርማር ፖሊሲታት ጸኒሕወን፡ ከም ኢጣልያ፡ ሆላንድ፡ ስጳኛን፡ ስዊዘርላንድን ዝኣመሰላ።
en-mt: As of March 23, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries had policies of not testing people with only focal symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.

sourceString: A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 16 ዝወጸ መጽናዕቲ ከም ዝሕብሮ ክሳብ 23 ጥሪ 86% ካብ ለበዳ ኮቪድ-19 ኣይተፈልጠን፡ እዚ ዘይተሰነደ ብዝሒ ሕሙማት ድማ ኣስታት 79% ሚእታዊት ናይ ዝተሰነደ ብዝሒ ዝተለኽፉ የጠቓልል።
en-mt: A study released on March 16 found that as of January 23, 86% of the outbreak was unknown, and this undocumented number of cases accounts for about 79% of the documented number of infections.

sourceString: A statistical analysis published 30 March estimated that numbers of infections in Italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
targetString: ኣብ 30 መጋቢት ዝተሓትመ ስታቲስቲካዊ ትንተና/መግለጺ፡ እቲ ልክዕ ብዝሒ ናይ ልኹፋት ኣብ ዓዲ ጣልያን ካብቲ ዝወጸ ጸብጻብ ይዓቢ ኔሩ።
en-mt: In a statistical analysis/statement published on March 30, the exact number of infections in Italy was higher than the report.

sourceString: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ፈለማ ገምጋም ናይቲ መሰረታዊ ቁጽሪ መፍረ (R0) ንCOVID-19 ኣብ 1.4 ክሳብ 2.4 ነይሩ።
en-mt: The initial estimate of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 was in the range of 1.4 to

sourceString: A study published by the US Center for Disease Control and Prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
targetString: ብማእከል ምቁጽጻርን ምክልኻልን ሕማማት ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ (US Center for Disease Control and Prevention) ዝተዘርገሐ መጽናዕቲ 5.7 ከምዝኾነ ተደምዲሙ።
en-mt: A study published by the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention concluded that it was

sourceString: Most people with COVID-19 recover.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም COVID-19 ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ይሓውዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Most people with COVID-19 recover.

sourceString: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
targetString: ምልክት ካብ ዝተራእየሉ ክሳብ ሞት ዘሎ ካብ 6 ክሳብ 41 ዘሎ መዓልትታት ኮይኑ እቲ ቀንዲ ድማ 14 መዓልትታት እዩ።
en-mt: The period from symptoms to death is 6 to 41 days and the main one is 14 days.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to COVID-19.
targetString: ክሳብ ሚያዝያ 17 ግዜ ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ 97,000 ኣቢሎም ዝኾኑ ሰባት ብ ኮቪድ-19 ሞይቶም።
en-mt: As of April 17, some 97,000 people have died of the virus.

sourceString: In China, as of 5 February about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፡ ክሳብ ለካቲት 5 ኣብ ዝነበረ ግዜ፡ 80% ካብ ብዝሒ ምዉታት ልዕሊ 60 ዕድሚኦም ክኾኑ ከለዉ፡ ልዕሊ 75% ከኣ ሕዱር ናይ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ ሕማምን ሽኮርያን ዝጸንሖም እዮም። ወግዓዊ ጸብጻብ ምዉታት ኮቪድ-19፡ በቲ ሕማም ኮቪድ ተለኺፎም ከም ዝሞቱ ንዝተረጋግጹ ሰባት ጥራይ የጠቓልል።
en-mt: In China, as of February 5, 80% of the death toll was over 60 years old, and more than 75% had chronic respiratory disease and diabetes. The official COVID-19 death toll includes only those who have been confirmed to have died of the disease.

sourceString: The number of true fatalities from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
targetString: ብ ኮቪድ-19 ናይ ዝሞቱ ብዝሒ ካብቲ ዝግለጽ ንላዕሊ ክዛይድ ከም ዝኽእል ይግመት፡ ምኽንያቱ ብዙሓት ኣብ ገዝኦም፡ መእለዪ ሽማግለታትን፡ ብዘይመርመራ  ዝሞቱ ኣለዉ።.
en-mt: The number of deaths from COVID-19 is expected to be higher than reported, as many die at home, in nursing homes, and without diagnosis.

sourceString: Partial data from Italy found that the number of excess deaths during the pandemic exceeded the official COVID death tally by a factor of 4-5x.
targetString: ከፊላዊ ዳታ/ሓበሬታ ካብ ኢጣልያ ከምዝረኸቦ እቲ ቁጽሪ ናይ ዝያዳ ሞት ኣብ እዋን እቲ ለበዳ ነቲ ወግዓዊ ቁጽሪ ሞት COVID 4-5x ዕጽፊ ይሓልፎ።
en-mt: Partial data/information from Italy suggests that the number of more deaths during the pandemic is 4-5x the official COVID death toll.

sourceString: A spokeswoman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged "We know that [the stated death toll] is an underestimation", a statement corroborated by anecdotal reports of undercounting in the U.S. Such underestimation often occurs in pandemics, such as the 2009 H1N1 swine flu epidemic.The first confirmed death was in Wuhan on 9 January 2020.
targetString: ኣፈኛ ማእከል ምቁጽጻርን ምክልኻልን ሕማማት (CDC) "ተጠቒሱ ዘሎ ብዝሒ ምዉታት፡ ጎደሎ ምዃኑ" ተኣሚና እያ። እዚ ኣብ ኣመሪካ ሓድሽ ተርእዮ ከም ዘይኰነ ይፍለጥ። ከምዚ ዝኣመስለ ጐደሎ ጸብጻባት ለበዳታት ኣብ ዘጋጥመሉ፡ ንኣብነት ኣብ 2009 ዘጋጠመ H1N1 ቫይረስ ግዜ፡ ብብዝሒ ዝተርኣየ ምዃኑ ይፍለጥ። እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ግዳይ ሞት ኣብ ዉሃን ኣብ 9 ጥሪ 2020 ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: A spokeswoman for the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) admitted that "the death toll is insufficient. This is not a new phenomenon in the United States. Such underreported outbreaks have been common, such as during the 2009 H1N1 pandemic. The first death victim was found in Wuhan on January 9,

sourceString: The first death outside mainland China occurred on 1 February in the Philippines, and the first death outside Asia was in France on 14 February.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ሞት ካብ ቻይና ወጻኢ ኣብ ፊሊፒኒስ ኣብ 1 ለካቲት ተራእዩ፡ እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ሞት ካብ ኤስያ ወጻኢ ድማ ኣብ ፈረንሳ ኣብ 14 ለካቲት ተራእዩ።
en-mt: The first death outside China occurred in the Philippines on February 1, and the first death outside Asia occurred in France on February 14th.

sourceString: By 28 February, outside mainland China, more than a dozen deaths each were recorded in Iran, South Korea, and Italy.
targetString: ብለካቲት 28 ፥ ካብ ቀንዲ መሬት ቻይና ወጻኢ ፡ ኢራን፡ ደቡብ ኮርያን ኢጣልያን ነፍሲ ወከፈን በቲ ቫይረስ ልዕልሊ 12 ሰባት ከም ዝሞትወን ኣዊጀን።
en-mt: On February 28 , outside mainland China , Iran, South Korea and Italy each announced more than 12 deaths from the virus.

sourceString: By 13 March, more than forty countries and territories had reported deaths, on every continent except Antarctica.Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: ብ መጋቢት 13 ፡ ልዕሊ ኣርብዓ ሃገራትን ግዝኣታትን፡ ብዘይካ ኣንታርክቲካ፡ በቲ ሕማም ዝሞትወን ከም ዘለዉ ሓቢረን። ብዝሒ ሞት ንምዕቃን ዝተፈለላዩ ኣገባብት እዮም ዝውሰዱ።
en-mt: On March 13 , more than forty countries and territories, except Antarctica, reported deaths from the disease. Different methods are used to measure mortality.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time, and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, sex, and overall health.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: እዞም ቁጽርታት እዚኦም ብዞባን ብግዜን ይፈላለዩ፡ ከምኡ ድማ በቲ ብዝሒ ናይ ዝካየድ መርመራ፡ ብቖዓት ስርዓተ ክንክን-ጥዕና፡ ናይ ፍወሳ ኣማራጺታት፡ ግዜ ካብ ለበዳ ዝጀመረሉ ኣትሒዙ፡ ከምኡ ድማ ናይ ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ጠባያት ከም ዕድመ፡ ጾታን፡ ሓፈሻዊ ጥዕናን ዝኣመሰሉ ይጽሎ።እቲ ብዝሒ ቁጽሪ ናይ ምዉታት ናብ ግዳያት (death-to-case ratio) ነቲ ቁጽሪ ናይ ዘጋጠሙ ሞት ዝተመቕሎ እቲ ቁጽሪ ናይ ብመርመራ ዝተለለዩ ተርእዮታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ሓደ ውሁብ ንውሓት ግዜ የንጸባርቕ።
en-mt: These numbers vary by region and time, and are influenced by the number of tests conducted, the efficiency of the health-care system, treatment options, time since the onset of the outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, gender, and overall health The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of cases identified by diagnosis during a given period of time.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of 10 April 2020.
targetString: ኣብቲ ካብ ናይ ጆን ሆፕኪንስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ፡ኣብ ሚያዝያ 10 ናይ 2020 ፡ ዝወጸ ጸብጻብ ብምሙርካስ፡ ዓለማዊ ቁጽሪ ናይ ሞት ምስ ቁጽሪ ናይ ግዳያት ክነጻጸር እንከሎ 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) ኢዩ፡፡
en-mt: Based on the report from Johns Hopkins University , released on April 10, 2020 , the global death toll is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204).

sourceString: The number varies by region.
targetString: እቲ ቁጽርታት በቲ ዞባታት ይፈላለ።
en-mt: The numbers vary by region.

sourceString: In China, estimates for the death-to-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptom onset after 1 February 2020).Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed people who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፡ ገምጋምናት ናይቲ ምጣነ ሞት-ናብ-ተርእዮ ካብ 17.3% (ነቶም ምልክታት ሕማም ዝነበሮም 1–10 ጥሪ 2020) ናብ 0.7% ጎዲሉ (ነቶም ድሕሪ 1 ለካቲት 2020 ምልክታት ሕማም ዝነበሮም)።ካልእ ስጉምትታት ነቲ case fatality rate (CFR, መጠን ሞት ተርእዮ)፡ እቲ ሚእታዊት ናይ ብመርመራ ዝተለለዩ ሰባት በቲ ሕማም ከኣ ዝሞቱ ዘንጸባርቕ፡ ከምኡ ድማ እቲ infection fatality rate (IFR, መጠን ሞት መልከፍቲ)፡ ነቲ ሚእታዊት ናይ ዝተለኽፉ (ብመርመራ ዝተፈልጡን ዘይተፈልጡን) በቲ ሕማም ዝሞቱ ሰባት ዘንጸባርቕ።
en-mt: In China, estimates of the death-to-incidence ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptoms 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptoms after 1 February 2020).Other measures for the case fatality rate (CFR, rate). mortality rate), which reflects the percentage of people diagnosed with the disease who died, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percentage of people infected (diagnosed and unknown) who died of the disease.

sourceString: These statistics are not timebound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: እዚ ጸብጻባት ናይ ግዜ ገደብ የብሉን፡ ነቲ ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ምስ ተለከፍቲ ዘሎ ቁጽራዊ ዝምድና ድማ ይስዕብ።
en-mt: These reports have no time limit and follow the numerical relationship of population to infections.

sourceString: A number of academics have attempted to calculate these numbers for specific populations.
targetString: ብዙሓት ምሁራት ነዞም ቁጽርታት ፍሉያት ኣህዛብ ክጽብጽቡ ፈቲኖም ኢዮም።
en-mt: Many scholars have tried to calculate these numbers for specific nations.

sourceString: The University of Oxford's Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine estimates that the infection fatality rate for the pandemic as a whole is between 0.1% and 0.39%.
targetString: Oxford Centre-for Evidence Based Medicine ብሰንኪ ረኽሲ ለበዳ ኮሮና መጠነ ሞት ብሓፈሻ ካብ 0.1% ናብ 0.39% ክብ ምባሉ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: The Oxford Centre-for Evidence Based Medicine said the overall death rate from pandemic infection had risen from 0.1% to 0.39%.

sourceString: The upper estimate of this range is consistent with the results from the first random testing for COVID-19 in Germany, and a statistical study analysing the impact of testing on CFR estimates.
targetString: እቲ ላዕለዋይ ገምጋም ናይዚ ዝርግሐ’ዚ ምስቶም ውጽኢታት ናይቲ ቀዳማይ ናይ ሃውሪ መርመራ ናይ COVID-19 ኣብ ጀርመን ከምኡ ድማ ነቲ ጽልዋ ናይ መርመራ ኣብ CFR ዝግምግም ስታትስቲካዊ መጽናዕቲ ዝሳነ እዩ።
en-mt: The highest estimate of this prevalence is consistent with the results of the first rapid testing of COVID-19 in Germany and a statistical study assessing the impact of testing on CFR.

sourceString: The WHO asserts that the pandemic can be controlled.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) እዚ ለበዳ ምቁጽጻሩ ከም ዝከኣል እዩ ዝኣምን።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) believes the epidemic is controllable.

sourceString: The peak and ultimate duration of the outbreak are uncertain and may differ by location.
targetString: ናይ’ዚ ለበዳ ጥርዝን ናይ መወዳእታ ደረትን ርጉጽ ዘይኮነ ኮይኑ ብቦታ’ውን ክፈላለ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The peak and final limit of the epidemic is uncertain and may vary from place to place.

sourceString: Maciej Boni of Penn State University stated, "Left unchecked, infectious outbreaks typically plateau and then start to decline when the disease runs out of available hosts.
targetString: ኣባል ዩኒቨርሲቲ ፐን ስቴት ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዝዀነ ማሲጂ ቦኒ ፡ "እንተደኣ ስቕ ኢልካ ርኢኻዮም ለበዳታት ብናህሪ ይውስኹ'ሞ ኣብ ዝተወሰነ ደረጃ ምስ በጽሐ ዳርጋ ጠጠዉ ይብል፡ ካብኡ ዝሕዞ ቁጽሪ ቀስ ብቀስ እናጎደለ የንቆልቁል" ክብል ገሊጹ።
en-mt: "If you watch them quietly, outbreaks increase rapidly and when they reach a certain level they almost stop, then the number of cases slowly decreases," said Masiji Boni, a member of Penn State University.

sourceString: But it's almost impossible to make any sensible projection right now about when that will be".
targetString: ኣብ'ዚ ሕጂ እዋን ምዓስ ከም ዝኸዉን ጭቡጥ ገምጋም ምሃብ ኣዝዩ ኣሸጋሪ እዩ።
en-mt: It's very difficult to give a concrete assessment of when it will happen at the moment.

sourceString: The Chinese government's senior medical adviser Zhong Nanshan argued that "it could be over by June" if all countries can be mobilized to follow the WHO's advice on measures to stop the spread of the virus.
targetString: ላዕለዋይ  ኣማኻሪ ጥዕና መንግስቲ ቻይና፡ ዞንግ ናንሻን፡ ኩለን ሃገራት ንምክልኻል እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ዝካየድ ዘሎ ጻዕሪ፡ መመርሒታት ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) እንተተኺትለን እዚ ሕማም " ኣብ ወርሒ ሰነ ክእለ" ከም ዝኽእል ገሊጹ።.
en-mt: China's top health adviser, Zhong Nanshan, said the disease could be "eliminated by June" if all countries followed World Health Organization (WHO) guidelines in efforts to prevent the virus.

sourceString: On 17 March, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine stated that SARS-CoV-2 "is going to be circulating, potentially for a year or two".
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 17፥ ኣዳም ኩቻርስኪ (Adam Kucharski) ካብ London School of  Hygiene&amp: Tropical Medicine: SARS-COV-2 "ንክልተ ዓመት ክጸንሕ ዩ" ክብል ተዛሪቡ።
en-mt: On March 17, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene&: Tropical Medicine said that SARS-COV-2 "will last for two years.

sourceString: According to the Imperial College study led by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures will be required "until a vaccine becomes available (potentially 18 months or more)".
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ ኢፐርያል ኮለጅ መጽናዕቲ ብ ኔል ፈርጉሰን (Neil Ferguson)፡ ኣካላዊ ምርሕሓቃን ካልእ ስጉምትታትን ‘’ ክሳብ ክታበት ኣብ ዝርከብ (ካብ 18 ኣዋርሕ ንላዕ ሊ ዝወስድ)’’፡ ከም ዘድሊን ገሊጾም።
en-mt: According to an Imperial College study by Neil Ferguson, physical isolation and other measures are necessary '' until a vaccine is available (which takes more than 18 months).

sourceString: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University stated, "I think it's unlikely that this coronavirus—because it's so readily transmissible—will disappear completely" and it "might turn into a seasonal disease, making a comeback every year".
targetString: ካብ Vanderbilt University ዝኾነ William Schaffner ከምዝበሎ “እዚ ኮሮና ቫይረስ--ብቐሊሉ ዝመሓላለፍ-- ስለዝኾነ ጠቕላላ ክጠፍእ ኣይኽእልን” ከምኡ’ውን “ናብ ወቕታዊ ሕማም ብምቕያር ዓመት ዓመት ክመጽእ ይኽእል”።
en-mt: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University said that “this coronavirus--is easily transmitted--so it cannot be totally eradicated” and “it can turn into a seasonal disease and come every year”.

sourceString: The virulence of the comeback would depend on herd immunity and the extent of mutation.
targetString: ካልኣይ ግዜ ናይ ምልባዕ ዓቕሙ ፡ ኣብ ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ህዝቢን፡ እቲ ቫይረስ መልክዑ ናይ ምልውዋጥ ባህሪን ይምርኮስ።
en-mt: Its ability to spread a second time , depends on the immune system of the population and, the nature of the virus to change its form.

sourceString: Symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively non-specific and infected people may be asymptomatic.
targetString: ምልክታት  ኮቪድ-19 ዘይንጹራት ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም ጥራይ ዘይኮነ ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት'ውን ምልክታት ዘየርእዩ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Not only can the symptoms of COVID-19 be vague, but infected people may also be asymptomatic.

sourceString: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).
targetString: እቶም ክልተ ቀንዲ ምልክታት ሕማም ረስኒ (88%) ከምኡ ድማ ቃንዛ ጎረሮ (68%) እዮም።
en-mt: The two main symptoms were fever (88%) and sore throat (68%).

sourceString: Less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), loss of the sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, or cyanosis.The WHO states that approximately one person in six becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing.
targetString: ብዙሕ ልሙድ ዘይኮነ ምልክታት ከም ድኻም፡ ናይ ምስትንፋስ sputum production (phlegm)፡ ናይ ምጭናው ጸገም፡ ሕጽረት ትንፋስ፡ ቃንዛ መላግቦ፡ ዕረ ጎሮሮ፡ ሕማም ርእሲ፡ ቁሪ፡ ተምላስ፡ ውጽኣት፡ hemoptysis,or cyanosis የጠቓልል።ውዱብ ጥዕና ዓለም ከምዝገለጾ ሓደ ካብ ሹዱሽተ ብጽኑዕ ይሓምምን ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጸገም የጋጥሞን።
en-mt: Many less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), difficulty breathing, shortness of breath, joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, diarrhea, hemoptysis,or cyanosis.According to the World Health Organization, one in six He becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.Further development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and death.
targetString: እቲ U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC, ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ማእከላት ንምቊጽጻርን ምግታእን ሕማም) ናይ ህጹጽ ምልክታት ሕማም ኢሉ ዝዘርዘሮም ጸገም ምስትንፋስ፡ ቀጻሊ ናይ ኣፍልቢ ቃንዛ ወይ ጸቕጢ፡ ሃንደበታዊ ድንግርግር፡ ጸገም ብእግሪ ምኻድ፡ ከምኡ ድማ ሰማያዊ ሕብሪ ገጽን ከናፍርን እዮም፣ እንተድኣ እዞም ምልክታት ሕማም እዚኦም ኣለዉ ኾይኖም ቀጥታዊ ሕክምናዊ ቆላሕታ ይምከር።ተወሳኺ ምዕባለ ናይቲ ሕማም ናብ ከቢድ ኒሞንያ፡ ከቢድ ሕማም ጸቕጢ ምስትንፋስ፡ ሰፕሲስ፡ ሰፕሲሳዊ ወቕዕን ሞትን ከምርሕ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden dizziness, difficulty walking, and blue color of the face and lips , If these symptoms are present, direct medical attention is recommended.Further progression of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, severe respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic stroke, and death.

sourceString: Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but with test results that confirm infection, so researchers have issued advice that those with close contact to confirmed infected people should be closely monitored and examined to rule out infection.
targetString: ገለ ካብዞም ዝተለኹ asymptomatic (ምልክታት ሕማም ዘይብሎም ልኹፋት) ኢዮም፡ እንተኾነ ምስቲ ልኹፍ ምኻን ዝሕብር ናይ መርመራ ውጽኢት፡ እቶም ተመራመርቲ ፡ ምስፍሕፋሕ ንምግታእ ነቶም ምስ ልኹፋት ዝኾነ ርክበት ዝገበሩ ዓሚቕ መርመራ ክገብሩ ከም ዘለዎም ሓቢሮም ።
en-mt: Some of these cases are asymptomatic, but with the test results suggesting infection, the researchers said they should conduct thorough testing of those who have had any contact with the infected to prevent spread.

sourceString: Chinese estimates of the asymptomatic ratio range from few to 44%.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና ዘሎ ብዝሒ ምልክታት ዘየርእዩ ሰባት ካብ ዉሑድ ክሳብ 44% ይበጽሕ።
en-mt: The prevalence of asymptomatic people in China ranges from a low to 44%.

sourceString: The usual incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; it is most commonly five days.As an example of uncertainty, the estimate of the fraction of people with COVID-19 who lost their sense of smell was initially 30% and later fell to 15%.
targetString: ንቡር ናይ ሕቑፎ ግዜ (ካብ መልከፍቲ ክሳብ ምልክታት ዝርኣየሉ ግዜ) ካብ ሓደ ክሳብ 14 መዓልቲ እዩ፡ ኣብ ዝበዝሐ ግና ሓሙሽተ መዓልቲ ይወስድ። እቲ ሓበሬታ ክሳዕ ክንደይ ዘይንጹር ምዃኑ ንምብራህ ንኣብነት ብኮቪድ-19 ተለኺፎም ናይ ምሽታት ዓቕሞም ዝጎደለ 30% ነይሩ ድሒሩ ግና ናብ 15% ጎዲሉ።
en-mt: The normal incubation period (from infection to symptoms) is one to 14 days, but at most it takes five days. To illustrate how vague the information is, for example, the percentage of people infected with COVID-19 who lost their ability to smell was 30%, but later it decreased to 15%.

sourceString: Some details about how the disease is spread are still being determined.
targetString: ገለ መግለጺታት ብዛዕባ እዚ ሕማም ከምይ ዝመሓላለፍ ዝተፈልጡ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Some explanations are known about how the disease is transmitted.

sourceString: The disease is believed to be primarily spread during close contact and by small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking; with close contact being within 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 feet).
targetString: እቲ ሕማም ብቐንዱ ኣብ እዋን ጥቡቕ ርክብ ከምኡ ድማ ብመገዲ ንኣብ እዋን ምስዓል፡ ምህንጣስ፡ ወይ ምዝራብ ዝፍጠሩ ንኣሽቱ ነጠብታታት ከምዝመሓላለፍ ይእመን፣ ጥቡቕ ርክብ ዝብሃል ኣብ ውሽጢ 1 ክሳብ 2 ሜትሮ እዩ (3 ክሳብ 6 ጫማ)።
en-mt: The disease is believed to be transmitted primarily during close contact and through small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking, close contact is within 1 to 2 meters (3 to 6 feet).

sourceString: Studies have found that an uncovered coughing can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27 feet).
targetString: መጽናዕትታት ከም ዘገልጽዎ ብዘይ መሸፈኒ ምስዓል ካብ 4.5 ሜተር ( 15 ጫማ) ክሳብ 8.2 ሜተር (27 ጫማ) ዝበጽሕ ነጠብታ ክፈጥር ይክእል።
en-mt: Studies have shown that coughing without a mask can create droplets from 4.5 meters ( 15 feet) to 8.2 meters (27 feet).

sourceString: Some have proposed that the virus may also be transmitted by small droplets that stay for more prolonged periods in the air, that may be generated during speech.Respiratory droplets may also be produced during breathing out, including when talking, though the virus is not generally airborne.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ሰባት ውን፡ እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብ ኣየር ዝተናውሐ ግዜ ብዝጸንሑ ካብ ዘረባ ዝተበገሱ ነጠብጣብ ክመሓላለፍ ከም ዝኽእል ነጊሮም።እዞም ናይ ምስትንፋስ ነጠብጣባት ኣብ ግዜ ምስትንፋስ’ውን ክትዛረብ ምስ ትጂምር ክፍጠሩ ይኽእሉ ኢዮም፡፡
en-mt: Some people have also said that the virus can be transmitted by speech droplets that stay in the air for a long time.

sourceString: The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people who are nearby or possibly be inhaled into the lungs.
targetString: እቶም ነጠብጣብ ኣፍ ወይ ኣፍንጫ ናይቶም ጥቓኻ ዘለዉ ሰባት ክዓልብ ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ በዚ’ውን ናብ ሳንቡእ ክሓልፍ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people around you, and thus pass into the lungs.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolized and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: ገለ ሕክምናዊ ኣገባባት ከም ኢንቱበሽን cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR, ሳንቡእን ልብን ናብ ውነ ምምላስ) ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጸረርታታት ክንጸጉ ክገብር ይኽእል በዚ ምኽንያት ከኣ ናይ ትንፋስ ምምሕልላፍ ከስዕብ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Some medical procedures such as intubation cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR, lung and heart resuscitation) can cause respiratory radiation to be rejected and therefore cause respiratory arrest.

sourceString: It may also spread when one touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: እዚ ሕማም ሓደ ሰብ ዝተበከለ ግዳማዊ ክፋል ከም ቆርበት ዝኣመሰለ ተንኪፉ መሊሱ ዓይኑ፡ ኣፍንጩኡ ወይ ኣፉ ምስዝትንክፍ ክልሕም ይኽእል።
en-mt: The disease can be spread when a person touches an infected external surface such as skin and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread by faeces, this risk is believed to be low.
targetString: ስክፍታትት እካ እንተሎ ውሑድ ሓደጋ ዘለዎ ብ ቀልቀል ክመሓላለፍ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Despite concerns, it can be transmitted by sprouts with little risk.

sourceString: The Government of China denied the possibility of faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2.The virus is most contagious during the first three days after onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.
targetString: መንግስቲ ቻይና ነቲ ብ ቀልቀል ክመሓላላአፍ ይኽእል ኢዩ ዝተባህለ SARS-CoV-2 ተቃዊምዎ።እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብተን መጀመርያ ሰለስተ መዓልታት ምልክታት ክረኣየካ ካብ ዝጂምር፡ ኣዝዩ ተመሓላላፊን ሐደጋጃን ኢዩ፡ ብተወሳኺ ድሕሪ ምሕዋይካ ውን ምትሕልላፍ ናይ ምህላው ተሕእሎ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The Chinese government has opposed SARS-CoV-2, which is said to be transmissible by sprouting.The virus is highly contagious and dangerous from the first three days of symptoms, and there is a possibility of transmission after recovery.

sourceString: People have tested positive for the disease up to three days before onset of symptoms suggesting transmission is possible before developing significant symptoms.
targetString: በዚ ቫይረስ ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት፡ ሰለስተ መዓልቲ ቅድሚ ዝዀኑ ምልክታት ምርኣዮም ፡ ዉጽኢት መርመራኦም ኣወንታዊ ምዃኑ ተፈሊጡ፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ሕማም ገና ንጹር ምልክታት ከየርኣየ ክመሓላለፍ ከም ዝኽእል'ዉን የርኢ።
en-mt: People infected with the virus tested positive three days before they showed any symptoms , which also suggests that the disease can be transmitted before they show clear symptoms.

sourceString: Only few reports of laboratory-confirmed asymptomatic cases exist, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during contact tracing investigations.
targetString: ብላባራቶሪ ከም ዝተረጋገጸ፡ ዝተለኽፉ ግን ምልክታት ዘይብሎም ውሑዳት ኢዮም ብቁጽሪ፡ እንተኾነ እዚ ናይ ኣሲምፕቶቲክ ምትሕልላፍ (ምትሕልላፍ ብዘይ ምልክታት) ከም’ዘሎ ገለ ሃገራት ኣጽኒዐን ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Laboratory-confirmed, asymptomatic infections are rare in number, but some countries have studied this asymptotic transmission (transmission without symptoms).

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) states that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: እቲ European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC, ኤውሮጳዊ ማእከል ንምግታእን ምቊጽጻርን ሕማም) እቲ ሕማም ከመይ ገይሩ ብቐሊሉ ከምዝመሓላለፍ ምሉእ ንምሉእ ንጹር’ኳ እንተዘይኮነ፡ ሓደ ሰብ ብሓፈሻ ንኽልተ ወይ ሰለስተ ካልኦት ሰባት የመሓላልፍ።እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ዝባናት ካብ ሰዓታት ክሳብ መዓልታት ብህይወት ክጸንሕ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The European Center for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says it is not entirely clear how easily the disease is transmitted, but one person generally transmits it to two or three other people.The virus can survive on the heads for hours to days can.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel, for one day on cardboard, and for up to four hours on copper.
targetString: ብፍሉይ፡ እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብ ፕላስቲክ (polypropylene) ን ሰለስተ መዓልቲ ጸኒሑ፡ ከምኡውን 304 ኣብ ኣቻዮ፡ ን ሓደ መዓልቲ ኣብ ካርቶን፡ ከምኡውን ክሳብ ኣርባዕተ ሰዓታት ኣብ ኮፐር።
en-mt: Specifically, the virus survived in plastic (polypropylene) for three days, and 304 in achao, for one day in cardboard, and for up to four hours in copper.

sourceString: This, however, varies based on the humidity and temperature.Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19.
targetString: እንተኾነ እዚ፡ ኣብ ጠሊን ዋዒን ይምርኮስ።እንስሳ ዘቤትን ካልኦት እንስሳታትን ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ብ ኣወንታ ተመርሚሮም።
en-mt: However, this, depends on the dew and temperature.Pets and other animals tested positive for COVID-1

sourceString: There is no evidence animals can pass the virus on to humans, though British authorities advise washing one's hands after contact with animals, like after contact with other surfaces infected people could have touched.
targetString: ወላ'ኳ እቲ ቫይረስ ካብ እንስሳታት ናብ ሰብ ከም ዝመሓላለፍ ዘረጋግጽ ዝኾነ መርትዖ እንተዘይተረኽበ፡ ከምቲ ንሰብ ድሕሪ ምትንካፍካ ትሕጸብ፡ እንስታት ምስ ተንከፍካ ውን ንቅድመ-መጠንቀቕታ ክሕጽቡን ጽሬት ክሕልውን፡ሰበ ስልጣን ብሪጣንያ ይምዕዱ።
en-mt: Although there is no evidence that the virus is transmitted from animals to humans, British authorities advise people to wash and keep clean after touching animals, just as they do after touching humans.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: ከቢድ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ስንድሮም ኮሮናቫይረስ-ክልተ (Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)) ኖቨል ኮሮና ቫይረስ ኮይኑ፡ መጀመርያ ካብ ዝዓይነቱ ከቢድ ናይ ምስትብፋስ ሕማም ካብ ዝነበሮም ግዳያት ኣብ ዉሃን ምስ ኒሞንያ ዝተሓሓዝ፡ ሰለስተ ሰባት ክፈሊ ኪኡሉ።
en-mt: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus-2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel coronavirus that was first isolated from pneumonia-related victims in Wuhan.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which dissolves its protective envelope.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: ክሎም እቶም ባህርያት ናይቲ ሓድሽ SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስ ኣብ ዝዛመዱ ኮሮናቫይረሳት ኣብ ተፈጥሮ ይርከብ።ካብ ሰብነት ሰብ ወጻኢ፡ እቲ ቫይረስ ብናይ ገዛ ሳሙና ይመውት፡ ንሱ ነቲ መከላኸሊ ድርዑ የምክኾ።SARS-CoV-2 ምስቲ መበቆላዊ SARS-CoV ናይ ቀረባ ዝምድና ኣለዎ።
en-mt: All of the characteristics of the new SARS-CoV-2 virus are found in nature in related coronaviruses.Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which smokes its protective shield.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV .

sourceString: It is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: እዚ zoonatic (ካብ እንስሳ ዓሌት) መበቈል ኣለዎ ተባሂሉ ዝሕሰብ እዩ።
en-mt: This is thought to be of zoonatic (animal species) origin.

sourceString: Genetic analysis has revealed that the coronavirus genetically clusters with the genus Betacoronavirus, in subgenus Sarbecovirus (lineage B) together with two bat-derived strains.
targetString: ገነቲካዊ መጽናዕቲ ከምዘነጸሮ፡ ኮርናቪረስ ኣብ ገነቲካዊ ጉጅለ ቤታኮረናቪረስ፡ ኣብ ንኡስጅን ሳርበኮቪረስ (ሓረግ B) ምስ 2 ካብ መንካዕ ዝምንጭዉ ዘርኢ ዝምደብ ኢዩ
en-mt: Genetic studies have revealed that coronavirus belongs to the genetic group betacoronavirus, in the genus sarbecovirus (class B) with 2 tick-derived offspring

sourceString: It is 96% identical at the whole genome level to other bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13).
targetString: ምስ ናይ መንካዕ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ቅምሶ (BatCov RaTG13) ክመሳሰል፡ከሎ ናይ 96% ምምስሳል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Compared to the mouse coronavirus strain (BatCov RaTG13), it has a 96% similarity.

sourceString: In February 2020, Chinese researchers found that there is only one amino acid difference in certain parts of the genome sequences between the viruses from pangolins and those from humans.
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት 2020፡ ቻይናውያን ተመራመርቲ ኣብ ውሱናት ተርታታት ናይቲ ጂኖም ኣብ መንጎ እቶም ቫይረሳት ካብ ጽሒራታትን እቶም ናይ ሰባትን ናይ ሓደ ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ ፍልልይ ጥራይ ከምዘሎ ረኺቦም።
en-mt: In February 2020, Chinese researchers discovered that there was only one amino acid difference in certain sequences of the genome between the viruses from lizards and those from humans.

sourceString: Whole-genome comparison to date has found at most 92% of genetic material shared between pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is insufficient to prove pangolins to be the intermediate host.
targetString: ክሳብ እዛ ዕለት ጃምላዊ ንጽጽር genome በዚሑ ተተባህለ ኣብ መንጎ pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2 ክሳብ 92% ናይ ሓባር ጀነቲካዊ ንጥረነገር እዩ ዘሎ፡ ኣዚ ድማ pangolins ማኣከላይ ኣኣንገድቲ እዮም ንምባል ኣኹል ጭብጢ ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: To date, mass genome comparisons have shown that there is up to 92% common genetic material between pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is not enough evidence to suggest that pangolins are intermediate hosts.

sourceString: Infection by the virus can be provisionally diagnosed on the basis of symptoms, though confirmation is ultimately by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) of infected secretions or CT imaging.
targetString: መልከፍቲ እቲ ቫይረስ ገለ ምልክታት ብምርኣይ ክፍለጥ ዝኽእል እኳ እንተኾነ ፡ ብቐንዱ ግና ብ (rRT-PCR) ጌርካ ኣብ ምራቕ ወይ ካብ ኣካላት ዝወጽእ ፈሳሲ ብዝግበር መርመራ ወይ CT ምስኣል ዩ ዝፍለጥ።
en-mt: Although infection with the virus can be diagnosed by some symptoms , it is mainly diagnosed by (rRT-PCR) testing or CT scans of saliva or body fluids.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: ኣብ ዉሃን ኣብ ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ናይ PCR ኣብ CT ከምዝሓበሮ፡ CT ብተዛማዲ ዝዓበየ ናይ ምልላይ ብቅዓት ኣለዋ ምስ PCR ብምንጽጻር፡ ወላካ ኣዝዩ ዝተጻረየ ኣይኩን፡ ምስቲ ብዙሕ ናይ ምስኣል ብቅዓታ ምስቲ ካልእ ናይ ኒሞንያታትን ሕማማት መስርሓትን ዝድረብ።
en-mt: A study of PCR in CT in Wuhan found that CT has relatively greater detection efficiency compared to PCR, although not very refined, with its many imaging efficiencies comparable to those of other pneumonias and disease processes.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".
targetString: ክሳብ መጋቢት 2020፡ ናይ ኣሜሪካ ኮለጅ ናይ ራድዮሎጂ፡ CT ንመጋረዲ ወይ ከም ቀዳማይ መስመር መርመራ ን ኮቪድ-19 ምልላይ ክንጥቀመሉ ከም ዘይብልናን’’ ኣማኪሩ።
en-mt: Until March 2020, the American College of Radiology advised that we should not use CT for screening or as a first-line test for the diagnosis of COVID-1

sourceString: The WHO has published several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2, with the first issued on 17 January.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ዝተፈላለዩ ብ RNA ን SARS-CoV-2 ንምምርማር ዘኽእል ፕሮቶኮላት ወይ ኣገባባት ብ 17 ጥሪ ኣቕሪቡ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) on January 17 presented various protocols or methods for RNA testing for SARS-CoV-2

sourceString: The test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: እቲ መርመራ፡ ሓቀኛ-ግዜ ግምጣል ምቅዳሕ ናይ ፖሊመርስ ዝተተሓሓዘ መስርሓት (real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) ይጥቀም።
en-mt: The assay uses real-time approximate copying of polymers coupled processes (real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: The test can be done on respiratory or blood samples.
targetString: እቲ መርመራ ኣብ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ወይ ናይ ደም መርኣያታት ክካየድ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The test can be performed on breath or blood specimens.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to days.
targetString: ሓፈሻዊ እቲ ውጽኢት ድሕሪ ውሑድ ሰዓታት ወይ መዓልታት ይወሃብ።
en-mt: General The results are given after a few hours or days.

sourceString: Generally this test is carried out on a nasopharyngeal swab though a throat swab may also be used.A number of laboratories and companies are developing serological tests, which detect antibodies.
targetString: ሓፈሻዊ እዚ መርመራ ኣብ ናይ ጎሮሮ (nasopharyngeal) ሰፍነግ (swab) ኢዩ ዝትግበር፡ ስዋብ/ሰፍነግ ተጠቂምና ድማ መርመራ ክንገብር ንኽእል።ብዙሓት ላባራቶሪታትን ትካላትን ናይ ሰሮጂካል (serological) መመርመሪ የማዕብላ ኣለዋ፡ እዚ ድማ ጸረ-ነፍሳት የለሊ ኢዩ።
en-mt: General This test is performed on a nasopharyngeal swab and can be tested using a swab/sponge. Many laboratories and institutions are developing serological tests that detect antibodies.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, none of these has been proved sufficiently accurate to be approved for widespread use.
targetString: ክሳብ 6 መጋቢት 2020፡ ካብዞም ዝተጠቅሱ ውጽ ኢታዊ ኮይኑ ብብዝሒ ንክጥቀም ኣፍልጦ ዝረኸበ የለን።
en-mt: As of March 6, 2020, none of these products have been approved for mass use.

sourceString: In the US a serological test developed by Cellex has been approved for emergency use by certified laboratories only.
targetString: ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ብCellex ዝማዕበለ መርመራ ናይ ቅምሶታት ደም: ብወረቐት ስራሕ ዘለዎም ላባራቶሪታት ጥራይ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕል ፍቓድ ተዋሂብዎ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The test for blood samples developed by Cellex in the United States is licensed for use only by paper-based laboratories.

sourceString: Characteristic imaging features on radiographs and computed tomography (CT) of people who are symptomatic include asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacities and absent pleural effusions.
targetString: ስእልታት ተባይ ኣብ ርድዮግራፊ ከምኡ ድማ computed tomography (CT, ናይ ኮምፕዩተር ቶሞግራፊ) ናይ ምልክታት ሕማም ዘለዎም ሰባት ዘይተዳራጊ ጫፋዊ ናይ ምድሪ ጥርሙስ ተገራዳነት ብርሃንን ዘየለ ፑራል ፍስሰትን የጠቓልል።
en-mt: Tebai images on radiography as well as computed tomography (CT, computed tomography) of people with symptoms include inconsistent extreme earth bottle contrast light and absent purulent discharge.

sourceString: The Italian Radiological Society is compiling an international online database of imaging findings for confirmed cases.
targetString: እቲ Italian Radiological Society (ኢጣልያዊ ራድዮሎጅያዊ ሕብረተሰብ) ዓለምለኻዊ ኦንላይን ማዕከን-ዳታ ናይ ርኽበታት ስእሊ ንዝተረጋግጹ ተርእዮታት ይጥርንፍ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The Italian Radiological Society (Italian Radiological Society) is compiling an international online database-database of picture findings for confirmed cases.

sourceString: Due to overlap with other infections such as adenovirus, imaging without confirmation by PCR is of limited specificity in identifying COVID-19.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ምስ ካልኦት ከም ኣደኖቫይረስ (adenovirus) ዘለዎ ምምሳል ን ኮቪድ-19 ብዘይ ሓገዝ PCR ምስኣል ኣሸጋሪ እዩ።
en-mt: Because of its similarity to others such as adenoviruses, it is difficult to image COVID-19 without the help of PCR.

sourceString: A large study in China compared chest CT results to PCR and demonstrated that though imaging is less specific for the infection, it is faster and more sensitive, suggesting its consideration as a screening tool in epidemic areas.
targetString: ሓደ ገዚፍ መጽናዕቲ ኣብ ቻይና ናይ ኣፍልቢ ናይ CT ውጽኢታት ምስ PCR ኣነጻጺሩ ብመገዲ ስእሊ ምውሳድ ከኣ ነቲ ረኽሲ ትሑት ውሱንነት ከምዘለዎ፡ ቅልጡፍን ዝያዳ ተነቃፍን ምዃኑ ይሕብር፡ ኣብ ናይ ለበዳ ቦታታት ከም ናይ ምምማይ መሳርያ ኣብ ግምት ክኣቱ ሓሳብ ሂቡ።
en-mt: A large study in China compared chest CT findings with PCR and suggested that imaging for the infection was low-specificity, rapid, and more sensitive, and suggested it be considered as an assessment tool in epidemic settings.

sourceString: Artificial intelligence-based convolutional neural networks have been developed to detect imaging features of the virus with both radiographs and CT.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ እንታይ ከም ዝመስል ዘርኢ ስእሊ ንምርካብ ብ CT ከምኡ ውን ብራድዮግራፍን፡ ዝኣመሰሉ ናይ ኣርቲፊሻል ተክኖሎጂ መሳርሒታት ብምጥቃም ፡ መልክዕ እቲ ቫይረስ ንምልላይ ጻዕርታት ይካየድ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Efforts are being made to identify the appearance of the virus, using artificial technology tools such as CT and radiography, to get a picture of what the virus looks like.

sourceString: Strategies for preventing transmission of the disease include maintaining overall good personal hygiene, washing hands, avoiding touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands, and coughing or sneezing into a tissue and putting the tissue directly into a waste container.
targetString: መንገዲታት ን ምክልኻል ናይ ተነሓላለፍቲ ሕማማት እዞም ዝስዕቡ ኢዮም፡ ድምር ናይ ኣካላትካ ጽሬት፡ኣእዳው ምሕጻብ፡ ኣዒንትካ ኣፍንጫኻ ወይ ኣፍካ ኢድካ ረሳሕ ምስ ዝኸውን ዘይምትንክፍ፡ ክትስዕልን ክትህንጥስን እንከለኻ መንዲል ምጥቃን ብድሕሪኡ ውን ነቲ መንዲል ምጉሓፍን።
en-mt: Ways to prevent communicable diseases are: general hygiene, washing hands, not touching your eyes, nose or mouth when your hands are dirty, wearing a handkerchief when coughing and sneezing and then disposing of the handkerchief.

sourceString: Those who may already have the infection have been advised to wear a surgical mask in public.
targetString: እቶም ተለኺፎም ክኾኑ ዝኽእሉ፡ ናይ መጥባሕቲማስክ ክገብሩ ተመኺሮም ኢዮም።
en-mt: Those who may have been infected were advised to wear surgical masks.

sourceString: Physical distancing measures are also recommended to prevent transmission.Many governments have restricted or advised against all non-essential travel to and from countries and areas affected by the outbreak.
targetString: ምትሕልላፍ ንምግታእ ኣካላዊ ርሕቀት ናይ ምሕላው ስጒምትታት’ውን ይምከሩ።ብዙሓት መንግስታት ኣድለይቲ ዘይኮኑ መገሻታት ካብን ናብን ሃገራትን ናብ በቲ ለበዳ ዝተተንከፉ ከባቢታትን ቀይዶም ወይ ከምኡ ከይግበር ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: Physical distancing measures are also recommended to prevent transmission. Many governments have restricted or banned unnecessary travel to and from countries and areas affected by the outbreak.

sourceString: However, the virus has reached the stage of community spread in large parts of the world.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ቫይረስ ናብ ደረጃ ናይ ኮሚኒቲ ምትሕልላፍ በጺሑ ኢዩ ኣብ ዝበዝሐ ክፋል ናይ ዓለም።
en-mt: However, the virus has reached the level of community transmission in most parts of the world.

sourceString: This means that the virus is spreading within communities, and some community members don't know where or how they were infected.Health care providers taking care of someone who may be infected are recommended to use standard precautions, contact precautions, and eye protection.Contact tracing is an important method for health authorities to determine the source of an infection and to prevent further transmission.
targetString: እዚ ድማ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ውሽጢ ኮሚኒቲ ይስፋሕፍሕ ከም ዘሎ የርኢ፡ ከምኡውን ገለ ኣባላት ኮሚኒቲ ብከመይን ኣበይን ከም ዝተለኽፉ ኣይፈልጡን።ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ወሃብቲ፡ ን ሓደ ተለኺፉ ከይከውን ዝጥርጠር ሰብ ኣብ ዝከናኸኑሉ እዋን ደረጃኡ ዝሓለወ ናይ ምክልኻል፡ናይ ርክባት ከም ኡውን ናይዓይኒ፡ ጥንቃቐ ክኽተሉ ይምከሩ፡፡ ናይ ርክባት ክትትል/ምስዓብ፡ ነቶም ናይ ጥዕና ሰብመዚ፡ ነቲ ምንጪ ናይ መልከፍቲ ኣን ምርካብን ቀጺሉ ዝመጽእ ምምሕልላፋት ኣብ ምክልኻልን፡ ዝጠቅም ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ ኣገባብ ኢዩ።
en-mt: This indicates that the virus is spreading within the community, and some community members are unaware of how and where they were infected.Health care providers are advised to follow standard preventive, communications and eye, precautions when caring for a suspected infected person . Contact surveillance is an important method for health authorities to identify the source of an infection and prevent subsequent transmissions.

sourceString: The use of location data from mobile phones by governments for this purpose has prompted privacy concerns, with Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issuing a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ሞባይል ናይ ሰፈር/መኣዝን ሓበሬታ ተጠቃምነት ብ መንግስቲ ነቲ ናይ ውሕስነት ተሕታትነት ሕቶ ፈጢርሉ፡ በዚ ድማ ኣምነስቲ ዓለም-ለኸ (Amnesty International) እትረከበን 100 ማሕበራት ነዚ ምክትታላት ዝቃወም ጽሑፍ ኣቅሪበን ኣለዋ።
en-mt: The use of mobile neighborhood/corner information by the government has raised the issue of security liability, and 100 organisations, including Amnesty International, have filed a petition opposing the surveillance.

sourceString: Various mobile apps have been implemented or proposed for voluntary use, and as of April 7, 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: ብዙሓት ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ሞባይል ኣፕሊከሽንስ ተሰሪሖምን ኣብ መስርሕ ኣለዉን፡ ክሳዕ ሚያዝያ 7,2020 ኣብ ዝነበረ ዳርጋ ደርዘን ዝዀና ትካላት ኣብ ዉሕስነት እቲ ኣፕሊከሽን ይሰርሓ ነይረን፡ ገለ ካብኡ ናብኡ ብብሉቱዝ ዝግበር ርክብ እዩ።
en-mt: Many different mobile applications have been developed and are in process, and as of April 7,2020, nearly a dozen companies were working on the security of the application, some of which are Bluetooth connections.

sourceString: Users then receive a message if they've been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19.Misconceptions are circulating about how to prevent infection; for example, rinsing the nose and gargling with mouthwash are not effective.
targetString: ተጠቀምቲ ሽዑ ምስ ዝኾነ ኮቪድ-19 ፡ ዘለዎ ቀሪቦም ተኾይኖም ምልክት ይመጾም። ብተወሳኺ ጌጋ ሓበሬታ ንምክልኻል እዚ ሕማም ተመሓላሊፉ ኣሎ።  ገለ ካብኡ፡ ኣፍንጫኻ ምሕጻብን ብመሕጸብ ኣፍ ምጉርጓርን ኢዩ። እዚ ኣድማዕነት ከምዘይብሉ ድማ ተረጋጊጹ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Users will then be signaled if they have been in contact with anyone with COVID-1 In addition, misinformation has been passed on to prevent the disease. Some of these include rubbing your nose and gargling with mouthwash. This has proven ineffective.

sourceString: There is no COVID-19 vaccine, though many organizations are working to develop one.
targetString: ዋላ’ካ ብዙሓት ውድባት ንምምዕባል ክታበት COVID-19 ይሰርሓ እንተለዋ ገና ኣይተረኽበን።
en-mt: Although many organizations are working to develop a vaccine for COVID-19, it has not yet been found.

sourceString: Hand washing is recommended to prevent the spread of the disease.
targetString: ነቲ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይቲ ሕማም ንምግታእ ምሕጻብ ኢድ ይምከር።
en-mt: Hand washing is recommended to curb the spread of the disease.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that people wash hands often with soap and water for at least twenty seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty; before eating; and after blowing one's nose, coughing, or sneezing.
targetString: CDC ፡ ድሕሪ ካብ ሽቃቅ ምምላስና፡ ኣእዳውና ረሲሑ ይረአ እንተደኣ ኣሎ፡ ቅድሚ ምብላዕና፡ ከምኡውን ኣፍንጫና ድሕሪ ምሓዝና፡ ድሕሪ ምስዕልና ወይ ምህንጣስና፡ ብዉሑዱ ን ዒስራ ካልኢታት ብማይን ሳሙናን ኣእዳውና ከነማስዎን ክንሕጸቦን ከም ዘለና ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The CDC recommends that if our hands look dirty after using the toilet, we should wash them with soap and water for at least 20 seconds before eating, and after touching our nose, coughing or sneezing.

sourceString: This is because outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.
targetString: እዚ ከኣ ካብ ሰብነት ሰብ ወጻኢ፡ እቲ ቫይረስ ብናይ ገዛ ሳሙና ስለዝቕተል እዩ፡ ሳሙና ነቲ መከላኸሊ ድርዒ ከምዝነትዕ ይገብር።
en-mt: This is because outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which causes the protective shield to burst.

sourceString: CDC further recommended using an alcohol-based hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol by volume when soap and water are not readily available.
targetString: CDC ኣብ ኣልኮል ዝጠልቀየ ፡ 60% ኣልኮል ዘለዎ፡ ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘር ፡ ኣብ ግዜ ማይን ሳሙናን ኣብ ዘይህልወሉ ክጥቀሙ ይሕብር።
en-mt: The CDC recommends using alcohol-soaked , 60% alcohol, hand sanitizer , when soap and water are not available.

sourceString: The WHO advises people to avoid touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: WHO ሰባት ብዘይተሓጽበ ኣእዳው ኣዒንቶም፡ ኣፍንጫኦምን ኣፎምን ከይሕዙ ይመክር።
en-mt: WHO advises people not to touch their eyes, nose and mouth with unwashed hands.

sourceString: Surfaces may be decontaminated with a number of solutions (within one minute of exposure to the disinfectant for a stainless steel surface), including 62–71% ethanol, 50–100% isopropanol, 0.1% sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, and 0.2–7.5% povidone-iodine.
targetString: እቲ መናድቕ/ባይታ ብ ዝተፈላለየ ኣገባባት ክመክን ይኽእል ኢዩ (ብ ናይ ሓደ ደቂቅ ምቅላዕ ናብ መምከኒ ናይ ዘይምርት ሓጺን )፡ እዚ ድማ፡ 62–71% ethanol, 50–100% isopropanol, 0.1% sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, and 0.2–7.5% povidone-iodine፡ ዘጠቃለለ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The walls/floor can be sterilized by a variety of methods (with a one-minute exposure to a stainless steel sterilizer ), namely: 62–71% ethanol, 50–100% isopropanol, 0.1% sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, and –7.5% povidone-iodine, included.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chrohexidine gluconate, are less effective.
targetString: ከም benzalkonium chloride ከምኡ'ውን chrohexidine gluconate ዝኣመሰሉ ኣብ ምፍዋስ እዚ፡ሕማም ኣድማዕቲ ኣይኮኑን።
en-mt: Such as benzalkonium chloride and chrohexidine gluconate are not effective in treating this,disease.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that if a COVID case is suspected or confirmed at a facility such as an office or day care, all areas such as offices, bathrooms, common areas, shared electronic equipment like tablets, touch screens, keyboards, remote controls, and ATM machines used by the ill persons, should be disinfected.
targetString: CDC ከም ዝመኽሮ፡ ኣብ ኦፊስ ወይ መውዓሊ-ህጻናት ዝኾነ ብ ኮቪድ ዝተጠርጠረ ወይ ዝተለኽፈ እንተደኣ ኣሎ፡ ኩሎም እቶም ክንጥቀመሎም እንኽእል ቦታታት ከም ኦፊሳት፡ መሕጸቢ-ኣካላት፡ ሓባራዊ ቦታ፡ ናይ ሓባር ናይ ኤለክትሮንክ ንብረታት ከም ታብለት፡ ታች-ስክሪን፡ ኪ-ቦርድ፡ ሪሞት መቆጻጸሪን ሕሙም ክጥቀመሎም ዝኽእል ስለ ዝኾኑ ምምካን ኣገዳሲ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The CDC recommends that if anyone is suspected or infected with COVID-19 in an office or daycare, all areas we can use such as offices, bathrooms, common areas, shared electronics such as tablets, touch-screens, keyboards, It is important to dispose of remote controls because they can be used by the patient.

sourceString: Health organizations recommended that people cover their mouth and nose with a bent elbow or a tissue when coughing or sneezing, and disposing of any tissue immediately.
targetString: ውዱባት ጥዕና ከምዘተሓሳሰበኦ ህዝቢ ኣብ ግዜ ምስዓልን ምህንጣስን ኣፉን ኣፍንጭኡን ብኩርናዕ ኢዱን መንዲልን ክሽፍንን ብቕጽበት ድማ ዝተጠቕመሉ መንዲል ክድርብዮን ይመኽራ።
en-mt: Health organizations advise people to cover their mouths and noses with the corner of their hands and handkerchiefs when coughing and sneezing and to throw away used handkerchiefs immediately.

sourceString: Surgical masks are recommended for those who may be infected, as wearing a mask can limit the volume and travel distance of expiratory droplets dispersed when talking, sneezing, and coughing.
targetString: ናይ መጥባሕቲ ናይ ኣፍ መሸፈኒ (ማስክ) ንተነቀፍቲ ኣባላት ሕብረተሰብ ክወድዩ መተሓሳስቢ ቀሪቡ ኣሎ፡ ማስክ ምግባር ብምህጣስ፡ ምስዓል፡ ከምኡ'ዉን ዘረባ ከመሓላለፍ ካብ ዝኽእል ሕማም ይከላኸል።
en-mt: Surgical masks are recommended for vulnerable members of the community to wear, as wearing a mask protects against diseases that can be transmitted by sneezing, coughing, and speech.

sourceString: The WHO has issued instructions on when and how to use masks.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ማስክ መዓስን ኣበይን ትጥቅመሉ  መመርሒታት ኣውጺኡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has issued guidelines on when and where to wear masks.

sourceString: According to Stephen Griffin, a virologist at the University of Leeds, "Wearing a mask can reduce the propensity [of] people to touch their faces, which is a major source of infection without proper hand hygiene."Masks have also been recommended for use by those taking care of someone who may have the disease.
targetString: ብመሰረት ስተፈን ግሪፊን፡ ኣብ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ሊድስ ከም ክኢላ ናይ ስነ-ቫይረስ፡ ‘’ ሰባት ማስክ ምስ ዝገብሩ ገጾም ክትንክፍዎ ዘሎ ተኽእሎ ይጎድልን ይለማመድዎ ድማ፡ በዚ ድማ እቲ ቀንዲ ጸገም ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ብሰንኪ ኣእድእው ዝፍጠር ይጎድል’’ ።ነቶም በዚ ሕማም ዝተለኽፉ ዝኣልዩ ሰባት’ውን ማስክ ክጥቀሙ ይመክር።
en-mt: According to Stephen Griffin, a virologist at the University of Leeds, “When people wear masks, they are less likely to touch their faces and get used to it, thus reducing the main problem of transmission caused by hands.” He recommends wearing masks.

sourceString: The WHO has recommended the wearing of masks by healthy people only if they are at high risk, such as those who are caring for a person with COVID-19, although they also acknowledge that wearing masks may help people avoid touching their face.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ፡ እቶም ናይ ጥዕና ጸገም ዘይብሎም ሰባት ኣብ ሓደገኛ ቦታ ምስ ዝህልዉ ጥራይ ክጥቀሙሉ ኣማኺሩ፡ እዞም ሓደገጃ ቦታታት ድማ፡ ን ብ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተለኽፉ ይኣልዩ እንተደኣ ኣለዉ፡፡ ከም ተወሳኺ ድማ፡ ማስክ ምግባር ሰባት ንገጾም ከይትንክፉ ይከለከል ሙካኑ ኣስሚሮምሉ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that people without health problems use it only if they are in dangerous places, and these dangerous places are caring for people infected with COVID-1 In addition, he stressed that wearing masks prevents people from touching their faces.

sourceString: Several countries have started to encourage the use of face masks by members of the public.
targetString: ብርክት ዝበላ ሃገራት ህዝቢ ናይ ኣፍ መሸፈኒ ( ማስክ) ክገብር የተባብዓ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Several countries are encouraging people to wear face masks.

sourceString: In the U.S., the CDC recommends wearing non-medical face mask made out of cloth.China has specifically recommended the use of disposable medical masks by healthy members of the public, particularly when coming into close contact (1 metre (3 ft) or less) with other people.
targetString: ኣብ ኣሜሪካ፡ CDC፡ ብ ጨርቂ ዝተሰርሐ ሕክምናዊ ዘይኮነ ማስክ/መሸፈኒ ክጥቀሙ ኣማኺራ።ቻይና፡ ተጠቂምካ-ዝድርበ ናይ ሕክምና ማስክ/መሸፈኒ፡ በቶም ጥዕና ዘለዎም ክፋላት ህዝቢ ዝተሰርሑ፡ ክጥቀም ኣማኺራ፡ ብፍላይ ድማ ኣብ ምስ ሰባት ኣብ ሓጺር ርሕቀት (1 ሜትሮ (3 ፊት) ወይ ካብኡ ንታሕቲ) ኣብ እትቀራረበሉ።
en-mt: In the US, the CDC recommends the use of non-medical masks/covers made of cloth.In China, it recommends the use of disposable medical masks/covers, made by healthy sections of the population, especially at short distances with people (1 meter (3). feet) or less) as you approach.

sourceString: Hong Kong recommends wearing a surgical mask when taking public transport or staying in crowded places.
targetString: ሆንግ-ኮንግ፡ ናይ ህዝቢ መጋዓዝያ ኣብ ንጥቀመሉ ግዜን፡ ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ኣብ ዘለዎ ቦታ ኣብ ንጸንሓሉ ግዜን፡ ህዝቢ ናይ መጥባሕቲ ማስኬራ ክንጥቀም ኣማኺራ።
en-mt: Hong-Kong recommends that people wear surgical masks when using public transport and when staying in crowded places.

sourceString: Thailand's health officials are encouraging people to make cloth facemasks at home and wash them daily.
targetString: ሰብ መዚ ታይላንድ ህዝቢ ናይ ገጽ ማስክ ኣብ ገዛ ካብ ጨርቂ ክሰርሕን መዓልታዊ ክሓጽቦምን የተባብዑ።
en-mt: Thai authorities encourage people to make face masks at home from cloth and wash them daily.

sourceString: The Czech Republic and Slovakia banned going out in public without wearing a mask or covering one's nose and mouth.
targetString: ቸክ-ሪፑብሊክን ስሎቫክያን ዝኾነ ውልቀ-ሰብ ማስክ ከይገበረ ወይ ኣፉን ኣፍንጪኡን ከይሸፈነ ንደገ ክወጽእ ከምዘይፍቀድ ኣፍሊጠን።
en-mt: The Czech Republic and Slovakia have announced that no individual will be allowed to go outside without wearing a mask or covering his mouth and nose.

sourceString: On 16 March, Vietnam requested everyone to wear a face mask when going to public areas in order to protect themselves and others.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 16 ቬትናም፡ ን ኩሉ ሰብ ናብ ናይ ህዝቢ ቦታታት ክኸይድ እንከሎ፡ ንነፍሱን ንኻልዕትን ንምክልኻል ማስክ ክጥቀሙ ጠለብ ኣቕሪባ።
en-mt: On March 16, Vietnam required everyone to wear masks to protect themselves and others when going to public places.

sourceString: The Austrian government mandated that everyone entering a grocery store must wear a face mask.
targetString: መንግስቲ ኦስትርያ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ኣብ ግሮሰሪ ዝኣትው ሰብ ናይ ገጽ ማስከራ ክጥቀም ኣማሕጺኑ።
en-mt: The Austrian government has urged everyone to wear a face mask when entering grocery stores.

sourceString: Israel has asked all residents to wear face masks when in public.
targetString: እስራኤል ኩሎም ነበርቲ ኣብ ህዝባዊ ቦታታት ማስኬራ ክገብሩ ሓቲታ ኣላ።
en-mt: Israel has asked all residents to wear masks in public places.

sourceString: Taiwan, which has been producing ten million masks per day since mid-March, required passengers on trains and intercity buses to wear face masks on 1 April.
targetString: ታይዋን፡ እታ ካብ ፍርቂ መጋቢት ኣብ መዓልቲ ዓሰርተ ሚልዮን ማስክታት ከተፍሪ ዝጸንሐት፡ ካብ 1, ሚያዝያ ጀሚራ፡ ን ናይ ባቡርን ኣውቶቡስን ተጋዓዝቲ ማስክ ወይ መሸፈኒ ክጥቀሙ ኣዚዛ።
en-mt: Taiwan, which has been producing 10 million masks a day since mid-March, has ordered train and bus passengers to wear masks since April

sourceString: Panama has made it obligatory to wear a face mask whenever going outside, while also recommending the manufacture of a homemade face mask for those who cannot purchase face masks.
targetString: ፓናማ ናይ ገጽ መከላኸሊ (ማስክ) ከይወደኻ ምውጻእ ብሕጊ ዘሕትት ምዃኑን፥ ሰባት ኣብ ቤት ዝስርሑ ማስከታትገዚኦም ክጥቀሙ ከም ዝኽእሉን ሓጊጋ ኣላ።
en-mt: Panama has made it illegal to go out without wearing a mask, and people can buy and use homemade masks.

sourceString: Face masks have also been widely used in Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, and Singapore.
targetString: ናይ ገጽ ማስክ ኣብ ጃፓን፡ ደቡብ-ኮርያ፡ ማለዥያን ሲንጋፖርን ብብዝሒ ይጥቀም ከም ዘሎ ተነጊሩ።
en-mt: Face masks are widely used in Japan, South-Korea, Malaysia and Singapore.

sourceString: Social distancing (also known as physical distancing) includes infection control actions intended to slow the spread of disease by minimizing close contact between individuals.
targetString: ማሕበራዊ ርሕቀት (ኣካላዊ ርሕቀት’ውን ተባሂሉ ዝጽዋዕ) ነቲ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ሕማም ብመገዲ ምንካይ ጥቡቕ ርክብ ኣብ መንጎ ሰባት ንምጉዳል ዝዓለሙ ስጒምታት ቁጽጽር መልከፍቲ የጠቓልሉ።
en-mt: Social distancing (also called physical distancing) includes infection control measures aimed at reducing the spread of disease by reducing close contact between people.

sourceString: Methods include quarantines; travel restrictions; and the closing of schools, workplaces, stadiums, theatres, or shopping centres.
targetString: ኣገባባት ንውሸባታት፣ ናይ መገሻ ቀይድታት፣ ከምኡ ድማ እቲ ምዕጻው ኣብያተ-ትምህርቲ፣ ቦታታት-ስራሕ፡ ስታድዩማት፡ ትያትራት፡ ወይ ማእከላት ዕዳጋ የጠቓልሉ።
en-mt: Procedures include quarantines, travel restrictions, and the closure of schools, workplaces, stadiums, theaters, or shopping malls.

sourceString: Individuals may apply social distancing methods by staying at home, limiting travel, avoiding crowded areas, using no-contact greetings, and physically distancing themselves from others.
targetString: ውልቀ ሰባት ማሕበራዊ ምፍንታት ኣገባባት :ኣብ ገዛ ብምጽናሕ፡ ካብ መገሻ ብምድራት፡ ምውጋድ ምእካብ፡ ምትንኻፍ ዘይብሉ ሰላምታ ብምዝውታርን ብኣካል ካብ ካልኦት ብምርሓቕን: ከተግብርዎ ይኽእሉ ።
en-mt: Individuals can implement social distancing measures :by staying at home, restricting travel, avoiding gatherings, practicing non-contact greetings and staying physically away from others

sourceString: Many governments are now mandating or recommending social distancing in regions affected by the outbreak.
targetString: ብዙሓት መንግስታት ኣብዚ ሕጂ እዋን፡ ኣብቲ ብ ቫይረስ ዝተለኽፈ ቦታታት፡ ማሕበራዊ ምርሕሓቅ ክትግበር ይመክሩ ወይ ይእዝዙ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Many governments are currently recommending or ordering social distancing in infected areas.

sourceString: The maximum gathering size recommended by US government bodies and health organizations was swiftly reduced from 250 people (if there was no known COVID-19 spread in a region) to 50 people, and later to 10 people.
targetString: እቲ ዝበዝሐ ናይ ምትእኽኻብ ዓቀን፡ ብ ናይ ኣሜሪካ ኣካላት መንግስቲን ናይ ጥዕና ማሕበራትን ከም ዝተመክረ/ዝተማሕጸነ፡ ካብ 250 (ዝኾነ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምስፍሕፋሕ ኣብቲ ከባቢ እንተዘየለ) ናብ 50 ሰባት ወሪዱ፡ ጸኒሑ ውን ናብ 10 ወሪዱ።
en-mt: The maximum gathering size was reduced from 250 (if there is no spread of COVID-19 in the area) to 50 people, as recommended by US government agencies and health associations, and later to

sourceString: On 22 March 2020, Germany banned public gatherings of more than two people.Older adults and those with underlying medical conditions such as diabetes, heart disease, respiratory disease, hypertension, and compromised immune systems face increased risk of serious illness and complications and have been advised by the CDC to stay home as much as possible in areas of community outbreak.In late March 2020, the WHO and other health bodies began to replace the use of the term "social distancing" with "physical distancing", to clarify that the aim is to reduce physical contact while maintaining social connections, either virtually or at a distance.
targetString: ኣብ 22 መጋቢት ናይ 2020፡ ጀርመን ካብ ክልተ ሰባት ንላዕሊ ንዝግበሩ ምትእኽኻባት ኣጊዳ።ሽማግለታትን ሕዱር ሕማም ዘለዎም ዓይነት ሰባትን ከም፡ ሕማም ሽኮር፡ ናይ ልቢ ሕማም፡ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሕማም፡ ጸቅጢ ደም፡ ከም ኡውን ዘጠራጥር ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቅሚ፡ ዘለዎም ኣብ ግዜ ለበዳ ኣብ ገዛ ክጸብሑ CDC መኺራ።ኣብ መወዳእታ መጋቢት 2020፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለምን ካል ኦት ናይ ጥዕና ኣካላትን ነቲ ‘’’ማሕበራዊ ምርሕሓቅ’’ ዝብል ኣምር ብ ’’ኣካላዊ ምርሕሓቅ‘’ ብዝብል ክቕይሮ ጀሚሩ፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ዕላማ ኣብ ግዜ ርክባት (ቪርችዋል ወይ ብርሕቀት) ኣካላዊ ምቅርራብ ምጉዳል ንዝብል ንምንጻር ኢዩ።
en-mt: On March 22, 2020, Germany banned gatherings of more than two people.The elderly and people with chronic illnesses such as diabetes, heart disease, respiratory diseases, high blood pressure, and questionable immunity, at home during an outbreak In late March 2020, the World Health Organization and other health authorities began replacing the concept of “social distancing” with “physical distancing,” which is the goal during communications (virtual or remotely). to clarify the lack of physical intimacy.

sourceString: The use of the term "social distancing" had led to implications that people should engage in complete social isolation, rather than encouraging them to stay in contact with others through alternative means.Some authorities have issued sexual health guidelines for use during the pandemic.
targetString: "ማሕበራዊ ምርሕሓቕ" ዝብል ኣምር፡ ሰባት ኣብ ክንዲ ምስ መቕርቦም ብዝተፈለየ መገዲ ዝቀራረቡ፡ ፈጺምካ ተነጺልካ ንበይንኻ ምዃን ገይሮም ወሲዶሞ ኣለዉ ወላ`እካ ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ክራኸቡ እናኸኣሉ። ገለ ሰበስልጣናት ህዝቢ ጾታዊ ጥዕና መምርሒታት ብኽታል ጥዕናኡ ክሕሉ ከም ዘለዎ ዝገልጽ መምርሒታት ኣውጺኦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: The concept of “social isolation” has been taken by people to be completely isolated and alone instead of being close to their relatives in a different way even though they can communicate in different ways. Some officials have issued guidelines that the public should stay healthy by following sexual health guidelines.

sourceString: These include recommendations to only have sex with someone you live with, who does not have the virus or symptoms of the virus.
targetString: እዚኦም ምኽርታት ንምክያድ ጾታዊ ርክብ ምስቲ/ታ እቲ ቫይረስ ወይ ምልክታት ናይቲ ቫይረስ ዘይብሉ ምሳኻ/ኺ ዝነብር ሰብ ምክያድ ዘጠቓልሉ እዮም።
en-mt: These recommendations include having sex with someone who has the virus or someone living with you who does not have the symptoms.

sourceString: Self-isolation at home has been recommended for those diagnosed with COVID-19 and those who suspect they have been infected.
targetString: እቶም COVID-19 ከምዘለዎም ብመርመራ ዝተፈልጡ ከምኡ ድማ እቶም ተለኺፎም ከይህልዉ ዝጥርጥሩ ሰባት ኣብ ገዛ ክንጸሉ ዝብል ምኽሪ ተዋሂብዎም።
en-mt: Those who tested positive for COVID-19 and those suspected of being infected were advised to stay at home.

sourceString: Health agencies have issued detailed instructions for proper self-isolation.Many governments have mandated or recommended self-quarantine for entire populations living in affected areas.
targetString: ወኪላት ጥዕና ን ግቡእ ነፍሰ ምግላል ዝምልከት ዝርዝራዊ መምርሒታት ኣውጺአን።ብዙሓት መንግስታት ኣብ ተኣፋፊ ቦታታት ንዝርከቡ ኩሎም ዜጋታተን ሙሉእ ነብሰ ውሸባ ወሲነን።
en-mt: Health agencies have issued detailed guidelines for proper self-isolation. Many governments have imposed full self-quarantine on all their citizens in vulnerable areas.

sourceString: The strongest self-quarantine instructions have been issued to those in high risk groups.
targetString: እቶም ዝሓየሉ ናይ ርእሰ-ውሸባ መምርሒታት ነቶም ኣብ ልዑል ስግኣተ-ሓደጋ ዘለዉ ጒጅለታት ወጽዮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: The strongest self-quarantine guidelines have been issued for high-risk groups.

sourceString: Those who may have been exposed to someone with COVID-19 and those who have recently travelled to a country or region with widespread transmission have been advised to self-quarantine for 14 days from the time of last possible exposure.
targetString: እቶም ምስ ልኹፍ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝኾነ ርክባት ዝገበሩ ወይ ዝተቃልዑን ከምኡውን እቶም ናብተን ናይ ቫይረስ ምስፍሕፋሕ ዝተራ እየለን ሃገራት ዝገሹን፡ ካብታ ዝተቃልዑላ ግዜ ናይ 14 መዓልቲ ምውሻብ ክገብሩ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Those who have had contact with or been exposed to an infected person and those traveling to countries where the spread of the virus is normal must undergo a 14-day quarantine from the time of exposure.

sourceString: Strategies in the control of an outbreak are containment or suppression, and mitigation.
targetString: ናይ ምቁጽጻር ስትራተጂ ናይ’ዚ ለብዒ ምድራት፡ ምጽቃጥን ምፉኻስን ኣዮም።
en-mt: The control strategies for this outbreak are limitation, compression and mitigation.

sourceString: Containment is undertaken in the early stages of the outbreak and aims to trace and isolate those infected as well as introduce other measures of infection control and vaccinations to stop the disease from spreading to the rest of the population.
targetString: ገና ከይተጋደደ እንከሎ ነዚ ለበዳ ንምቁጽጻሩ፡ ንዝተለኽፉ ቀልጢፍካ ምእላይን ምዉሻብን፡ ከምኡ'ዉን ክታበትን ንእኡ ዝመስልን መከላኸሊ መገድታት ብምሕንጻጽ ዝርግሕኡ ንምግታእ ይስራሕ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Work is underway to control the outbreak before it worsens by developing early removal and quarantine of infected persons, as well as vaccines and similar preventive measures.

sourceString: When it is no longer possible to contain the spread of the disease, efforts then move to the mitigation stage: measures are taken to slow the spread and mitigate its effects on the healthcare system and society.
targetString: ነዚ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ሕማም ምቁጽጻር ኣብ ዘይከ ኣለሉ እዋን፡ እቲ ኩሉ ጻዕርታት ጸኒሑ ናብ ምፉኻስ ደረጃ ይቅየር፡ እዚ ተበግሶ ድማ ነቲ ለበዳ ንሙግዳልን ኣብ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን ሲስተም ዘምጸ ኦ ጽልዋ ንሙግዳልን ዝግበር ኢዩ።
en-mt: When this spread of disease cannot be controlled, all efforts are later turned to mitigation, an initiative to combat the epidemic and its impact on the health care system.

sourceString: A combination of both containment and mitigation measures may be undertaken at the same time.
targetString: ናይ ምክልኻልን ምጥፋእን መደባት ኣብ ሓደ እዋን ክሰላሰል ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Protection and eradication programs can be carried out at the same time.

sourceString: Suppression requires more extreme measures so as to reverse the pandemic by reducing the basic reproduction number to less than 1.Part of managing an infectious disease outbreak is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as flattening the epidemic curve.
targetString: ብዕባጥ ዝያዳ ምሒር ስጒምታትት ምውሳድ ይጠልብ ምእንቲ ነቲ ለበዳ ብመገዲ ምጒዳል መሰረታዊ መፍረ ናብ ትሕቲ 1 ናብ ድሕሪት ከምዝምለስ ክግበር።ክፋል ናይ ኣተኣላልያ ለበዳ ተመሓላላፊ ሕማም ነቲ ናይ ጫፍ ብዝሒ ለበዳ ከምዝንኪ ምግባር እዩ፡ ነቲ ናይ ለበዳ ጥውዮ (ከርቭ) ምጽፋሕ ተባሂሉ ከኣ ይፍለጥ።
en-mt: It requires more drastic measures to be taken by suppression so that the epidemic can be reversed by reducing basic production to below 1. Part of managing an infectious disease epidemic is to reduce the peak number of infections, known as widening the epidemic curve.

sourceString: This decreases the risk of health services being overwhelmed and provides more time for vaccines and treatments to be developed.
targetString: እዚ ትካላት ጥዕና ካብ ዓቕመን ንላዕሊ ከይምጠጣን ክታበትን ካልእ መድሃኒትን ክሳብ ንኽርከብ እኹል ግዜ ዝህብ እዩ።
en-mt: This will give health facilities enough time to become available for vaccines and other medicines.

sourceString: Non-pharmaceutical interventions that may manage the outbreak include personal preventive measures, such as hand hygiene, wearing face-masks, and self-quarantine; community measures aimed at physical distancing such as closing schools and cancelling mass gathering events; community engagement to encourage acceptance and participation in such interventions; as well as environmental measures such surface cleaning.More drastic actions aimed at containing the outbreak were taken in China once the severity of the outbreak became apparent, such as quarantining entire cities and imposing strict travel bans.
targetString: ፋርማሲያዊ ዘይኮኑ ተበግሶታትን ስጉምትታትን ነዚ ምስፍሕፋሕ ክ ኣልዩዉ ዝኽእሉ ነዞም ዝስዕቡ የጠቃልሉ፡ ናይ ውልቂ ምክልካል ስጉምቲ ከም፡ ጽሬት ኣእድው፡ ናይ ገጽ ማስክ ምግባር፡ ኣብ ናይ ኮሚኒቲ ማሕበራዊ ምርሕሓቅ ዝሙርኮሱ ከም ምቁራጽ ዓበይቲ ምትእክኻባን ምዕጻው ቤት-ትምህርትታት፡ ነቲ ኮሚኒቲ ድማ ኣብዚ ናይ ምክልኻል መስራሓት ክሳተፍ ምድጋፍ፡ ከ ኡውን ናይ ኣከባቢ ስጉምትታት ከም ጽሬት ባይታ መናድቕን።ኣዝዮም ከበድቲ ውሳኔታት፡ ነቲ ኣብ ቻይና ኣዝዩ ከስፋሕፍሕ ዝጀመረ ቫይረስ ንምዕጋት፡ ተወሲዶም ኢዮም፡ ከም ኣብነት ምውሻብ ከተማታት ሙሉእ ብ ሙሉእን ናይ መገሻ ምኽልካላትን።
en-mt: Non-pharmaceutical initiatives and measures that can prevent this spread include: personal preventive measures such as hand hygiene, wearing face masks, community social distancing such as cutting off large gatherings and closing schools, and involving the community in these preventive measures support, as well as environmental measures such as cleaning floor walls.Very tough decisions have been taken to curb the virus, which has begun to spread rapidly in China, such as complete urban quarantine and travel bans.

sourceString: Other countries also adopted a variety of measures aimed at limiting the spread of the virus.
targetString: ካልኦት ሃገራት'ዉን ዝርግሐ  እዚ ቫይረስ ንምግታእ ዝተፈላለየ ስጉምቲ ክወስዳ ጀሚረን ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Other countries have also begun taking various measures to curb the spread of the virus.

sourceString: South Korea introduced mass screening and localized quarantines, and issued alerts on the movements of infected individuals.
targetString: ደቡብ ኮርያ ዓቢ ምእጋድን ከባብያዊ ምውሻብን ከምኡውን ልኹፍ ውልቀሰብ ኣብ ዝንቀሳቀሰሉ እዋን መጠንቀቅታ ምስዳድ፡ ኣተኣታትያ።
en-mt: South Korea has introduced a massive ban and local quarantine, as well as sending alerts when an infected individual is moving.

sourceString: Singapore provided financial support for those infected who quarantined themselves and imposed large fines for those who failed to do so.
targetString: ሲንጋፖረ፡ ነቶም ዝተለኽፉ እሞ ባዕሎም ድማ ዝተወሸቡ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ትህብ፡ ብኣንጻሩ ድማ ነዚ ዘየተግበሩ ገጂፍ መቅጻዕቲ ትውስን።
en-mt: Singapore offers financial assistance to those who are infected and quarantined themselves, while imposing heavy penalties on those who do not comply.

sourceString: Taiwan increased face mask production and penalized hoarding of medical supplies.Simulations for Great Britain and the United States show that mitigation (slowing but not stopping epidemic spread) and suppression (reversing epidemic growth) have major challenges.
targetString: ታይዋን ነቲ ናይ ማስክ ምፍራይ ብዝሒ ወሲኻትሉ፡ ነቶም ናይ ሕክምና መሳርሒ ዝሓብኡ ድማ ቀጺዓ።ኣብ ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን ምጉዳላት ተራእዩ (ዝዘሓለ ዘየቃርጽ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ለበዳ)፡ ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካን ድማ ምውሳኽ ተራእዩ (ዝተገልበጠ ምውሳኽ ለበዳ)፡ እዚ ድማ ዓቢ መስገደል ኢዩ ነዘን ሃገራት።
en-mt: Taiwan has increased the mass production of masks and punished those who hide medical equipment.There have been declines in the UK (slowed steady spread of the epidemic) and increases in the United States (reversed increase in epidemics), which is a major blow to these countries.

sourceString: Optimal mitigation policies might reduce peak healthcare demand by 2/3 and deaths by half, but still result in hundreds of thousands of deaths and health systems being overwhelmed.
targetString: ምቹእ መቃለሊ ፖሊስታት ንጠለብ ሕክምናዊ ክንክን ብ 2/3 ን መጠነ ሞት ድማ ብ ፍርቂ ከጉድል ይኽእል።ኮይኑ ገና ሞት ኣማኢት ኣሽሓትን ሽግር ስርዓተ ሕክምናን ግን ኣሎ።
en-mt: Favorable mitigation policies can reduce the demand for medical care by 2/3 and the mortality rate by half. However, there are still hundreds of thousands of deaths and problems with the medical system.

sourceString: Suppression can be preferred but needs to be maintained for as long as the virus is circulating in the human population (or until a vaccine becomes available, if that comes first), as transmission otherwise quickly rebounds when measures are relaxed.
targetString: ምጽቃጥ ተመራጺ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ፡ እንተኾነ ግን ክሳብ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ሕብረተሰብ ዝዘውር ዘሎ ምዕጋቱ የድሊ ( ወይ ድማ ኣቐዲሙ ክታበት ክሳብ ዝርከብ)።እንተድኣ ኣተሓሕዛ ኣዝሊቕካ ግን ቅልጡፍ ምርባሕ ክኽሰት ይክእል።
en-mt: Compression may be preferable, but it needs to be contained until the virus is circulating in the community (or until a vaccine is available earlier).But if treatment is skipped, rapid reproduction can occur.

sourceString: Long-term intervention to suppress the pandemic causes social and economic costs.
targetString: ነዊሕ ዝዓለመ ምቁጽጻር ናይ ለበዳ ነቲ ኢኮኖሚን ማሕበራዊ ሂወትን ዋጋ የኽፍሎ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Long-term epidemic control costs the economy and social life.

sourceString: There are no specific antiviral medications approved for COVID-19, but development efforts are underway, including testing of existing medications.
targetString: ምርግጋጽ ህሉው መድሃኒታትን ናይ ምምዕባል ፈተነታት እካ ይካየዱ እንተለዉ ዝኾነ ቁቡል ጸረ ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት COVID-19 የሎን፡
en-mt: Despite the validation of existing drugs and development trials, there are no approved antiviral drugs for COVID-19:

sourceString: Taking over-the-counter cold medications, drinking fluids, and resting may help alleviate symptoms.
targetString: ምልክታት ሕማን ንምህዳእ ፈሰስቲ ምውሳድ፡ ዕረፍቲ ምርካብ ን መድሃኒት ፈውሲ ሰዓል ተኪኦም ሓገዝቲ እዮም።
en-mt: Taking fluids to relieve symptoms, getting rest and replacing cough medicine are helpful.

sourceString: Depending on the severity, oxygen therapy, intravenous fluids, and breathing support may be required.
targetString: ኣብቲ ናይ ሕደገኝነት ብምሙርካስ፡ ናይ ኦክሲጅን ምክንካን፡ ውሽጠ ቨይናዊ ፈሳሲ፡ ከምኡውን ናይ ምስትንፋስ ደገፍ የድሊ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Depending on the severity, oxygen maintenance, intravenous fluids, and ventilatory support are required.

sourceString: The use of steroids may worsen outcomes.
targetString: ምጥቃም ናይ ስተሮይድ ነቲ ውጽኢት ከግድዶ ወይ መሊሱ ከኽፍኦ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: The use of steroids can force or worsen the effect.

sourceString: Several compounds that were previously approved for treatment of other viral diseases are being investigated for use in treating COVID-19.
targetString: ብርክት ዝበሉ ኣኣቐዲሞም ንኻላኦት ዓይነታት ሕማም ቫይረስ ክፍውሱ ፍቓድ ዝረኸቡ ውሁዳት ኣብ ፍወሳ COVID-19 ንኽውዕሉ መርመራ ይግበር ኣሎ።
en-mt: Several compounds previously approved to treat other types of viral illnesses are being tested for use in the treatment of COVID-1

sourceString: The WHO also stated that some "traditional and home remedies" can provide relief of the symptoms caused by SARS-CoV-19.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ገለ "ባህላዊን ኣብ ገዛ ዝስርሑ መድሃኒታትን" ንገለ ምልክታት SARS-CoV-19 ክፍውሱ ከም ዝኽእሉ ጠቒሱ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) said some "traditional and home remedies" can cure some symptoms of SARS-CoV-1

sourceString: Increasing capacity and adapting healthcare for the needs of COVID-19 patients is described by the WHO as a fundamental outbreak response measure.
targetString: ዓቕሚ ትካላት ጥዕና ምዕባይ፡  ኣብ ምምካት ለበዳ ኮቪድ-19 ወሳኒ ተራ ከም ዘለዎ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ይገልጽ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) says capacity building of health institutions is critical in fighting the COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: The ECDC and the European regional office of the WHO have issued guidelines for hospitals and primary healthcare services for shifting of resources at multiple levels, including focusing laboratory services towards COVID-19 testing, cancelling elective procedures whenever possible, separating and isolating COVID-19 positive patients, and increasing intensive care capabilities by training personnel and increasing the number of available ventilators and beds.
targetString: ECDCን ናይ ኤውሮጳ ኣውራጃዊ ኦፊስ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO)ን፡ ን ሆስፒታላትን ነተን ቀዳማይ ረድኤት ዝህባን: ነቲ ጸጋታተን ኣብ ዝተፈላለየ ደረጃ ክኸፋፍለኦ ምዒዱ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ናይ ላባራቶርይ መርመራታት ናብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ስረሓት ክዘዙ፡ ነቲ መራጺ ስረሓት ኣብ ኣድላዪ እዋን ምቁራጽ፡ ነቶም ልኹፋት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ምውሻብ/ምፍላይ፡ ከምኡውን ብ ኣባላት ዝግበር ጽዕቅ ክንክን ኣገልግሎታት ምውሳኽ፡ እዚ ድማ ሓደሽቲ ብምስልጣንን ሓደስቲ ዓራውትን ቨንቲለቶራት ብምሳኽን ክግበር ይኸእል።
en-mt: The ECDC and the World Health Organization (WHO) European Regional Office have advised hospitals and first aid providers to: allocate their resources at different levels, including ordering laboratory tests to COVID-19 operations, suspending elective operations when necessary, Quarantine/isolation of those infected with COVID-19, and increase intensive care services by members, which can be done by training new ones and providing new beds and ventilators.

sourceString: There are various theories about where the very first case (the so-called patient zero) may have originated.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ሕሙም ካበይ ከም ዝተረኽበ ዝገልጽ ዝተፈላለየ ሓሳባት እዩ ዝቐርብ ዘሎ።
en-mt: There are various theories as to where the first patient was found.

sourceString: The first known case of the novel coronavirus may trace back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ሓድሽ ሕማም ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ኣብ 1 ታሕሳስ 2019 ኣብ ዉሃን፡ ሁቤ ናይ ቻይና ተራእዩ።
en-mt: The first new case of the coronavirus appeared on December 1, 2019 in Wuhan, Hubei, China.

sourceString: Within a month, the number of coronavirus cases in Hubei gradually increased.
targetString: ኣብ ዉሽጢ ወርሒ፡ ኣብ ዞባ ሁበይ ቻይና ብዝሒ መልከፍቲ ቀስ ብቐስ ወሲኹ።
en-mt: Within a month, the number of infections in China's Hubei Province has slowly increased.

sourceString: These were mostly linked to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, which also sold live animals, and one theory is that the virus came from one of these kinds of animals; or, in other words, has a zoonotic origin.A pneumonia cluster of unknown cause was observed on 26 December and treated by the doctor Zhang Jixian in Hubei Provincial Hospital, who informed the Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: እዚኦም ዝበዝሑ ምስ ሁናን ናይ ባሕሪ መሸጢ ዕዳጋ ዝተሓሓዙ ኢዮም (ወላ’ውን ብሂወት ዘለዉ እንስሳታት ዝሸይጥ)፡ ሓደ ሓቒ ድማ እዚ ቫይረስ ካብዞም ኣብ ዕዳጋ ዝሽየጡ ዓይነት እንስሳታት ምምጹኡ ኢዩ፡ ወይ’ውን ብካልእ ኣዘራርባ ናይ እንስሳ መበቆል ኣለዎ።Doctor Zhang Jixian (ዶክተር ዛንግ ጂዥያን)- ኣብ 26 ታሕሳስ ኣብ ሁበይ ኣውራጃዊ ሆስፒታል፡ ብዘይ ፍሉጥ ጠንቂ ዝተኣከቡ ናይ ኒሞንያ ቫይረስ ተዓዚቡ፡ በዚ ድማ እታ ትሰርሓላ ሆስፒታል ናብ ዉሃን ጂያንገን CDC ኣብ 27 ታሕሳስ፡ ሓበሬታ ኣመሓላሊፋ።
en-mt: These are mostly associated with Hunan seafood markets (even those that sell live animals), and one fact is that the virus comes from these species sold in the market, or in other words, has animal origins. Doctor Zhang Jixian (Dr. Zhang). Jixian)- On December 26, a collection of pneumonia viruses of unknown cause was observed at Hubei Provincial Hospital, which informed the Wuhan Jiangen CDC on December

sourceString: On 30 December, a group of doctors at Wuhan Central Hospital alerted their colleagues of a "SARS-like coronavirus".
targetString: ኣብ 30 ታሕሳስ፡ ኣብ Wuhan Central Hospital (ማእከላይ ሆስፒታል ዉሃን) ዝርከቡ ጉጅለ ዶካትር ንመሳርሕቶም ብዛዕባ “SARS-መሰል ኮሮናቫይረስ” መጠንቀቕታ ኣመሓላሊፎምሎም።
