targetString: እቲ ሓፈሻዊ ዳይረክተር WHO (ዓለማዊ ውድብ ጥዕና) “በቲ ዘሻቅል መጠን ለበዳን ክብደቱን ከምኡ ድማ በቲ ዘተሓሳስብ መጠን ተግባር-ኣልቦነት ብኽልቲኦም ኣዝዩ ስክፍታ ከምዘለዎ” ሓቢሩ።እቲ WHO (ዓለማዊ ውድብ ጥዕና) ዘይእኹል ኣተሓሕዛ ናይቲ ለበዳ ኣርእዩ ብዝብል ከቢድ ነቐፌታ ወሪድዎ፡ ንሳቶም ደንግዩ ህዝባዊ ህጹጽ እዋን ብምእዋጁን ነቲ ቫይረስ ደንጉዩ ከም ዓለማዊ ለበዳ ምእዋጁን የጠቓልል።
en-mt: The WHO (World Health Organization) Director-General said he was “deeply concerned by both the alarming scale and severity of the epidemic and the worrying level of inaction.” It includes declaring a state of emergency and late declaring the virus a global pandemic.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: ሓደ ካብቲ ሳዕቤናት ዳይረክተር ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ክወርድ ዝጠልብ ናይ 733,000 ሰባት ፌርማ ዘለዎ ስምዕታ ኣብ ሚያዝያ 6 ምቕራቡ እዩ።
en-mt: One of the consequences was the April 6 petition signed by 733,000 people demanding the resignation of the World Health Organization (WHO) director.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ 26 መጋቢት 2020፡ ብርክት ዝበሉ ናይ ሕቡራት ሃገራት (UN) ክኢላታት ሰብኣዊ መሰላት ኣብ ግዜ ለበዳ ኮቪድ-19 ክኽበር ጻውዒት ኣቕሪቦም።
en-mt: On March 26, 2020, a number of United Nations (UN) experts called for human rights to be respected during the COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: እቲ ጉጅለ ክኢላታት፡ ኩሉሰብ ናይ ህይወት ኣድሕን መሰል ከም ዘለዎ ብምጥቃስ፡ መንግስቲ ድማ ነዚ ሓላፍነት ዝስከም ምዃኑ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The expert group said everyone has the right to save lives and the government bears this responsibility.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: እቲ ጉጅለ ጸቒጡ ከምዝተዛረበሉ ዋሕዲ ናይ ምንጭታት/ጸጋታት ጥዕና ወይ መድሕን ከም ምኽኒት ናይ ኣድልዎ ኣንጻር ሓደ ውሱን ጉጅለ ከገለግል የብሉን።
en-mt: The group stressed that lack of health resources/resources or insurance should not serve as an excuse for discrimination against a particular group.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: እቶም ክኢላታት ከም ዘስመሩሉ፡ ኩሉ ዓይነት ሰብ ናይ ጥዕና መሰል ኣለዎ፡ እዚ ድማ ነዞም ዓይነታት ሰባት የጠቃልል፡ ጎዶሎ ኣካል ዘለዎም፡ ናይ ማይኖሪቲ ጉጅለ ኣባላት ዝኾኑ፡ ዓበይቲ ሰባት፡ ገዛ ዘይብሎም፡ ኣብ ኣዝዩ ድካ ከባቢ ዝነብሩ፡ ኣብ ቤት-ማእሰርቲ ዘለዉ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ስደተኛታትን ካልኦት ናይ መንግስቲ ሓገዝ ዝደልዩን፡ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: The experts emphasized that everyone has the right to health, including people with disabilities, minority group members, adults, the homeless, those living in very poor areas, those in prison, and' They may also be refugees and others in need of government assistance.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: ዓለም-ለኻዊ መንግስታዊ ማሕበራት፡ቅልውላው ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ኢኮኖሚን ማሕበራዊን ዘምጽኦ ጽልዋ ይግምግማ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: International government organizations are assessing the economic and social impact of the COVID-19 crisis.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: ውድብ ምትሕግጋዝ ንቁጠባን ምዕባለን (Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development) ሃገራት ዓለም እዋናዊ ሓበሬታን፡ ፓሊሲን ኣተሓሕዛ እዚ ሕማምን ዝርክበሉ ባይታ ከምዝፈጠረ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) has created a platform for countries around the world to receive up-to-date information, policy and management of the disease.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: ዲጂታላዊ ማእከል፡ ንመድለዪ(Tracker) ሃገራዊ ፖሊሲ ዘካተተ ኮይኑ፡ ካብ ፖሊሲ ምጥንኻር ጥዕናውን ቁጠባውን ስርዓታትን ዓለምን ክሳብ ምርኣይ ሳዕቤን ምዕጻውን ምድራት መገሻታትን የጠቓልል።ዕላሙኡ ድማ ሃገራት ካብ ንሓድሕደን ክምሃራን ምስላጥ ውሁድ ዓለማዊ ግብረመልሲ ነዚ በዳሂ ሕማም ኮሮና ቫይረስ።
en-mt: The digital hub includes a national policy tracker, ranging from policies to strengthen health and economic systems and the world to seeing the consequences of closures and travel restrictions.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: መንግስቲ ቻይና ብሰንኪ ኣታሓሕዛ ናይ’ዚ ኣብ ዞባ ሁበይ ናይ ቻይና ዝጀመረ ዓለማዊ ለበዳ ካብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ ጸሓፊ ካቢነ ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ማይክል ጎቭን ኤድዋርዶ ቦልሶናሮ ወዱ ንፕረሲደንት ብራዚል ጃየር ቦልሶናሮ ይውቀስ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The Chinese government is being blamed by the United States, UK Cabinet Secretary Michael Gove and Eduardo Bolsonaro, son of Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro, for its handling of the global outbreak that began in China's Hubei province.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: ብዙሓት ኣብ ኣውራጃዊ-ጽፍሒ ዘለዉ ኣመሓደርቲ ናይቲ Communist Party of China (CP, ዴሳዊ ሰልፊ ቻይናC) ነቶም ናይ ውሸባ ጻዕርታት ኣብ ማእከላይ ቻይና ብዘርኣይዎ ኣተሓሕዛ ተባሪሮም፡ እዚ ከኣ ምልክት ናይ ዘይዕግበት ኣብ ናይቲ ፖለቲካዊ ውድብ ግብረመልሲ ነቲ ለበዳ ኣብዞም ዞቦታት እዚኦም እዩ።
en-mt: Many provincial-level governors of the Communist Party of China (CP) have been sacked for their handling of the quarantine efforts in central China, a sign of dissatisfaction with the political party's response to the outbreak in these regions.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ተንተንቲ ፡ እዚ ን መራሒ ናይ ቻይና ኮሚኒስታዊ ፓርቲ ዚን ፒንግ ኣብ ጉዳይ ኣተሓሕዛ እዚ ለበዳ ኮሮናቫይረስ ንዝወርዶ ዘሎ ነቐፌታ ንምህዳእ ዝተገብረ ምዃኑ ይገልጹ።
en-mt: Some analysts say this was done to ease criticism of Chinese Communist Party leader Xi Jinping over his handling of the outbreak.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: ገለ ከም ዛሆ ሊጂያን ዛኣመሰሉ ሰበስልጣን ቻይና ኮሮና ቫይረስ ካብ ዉሃን ከም ዝተበገሰ ኣቐዲሙ ዝተዋህበ መረዳእታ ብምንጻግ፡ COVID-19 ብ ውዲት ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ወይ ጣልያን ዝመጸ ሙኻኑ ይገልጹ።
en-mt: Some Chinese officials, such as Zhao Lijian, have rejected earlier claims that the virus originated in Wuhan, saying COVID-19 was a conspiracy by the United States or Italy.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: ምምሕዳር ዶናልድ ትራምፕ ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ናይ “ቻይና ቫይረስ” ወይ “ዉሃን ቫይረስ” ከም ዝኾነ ብምግላጽ ናይ ቻይና ልዕሊ ‘’መጠን ሳንሱር ናይ’ቲ ቫይረስ ናብ ዓለማዊ ለብዒ ከምዝለወጦ’’ ገሊጹ።እዚ ጉዳይ ብገለ ነቐፍቲ ምስ ዓሌትነት ብምትሕሓዝ እቲ ምምሕዳር ‘’ኣብ ኣታሓሕዛ እቲ ሕማም ዝነበሮ ጉድለት ንምጥምዛዝ ሙኻኑ ገሊጾም’’።
en-mt: The Donald Trump administration has described the US coronavirus as a “China virus” or “Wuhan virus” and said China’s “excessive censorship of the virus has turned it into a global pandemic.” The administration has linked the issue to racism by some critics “They said it was to distort his shortcomings in the treatment of the disease.”

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: እቲ Daily Beast ዝረኸቦ ናይ መንግስቲ ኣመሪካ ምስጢራዊ ሓበሬታ መበቆሉ ካብቲ National Security Council (ሃገራዊ ቤት-ምኽሪ ጸጥታ) ምዃኑ ርኡይ ዝኾነ፡ “ኩሉ ብዛዕባ ቻይና” ዝብል ስትራተጂ እዩ።
en-mt: The classified U.S. government information obtained by the Daily Beast obviously originates from the National Security Council’s “all about China” strategy.

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: ነዚ መልእኽቲ፡ ብዝተኻእለና መጠን፡ ብዝኾነ መገዲ፡ከምኡ'ውን ብጋዜጣዊ ዋዕላን ተለቪዥንን ከነብጽሖ እዩ ተነጊሩና። " መጽሄታት Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg ቻይና ን ብኮሮና ቫይረስ ዝተጠቕዓ ሃገራት ትገብሮ ዘላ ሓገዝ ዓለማዊ ጽልውኣ ንምዕዛዝ ትገብሮ ዘላ ፕሮፖጋንዳ እዩ ክብላ ይጠቕሳ"።
en-mt: We were told to get this message across, in any way we could, including through press conferences and television. " Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg magazines cite China's aid to countries affected by the coronavirus as propaganda to increase its global influence.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: ናይ ኤውሮጳዊ ሕብረት (EU) ናይ ወጻኢ ጉዳያት ሓላፊ፡ ጆሰፍ ቦረል፡ ‘’ጅኦ-ፖለቲካዊ ክፋል፡ ን ጽልዋ ናይ ምንባር ዝቆመ ናይ ‘ፖለቲካ ልግሲ’’ከምዘሎ ኣጠንቂቁ።
en-mt: The European Union (EU) foreign policy chief, Joseph Borrell, warned that there is a ''geo-political component, a 'political generosity'' that stands for the influence of living.

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: "ዘይከም ሕቡራት ምንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ ቻይና ሓላፍነታዊትን ተተኣማምንን መሻርኽቲ እያ ዝብል ሓበሬታ ቻይና ጸቒጣ ትሰርሓሉ ኣላ" ከብል ቦረል ጠቒሱ።
en-mt: "Unlike the United States, China is emphasizing that it is a responsible and reliable partner," Borrell said.

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: ቻይና ከም ተወሳኺ ነቲ እገዳ ናይ ሶርያ፡ ቨንዚዌል፡ ኢራንንን፡ ኣሜሪካ ከተልዕሎ ጸዊዓ፡ ናብዘን ዳሕረዎት ክልተ ሃገራት ሓገዛትን ደገፋትን እናሰደደት።
en-mt: China has also called on the United States to lift sanctions against Syria, Venezuela, Iran, and the United States, sending aid and support to the latter two countries.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: ናይ ጃክ ማ (Jack Ma's) 100,000 ናይ ማስክታት ወፈያ፡ በቲ ናይ ኣሜሪካ እገዳ ናይ 3, ሚያዝያ ተቃሪጹ።
en-mt: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks was interrupted by the US embargo on April

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: ሰበ-ስልጣን ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ ንካልኦት ሃገራት ዝግባእ ረድኤት ናብ ሃገሮም ከም ዘበልዎ'ዉን ይኽሰሱ እዮም።
en-mt: US officials are also accused of diverting aid to other countries.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ካልእ ሃገራት ምስ ማስኬራ ዝተኣሳሰሩ ክርክራት ነይሮም፡ ኣብ ከም ጀርመን፡ ኦስትርያን ስዊዘርላንድን ዝኣመሰላ ሃገራት፣ ከምኡ ድማ ቸክ ሪፓብሊክን ኢጣልያን።
en-mt: There have been mask-related disputes among other countries, in countries such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland, as well as the Czech Republic and Italy.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: ከም ተወሳኺ፡ ቱርኪ ን ስጵኛ ዝተሓስበ ኣማኢት ቨንትሌተራት ወሪሳቶ/መንዚዓቶ።
en-mt: In addition, Turkey inherited/confiscated hundreds of ventilators intended for Spain.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: ኣብ መጀመርያ መጋቢት፡ መንግስቲ ጥልያን ኣብ ግዜ መልከፍቲ ብ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ኣብ ጥልያን ፡ ሕብረት ኤውሮጳ ሓድነት ከምዘይገበረ ትነቅፍ።
en-mt: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union for not uniting during the coronavirus outbreak in Italy.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: ኣምሳደር ኢጣልያ ንኤዉሮጳዊ ሕብረት፡ ማዉሪዝዮ ማዛሪ፡ "ቻይና ጥራይ ሓጊዛትና" ክብል ገሊጹ።
en-mt: "Only China has helped us," said Italy's ambassador to the European Union, Maurizio Mazzarri.

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: ብርግጽ: እዚ ምስ ኤውሮጳ ዘሎ ጥምረት ጹቡቕ ከምዘየሎ ምልክት እዩ’’።
en-mt: Indeed, this is a sign that the alliance with Europe is not good.”

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 22፡ ድሕሪ ናይ ተለፎን ዝርርብ ምስ ናይ ኢጣልያ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ጂሰፐ ኮንተ፡ ፕረሲደንት ሩስያ ቭላድሚር ፑቲን፡ ናይ ሚሊታሪ ሕክምናዊ መሳርሒ፡ተንቀሳቀስቲ መምከኒ መሳርሒታትን ካልእ ናይ ሕክምና መሳርሒን፡ ናብ ኢጣልያ ንምስዳድ ንወተሃደራት ሩስያ ኣዳልይዎም።
en-mt: On March 22, after a telephone conversation with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian President Vladimir Putin prepared Russian troops to send military medical equipment, mobile combat equipment and other medical equipment to Italy.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: ናይ ኢጣልያ ጋዜጣ La Stampa ስሙ ዘይተጠቕሰ “ልዑል ደረጃ ዘለዎ ፖለቲካዊ ምንጪ” ብምጥቃስ 80 ካብ ሚእቲ ናይ ሩስያ ሓገዝ “ጥቕሚ ኣልቦ ወይ ንኢጣልያ ውሑድ ሓገዝ ዘለዎ እዩ” ከምዝበለ ሓቢራ።
en-mt: Italian newspaper La Stampa quoted an unnamed “high-level political source” as saying 80 percent of Russian aid was “useless or of little help to Italy”.

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: እቲ ምንጪ "ሩስያ ኣብ ጂኦ-ፖለቲካዊን ዲፕሎማስያዊን" ጸወታ  ከምዝኣተወት እዩ ዝኸስስ።
en-mt: The source accused "Russia of getting into a geo-political and diplomatic" game.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: እቲ ፕረሲደንት ናይ Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, ምኒስተር ወጻኢ ጒዳያት ኢጣልያ ልዊጂ ዲ ማዮ (Luigi Di Maio) ነቶም ናይ መራኸቢ ብዙሃን ጸብጻባት ኣወጊዶምም ምስጋንኦም ከኣ ገሊጾም።
en-mt: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: ሩስያ'ዉን ናይ ሕክምና መሳርሒታት ዝጸዓነት ናይ ጽዕነት ነፋሪት ንኣመሪካ ከም ዝለኣኸት ይፍለጥ።
en-mt: Russia has also sent a cargo plane carrying medical equipment to the United States.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: ኣፈኛ ክረምሊን ደሚትሪ ፔስኮቭ ከምዚ ይብል "ንኣመሪካዉያን ኣሕዋትና ክንሕግዝ ከለና፡ ኣብ መጻኢ፡ ማለት ናብ ንቡር ብቕዓትን ፍርያት ምስ ተመልሳ፡ ትካላት መፍረ ናዉቲ ሕክምና ኣመሪካ ከም ዝሕግዛና ስለ ንኣምን እዩ።"
en-mt: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said, "When we help our American brothers, we believe that in the future, when they return to normal efficiency and production, US medical device manufacturers will help us.

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: ብ "Defender 2020" ዝፍለጥ ኣብ ጀርመን፡ ፖላንድን ሃገራት ባልቲክን ክካየድ ተመዲቡ ዝነበረ፡ ብኔቶ ዝተወደበ ድሕሪ ዝሑል ኲናት ካብ ዝየኻየዱ ልምምዳት ዝዓበየ ምዃኑ እተገልጸ ወተሃደራዊ ልምምድ፡ ብትሑት ተሳትፎ ክካየድ ምዃኑ ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: The "Defender 2020" military exercise, the largest NATO-organized exercise since the Cold War, scheduled to take place in Germany, Poland and the Baltic states, will be held with low participation.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: ዋና ጸሓፊት ናይ ወፍሪ ንክለራዊ ብረት-ምፍታሕ ከይት ሁድሰን፡ ነቲ ምክልኻል ናይ 2020 ንጥፈታት ፡ ‘’ ኣብዚ ህሉው ማሕበራዊ ናይ ጥዕና ሽግራት ዘለዎ ኩነታት፡ ነቶም ተሳተፍቲ ናይ ኣሜሪካ ወተሃደራትን ካልኦት ናይ ኤውሮጳ ሃገራትን ጥራይ ዘይኮነ፡ ነቶም ነበርቲ ናይተን ክሰርሑለን ኢሎም ዝኸዱ ዘለዉ ሃገራት’ውን ኣብ ሓደጋ ናይ ሂወቶም ጥዕና የእቲዮሞም’’ ብምባል ነቒፋቶ።‘’ መንግስቲ ናይ ኢራን ድሮ በዚ ቫይረስ ብከቢድ ተጎዲኡ ኢዩ፡ ምስ ዳርጋ ክልተ ደርዘን ምልካፋት ናይ ኣባላት ባይቶን፡ ዓሰርተ ሓሙሽተ ካልኦት ናይ ቅድምን ሕጂን ፖለቲካውያንን ፡።
en-mt: Keith Hudson, secretary-general of the Campaign for Clerical Disarmament, called the prevention of the 2020 activities: The Iranian government has already been severely affected by the virus, with nearly two dozen infections of lawmakers and fifteen other former and current politicians.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: ብ መጋቢት 14,2020 ፕረዚደንት ኢራን ሓሰን ሮሃኒ፡ ንማሕረስብ ዓለም ብወግዒ ደብዳበ ጽሒፉ፡ ብሰንኪ እቲ ኣመሪካ ኣብ ልዕሊ ሃገሩ ኣጽኒዓቶ ዘላ እገዳ ንምክልኻል እቲ ሕማም ተጸጊሞም ከም ዘለዉን ሓቢሩ። ብተወሳኺ ሕቡራት መንግስትታት ኣመሪካ ከምቲ ካልኦት ሃብታማት ሃገራት ዝገብርኦ ናይ ማሕበራዊ ድሕነት ፖሊሲታት ከም ድሕነት ቆልዑ፡ ህዝባዊ ኣገልግሎት ጥዕናን፡ ዝኽፈሎ ዕረፍቲን ከምኡ'ዉን ተወሳኺ  ባጀት ህዝባዊ ኣገልግሎት ጥዕና ክዉስኽን ርእይቶ ቀሪቡ።
en-mt: On March 14,2020, Iranian President Hassan Rouhani wrote an official letter to the World Farm, saying they are having difficulty preventing the disease due to the US sanctions imposed on his country. It was also recommended that the United States, like other rich countries, increase social security policies such as child safety, public health services, paid leave, and additional public health budgets.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: ትራምፕ ኣብ ፕረዚደንታዊ ምርጫ 2020 ዳግማይ ንክዕወት ከምዘይሕግዞ ትጽቢት ተንተንቲ ፓለቲካ እዩ። ዲፕሎማስያዊ ዝምድና ጃፓንን ደቡብ ኮርያን ብሰንክ'ዚ ለበዳ ከም ዝሻሕከረ'ዉን ይፍለጥ።
en-mt: Political analysts expect Trump to not win the 2020 presidential election again. Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea have also been strained by the outbreak.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: ደቡብ ኮርያ ነቲ ናይ ጃፓን ‘’ዘይፍሉጥን ዘይንጡፍ ናይ ውሸባ ጻዕሪ።ነቂፋቶ፡ ድሕሪ እቲ ጃፓን ነቶም ካብ ደቡብ ኮርያ ዝመጻ ናይ ክልተ ሰሙን ግዴታዊ ውሽባ ክግበር ከም ዘለዎ ምንጋራ።
en-mt: South Korea has criticized Japan's ''vague and inactive quarantine efforts., after Japan told them that a two-week mandatory quarantine should be imposed on those from South Korea.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: ሕብረተሰብ ደቡብ ኮርያ መጀመርታ ብናይ ፕረሲደንት Moon Jae-in ግብረ-መልሲ ነቲ ቅልውላው ተኸፋፊሉ ነይሩ።
en-mt: South Korean society was initially divided by President Moon Jae-in's reaction to the crisis.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: ብዙሓት ኮርያውያን ን ፕረሲደንት ሙን መንግስቱ ብምኽንያት ጉጉይ ኣተሓሕዛ ናይ’ዚ ለብዒ ካብ ስልጣኑ ክወርድ ዝጠልብ ወይ ን ግብረ መልሱ ዘሞግስ ወረቓቕቲ ፈሪሞም።ከም ግብረ መልሲ ናይ’ዚ ዓለማዊ ለብዒ ብዙሃት ሃገራት ናይ ህጹጽ እዋን ድንጋገ ከእውጃ ገይርወን።
en-mt: Many Koreans signed petitions demanding that President Moon step down or praising his government for its mishandling of the outbreak.In response to the global outbreak, many countries declared a state of emergency.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ጋዜጠኛታት፡ እዚ: መንግስታት ነቲ ስልጣኖም መሐየሊ ክጥቀሙሉ ከም ዝኽእሉ፡ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: Some journalists said that this could be used by governments to strengthen their power.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: ባይቶ ሃንጋሪ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ኣታ ሃገር Victor Orban ብኣዋጅ ንዘይተወሰነ ግዜ ከመሓድርን ባይቶን ምርጫን ከደስክልን ፡ ብዛዕባ እቲ ቫይረስን ኣታሕዛ መንግስቲን ናይ ሓሶት ሓበሬታ ንዝዝርግሑ ክቐጽዕን ኣድሚጹ።
en-mt: Hungary's parliament has voted to suspend Prime Minister Victor Orban indefinitely, suspend parliament and elections , and punish those who spread false information about the virus and the government's treatment.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ለበዳ ንብዙሕ ናይ ቀረባት ሕጽረት ኣቃሊዑ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብቲ ዓለማዊ ልዕለ ተጠቃምነት ናይ ንብረታት ን ለበዳ ንምቅላስ ፡ ፍርሒ ዘንቀዶ ምዕዳግ፡ ከምኡውን ዘይስሩዕ ኣካይዳ ናይ ትካላትን ሎጂስቲካዊ ስረሓትን ፡ ዝነቀለ ወይ ዝተበገሰ ኢዩ።
en-mt: This coronavirus pandemic has exposed a number of supply shortages, which have stemmed or been triggered by the global overuse of resources to combat the pandemic , fear-driven purchasing, and irregular conduct of institutional and logistical operations

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: እቲ United States Food and Drug Administration (ምምሕዳር ምግብን መድሃኒትን ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ) ብዛዕባ ሕጽረታት ናይ መድሃኒታን ሕክምናዊ መሳርሒታትን ብሰንኪ ዝወሰኸ ናይ ኣህላኺ ጠለብን ምቊራጽ ቀረብን መጠንቀቕታታት ኣውጺኡ።
en-mt: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical devices due to increased consumer demand and supply cuts.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: ኣብ ብዙሓት ከባቢታት ፍርሒ ከም ዝተኣታተወን ብሰንኩ ድማ ኣስፔዛታት ከም መግቢ፡ ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቐት፡ ዕሹግ ማይን ብብዝሒ ከም ዝተዓደገን፡ ሕጽረት ከም ዘጋጠመን ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: Fear was introduced in many areas and as a result, asparagus such as food, toilet paper and bottled water were bought in large quantities, causing shortages.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: ኢንዱስትሪ ተክኖሎጂ ብፍላይ  ኣብ ጽዕነት ኣቕሑት  ምድንጓያት ከጋጥም ምዃኑ ክሕብር ቀንዩ እዩ።
en-mt: The technology industry has been reporting delays, especially in shipments.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: ብመሰረት ሓበሬታ ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ሓላፊ ኣቶ. ቴድሮስ ኣድሓኖም፡ ጠለባት ናይ ሕክምና መሳርሒታት ብ 100 ዕጽፊ ከምዝወሰኸ ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: According to the World Health Organization (WHO). Demand for medical equipment has increased 100-fold.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: ምውሳኽ ጠለባት ናብ ምውሳኽ ዋጋታት ክሳብ ዕስራ ዕጽፊ ናይቲ ንቡር ዋጋታት ክኸውን ኣኽኢሉ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ኣብቲ ቀረባት ናይ ሕክምና መሳርሒታት ካብ ኣርባዕተ ክሳብ ሽዱሽተ ወርሒ ምድንጋያት ከምዝህሉ ጌሩ።
en-mt: Increased demands led to increased prices up to twenty times normal prices, and delays of four to six months in the supplies of medical equipment.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: እዚ ኩነት ብዓለም ደረጃ ሕጽረት ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ኣቕሑ ብምፍጣሩ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ሰራሕተኛታት ንሓደጋ ናይ ጥዕና ከምዝተቓልዑ የጠንቅቕ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) warns that this situation has created a global shortage of personal protective equipment, exposing workers to health risks.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ ኣብ ኣውስትራልያ ንዝርከቡ ሸቃጦ ዳያጉ ፍርያት ኣውስትራልያ ንቻይና ክመጹ ዕድል ከፊትሎም።
en-mt: The outbreak opened up opportunities for Daegu grocers in Australia to bring Australian products to China.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: እዚ ንጥፈት ኣብ ገለ ሱፐር ማርኬታት ሕጽረት ናይ ቆልዑ ክሬም ከም ዘስዓበን መንግስቲ ኣውስትራልያ ድማ ብኡ ንብኡ ከም ዝኸልከሎን ይፍለጥ።ብዝሒ መልከፍቲ ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ዉሃንን ሰሜን ኢጣልያን፡ ንጠለብ መግብታት ብዝተዓጻጸፈኳ እንተኣንሃሮ፡ ዝኾነ ሕጽረት ግና ኣየጋጠመን።
en-mt: The activity led to a shortage of baby cream in some supermarkets and the Australian government immediately banned it.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: ብ ቻይናን ጥልያንን ዝተወስዱ ስጉምትታት፡ ኣንጻር እቶም ፡ኣገደስቲ ንብረታት ወይ መግብታት ብዘይ ግቡእ ክዕቅቡን፡ ክሸጡን ዝፈተኑ፡ ዕዉት ኔሩ።ኣብ ኤውሮጳን ሰሜን ኣሜሪካን ከጋጥም ዝተሓስበ ከቢድ ናይ መግቢ ሕጽረት ውን ከየጋጥም ዝተወስደ ስጉምቲ ሓጋዚ ኔሩ።
en-mt: Measures taken by China and Italy against those who tried to improperly store and sell essential commodities or foods were successful.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: ሰሜን ኢጣልያ ምስ ዘለዋ ዓበይቲ ሕርሻታት ፡ ኣብ ፍርያት ዝመጸ ምጉዳል የለን፡ እንትኾነ ዋጋታት ግና ክውስኽ ከምዝኽእል ወከልቲ ኢንዱስቱሪታት ይሕብሩ።
en-mt: With large farms in northern Italy , there has been no decline in production, but industry representatives say prices could rise.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: ናይ መግቢ መኻዚኖ ጥርሑ ክኸውን ኣብ ውሑድ ግዚያት ጥራይ ኣጋጢሙ፡ ወላውን ኣብ ከተማ ዉሃን፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ውን ዝተዓቀበ ስጋ ሓሰማ: ጠለባት ንከማልእ ናብ ህዝቢ ቀሪቡ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Food warehouses have rarely been empty, and even in Wuhan, the Chinese government has made stored pork available to the public to meet demand.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: ኣፍረይቲ ምግቢ ንከምዚኦም ዝኣመሰሉ ህጹጽ እዋናት መግቢ ክኽዝኑ ዝጠልቡ ተመሳሰልቲ ሕግታት ኣብ ኢጣልያ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food manufacturers to store food for such emergencies.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: ቁጠባዊ ወቕዒ ንቻይና ኣረኻኺቡላ እዩ፡ ብመሰረት ጸብጻባት ሚድያ ኣብ መጋቢት 16፥ ነቲ ለበዳ ንምክልኻል ብዝተወስደ ናይ ምዕጻው ስጉምቲ ኣብ ቀዳሞት ኣዋርሕ 2020 ቁጠባ ቻይና ኣዝዩ ተሃስዩ እዩ፡ ከም መርኣያ ናይዚ ድማ መሸጣ ሃለኽቲ ብ 20.5% ጎዲሉ።
en-mt: According to media reports on March 16, China's economy was hit hard in the first months of 2020 by the lockdown imposed to prevent the outbreak, with consumer sales falling 20.5 percent.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: ቀንዲ ሃገረ ቻይና ዓባይ ማእከል ቁጠባን ምስናዕን ስለዝኾነት፡ እቲ ለበዳ ቫይረስ ኣብቲ ዓለማዊ ቁጠባ ከም ዓቢ ዘይምርግጋእ ዝፈጥር ስግኣት ክርአ ጸኒሑ።
en-mt: The outbreak has been seen as a major threat to the global economy as China is a major economic and industrial hub.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: ኣጋተ ዳማሪስ ናይ ኢኮኖሚ ኢንተሊጀንስ ዩኒት/ክፍሊ ፡ ክሳብ ሓደ ንጹር ስእሊ ዝፍጠር ዕዳጋታት ዓለምና: ክሳብ ፍሉጥ ዝኾነ ነገር ዝፍጠር፡ ኣዝዩ ክቀያየር ሙኻኑ ገሚታ።
en-mt: Agate Damaris of the Economic Intelligence Unit/Division , predicts that the world markets will change dramatically until a clear picture is formed: until something definite happens.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: ኣብ ጥሪ 2020 ገለል ተንተንቲ፡ ቁጠባዊ ሃስያ እዚ ለበዳ፡ ካብቲ ብ SARS 2002-2004 ዝወረደ ክሳራታት ንላዕሊ ክዛይድ ከምዝኽእል ኣሚቶም።
en-mt: In January 2020, independent analysts predicted that the economic damage caused by the pandemic could exceed the losses caused by SARS in 2002-2

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: ካብ ሓደ ኣብ ዋሺንግቶን ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዝርከብ ክኢላ ኣብ St. Louis፡ ልዕሊ 300+ ቢልዮን ዶላር ዝግመት ጽልዋ ኣብ ናይ ዓለም ናይ ቀረብ ሰንሰለት ኣበርኪቱ፡ እዚ ድማ ክሳብ ክልተ ዓመት ክጸንሕ ይኽእል።
en-mt: From an expert at the University of Washington in St. Louis. Louis, delivered more than $300+ billion in global supply chain impact, which can last up to two years.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: ማሕበር ለኣኽቲ ነዳዲ ሃገራት (OPEC) ጠለብ ነዳዲ ዘይቲ ብፍላይ ኣብ ቻይና ኣዝዩ ብምጉዳሉ "ሰንከልከል" ከም ዝበለ ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) has "stumbled" as demand for oil, particularly in China, has fallen sharply.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: ዓለማዊ ዕዳጋ ብርኪ ብምኽንያት ካብ ቀንዲ መሬት ቻይና ወጻኢ ዘጋጠመ ምንሃር ቊጽሪ ሕሙማት COVID-19 ብ 24 ለካቲት ምውዳቕ ዋጋ ኣርእዩ’ሎ።
en-mt: Global stock markets fell on February 24 due to the spike in COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: ብሰንኪ እናዓበየ ዝኸደ ስግኣት ለበዳ ኮሮና ፡ኣብ ለካቲት 27 ዝተፈላለያ ናይ ብርኪ ኣመልከቲ (stock indexes ) ከም NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average ቅልጡፍ ምውራድ ብርክታተን ዝሕብር ካብ 2008 ዘርጊሐን።Dow 1,191 ነጥብታት ብምውራድ እዚ ድማ ካብ’ቲ ኣብ 2007-08 ዝነበረ ፊናንስያዊ ቅልውላው እቲ ዝዓበየ ምውራድ ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ ኮይኑ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Due to growing fears of the coronavirus pandemic, on February 27, various stock indexes such as the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average released their fastest declines since T he financial crisis of 2007-08 has been the biggest one-day decline.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: ኩሉ ኣሃዱታት፡ ካብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ናይ 10% ጎደሎ ኣመዝጊቡ።
en-mt: All units, recorded a 10% decrease from last week.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: ኣብ 28 ለካቲት፡ ተማኒ ዋጋ GmbH (Scope Ratings GmbH) ን ናይ ቻይና ልኡላዊ ትመና ዋጋ ኣረጋጊጹ፡ እንተኾነ ኣሉታዊ ዝኾነ ጠመተ ረኺቡ።
en-mt: On February 28, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed its Chinese sovereign rating, but received a negative outlook.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: ቀረባት ከም እንደገና፡ ብሰንኪ ፍርሒ ናይ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ፡ ኣንቆልቂሉ፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ዝዓበየ ምንቁልቃል ዝተመዝገበ ኣብ መጋቢት 16 ኢዩ።
en-mt: Supplies have again declined due to fears of the coronavirus, with the biggest decline recorded on March

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: ብዙሓት ሰባት ቊጠባዊ ምንቊልቋል ክህሉ ልዑል ተኽእሎ ከምዘሎ ይቖጽሩ።
en-mt: Many people consider a recession highly likely.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: ምሁር ስነ-ቚጠባ Mohamed መሓመድ አል-አራን (El-Erian) ናይ ማእከላይ ባንክታትን ናይ ክፍላተሃገርን ኣብ ግዚኡ ዝተገብሩ ናይ ህጹጽ እዋን ሕግታት ንኢዱ።
en-mt: Economist Mohamed Mohamed al-Erian (El-Erian) praised the timely emergency laws of central banks and states.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: ሃገራውያን ባንክታት ካብ’ቲ ናይ 2008 ፊናንስያዊ ውድቀት ብዝያዳ ሕጂ ቅልጡፍ ግብረመልሲ የርእያ ኣሎዋ።
en-mt: National banks are reacting faster now than they did in the 2008 financial crash.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: ቱሪዝም ሓደ ካብቶም ብሰንኪ ናይ መገሻ ክልከላታት፡ ምዕጻው ህዝባዊ ቦታታት ንናይ መገሻ ሰሓብነታት ዘጠቓለለ፡ ከምኡ ድማ ናይ መንገስታት መምርሒ ኣንጻር መገሻ ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ቀንዲ ብሕማቕ ተጸልዮም ካብ ዘለዉ ጽላታት እዩ።
en-mt: Tourism is one of the main sectors that has been badly affected by travel restrictions, closures of public places including travel attractions, and government guidelines against travel around the world.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: ከም ዉጽኢቱ ድማ፡ ብዙሓት መገድታት ኣየር፡ ብሰንኪ ሕጽረት ተጐዓዝቲ በረራታትን ጠጠዉ ከምዘበላ ተሓቢሩ። ገለ ካብዚኣተን British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, ክኾና ከለዋ፡ ኣብ ብሪጣንያ ትዓዪ ዝነበረት መገዲ ኣየር Flybe ድማ ኣብ ዕዳጋ ወጺኣ።
en-mt: As a result, many airlines have suspended flights due to passenger shortages. Some of these were British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British airline Flybe went on sale.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: ኣብ ልዕሊ ናይ ቱሪዝም መራክብ ዘስዓቦ ጽልዋ ኣብ ታሪኽ ተራእዩ ኣይፈልጥን።
en-mt: The impact on cruise ships is unprecedented in history.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: ብዙሓት መንገዲ ባቡራትን ወደባትን ውን ተዓጽየን ኢየን።
en-mt: Many railroads and ports were also closed.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ምስቲ ኣብ ቻይና ዝካየድ ናይ ሓድሽ ዓመት ቸንዩን ፈስቲቫል ልን ጻዕቂ ምንቅስቓስን ዝረኣየሉን ወቕቲ እዩ ኣጋጢሙ።
en-mt: The outbreak coincided with China's busy New Year's Eve festival.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: ን ብዙሓት ሰባት ክእክቡ ዝኽእሉ ዝነበሩ ኣጋጣሚታት ብ ሃገራዊን ኣውራጃውን/ከባብያውን መንግስቲ ተሰሪዞም ኢዮም፡ ነቲ ዓመታዊ ዝግበር ናይ ሓደሽ ዓመት ጽምብል ዝሓቆፈ፡ ናይ ውልቂ ትካላት ከም ሆን-ኮንግ ዲስኒ-ላንድን ሻንጋይ ዲስኒ-ላንድን ባዕላተን ናይ ምዕጻው ስጉምቲ ወሲደን።
en-mt: Events that could have gathered large numbers of people have been canceled by the national and provincial/local governments, and private establishments such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland have taken action to close themselves, including the annual New Year's celebrations.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: ብዙሓት ብምኽንያት ሉናር ሓድሽ ዓመት ክካየዱ ተመዲቦም ዝነበሩ መደባት፡ ከም ናብ Forbidden City ምብጻሕን ኣብ ጥንታዊ ቤተ መቕደስ ምእካብን ዝበሉ ንጥፈታት ተዓጽዮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Many events scheduled for the Lunar New Year, such as visits to the Forbidden City and gatherings at ancient temples, have been cancelled.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: ሰብ መዚ ቻይና ኣብ 24 ካብ 31 ናይ ቻይና ኣውራጃታትን ምምሕዳራትን ዞባታትን በዓል ሓድሽ ዓመት ናብ 10 ለካቲት ብምንዋሕ፡ ክሳብ እዚ ዕለት እዚ ዝበዝሐ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታት ከይክፈት ኣዚዞም።
en-mt: Authorities in 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions have extended the New Year's holiday to February 10 and ordered most workplaces not to reopen until that date.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: እዘን ዞባታት 80% ናይ’ታ ሃገር ጠቕላላ ጃምላዊ እቶትን (GDP) 90% ሰደድን ይውክላ።
en-mt: These regions represent 80% of the country's gross domestic product (GDP) and 90% of exports.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: ሆንግ-ኮንግ ነቲ ኣማሓላላፊ ሕማም ዝኸውን መልሲ ናብ ዝለዓለ ደረጃ ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ኣዕብያቶ፡ ቤት-ትምህርቲታት ክሳብ መጋቢት ዓጽያቶ ፡ ናይ ሓዲሽ ዓመት ጽንብል ውን ሰሪዛቶ።እቲ ናይ መሸጣ ክፍሊ ብ ዓለም ደረጃ ተጸልዩ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ብሰንኪ ምውሓድ ሰዓታት ቀረብ ናይ መኽዘንን ግዝያዊ ምዕጻውን ኢዩ።
en-mt: Hong Kong has raised the response to the infectious disease to the highest level of emergency, closed schools until March and canceled New Year's celebrations .

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: ብዝሒ ዓደግቲ ኣብ ድኳናት ኤዉሮጳን ኣመሪካን ብ 40% ጐዲሉ።
en-mt: The number of shoppers in stores in Europe and the United States fell by 40%.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: ኣብ ሰሜን ኣሜሪካን ማእከላይ ምብራቅን ዝርከቡ ንግዲታት ናይ 50-60% ምጉዳል/ምውዳቕ ጌሮም።
en-mt: Businesses in North America and the Middle East made a decline/fall of 50-60%.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: ምስ ለካቲት ክነጻጸር ከሎ ንዕዳጋ፡ ማእከላት ብእግሪ ናይ ዝጎዓዙ  ብዝሒ  ካብ 33-43% ምንቁልቋል ኣብ መጋቢት ኣስዒቡ።
en-mt: For shopping compared to February, centers resulted in a 33-43% decline in walk-in volume in March.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝርከባ ዓበይቲ መሸጢ ሃለኽቲ ንብረታት፡ ጽኑዕ ናይ ጽሬት መምርሒታት፡ ከም መጽረዪ ኢድ ምጥቃም፡ መመርመሪ ሙቐት ሰብነት ዝዕቅኑ መሳሪሕታት ምውዳድ፡ ከምኡ ውን ገለ ንጥፈታት ደው ምባልን ዝኣመሰለ ስጉምቲ ይወስዳ ኣለዋ።  በመሰረት ኮሚሽን ናይ ላቲን ኣሜሪካ ናይ ሕቡራት ሃገራት (United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America)  ዘቕረቦ ጸብጻብ፡ እዚ ለበዳ ዘስዓቦ ቁጠባዊ ድስካለ ካብ 14 ክሳብ 22 ሚሊዮን ዝበጽሕ ህዝቢ ናይ ላቲን ኣሜሪካ፡ ኣብ ትሕቲ ሕሱም፡ድኽነት ክገድፎ ምዃኑ ይግምገም፡ እዞም ክንድዚ ዝኣክሉ ነበርቲ ላቲን ኣሜርካ ድኽነቶም ብዝገደደ መልክዑ ኵውስኽ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Major consumer goods retailers around the world are adopting strict hygiene guidelines, such as using hand sanitizers, installing thermometers, and suspending certain activities. According to the United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America, the economic stagnation caused by the pandemic is estimated to leave between 14 and 22 million Latin Americans, so many Latino residents, in extreme, poverty The United States could increase their poverty even more.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና ኣብ ጥርን ለካቲትን ናይ 2020 ኣብ እዋን ዝርገሐ ናይ’ቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ውሃን፡ ኣስታት 5 ሚልዮን ሰባት ስርሖም ሲኢኖም።
en-mt: In China, about 5 million people lost their jobs in January and February 2020 during the outbreak in Wuhan.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: ዝበዙሑ ካብቶም ናይ ቻይና ናይ ገጠር ስደተኛታት: 300 ሞልዮን ዝበጽሑ: ሰራሕተኛታት ኣብ ብዙሓት ኣውራጃታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ገዛውቲን ኣብ ሁበይ ድማ፡ ተወሺቦም ኣለዉ።ኣብ መጋቢት 2020, ልዕሊ 10 ሚልዮን ኣመሪካውያን ስርሖም ስኢኖም ናይ መንግስቲ ሓገዝ ውን ሓቲቶም።
en-mt: Most of China's rural refugees, up to 300 million, are under house arrest in many provinces and in Hubei. As of March 2020, more than 10 million Americans have lost their jobs and sought government assistance.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: ብመሰረት ጸብጻብ ፈደራል ባንክ ሳኢንት ሉዊዝ፡ ብሰንኪ ለበዳ ኮሮና ቫይረስ 47 ሚሊዮን ሰባት ክባረሩ ከም ዝኽእሉን፡ ሽቕለት ኣልቦነት ድማ ብ 32% ክውስኽ ከምዝኽእልን ኣሚቱ። ኣብ ህንዲ፡ እቲ ዕጽዋ ብሚልዮናት ንዝቑጸሩ (ብመዓልታዊ ደሞዝ) ዝናበሩ ሰራሕተኛታት ካብ ስራሕ ኣልዩ። ብ Angus Raid Institute ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ ከም ዝሕብሮ 44% ካብ ካናዳውያን ስድራቤታት ብ ሻቅለት ኣልቦነት ከም ዝተጸልዋ ሓቢሩ። ኣብ ስጳኛ ኣስታት 900,000 ኣቢሎም ዝኾኑ ሰራሕተኛታት፡ እታ ሃገር ካብ መፋርቕ መጋቢት 2020 ጀሚራ ኣብ ዕጽዋ ካብ ትኣቱ ፡ ካብ ስርሖም ደው ኢሎም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: According to the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis, 47 million people could be laid off and unemployment could rise by 32 percent. In India, the lockdown has put millions of (daily wage) workers out of work. A study by the Angus Raid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households are affected by anxiety. Some 900,000 workers in Spain have been out of work since the country went into lockdown in mid-March

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: ኣብ ካልኣይ ፍርቂ ወርሒ መጋቢት፡ 4 ሚልዮን ፈረንሳዉያን ግዚያዊ ናይ ሽቕለት-አልቦነት ካሕሳ ክሓቱ ከለዉ፡ 1 ሚልዮን ዝዀኑ እንግሊዛዉያን ድማ ሓባራዊ ናይ ለቓሕ ሕቶ ኣቕሪቦም። ኣስታት ፍርቂ  ሚልዮን ዝዀና ትካላት ጀርመን ድማ ብመንግስቲ ዝተደጎመ "ኩራዝርቤት" ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ ናይ ሓገዝ መደብ፡ ፍርቂ ደሞዞም ከምዝኽፈሉ ብምግባር ኣፋንዮሞም።
en-mt: In the second half of March, 4 million French people applied for temporary unemployment compensation, while 1 million Britons applied for collective loans. About half a million German companies have paid them half their salaries under a state-sponsored aid program known as Kurazerbet.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: ናይ ጀርመን: ሓጺር-ግዜ ናይ ስራሕ ካሕሳ መደብ፡ ብ ፈረንሳን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን’ውን ተሳዒቡ።
en-mt: Germany's: Short-term work compensation scheme, followed by France and the UK.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: እቶም ናይ ስነጥበብን ባህሊን ምውርራሳት ክፍልታት በዞም ዝስዕቡ ህልው ኩነታት ምክንያታት ኣዝዮም ኢዮም ተጎዲኦም ዘለዉ፡ እዚኦም ድማ፡ ብሰንኪ ለበዳ፡ ስረሓት ናይ ጸለውቲ ማሕበራትን ውልቀሰባትን -ስራሕ ዝተቆጸኡን ዘይተቆጸሩን-ብ ዓለም ደረጃ: ኢዮም።
en-mt: The arts and cultural heritage sectors are being severely affected by the following current situation: due to the pandemic, the work of influential organizations and individuals - employed and unemployed - globally.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: ናይ ባህሊን ጥበብን ማሕበራዊ ክፍሊ፡ ነቲ ናቶም ሚሽን ክድግፍዎ (ብ ህዝቢ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ዝረክብ)፡ ነቲ ኮሚኒቲ ናይ ባህላዊ ውርሻ ክዕዘብዎ ፍቃድ ክህቡ፡ ናይ ሰራሕተኛታቶም ጥዕና ክከታተሉ ከሙ ውን ነቶ ናይ ጥበብ ክኢላታት ደገብ ኣብ ዘድልዮም ክሕግዝዎም ይፍትኑ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: The Culture and Arts Social Department is trying to support their mission (which is funded by the public), allow the community to visit the cultural heritage, monitor the health of their staff and help the arts professionals where they need support.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020፡ ብ ደረጃ ዓለም ቤተ-መዘክራት፡ ቤት-ንባባት፡ ቤት-ምርኢት፡ ከምኡውን ባህላዊ ማእከላት ንዘይ ተወሰነ ግዜ ናይ ኤግዚቢሽን፡ ኣጋጣሚኣታት፡ ከም ኡውን ምር ኢታት ኣገልግሎት ኣቃሪጸን ወይ ኣውንጺፈን።
en-mt: In March 2020, museums, libraries, galleries, and cultural centers around the world suspended or canceled exhibitions, events, and performance services indefinitely.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: ከም ግብረ-መልሲ ፡ ጽዑቕ ቃዕርታት ነቲ ናይ ኣማራጺ ኣገልግሎታት ብ ዲጂታላዊ መሳርሒ ተፈቲኑ ኢዩ።ካልእ ናይ ቀረባን ቅልጡፍ ምውዳቕን ናይዚ ሕማም ድማ፡ በቶም ምቁራጻት ናይ ሃይማኖታዊ ምትእክካባት፡ ዓበይቲ ናይ ስፖርት ጸውታታት፡ ከምኡውን ካልእ ማሕበራዊ ኣጋጣሚታት ከም ሙዚቃ፡ ፈስቲቫላትን ኮንሰርትታትን፡ ናይ ተክኖሎጂ ኮንፈረንሳትን ምርኢት ፋሽንን የጠቃልል።
en-mt: In response , intense attacks on the alternative services have been tested by digital devices.Another recent and rapid decline of the disease is the interruptions of religious gatherings, major sporting events, and other social events such as music, festivals and concerts, and technology conferences and includes fashion shows.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: ኢንዱስትሪ ፊልም'ውን ገለ ምዝንባል ኣጋጢምዎ ኣሎ። ቫቲካን ብወገና ናይ ክርስትያን ቅድስቲ ሰሙን ተባሂላ ትፍለጥ ዓመታዊት በዓል ከምዝሰረዘት ኣፍሊጣ ኣላ።.
en-mt: The film industry has also undergone some disruption. The Vatican has canceled the annual Christian Holy Week.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: ብዙሓት መራሕቲ ሃይማኖት፡ ነቶም ብዕድመ ዝደፍኡ ኣመንቲ ኣብ ግዜ ጽዑቕ ምትእክካብ ናይ ሰንበት መደብ ኣብ ገዝኦም ኮፍ ክብሉ ሓቢሮም፡ ገለ ገለ ቤት-ክርስትያናት’ውን ነቲ ኣገልግሎታተን ብ ራድዮ፡ ኦንላይን ቀጥታዊ ፈነወ፡ ወይ ተለቪዥን ጌረን የመሓላልፈኦ ኣለዋ፡ ብተወሳኺ ናይ ገዛ ኣገልግሎት’ውን ይህቡ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Many religious leaders have asked older believers to stay at home during intense Sunday gatherings, and some churches are broadcasting their services on radio, online live, or television, as well as offering home services They are there.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: ሰበኻ ሮማን ካቶሊክ ናይ ሮማ ምዕጻው ኣብያተ ክርስትያናትን: ናይ ጾሎት ቦታታን ብምክያድ ሜዳ ቁዱስ ጴጥሮስ ድማ ካብ ናይ ክርስትያናት ንግደት ናጻ ተገይሩ።ካልኦት ናይ ሃይማኖት ኣካላት ውን ኣገልግሎታተን ደው ብምባል ኣብ ኣብያተ ክርስትያናት፡ መሳጊድ፡ ሲናጎጋትን ቤተ መቕደስን ጉዋርድዋርስን ህዝባዊ ምትእኽኻብ ኣቃሪጸን።
en-mt: The Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closed its churches and: places of prayer and St. Peter's Square was exempted from Christian pilgrimages.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: ናይ ኢራን ሚኒስተሪ ጥዕና፡ ኣብቲ ብ ቫይረስ ዝተጸልወ ቦታታት፡ ናይ ዓርቢ ጸሎት ክቃረጽ ጸዊዑ፡ ቀጺሉ ድማ ቅዱስ-ቦታታት ተዓጽዩ፡ ብተወሳኺ ስዑዲ-ዓረብካብ ደገ ንዝመጹ በጻሕቲን ኣጊዳ ከም ኡውን ናብ መካን ከዲናን ዝግበር ምብጻሓት በቶም ነበርቲ ኣቃሪጻቶ።
en-mt: Iran's health ministry called for the suspension of Friday prayers in the affected areas, followed by the closure of holy sites, while Saudi Arabia banned foreign tourists and suspended visits to the shrine by residents.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ ድሕሪ ካልኣይ ኲናት ዓለም፡ዝኸፍአ ምዃኑ ዝተገልጸ ናይ ስፖርታዊ ንጥፈታት መደባትን ካላንደራትን ምዝባል ኣስዒቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The outbreak has disrupted sporting events and calendars, the worst since World War II.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: እቶም ዓበይቲ ናይ ስፖርት ኣጋጣሚታት ተቃሪጾምን ተወንዚፎምን ኢዮም፡ ነቲ ናይ 2019-20 ቻምፒዮንስ ሊግ ፡ 2019-20 ፕሪመር ሊግ፡ UEFA Euro 2020፡ 2019–20 NBA ወቅቲ፡ ከምኡውን 2019–20 NHL ወቅቲ፡ ዘጠቃለለ።
en-mt: The major sporting events have been canceled and postponed, including the 2019-20 Champions League , 2019-20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ ንመደባት ኦሊምፒክስ 2020 ከም ዘዘናበለ ይፍለጥ። ኣብ መጀመርያ ሓምለ 2020 ክጅመር ተወጢኑ ዝነበረ መደብ፡ "ድሕሪ 2020 ግና ቅድሚ ክረምቲ 2021" ከነካይዶ ኢና ክብል ኣብ 24 መጋቢት፡ ኣህጉራዊ ኮሚተ ኦሊምፒክስ ገሊጹ ኣሎ። ብተወሳኺ ካዚኖታትን ካልእ ናይ ዉሽጢ ገዛ ጸወታ ማእከላትን፡ ከምኡ'ዉን ናይ ጠላዕ ብቐጥታ ክመሓላለፍ ዝተሓስበ ጸወታን፡ ተቛሪጾሞ ወይ ተሰጋጊሮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: The outbreak has disrupted plans for the 2020 Olympics. The International Olympic Committee (IOC) said on March 24 that the event, which was scheduled to begin in early July 2020, would be held "after 2020 but before the winter of In addition, casinos and other indoor gaming centers, as well as live gaming, have been canceled or postponed.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ን ብዙሕት ተጣላዕቲ ናብ ኦንላይን ክግዕዙ ጌሩ፡ ብ መጠኑ ድማ ብዙሓት ናይ ኦንላይን ጠላዕ ዘጻውታ ሳይታት ብዝሒ ናይ ተጠቀምቲ ከም ዝተራእየ ሓቢረ።ናይ ምዝንጋዕ ኢንዳስትሪ ውን ተጸልዩ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ገለ ናይ ሙዚቃ ባንድታት ነቲ ናይ ኮንሰርት ምብጻሓት ኣወንዚፈንኦ።
en-mt: This has led to many gamblers moving online, and to some extent many online gambling sites have seen a large number of users. The entertainment industry has also been affected, with some bands postponing concert tours.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: ብዙሓት ዓበይቲ ቲያትራት ከም ን ኣብነት ኣብ ብሮድወይ (Broadway) ዘለዉ ኩሉ ስረሓቶም ኣወንዚፎሞ።
en-mt: Many major theaters, such as those on Broadway, have postponed all their operations.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: ገለ ስነ-ጥበባዊያን ፍርያቶም ብመንገዲ ኢንተርነት ናብ ትዓዘብቲ ዘብጽሕሉ መንገዲ ፈጢሮም ኣለዉ፡ ገለ ካብኡ ብቐጥታ ዝመሓላለፍ መደባትን ብገጻት ኢንተርነት ዝካየዱ ፈስቲቫላት የጠቓልል።
en-mt: Some artists have created ways to bring their work to audiences online, some of which include live events and online festivals.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: ኣብ ኢንተርነት ኣብ ርእስቲ ዘይርግጹነቱ ንኮሮና ቫይረስ ዝምልከት ብዙሕ ኣርእስትታት ናብ ዋዛታትን ኣቓልቦ ምርሳዕን ገጹ ከይዱ እዩ።
en-mt: In addition to the uncertainty of the coronavirus, many topics on the Internet have turned to jokes and oblivion.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ካብ ዝጂምር፡ ጽልኢ፡ ጽልኢ-ጋኖትን ዓሌትነትን፡ ናብ ህዝቢ ቻይናን መበቆል ምብራቕ ኣፍሪቃ ዘለዎምን፡ ከም ኡውን ኣንጻር እቶም ኣብ ሓደገኛ ኩነታት ኣብ ኤውሮጳ፡ ኣሜሪካን ካል ኦት ሃገራትን ዝነበሩ ወሪዱ ኢዩ፡፡
en-mt: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, hatred, bigotry and racism have descended towards the Chinese people and those of East African descent, as well as against those at risk in Europe, the United States and other countries.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ብፍላይ ኣብ ኤውሮጳን ምብራቕ ኤስያን ሰሜን ኣሜሪካን ኤስያ ፓስፊክን ተርእዮ ፍርህን ምጥርጣርን ጽልእን ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: There has been a phenomenon of fear, suspicion, and prejudice in many countries, especially in Europe, East Asia, North America, and Asia Pacific.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: ጸብጻባት ካብ ለካቲት ከም ዝሕብሮ (ዝበዝሑ ናይቶም ግዳያት ኣብ ቻይና ኣብ ዝነበሩሉ) ኣብ ብዙሓት ጉጅለታት ናይ ዓለም፡ ቻይና እቲ ቫይረስ ከም ዝግባኣ ወይ ውን እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብ ቻይና ምህላዉ ቅኑዕ ኢዩ፡ ዝብሉ ዓሌታዊ ስምዒታት ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Reports from February (when most of the victims were in China) showed racist sentiments in many groups around the world that China deserved the virus or that it was right for it to be in China.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: ገለ ሃገራት ኣብ ኣፍሪቃ፡ ጸረ-ቻይና ስሚዒታት ተራእይወን።
en-mt: Some countries in Africa have experienced anti-China sentiment.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: ብዙሓት ነበርቲ ናይ ዉሃንን ሁበይን፡ ዓሌትነት ኣብ መበቆሎም ዝተሚርከሰ ከም ዝተራእየ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei reported racism based on their origins.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: ንቻይናውያን ኣብ ኦንላይንን ካብ ኦንላይን ወጻእን ደገፍ ነይሩ ከምኡ ድማ ነቶም ኣብ ብቫይረስ ዝተጠቕዑ ከባቢታት።
en-mt: There was online and offline support for the Chinese and so for those in the affected areas.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: ነቲ ቀጻልነት ናይ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናብተን ሓደሽቲ ኣብ ሓደጋ ዘለዋ ሃገራት ብምስዓብ፡ ን ህዝቢ ናይ ዓዲ ጥልያን፡ እታ ናይ መጀመርያ ሃገር ኣብ ኤውሮጳ ብኣዝዩ ከቢድ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተጠቅዐት፡ ናብ ጥርጠረን ዓለታውነትን ከቃልዕም ይኽእል ኢዩ።ነበርቲ ናይ ማለዥያ፡ ኒው-ዚላንድ፡ ሲንጋፖር፡ ከም ኡውን ደቡብ-ኮርያ፡ ካብ መጀመርያ ነቲ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ሕማም ንምግታእ ነቲ ካብ ቻይና ዝመጽእ ህዝቢ ናብ ሃገራትን ከይ ኣቱ ዝእግድ ጥርዓን ዝሓዘ ጽሑፍ ፈሪመናሉ።
en-mt: Following the continued spread to new countries at risk, it could expose the people of Italy, the first country in Europe to be hit by the worst spread of the virus, to suspicion and racism.Residents of Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, And South-Korea, we signed a petition banning people from China from entering the countries and to curb the spread of the disease from the beginning.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: ኣብ ጃፓን ሃሽ-ታግ #ChineseDontCometoJapan ኣብ ትዊተር ብብዝሒ ተራእያ።
en-mt: In Japan, the hash-tag #ChineseDontCometoJapan appeared heavily on Twitter.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: ኣብ ኣመሪካን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን ዝርከቡ ቻይናውያንን ካልኦት ኤስያውያንን ኣብ ልዕሊኦም ዝወርድ ዓሌታዊ ዓመጽን መጥቓዕትን እናወሰኽ ምምጻኡ ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: There has been an increase in racial violence and attacks against Chinese and other Asians in the United States and the United Kingdom.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: ፕረዚደንት ትራምፕ፡ ን ኮሮና ቫይረስ "ቻይና ቫይረስ"ኢሉ ብምጽውዑ ዓሌታዊን ጸረ ቻይናን ዝኾነ ቃል ተጠቂካ ተባሂሉ፡ ኣደዳ ነቐፌታ ኮይኑ እዩ።
en-mt: President Trump has been criticized for using racist and anti-Chinese language for calling the coronavirus the "China virus.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: ኣብ ዩክሬን፡ ሰልፈኛታት ካብ ውሃን ን ኖቪ ሳንዛሪ ብ ኣውቶቡስ ዝጎዓዙ ዝነበሩ ወጻእተኛታት ኣጥቂዖም።
en-mt: In Ukraine, protesters attacked foreigners traveling by bus from Wuhan to Novi Sanzari.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: ካብቲ ምስ  ቻይና ዘዳውብ ሰሜናዊ ምብራቕ ህንዲ መጺኦም፡ ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ህንዲ ዝመሃሩ ተምሃሮ ካብ፡ ምስቲ ለበዳ ብምትሕሓዝ  መጥቃዕቲን ተነጽሎን ከም ዝወረዶም ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Students from northeastern India bordering China have been attacked and isolated in major Indian cities.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: ፕረዚደንት ሰልፊ Bahartiya Janta Party State ኣብ ምዕራብ በንጋል ኣቶ ደሊፕ ጎሽ፡ ቻይና ን ተፈጥሮ ስለዝበደለት " ኣምላኽ ይቐጽዓ ኣሎ" ክብል ገሊጹ።
en-mt: Bahartiya Janta Party State President in West Bengal, Dilip Ghosh, said "God is punishing China" for wronging nature.

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: ኣብ ካልካታ ዝነበረ ቆንስል ቻይና ዝውሃብ ዝነበረ መግለጺታት “ጉጉይ” ብምባል ኮኒንዎ።ብሰሪ እዚ ዓለማዊ ለብዒ ኣብ ቻይና ኣብ ልዕሊ ካልኦት ዜጋታት ጽልእን ዓሌትነትን ተጋሃሂሩ እዩ ብተወሳኺ ወጻእተኛታት ናይ “ግዳም ጛሓፍ” ተባሂሎም “ንግዳም ክወጹ” ተሃዲኖም እዮም።
en-mt: The Chinese consulate in Calcutta condemned the statements as “wrong.” The global pandemic has led to hatred and racism against other citizens in China and foreigners have been hunted down as “foreign garbage”.

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: ገለ ብክፍሊት ዘርእያ ጋዜጣታት ብኸፊል ወይ ብምሉኡ ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ሽፈነታት ኣቋሪጸን።
en-mt: Some paid newspapers have partially or completely suspended coverage of the coronavirus.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: ብዙሓት ኣሕተምቲ ኣጽናዕቲ ሳይንስ፡ ኣብቲ ቅሉዕ መርበብ ብዝረኸብዎ ሓበሬታ፡ ብዙሕ ሳይንሳዊ ጽሑፋት ምስ ምስፍሕፋሕ ዝተሓሓዝ ኣሕቲሞም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Many publishers of scientific studies have published a large amount of scientific literature related to expansion on the basis of information obtained on the open web.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ተመራመርቲ ፡ ነቲ ውጽኢቶም ቀልጢፎም ከመሓላልፍዎ መሪጾም፡ ከም ኣብነት bioRxiv።
en-mt: Some researchers , chose to communicate their results quickly, such as bioRxiv.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: ሓድሽ ተላባዒ ሕማም ዝበሃል- ብ ሰበብ-ሕማም (Pathogen) ዝመሓላለፍ ወይ ብናይ ዝርግሐ ዓቕሙ ወይ`ውን ብናይ ምምሕልላፍ ክእለቱ ፍሉይ ሓድሽን ምስ ዝኸውን እዩ።
en-mt: A new infectious disease is one that is transmitted by a pathogen that is either unique and new in its ability to spread or in its ability to transmit.

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: ግሎባውነትን ሕማምን – ሓፈሻዊ መግለጺ ናይ ግሎባውነትን ምምሕልላፍ ሕማምን
en-mt: Globalization and disease – an overview of globalization and disease transmission

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: ዝርዝር ናይ ለበዳታትን ዓለማዊ ለበዳታትን – ዝርዝር ናይ ብዝሒ ሞት ብሰንኪ ተመሓላላፊ ሕማም
en-mt: List of Epidemics and Global Pandemics – List of the number of deaths due to communicable disease

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: ናይ እንስስሳ ዘገዳም ምሽጥን ዞኖሰስን (ምምሕልላፍ ናይ ሕማም ካን እንስሳ ናብ ሰብ) - ዓቢ ሓደጋ ምን ንግዲ ናይ እንስሳ ዘገዳም ዝተሓሓዝ።
en-mt: Wildlife trafficking and zoonoses (transmission of Canine disease from animals to humans) - A major risk associated with wildlife trade.

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መመርመሪ ላባራቶሪታት ናይዞም ናይ ምስትንፋስ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ሕማም ናይ 2019 (ኮቪድ-19)ን ሓጋዚኡ ዝኾነ SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስን ፡ ነቶም ኣብ ውሽጢ ዝርከቡ ቫይረስ ህላውነቶም ብምርግጋጽን፡ ብሰንኪ እቲ ረክሲ ዝወጹ ጸረ-ነፍሲ ን ብምጥቃም ናይቲ ቫይረስ መልከፍቲ ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ከረጋግጽ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The testing laboratories for these respiratory coronavirus disease of 2019 (COVID-19) and its auxiliary SARS-CoV-2 virus , by confirming the presence of the viruses inside, and using antibodies released by the rexi to the virus infection of a person can prove it.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: ህላውነት ናይ ቫይረስ ኣብቲ ቅምሶታት በታ RT-PCR ኡዩ ዝረጋገጽ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ናይቲ ቫይረስ RNA ድሕሪ ምልላያ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The presence of virus in the samples is detected by the RT-PCR UI, which identifies the RNA of the virus.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: እዚ መርመራ ን RNA ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስ ንምምርማር ተባሂሉ ዝተመስረሐን ዝተነድፈን ኢዩ።
en-mt: This assay was developed and designed to detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: ነቲ ናይ ቀረባ ወይ ንጡፍ ምልካፋት ንምርግጋጽ ይጠቅም ኢዩ።
en-mt: It is useful for confirming recent or active infections.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: ምልላይ ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት (serology) ፡ ከም መመርመሪን መከታተሊ ናይ ህዝቢን ፡ ክንጥቀመሉ ንኽእል ኢና።
en-mt: Serology can be used as a diagnostic and population surveillance tool.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሲ መርመራ ከም ዘነጽሮ፡ ነቶም ምልክታት ናይ ሕማሞም ኣዝዩ ትሑት ዝኾነን ፡ ዳርጋ ምልክታት ዘይብሎም ን ሓዊሱ ክንደይ ሰባት ከም ዝሓመሙ ኣነጺሩ።
en-mt: The antibiotic testing revealed how many people got sick, including those whose symptoms were very low and who had almost no symptoms.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: እቲ ልክዕ ናይ ሞራል ለውጢ ብ ሕማም ን እቲ ዓቀን ተጸዋርነት ኣብ ናይ ከብቲ መጋርያን ፡ ካብቲ ውጽኢት ናይ መርመራ ክፍለጥ ይከኣል።
en-mt: The exact change in morale by disease and the extent of tolerance in the cattle pen, can be determined from the results of the test.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ሕጽረት ናይ ሓበሬታ ፡ ክሳብ መጋቢት 2020 ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ፡ ሃገራት ኣብ ብዝሒ ናይ ሕሙማተን ዝኾነ ዝተረጋገጸ ቁጽራዊ ሓበሬታ የብለንን።
en-mt: Due to a lack of data , as of March 2020, countries do not have any verified figures on their patient populations.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 23፡ ዝኾነት ሃገር ልዕሊ 3% ካብ ብዝሒ ህዝባ መርመራ ዝገበረት የላን፡ እዚ ብዝሒ ናይ መርመራታት ድማ ኣዝዩ ዓቢ ፍልልይ ኣለዎ ኣብ መንጎ ኩለን ሃገራት።
en-mt: On March 23, no country tested more than 3% of its population, and this proportion of tests varies enormously across countries.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: እዚ ምፍልላያት ነቲ ዓቀናዊ ጸብጻብ ናይ ግዳያት ኣዝዩ ክጸልዎ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ገለ ገለ ሃገራት ብብዝሒ ልዕለ-ዓቀናዊ ጸብጻብ ክስዕብ ውን ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: These differences will greatly affect the standardized reporting of victims, which may also be followed by a large number of over-reports in some countries.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: ነቲ ኣንጻር ሰዓት ዝሰርሕ ናይ ምቕዳሕ ፖሊመርስ ቸይን ሪኣክቶር (rRT-PCR) ብምጥቃም ነቲ ፈተናታት ኣብቲ ናይ መስተንፈሲ ቅምሶታት ክምስራሕ ይኽእል እዚ ድማ ናሶፈራንጊል ስዋብ ወይ ኣፑቱም ቅምሶ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: Using the counterclockwise replication polymers chain reactor (rRT-PCR) the tests can be run on the respiratory specimens which can be nasopharyngeal swabs or aputum specimens.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: እቲ ውጽኢት ናይ መርመራታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ሰዓታት ክሳብ 2 መዓልታት ኣብ ዘሎ ግዚያት ኵአሃብ ይኽእል
en-mt: The results of the tests can be given within hours to 2 days

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: እዚ በቲ ናይ ጎሮሮ ቅምሶ ዝግበር ናይ RT-PCR መርመራ፡ ኣብቲ መለመርያ ሰሙን ናይ ሕማም ጥራይ ኢዩ ውጽኢታዊ ዝኸውን
en-mt: This RT-PCR test with the throat sample is only effective in the first week of illness

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: ድሕሪ ግዜ ኣብ ጎሮሮ ዘሎ ቫይረስ ክጠፍእ ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ ኣብ ሳንቡእና ክባዛሕ ምስ ጀመረ።
en-mt: Over time, the virus in the throat may disappear when it begins to multiply in the lungs.

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: ነቶም ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት፡ ኣብ ካልኣይ ሰሙኖም ዝምርመሩ፡ ከም ኣማራጺ ኣብነት ዝኸውን መሳርሒ ካብቲ ዓሚቅ ናይ ኣየር መንገዲ ብ መጻዪ ትቦ (spetum) ክጥቀሙ ይኽእሉ
en-mt: For infected people, who are examined in their second week, an alternative sample device can be used from the deep airway with a future tube (spetum).

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: ሓደ ካብቶም ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ PCR መመርመሪታት ኣብ ቻሪተ በርሊን ብ ናይ ሓቀኛ-ግዜ ረቨርስ ምቅዳሕ ናይ ፖሊመርስ ረኣክሽን (rRT-PCR ፡ ልክዕ ኣብ ጥሪ 2020 ማዕቢሉ፡ ከም ኡ ውን ነቲ ናይ 250,000 መመርመሪ ንብረት፡ ብ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ዝዝርጋሕ (WHO); ምስራሕ መበገሲ ኢዩ ኔሩ
en-mt: One of the first PCR tests at Charite Berlin with real-time reverse transcription of polymers reaction (rRT-PCR , developed exactly in January 2020, and the 250,000 test kits, distributed by the World Health Organization (WHO); It was a starting point

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ኣብ 23 ጥሪ 2020፡ ሓደ መሳርሒ ኣማዕቢላ። ናይ ደቡብ ኮርያ ትካል ኮግነ-ባዮተክ ድማ ናይ ክሊኒክ ኣብ PCR-ዝተመርኮሰ SARS-CoV-2 መፍለጢ (PowerChek Coronavirus) መሳርሒ ኣብ 28, ጥሪ 2020 ኣማዕቢሉ።
en-mt: The UK on 23 January 2020, developed a device. South Korean company Cogne-Biotech developed a clinical PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection (PowerChek Coronavirus) device on January 28,

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: እቲ ‘’E’’ ጂን ብ ኩሎም ቤታ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ተጠቃምነት ይረክብ፡ ከምኡ`ውን ን RdRp ጂን ን SARS-CoV-2.In ቻይና ፡ BGI ፡ ሓደ ካብቶም ናይ ቻይና ናይ ምፍራይ ምምሕዳር ኢመርጀንሲ/ቕልጡፍ ኣፍልጦ ዝረኸበ ትካል ወይ ካምፓኒ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ኣብ PCR-ዝምርኮስ SARS-CoV-2 ንምልላይ ዝተመስረሐ መሳርሒ ኢዩ ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ እተን ማእከላት ናይ ምቁጽጻር ሕማምን ምክልኻልን (CDC) ፡ ነቲ 2019-ኖቨል ኮሮና-ቫይረስ (2019-nCoV) ክዉን-ግዜ RT-PCR መመርመሪ ፓነል፡ን ህዝባዊ ናይ ጥዕና ለባራቶሪ ብ ዓለምለኻዊ ረጀንት ርእሰ-ማል ፡ ክዝርግሖ ወሲኑ ኣሎ
en-mt: The ''E'' gene is used by all beta coronaviruses, as well as the RdRp gene for SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI is one of China's Emergency/Rapid Recognition Administration of Production , which is a tool developed to detect the PCR-dependent SARS-CoV-2 In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) , the 2019-novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) real-time RT-PCR The Testing Panel has decided to expand the Public Health Laboratory by International Regent Capital

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: ሓደ ካብቶም ሰለስተ ጀነቲካዊ ፈተናታት ኣብ ዝሕለፉ ስረሓት ናይቲ መመርመሪ መሳርሒ ዝተራእዩ ውጺኢታት ብሰንኪ ሕማቃት ቀመማት፡ ከምኡውን ምዕጻው ናይ መርመራታት ኣብ CDC ናይ ኣትላንታ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ወርሒ ለካቲት 2020 ፡ ኣብ መዓልቲ ብ ገምጋም 100 ቅምሶታት ጥራይ ክምርመር ተኻኢሉ።
en-mt: One of the three genetic tests showed results in past operations of the testing device due to poor ingredients, and the closure of tests at the CDC in Atlanta, which in February 2020 , could only test an average of 100 samples per day.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: እቶም ብ ክልተ ኣካላት ዝተተግበሩ ፈተናታት ፡ ክሳብ ለካቲት 28, 2020 ውጽኢታውያን ኮይናም ኣይተረክቡን፡ ክሳብ እዚ ግዜ እዚ ድማ እቶም ዞባዊ ናይ መመርመሪ ላባራቶሪታት ክሰርሑ ኣይተፈቅደሎን ኔሩ።
en-mt: The tests implemented by the two bodies , were not found to be effective as of February 28, 2020, and until this time the regional testing laboratories were not allowed to operate.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: እቲ መርመራ በቲ ናይ መድሃኒትን መግቢን ምሕደራ፡ ኣብ ትሕቲ ሓላፍነት ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ጥቅምታት ተፈቂዱ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The test was approved by the Drug and Food Administration, under the responsibility for emergency benefits.

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: ክሳብ መጋቢት 05, 2020፡ ላብኮርፕ ህላውነት ናይ ዓለም ለኻዊ መሳርሒ መመርመሪ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝኾነ RT-PCR ገሊጹ።
en-mt: As of March 05, 2020, LabCorp has announced the availability of RT-PCR, the international testing tool for COVID-1

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: ክሳብ 9 መጋቢት ናይ 2020, ብ ዓለም ደረጃ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ኣብ ምንዳይን ሃሰው ኣብ ምባልን ኣለዉ።
en-mt: As of March 9, 2020, there is a global search and search for COVID-19 test kits.

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: ዝኾነ ናይ ብዝሒ ዓቀን ግን ኣይተሓበረን ኣሎ፡ እቲ ናይ ቅምሶታት ምእካብን ምምስራሕን ከ ኣ በቲ ናይ CDC መምርሒታት ክትግበር ኣለዎ።
en-mt: No quantity is reported, however, and the collection and processing of samples must follow CDC guidelines.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: ኣብ ሩስያ፡ እቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 መመርመሪ መሳርሒ ብ ሃገራዊ መመረሪ ማእከል ናይ ቫይረስን ባዮተክኖሎጂን ዝማዕበለ ኢዩ ኔሩ
en-mt: In Russia, the COVID-19 testing device was developed by the National Testing Center for Viruses and Biotechnology

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት 11, 2020፡ እቲ መርመራ ብ ናይ ፈደራል ኣገልግሎት ወሃብቲን ናይ ሕክምና ተቆጻጸርቲን፡ ተዋሂቡ። ኣብ 12, መጋቢት 2020, ማዮ ክሊኒክ ነቲ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተባህለ ቫይረስ ዘለሊ መሳርሒ ምሂዙ። ኣብ መጋቢት 13, 2020፡ ሮቸ ናይ መርመራ ኣካል፡ ብ FDA ተቀባልነት ረኪቡ፡ ኣብ ውሽጢ 3.5 ሰዓታት ብዝሒ ዘለዎ መርመራታት ከተካይድ እትኽእል መሳርሒ ብምምሃዙ ኢዩ፡ ከምኡውን ሓንቲ ማሺን ዳርጋ 4,128 መርመራታት ኣብ ውሽጢ 24 ሰዓታት ከተካይድ ከም እትኽእል ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: On February 11, 2020, the test was conducted by federal service providers and medical inspectors. On March 12, 2020, the Mayo Clinic developed a device that detects the COVID-19 virus. On March 13, 2020, Roche's testing unit was approved by the FDA for developing a device that can perform a large number of tests in 3.5 hours, and a machine can perform nearly 4,128 tests in 24 hours.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 19, ናይ 2020፡ FDA ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ምጥቃም ፍቓድ (EUA) ብምሃብ፡ ነቲ ላባራቶሪታት ን መርመራ ከዳልዎ ኣብ Abbott's m2000 ሲስተም፡ ቅድሚ ሕጂ ውን FDA ብ ተመሳሳሊ ን ሆሎጂክ፡ ላብቾርፕ፡ ከምኡውን ተርሞ ፊሸር ሳይንቲፊክ ፡ ፍቓድ ሂቡ
en-mt: On March 19, 2020, the FDA granted an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) to prepare the laboratories for testing on Abbott's m2000 system, which the FDA has previously granted to Hologic, Labchorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 21, 2020፡ ሰፈይድ፡ ብተመሳሳሊ EUA ካብ FDA ተቀቢሉ፡ እቲ መርመራ ድማ 45 ደቃይቅ ጥላይ ወሲድሉ።
en-mt: On March 21, 2020, Safeid received a similar EUA from the FDA, and the test took 45 minutes.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA፡ ኣብ ክንዲ PCR ፡ ኣይዞተርማል ኑክለይ ኣሲድ እተጉልሕ ናይ ተክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም እትሰርሕ መመርመሪት ኣጽዲቑ ኣሎ፡
en-mt: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR:

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: እዚ ኣገባብ እዚ ፡ ተኻታታሊ ምቅይያር ናይ ሙቀት ስለ ዘየድልዮ፡ ኣብ ውሽጢ 5 ደቂቅ ኣወንታዊ መልሲ ክህብ ይኽእል ኣብ 13 ደቃይቅ ድማ ኣሉታዊ መልሲ ክህብ ይኽእል።
en-mt: This method , because it does not require continuous temperature changes, can give a positive response within 5 minutes and a negative response within 13 minutes.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: ኣቢ ሕጂ እዋን ኣስታት 180 ካብዘን ማሺናት ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ (U.S.) ኣለዋ፡ ኣቦት ድማ 50.000 መርመራታት ኣብ መዓልቲ ከበጻጽሕ ተስፋ ይገብር ኣሎ። ሞኖክሎናል ጸረ-ነፍሲ ዝጥቀም ን ነቲ ኒክሎስፒድ ፕሮቲን (N protein) ናይ ኖቨል ኮሮናቫይረስ ዝሽፍንን ፡መመርመሪ መሳርሒ ኣብ ታይዋን ተማሂዙ ኣሎ፡ በዚ ድማ ፡ ልክዕ ከምቲ ቅልጡፍ ናይ ኢንፍሊወንዛ መርመራ፡ ኣብ ውሽጢ 15-20 ደቃይቅ መልሲ ክህብ ከም ዝኽእል ይግመት።
en-mt: AB now has about 180 of these machines in the United States (US), and Abbott is hoping to deliver 50,000 tests a day. A test device that uses a monoclonal antibody and covers the niclospid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus has been developed in Taiwan, and is expected to give a response in 15-20 minutes, just like a rapid influenza test.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: ኣብ 20 መጋቢት ዝተገብረ ናይ ሊተርቸር ምርመራ ከም ዘነጽሮ፡`` ናይ ኣፍልቢ ራድዮግራፍ ስእልታት፡ ኣብቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ደረጃ፡ ውሑድ ዓቐን ናይ መርመራ ይህቡና፡ እቶም ናይ CT [computed tomography] ግን ወላ ውን ወላውን ምልክታት ከይተራእየ ውጽኢት ናይ መርመራ ክህቡና ይጂምሩ``።
en-mt: A March 20 literature review revealed that ``chest radiographs, in the early stages, give us a small amount of diagnosis, but CT [computed tomography] ones start to give us diagnosis results even without symptoms.

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: እቶም ቀንዲ ክፋላት ናይ CT እዞም ዝስዕቡ ኢዮም፡ ባይላተራል ማልቲቦላር፡ ግራውንድ ግላስስ ኦፖቺፊቺቴስ ማስ ፐሪፈራል፡ ኣሳይመትሪክ ምስ ፖስቶሬር ዲስትሪቡሽን።
en-mt: The main parts of CT are: bilateral multibolar, ground glasses opocchificites mass peripheral, asymmetric with postural distribution.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: ዓብላልነት ናይ ሳብፕሉራል ፡ ጽሉል ፓቪን ከምኡውን ጽንዓት፡ ሕማም ምስ ፈሎቀ ይምዕብል።
en-mt: Dominance of the subplural , crazy pavin and perseverance, develops when the disease flourishes.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: ኣብ ዉሃን ፡ እታ ማእከል/መበገሲ ለበዳ ዝኾነት ከተማ፡ ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ናይ ምንጽጻር PCR ናብ CT ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ CT ካብ PCR ንላዕሊ ንጥፍቲ ኢያ ኢሉ፡ ወላ`ካ እቲ ናይ ምስ ኣል ባህሪኡ ስቲ ናይ በዓል ኒሞንያን ካልኦት ዓይነት ሕማማትን ዝደራረብ እንተኽዕነ
en-mt: In Wuhan , the epicenter/origin city, a study comparing PCR to CT suggested that CT was more active than PCR, despite the overlap of its al nature ste of pneumonia and other diseases

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020፡ ናይ ኣሜሪካ ኮለጅ ናይ ራድዮሎጂ ``CT ን ምኽልካል ወይ ከም ቀዳማይ መስመር ናይ ኮቪድ-19 መመርመሪ ክንጥቀመሉ ኣይንኽእልን ኢና`` ኣብ መጋቢት 2020፡ CDC ን PCR ናይ መወዳእታ ምክልኻል ክተተግብል ጸዊዑ
en-mt: In March 2020, the American College of Radiology ``We cannot use CT for prevention or as a first-line test for COVID-19

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: ሓደ ክፋል ናይ ስርዓት ምጽዋር ናይ ረኽሲ፡ ምፍራይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ን IgM ን IgG፡ ዘጠቃለለ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Part of the immune system of infection involves the production of antibodies to IgM and IgG.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: እዚኦም ድማ ነቲ ናይ ውልቀ-ሰባት ረኽሲታት ካብቲ ምልክታት ክረኣየሉ ዝጀመረ 7ይ መዓልቲ ወይ ብድሕሪኡ፡ ከለልዮ ከም ዝኽእል ተፈሊጡ። እቲ መርመራታት ኣብ ማእከል ላባራቶሪታት (CLT) ወይ`ውን ብ ናይ ነጥበ-መርመራ (PoCT) ክካየድ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: These can identify individual infections on or after the 7th day of symptoms. The tests can be done in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
