sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: እቲ ዓቢ ሓሳብ ነቲ ናይ ክሊኒክ ላባራቶሪ ኣውቶማቲክ መስርሕ ከም ዝሕዝ ጌርዎ፡ ፡ እዘን ላባራቶሪ ድማ ነዚ ዕዮታት ክዓያ ኢየን ፡ እቲ ህላውነተን ግን ኣብቲ መጠንን ብዝሒን ፍርያት ናይቲ ሲስተም ይምርኮስ
en-mt: The big idea is to handle the clinical laboratory automation process, , and these labs will do these tasks , but their availability depends on the volume and quantity of products in the system

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: እዚ ናይ CLT ናይ ውልቂ ቅምሶ/ኣብነት ናይ ፐሪፈራል ደም ፡ ልሙድ ተጠቃምነት ኢዩ ዘለዎ፡ ከም ተወሳኺ እቶም ሰያል ቅምሶታት ነቲ ናይ ምጽዋር ዓቅሚ ምስዕብ ይጠቅሙ ኢዮም
en-mt: This CLT individual sample/sample of peripheral blood , is commonly used, as well as the seal samples are useful for tracking the tolerance

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: ን PoCT፡ ንጽል ቅምሶ ናይ ደም ብ ሓንቲ ንእሽተይ ናይ ቆርበት ነኻል ክትኣቱ ትኽእል ኢያ።
en-mt: For PoCT, a single sample of blood can be inserted through a small skin incision.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: በ ኣንጻር ናይ PCR መኝገዲ፡ ናይ ምጽማቕ ደረጃ ቅድሚ መርመራ ኣየድልን ኢዩ፡ ኣን መጋቢት 26, 2020, FDA ነተን ን ኣጀንሲ ከ ኣድላይነቱ ኣገዳሲ ሓበሬታ ዝሃባ 29 ኣሃዱታት ሰምዩ ኣሎ፡ ሕጂ ድማ ነቲ ጸረ-ነፍሳት መርመራ ክዝርገሓኦ ጀሚረን ኣለዋ
en-mt: Unlike the PCR method, a summary stage is not required before testing, and on March 26, 2020, the FDA named the 29 units that provided the agency with important information about its need and are now beginning to roll out the antibiotic test

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: ክሳብ መጋቢት 7, 2020፡ ትሕቲ ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ሓላፍነታዊ ተጠቃምነት FDA ሓንቲ መርመራ ጥራይ ኣካይዳ። ኣብ መወዳእታ ናይ መጋቢት 2020, ኢሮንዩም ናይ ሕክምና ላባራቶሪ መመርመሪ ን ኤፒቶፕ መመርመሪን ፡ ናይ ኤውሮጳ ኣፍልጦ ረኺቦም ነቲ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ክምስርሑ ክቕጽሉ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቶም IgG ን IgA ን ዝበሃሉ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ኣንጻር ናይ ቫይረስ ኣብ ናይ ደም ቅምሶታት ከለልዩ ዝእሉ መሳርሒታት ኢዮም።
en-mt: As of March 7, 2020, the FDA has conducted only one investigation under emergency responsible use. By the end of March 2020, Ironium will receive European approval for medical laboratory tests and epitope tests to continue to develop the test kits that can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against viruses in blood samples.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መርመራ ዓቀን ኣብ ውሽጢ ሰዓታት ብ ኣማኢት ዝዕቀን ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ ስለዚ ድማ ካብቲ ልሙድ ናይ PCR ፈተነ ናይ RNA መርመራ ዝቀልጠፈ ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: The assay size may be measured in hundreds within hours and may therefore be faster than the conventional PCR experiment of RNA assay.

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: እቲ ጸረ-ነፍሲ፡ ድሕሪ ምልካፍ ኣብ 14 መዓልቲ ኢዩ ዝልለ። ኣብ መጀመርያ ሚያዝያ፡ ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ዝኾነ ካብቲ ዝዓደገቶ ፡ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሲ መሳርሒ መመርመሪ ፡ ኣይተጠቀመትሉን።
en-mt: The antibody is detected 14 days after infection. In early April, the UK did not use any of the antibiotic testing equipment it had purchased.

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: ሆንግ ኮንግ ፡ ዝተጠርጠሩ ሰባት ኣብ ገዛ ዝጸንሑሉ ሓደ ውጥን ኣውጺኡ ኣሎ፡ ኣዚ ድማ፡ ``ክፍሊ ኢመርጀንሲ ነቲ ተሓካሚ ሓደ ኣብነት ዝኸውን ቱቦ ክህብ ኢዩ``፡ እቲ ተሓካሚ ናብቲ ቱቦ ጡፍ ኢሉ ድማ ናብቲ ዝተወጠነ መመርመሪ ይሸድዕ፡ መልሺ ድምእ ቐልጢፉ ይረክብ። ናይ ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ NHS ድማ ነቶም ኣተጠርጠሩ ኣብ መንበሪ ቤቶም ኮይኖም ንምምርማር ሓደ ፓይሎት ውጥን ኣውጺኡ፡ እዚ ድማ እቶም ጥርጡራት ናብ ሕክምና መጽዮም ከውርድዎ ዝኽእሉ ሽግራት ንምእላይ፡ ወይ`ውን ነታ ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ኣምቡላንስ ከይብክልዋ ብ ቫይረስ፡ ተባሂሉ ዝተወጠነ ኢዩ። ኣብቲ ናይ ምምርማር መስርሕ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ነቶም ጥርጡራት ሰባት፡ እቲ ናይ ጥዕና ክኢላ ቅኑዕ ኣገባብ ተጠቂሙ ቅምሶ ይወስድ።
en-mt: Hong Kong has introduced a plan to keep suspects at home: “The emergency department will give the patient a sample tube.” The UK's NHS has launched a pilot scheme to test suspects at home to prevent problems that suspects may have coming to hospital or contaminating the emergency ambulance with a virus. During the COVID-19 testing process for the suspects, the health professional uses the correct method to take samples.

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: እቶም መተባባዕቲ ማእከላት ን ደቡብ-ኮርያ ነቲ ኣዝዩ ቅልጡፍን ክቡርን ዝኾነ መርመራታት ከተካይድ ሓጊዞማ ኢዮም። ኣብ ጀርመን፡ ኣብቲ ብሕጊ ዝተወሰነ ሃገራዊ ማሕበር ናይ ጥዕና ኢንሹራንስ፡ ዘለዉ ክኢላታት ; ኣብ 02, መጋቢት፡ ኣስታት 12000 ዝዓቀኑ መርመራታት ኣብ መዓልቲ ብ ጉዕዞ፡ ከምኡውን ኣስታት 10,700 ቅድሚ ሰሙን ከምዝተኻየደ ነጊሮም/ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: The incentive centers have helped South Korea conduct the fastest and most expensive tests. In Germany, experts in the statutory national association of health insurance; On 02, March, they told/reported that about 12000 measured tests were conducted per day by travel, and about 10,700 the week before.

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: እቶም ዋጋታት ናይ ጥዕና ኢንሹራንስ ኣዝዮም ክቡራት ኢዮም ፡ እቲ መርመራ ብ ፊዚሽያን ምስ ዝእዘዝ።
en-mt: The costs of health insurance are very expensive , when the test is ordered by a physician.

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ ሮበርት ኮች ኢንስቲቱት ፕረሲደንት፡ ጀርመን ኣብ ሓደ ሰሙን 160,000 መርመራታት ኣካይዳ።
en-mt: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany conducted 160,000 tests in one week.

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: ክሳብ 19 መጋቢት ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ፡ ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት መርመራታት ተኻይዱ።
en-mt: As of March 19, inspections were conducted in major cities.

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: ክሳብ 26. መጋቢት ናይ 2020፡ እቶም ኣብ ጀርመን ዝተኻየዱ መርመራታት ብዝሖም ኣይተፈልጠን ፡ ምኽንያቱ እቶም ኣወንታዊ ውጽኢታት ጥራይ ስለ ዝተሓበሩ።
en-mt: As of 26. March 2020, the number of tests conducted in Germany is unknown , as only the positive results have been reported.

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ላባራቶሪ ገምጋም፡ ከም ዘነጽሮ ክሳብ መበል 12 ሰሙን ናይ 2020፡ ብገምጋም ዳርጋ 483,295 ቅምሶታት ተመርሚሩ፡ ኣብ መበል 12 ሰሙን ከኣ 33,491 (6.9%) ብ ኣወንታ ተመርሚሩ ን SARS-CoV-2። ኣብ እስራአኤል ተመራመርቲ ኣብ ተክኖን ን ራምቦምን ሆስፒታት ፡ ን 64 ቅምሶታት ተኸታታሊ ክምርምር ዝኽእል መሳርሒ ኣማዕቢሎም፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ቅምሶታት ብምስሓብን፡ እቲ ቅምሶ ኣወንታ እንተኾይኑ ዳግማይ ብምምርማርን ጥራይ ድማ ኣካይዶሞ። ኣብ ዉሃን ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ መለለዪ ላባራቶቲ ፡ 200 ትር ኪ.ሜ ዝዓቀኑ፡ ``ሁዎ-ያን`` (Chinese: 火眼, ወይ "Fire Eye" ብ እንግሊዘኛ)፡ ኣብ 05 ለካቲት 2020 ብ BGI ተከፊቱ፡ እዚ ላባራቶሪ 10,000 ቅምሶታት ኣብ መዓልቲ ክምርምር ከም ዝኽእል ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: The initial laboratory assessment, revealed that as of the 12th week of 2020, an average of nearly 483,295 samples were tested, and in the 12th week, 33,491 (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 In Israel, researchers at Technon and Rambom Hospitals developed a device that can test 64 samples in a row by withdrawing the samples and testing them again if they are positive. The Emergency Identification Laboratory in Wuhan , measuring 200 tr km, ``Huo-Yan`` (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English), was opened by BGI on February 05, 2020, to test 10,000 samples per day It turned out that he could.

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: ምስቲ ብ መስራቲ BGI ዝኾነ ዋንግ ጂያን ዝተራእየ 5 መዓልቲ ዝወሰደ ህንጻ፡ እቶም ንድፊታት ኣብ ሁበይ ን ምር ኢት ወሪዶም ናይ 47% ወሰኽ ጌሮም፡ እቲ ናይ መርመራ ዓቀን ኣብ ኦንላይን እንተዘይመጽዩ ድማ፡ እቶም ተመሳሰልቲ ዓገትቲ ናይ ውሸባ ብ ክልተ ዕጽፊ ክውስኹ ከም ዘለዎም ተነጊሩ።
en-mt: With the five-day build shown by BGI founder Wang Jian, the designs went on display in Hubei, an increase of 47%, and if the test volume does not come online, the same quarantine inhibitors will have to double.

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ዉሃን ላባራቶሪ በቶም ናይ ሆዎ-ያን ላባራቶሪ፡ ታኢጃን፡ በይጂን፡ ከም ኡውን ሻንጋይ ብ ጠቅላላ 12 ከተማታት ብቅልጡፍ ተኸቲሉ ወይ ተሳዒቡ ኢዩ
en-mt: The Wuhan laboratory was quickly followed or followed by the Huo-Yan laboratory, Taijian, Beijing, and Shanghai in a total of 12 cities

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 04, 2020፡ እቶም መዓልታዊ ናይ ሓሳብ መርመራታት 50,000 ኣብ መዓልቲ ኢዮም ኔሮም ክፉታት ምንጪ፡ ብ ኦቲጋሚ ኣሳይ ዝተዘርግሑ ክሳብ 1122 ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ተሓከምቲ ቅምሶታት ብ 93 መመርመሪታት፡ ክምርምር ዝኽእል መሳርሒ ምሂዙ እዞም ዝተመዛዘኑ ንድፊታት ፡ ብዘይ ኣድላዪነት ፈሳሲ ተሓዝቲ ሮቦት፡ ኣብ ንኢሽተይ ላባራቶሪ ብዘይ ጸገም ክሰርሕ ይኽእል
en-mt: On March 04, 2020, the daily thought tests were 50,000 per day Open source, released by Otigami Asai up to 1122 samples of COVID-19 patients with 93 tests, developed a device that can test these balanced designs , without the need for liquid holding robots, in A small laboratory can work without problems

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት፡ እቲ ዘይ ምሉእነት ወይ ሕጽረታት ናይ ሓባሪ-ሳብስታንስ ቀንዲ ማሕንቖ ነቲ ናይ ብብዝሒ መርመራታት ክግበር ተሓሲቡ ዝነበረ ኣብ ኤውሮጳ፡ ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካን ኢዩ።
en-mt: In March, the incompleteness or shortages of co-substance was the main obstacle to the planned mass testing in Europe, the UK and the United States.

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ነቶም ገለ ደረስቲ ሓድሽ ነገር ከም ዘስተውዕሉ ጌርዎም፡ እዚ ነቲ ናይ ቅምሶ ምድላው ፕሮቶኮል ንምድላው፡ነቲ ቅምሶታት ኣብ 98 °C (208 °F) ን 5 ደቃይቅ ምውዓይ ዘማልአ RNA ኮይኑ፡ ዕላሙኡ ድማ ነቲ ጂናኦም ምስዳድ/ምልቃቕ ኢዩ፡፡ ኣብ 31 መጋቢት፡ ሕቡራት ኢማራት ዓረብ፡ ምስ ካልእ ሃገራት ኣነጻጺርካ፡ ነቶም ዜጋታት ኣዝዩ ብዝሒ ዘለዎ መርመራታት ተካይደሎም ከም ዘላ ኣረዲኡ፡ ኣብ ቀጻሊ ድማ ነዚ ቁጽሪ እዚ ብናህሪ ከም እትውስኸሉ ኣፍሊጣ።
en-mt: This led some of the authors to discover something new: to prepare the sample preparation protocol, heat the samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to prepare the RNA, whose purpose is to send/release their gene. On March 31, the UAE said it was conducting the highest number of tests for its citizens compared to other countries and would increase the number rapidly in the future.

sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: እዚ ድማ ብ ምትሕውዋስ ናይ ምትብባዕ ክእለታት፡ ናይ ብብዝሒ ናይ ላባራቶሪ ካብ ጉጅለ 42 ን BGI (ኣብ ``ሁዎ-ያን`` ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ምልላይ ላባራቶሪ ኣብ ቻይና) ምዕዳግ።
en-mt: This is done by combining incentive capabilities, the purchase of large quantities of laboratories from Group 42 for BGI (at ``Huo-Yan`` Emergency Identification Laboratory in China).

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: ኣብ ውሽቲ 14 መዓልታት ዝተሰርሐ ላባራቶሪ ፡ ኣማኢት ኣሽሓት RT-PCR መርመራ ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ ክግበር ይከኣል፡ ካብ ቻይና ወጻኢ ድማ ኣብ ዓለም እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ብ ከምዚ ዓቀን መርመራ ዝገብር ዘሎ ላባራቶሪ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The laboratory, built in 14 days , can perform hundreds of thousands of RT-PCR tests in a day, and is the first laboratory in the world outside China to test on this scale.

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ መመርመሪ መንገዲታት ን ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ጀነቲካዊ ፕሮፋይል ዝዓለመ ኣብ ቻይና፡ ፈረንሳ፡ ጀርመን፡ ሆንግ-ኮንግ፡ጃፓን፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካን ማዕቢሎም ኢዮም፡፡
en-mt: Various testing methods targeting different coronavirus genetic profiles have been developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ነቲ ኣብ ጀርመን ዝተወሃሃደ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት፡ ነተን ኣብ ትሑት-ድረጃ ናይ መነባብሮ ዘለወን ሃገራት ነናተን ከመስርሓ ዓቅሚ ዘይብለንን፡ ሰዲዱለን።
en-mt: The World Health Organization has shipped the test kits integrated in Germany to low-income countries that cannot afford to process their own.

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ጀርመን መምርሒ ኣብ ጥሪ 17, 2020 ተሓቲሙ፡ እቲ ብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ዝማዕበለ ፕሮቶኮል ናይ ምቁጽጻር ሕማም ክሳብ ጥሪ 28 ኣይነበረን፡ ኣተደናጎየ ቀረባት ናይ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ኣብ ቻይናን ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ (U.S.)ን ፡ ኣብ መጀመርያ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይቲ ሕማም ፡ ናይቲ መሳርሒ ብቅዓት ዝጎደለ ብምንባሩ፡ ጸልዩዎ ኢዩ፡ እዘን ሃገራትን ኣወስትራልያን ከኣ ነቲ ብ ናይ ሕክምና ክላታት ዝሕተት ዝነበረ ጠለባት ናይ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ፡ ከማሎኦኦ ኣይከኣላን
en-mt: The German directive was published on January 17, 2020. The disease control protocol developed by the United States was not available until January 28, delaying the supply of testing equipment in China and the United States (US) , in the early outbreak of the disease , of the device It was affected by the lack of efficiency, and these countries and Australia were unable to meet the requirements for testing equipment , which were being demanded by medical classes

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: ከም ተጻራሪ፡ ተመራመርቲ ፡ምህላው ብብዝሒ ናይ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ኣብ ደቡብ ኮርያ፡ ነዚ ኖቨል ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ከይስፋሕፍሕ ኮልኪልዎ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Conversely, researchers , the availability of abundant testing equipment in South Korea has prevented the spread of this novel coronavirus.

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ምምርማር ዓቀን፡ ብገፊሑ ኣብ ናይ ውልቂ ላባራቶሪታት፡ ቅድሚ ገለ ዓመታት ብ መንግስቲ ደቡብ ኮርያ ተሃኒጹ።
en-mt: The testing scale, largely in private laboratories, was built by the South Korean government a few years ago.

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 16፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ነቲ ናይ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ምምዕባል መደባት ክሰፍሕ ደልዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ብሰንኪ እቲ ካብ ንቡር ወጻኢ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ኢዩ። ብዝሒ ጠለባት ኮቪድ-19 መርመራታት ፡ኣብ ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ (U.S.) ላባራቶሪታት፡ ናይ ፡ ሕጽረት ናይ መመርመሪታት መሳርሒ ኣኸቲሉ፡ እቶም ፍርያት ናይ መወልወሊታትን ከሚካላዊ መጽረዪታት ድማ ተዋጢሩ።
en-mt: On March 16, the World Health Organization wanted to expand its testing equipment development programs due to the abnormal spread of the virus. The increased demand for COVID-19 tests in United States (US) laboratories has led to a shortage of testing equipment, and the products of solvents and chemical cleaners have been disrupted.

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020፡ ቻይና ኣብቶም ዘፍረየቶም መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ጸገማት ከም ዘሎ ሓቢራ።
en-mt: In March 2020, China reported problems with its test kits.

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜርካ፡ እቶም ብ CDC ዝማዕበሉ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ``ሽግራት`` ኔርዎም፡ ብድሕሪኡ ግን መንግስቲ ነቲ ዘይተዓጻጸፍ ሕጊ ናይ ውልቂ ላባራቶሪ ምርመራ ፡ክቕይሮ ተገዲዱ ። ስጳኛ ካብ ቻይና ካምፓኒ ሸንዘን ባዪኢዚ ባዮተክኖሎጂ ብሕ.ትካ ዝተባህለ ትካል መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ገዚኣ እንተኾነ ግን እቶም መሳርሒታት ጸገማት ኔርዎም።
en-mt: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had ``problems,'' but the government was then forced to change the inflexible law on private laboratory testing. Spain bought testing equipment from China's Shenzhen BayEzi Biotechnology Pvt.

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: እቲ ትካል ከም ዝሓበሮ እቲ ጌጋ ውጽኢት ብሰንኪ እቲ ቅምሶታት ብዘይ ግቡእ ምእካቡ ወይ`ውን ነቲ መሳርሒ ብጉቡእ ዘይንጥቃሙ ሙኻኑ ሓቢሩ
en-mt: The company said the incorrect results were due to improper collection of the samples or improper use of the device

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: ናይ ስጳኛ ሚኒስትሪ ከምዝሓበሮ፡ ነቲ ጌጋ ሓበሬታ ዝህብ መሳርሒታት ክትመልሶ ሙኻናን፡ ብኻልእ ካብ ሸንዘን ዝመጸ ሓድሽ መመርመሪ መሳርሒ ክትትክኦ ሙኻናን ሓቢሩ። 80% እቲ ካብ ቻይና ዝተዓደገ ናይ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት፡ ጌጋ ሓበሬታ ሂቡ። ስሎቫክያ ድማ 1.2 ሚልዮን መመርመሪ መሳርሒ ካብ ቻይና ዓዲጋ፡ እንተኾነ ግን ውጺእታውነቱ ኣዝዩ ትሑት ኢዩ።
en-mt: The Spanish ministry said it would return the misleading devices and replace them with new testing equipment from Shenzhen. 80% of the testing equipment purchased from China gave incorrect information. Slovakia bought 1.2 million test kits from China, but the efficiency is very low.

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ማቶቪች ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ናብ ዳኑበ ክጉሓፍ ከም ዘለዎ ኣነጺሩ። ኣተሽ ኮራ ናይ ቱርኪ ናይ ጥዕና ሚኒስተር ሳኢድ እዞም መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ካብ ቻይና ዝተገዝኡ ``ብዙሕ ጸገም ኣለዎ`` ኣብ ስራሕ ድማ ኣይወዓሉን።``ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ኣስታት 3.5 ሚልዮን መሳርሒታት ካብ ቻይና ዓዲጋ ፡ ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 ግን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ከም ዘይወዓሉ ሓቢራ።
en-mt: According to Prime Minister Matowicz, he specified that it should be dumped into the Danube. Turkish Health Minister Ates Kora said the test kits purchased from China ``have a lot of problems`` and have not been used.``The UK bought about 3.5 million kits from China , but they were not used in March

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: ምምርማር፡ ምስ ምውሻብ ናይቶም ብ ኣወንታ ዝተመርመሩን ምክትታል ነቶም ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ዘለዎም ዓይነት ሰባት ዝተራኸቡን ዝተሰነየ ኣገባብ፡ ኣዝዩ ኣወንታዊ ዝኾነ ውጽኢት ሂቡ
en-mt: Testing, accompanied by quarantine of those who tested positive and surveillance of those who had contact with people with SARS-CoV-2, yielded very positive results

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ዓዲ ጣልያን ከተማ ቮኦ ዝርከቡ ተመራመርቲ፡ ኣብታ ናይ መጀመርታ ሞታ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተራእየላ ከተማ፡ 2 ዙርያ ናይ መርመራታት ኣብ መላእ 3400 ሰባት ናይታ ከተማ፡ ኣብ ናይ ዓሰርተ መዓታት ፍልልይ፡ ኣካይዶም።
en-mt: Researchers in the Italian city of Voo, where the first death from the virus was reported, conducted two rounds of tests across 3,400 people in the city, ten days apart.

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: ካብቶም 50% ብ ኣወንታ ዝተመርመሩ ዝኾነ ምልክት የብሎምን፡ እቶም ኩሎም ዝተበጽሑ ግዳያት ድማ ተወሺቦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Of the 50% who test positive, they have no symptoms, and all victims visited have been quarantined.

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: ምስዚ ምጉዓዝ ናብቲ ናይ ኮሚኒ ዝተሓዘአ፡ እዚ ነቲ ሓዲሽ ምልካፍ ሙሉእ ብ ሙሉእ ክኣልዮ ይኽእል።
en-mt: With this move to the commune reserved, this can completely eliminate the new infection.

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: ብ ኣዝዩ ዝተራቀቀ ምክትታል፡ ዘይተገደበ ውሸባ፡ መርመራታት፡ ምዕጻውን፡ እዚ ናይ 2020 ለበዳ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ኣብ ሲንጋፖር፡ ምስ ካልኦት ሃገራት ኣወዳዲርካ ብ ኣዝዩ ዝዛሓለ መጠን ኢዩ ገስጊሱ ፡እንተኾነ መጠኑ ዝሓለፈ ምሕጻርን ከም ኣብነት፡ ኣስገዳዲ ምዕጻው ሪስቶራንታት ን መሸጢ ክፍልታትን፡ ኣይተተግበሩን።
en-mt: With highly sophisticated surveillance, unrestricted quarantine, testing, and closures, the 2020 coronavirus outbreak in Singapore has progressed at a much slower rate than in other countries , but excessive curtailments and, for example, forced closures of restaurants and outlets, have not been implemented.

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: ብዙሓት ኣጋጣሚታት ተዓጽዮም ኢዮም ከምኡውን ሲንጋፖር ነቶም ነበርታ ክሳብ 28 መጋቢት ክዕጸዉ ከም ዘለዎም ነጊራ ኣላ፡ እንተኾነ ናይ ቤት-ትምህርትታት ምኽፋት ድሕሪ ዕረፍቲ መጋቢት 23 ኢዩ።
en-mt: Many opportunities have been closed and Singapore has told its residents to remain closed until March 28, but schools will reopen after the March 23 holiday.

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.
targetString: ገለገለ ካልኦት ሃገራት ብ ኣዝዩ ዘይምቹእ ናይ ምክትታል መስርሕ፡ ነይተወሰነ ናይ ጉዕዞ ሓጹር፡ መርመራታትን ምውሻባትን፡ ምስ ዝተመሓየሸ ምዕጻው፡ ከም ሃገራት ደቡብ ኮርያን ኣይስላንድ ን፡ ብምጥቃም ነቲ ለበዳ ተቆጻጺረንኦ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Some other countries have controlled the outbreak with very unfavorable surveillance processes, using indefinite travel restrictions, tests and quarantines, with improved closures, such as South Korea and Iceland

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.
targetString: ስታቲስቲካዊ መጽናዕቲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ እተን ብዙሕ ዝኾነ መርመራታት ዝገበራ ሃገራት፡ ምስቲ ዘሎ ህሉው ቁጽሪ ናይ ሞት፡ ዝተሓተ ቁጽሪ ሞት ይረ ኣየለን ኣሎ፡ እዚ ድማ እተን ሃገራት ነቶም ውሑድ ምልክታት ወይ ድማ ዝኾነ ምልክታት ዘይብሎም ልኹፋት ብቐሊሉ ስለ ዘለልያኦም ኢየን።
en-mt: Statistical research shows that countries that have tested more are seeing lower death rates than current death rates because they are more likely to identify infected people with few or no symptoms.

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ፡ እተን መርመራታት ከካይዳ ብቅዓት ዘይብለንን፡ ሃገራዊ ላባራቶርአን ተመክሮ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 መርመራትት ዘይብሉን፡ ናይ መጀመርያ 5 ኣወንታዊ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ቅምሶታት ክሰዳ፡ ቀጺለን ድማ 10 ኣሉታዊ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ቅምሶታት ናብ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) መወከሲ ላባራቶሪ ን መርመራታት ምርግጋጽ፡ ሰዲደን
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) , which is not qualified to conduct tests and whose national laboratory has no experience in testing for COVID-19, should send the first 5 positive samples, followed by 10 negative samples to the WHO. Reference laboratory for confirmation tests, sent

sourceString: Out of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.
targetString: ካብቶ 16 መወከሲ ላባራቶሪታት እቶም 7 ኣብ ኤስያ 5 ኣብ ኤውሮጳ፡ 2 ኣብ ኣፍሪቃ፡ 1 ኣብ ደቡብ ኣሜሪካ፡ ከምኡውን 1 ኣብ ኣዉስትራልያ።
en-mt: Of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in South America, and 1 in Australia.

sourceString: In the following chart, the column “Positive as % of tests” is influenced by the country's testing policy.
targetString: ኣብዚ ዝስዕብ ቻርት ``እቲ ኣወንታዊ % መርመራታ`` በቲ ሃገራዊ ናይ መርመራ ፖሎሲ ኢዩ ዝጽሎ።
en-mt: In the following chart, ``the positive % of tests`` is affected by the national testing policy.

sourceString: A country that only tests people admitted to hospitals will have a higher positive as % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether or not they are showing symptoms, other things being equal.
targetString: ካብተን ናብ ሆስፒታል ዝመጹ ጥራይ ዝምርመራ እተን ን ኩሉ ህዝበን ብሓፈሻ ዝምርምራ፡ ምልክታት ይሃልዎ ኣይሃልዎ ብዘየገድስ፡ ዝወሓደ ቁጽሪ ናይ ብ ኣወንታ ዝምርመሩ %ተለከፍቲ ቁጽሪ ኣለወን።
en-mt: Those that test only those who come to the hospital have the lowest %of infections that test positive, regardless of whether they have symptoms or not.

sourceString: Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.
targetString: ኢድ ምሕጻብ፡ ወይ ውን ብ ጽሬት ኣእዳው ዝፍለጥ፡ መስርሕ ናይ ጽሬት ረስሓት፡ ተጋዳእቲ ታህዋስያን ወይ ዘየድልዩ ነገራት ምእላይ ካብ ኢድ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Hand washing, also known as hand hygiene, is the process of cleaning the hands by removing dirt, infectious bacteria or unwanted substances.

sourceString: Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route.
targetString: ኣብ እዋን ቀትሪ ኣእዳውካ ብሳምና ደጋጊምካ ምሕጻብ፡ ዝርግሐ ብዙሓት ብቀልቀልን ብኣፍን ክመሓላለፉ ዝኽእሉ ከም ውጽኣትን ሸሮኽን ዝኣመሰሉ ሕማማት ክከላኸል ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Washing your hands frequently with soap during the day can prevent the spread of many diseases that can be transmitted by mouth and mouth, such as diarrhea and cholera.

sourceString: People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).
targetString: ደቂ ሰባት ቅድሚ ዓይኖም፡ ኣፍንጭኦም ወይ ኣዶም( ከም ኣብነት ንፍጣዊ ሽፋናት) ምሓዞም ኣእዳዎም ምስዘይሕጸቡ ከም በዓል  ሰዓል ዝኣመሰሉ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሕማማት ክጥቅዑ ይኽእሉ ኢዮም።
en-mt: People can contract respiratory diseases such as the common cold if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose or mouth( for example, mucous membranes).

sourceString: The five critical moments during the day where washing hands with soap is important include: before and after defecation, after cleaning a child's bottom or changing nappies, before feeding a child, before eating and before and after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: እዘን 5 ኣተሓሳሰብቲ ግዝያት ምሕጻብ ኢድ ብሳምና፡ ኣብ ማዓልቲ ቅድምን ድሕርን ቀልቀል ምውጻእ፡ማዓኮር ቆልዓ ድሕሪ ምጽራይ ወይ ጨርቂ ምቅያር፡ቆልዓ ቅድሚ ምምጋብ፡ቅድምን ድሕርን ምድላው መግቢ(ጥረ ስጋ፡ዓሳ ወይ ዶርሆ ምሓዝ) ዘማእከለ ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: These 5 thoughtful times are important centered on washing hands with soap, before and after emergence during the day, after cleaning or changing baby's chest, before feeding baby, and before and after food preparation(handling raw meat, fish or chicken).

sourceString: If water and soap are not available, hands can be cleaned with ash.The World Health Organization recommends washing hands:
targetString: ሳሙናን ማይን ኣብ ዘይህልወሉ እዋን ኣእዳው ብ ሓሙኹሽቲ ክጸርዩ ይኽእሉ ኢዮ። ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ድማ ኣእዳውና ክንሕጸብ ይመክር።
en-mt: Hands can be cleaned with ashes when soap and water are not available. The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends hand washing.

sourceString: Before, during, and after preparing food.
targetString: ቅድሚ፡ ኣብ እዋንን ድሕርን ምድላው መግቢ።
en-mt: Before, during and after food preparation.

sourceString: Before and after caring for a sick person.
targetString: ቅድምን ድሕርን ክንክን ናይ ሕሙም ሰብ።
en-mt: Before and after care of a sick person.

sourceString: After changing the diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet.
targetString: ሓደ ህጻን ሽንቲ ቤት ድሕሪ ምጥቃሙ ወይ ጨርቂ ሽንቲ-ቆልዓ ድሕሪ ምቅያሩ።
en-mt: After a child uses the toilet or changes a diaper cloth.

sourceString: After blowing your nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: ድሕሪ ኣፍንጫኻ  ፊጥ ምባል፡ ምስዓል ወይ ምዕንጣስ።
en-mt: After sneezing, coughing or sneezing.

sourceString: After touching animal, animal feed, or animal waste.
targetString: ድሕሪ እንስሳ ፡ መብልዕ ማል፡ ወይ`ውን ጎሓፍ ማል ምሓዝካ።
en-mt: After you catch animals , feeders, or livestock waste.

sourceString: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene practices related to medical procedures.
targetString: ሕክምናዊ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት፡ ነቲ ናይ ሕክምና ናይ ጽሬት ንጥፈታት ኢዩ ዘመልክይ።
en-mt: Medical hand hygiene refers to the medical hygiene activities.

sourceString: Hand washing before administering medicine or medical care can prevent or minimize the spread of disease.
targetString: ቅድሚ መድሃኒት  ምሃብ ወይ ጥዕና ሓገዝ ምሃብና፡ኢድ ምሕጻብ እቲ ቀንዲ መከላኸሊ ወይ መጉደሊ ምስፍሕፋሕ ሕማም እዩ።
en-mt: Before giving medicine or health assistance, hand washing is the main prevention or reduction of the spread of disease.

sourceString: The main medical purpose of washing hands is to cleanse the hands of pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals which can cause harm or diseases.
targetString: ቀንዲ ሕክምናዊ ዕላማ ናይ ኣእዳው ምሕጻብ ነቶም ደቀቕቲ ተጋዳእቲ  ታህዋኣስያን ወይ ሰበባት ሕማም (ባክተርያ፡ ቫይረስ፡ ወይ ሕማም ዘስዕቡ ታህዋኣስያን ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ)  ምጽራይ ወይ ምእላይ ኢዩ ፡ ከምኡ`ውን ነቶም ኣብ ኢድ ዝጸንሑ ሕማም ዘስዕቡ ከሚካላት ክኣልዮም ይኽእል።
en-mt: The main medical purpose of hand washing is to clean or remove the microorganisms or pathogens (which can be bacteria, viruses, or disease-causing bacteria) , and it can remove disease-causing chemicals that have been on the hands.

sourceString: This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but also an important practice for the general public.
targetString: እዚ ብፍላይ መግቢ ዝኣልዩ ወይ ኣብ ሕክምናዊ ስራሕ ዝሰርሑ ኣገዳሲ እዩ። ከምኡ'ውን ብሓፈሻ ን ህዝቢ ጠቓሚ ምልምማድ እዩ።
en-mt: This is especially important for those who handle food or work in medical settings. It is also a useful exercise for the public in general.

sourceString: Hand washing has many health benefits, including minimizing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; decreasing respiratory infections;
targetString: ኢድ ምሕጻብ ብዙሕ ጥዕናዊ ጥቕሚ ኣለዎ፡ ካብኣቶም እዞም ዝስዕቡ ኢዮም;ምጉዳል ምስፍሕፋሕ ሕማም ዓባይ ሰዓል፡ኮሮና ቫይረስን ተላባዕቲ ሕማማትን ምጉዳል ተማሓላለፍቲ ጠንቂ ውጽኣት፡ምጉዳል  ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሕማማት።
en-mt: Hand washing has many health benefits, among which are;reduced spread of influenza, coronavirus and infectious diseases reduced vectors causing diarrhea,reduced respiratory diseases.

sourceString: and reducing infant mortality rate at home birth deliveries.
targetString: ከምኡ`ውን ምጉዳል መጠን ናጽላዊ ሞት ኣብ ቤት ዝውለዱ ዕሸላት።
en-mt: and reduced infant mortality rates among home-born infants.

sourceString: A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices may lead to small improvements in the length growth in children under five years of age.
targetString: ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ልምምድ ንእሽቶ ለውጢ ኣብ ዕቤት ትሕቲ ሓሙሽተ ዓመት ሕጻናት ከምዘምጽእ ኣብ 2013 ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ ኣርእዩ።
en-mt: A 2013 study showed that hand washing practice makes a small difference in the development of children under five.

sourceString: In developing countries, childhood mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple behavioral changes, such as hand washing with soap.
targetString: ኣብዘን ዝምዕብላ ዘለዋ ሃገራት፡ መጠነ ሞት ናይ ቆልዑ ምስ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሽግራት ንዝተሓሓዝ ቀሊል ዝኾነ ናይ ባህርያት ለውጢ ብምግባር፡ ከም እኒ ኢድ ምሕጻብ፡ ክጎድል ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: In these developing countries, child mortality rates can be reduced by making simple behavioral changes associated with respiratory problems, such as hand washing.

sourceString: This simple action can reduce the rate of mortality from these diseases by almost 50%.
targetString: እዚ ቐሊል ግብረመልሲ መጠን ናይ ሞት፡ካብዞም ሕማማት ብ ዳርጋ 50% ክቕንስ ይኽእል።
en-mt: This simple reaction can reduce the mortality rate,from these diseases by almost 50%.

sourceString: Interventions that promote hand washing can reduce diarrhoea episodes by about a third, and this is comparable to providing clean water in low income areas.
targetString: ምሕጻብ ኣእዳው ንውጽኣት ብ ሓደ ሲሶ ከጉድሎ ይኽእል፡ እዚ ድማ ምስቲ ምቕራብ ጽሩይ ማይ ናብቶም ድኻታት ስድራ-ቤታት ዝነብሩሉ ፡ ዝመሳሰል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Hand washing can reduce excretion by one-third, similar to providing clean water to poor households.

sourceString: 48% of reductions in diarrhoea episodes can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing with soap is the single most effective and inexpensive way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), as automatic behavior performed in homes, schools, and communities worldwide.
targetString: ከም ኣውቶማቲካዊ ጠባይ፡ ኣብ ገዛ፡ ቤት ትምህርትን ሕብረተሰብን እንገብሮ፡ ዓለምለኻዊ 48% ምጉዳል ፍጻመታት ውጽኣት ምስ ብሳምና ኢድ ምሕጻብ ክተሓሓዝ ይከኣል እዩ።ምሕጻብ ኢድ ብ ሳምና ቀንዲ ንጽል ኣድማዕን ሕሱርን መንገዲ መከላኸሊ ውጸኣትን ብርቱዕ ናይ ምስትንፋስ መልከፍትን (ARI) እዩ።
en-mt: As an automatic behavior, we do at home, school and in the community, a global 48% reduction in diarrhea incidents can be attributed to hand washing with soap.

sourceString: Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the number one cause of mortality among children under five years old, taking the lives of an estimated 1.8 million children per year.
targetString: ፔኑሞንያ ቀንዲ ARI ፡ ቀዳማይ ጠንቂ ናይ ሞት ኣብ መንጎ ትሕቲ 5 ዓመት ቆሉዑትን ፡ብ 1.8 ሚልዮን ኣብ ዓመት ዝግመት ሂወት ቆልዑት ዝወስድን  እዩ።
en-mt: Pneumonia is the leading ARI, the leading cause of death among children under 5 years of age, and claims an estimated 1.8 million child lives per year.

sourceString: Diarrhea and pneumonia together account for almost 3.5 million child deaths annually.
targetString: ውጽኣትን ኒሞንያን፡ ኣብ ዓመት ጠንቂ ሞት ናይ 3,5 ሚልዮን ሰባት ኢዮም።
en-mt: Diarrhea and pneumonia are the cause of death for 3.5 million people each year.

sourceString: According to UNICEF, turning hand washing with soap before eating and after using the toilet into an ingrained habit can save more lives than any single vaccine or medical intervention, cutting deaths from diarrhea by almost half and deaths from acute respiratory infections by one-quarter.
targetString: ብመሰረት UNICEF ኢድ ምሕጻብ ብሳምና፡ ቅድሚ ምብላዕን ድሕሪ ሽንቲ ቤት ምጥቃምን ናብ ዘይቅየር ልምዲ ምቕያር ካብ ብኽታበት ወይ ሕክምናዊ ትግበራ ንላዕሊ ብዙሕ ሂወት የድሕን ካብ ብ ውጽኣት ዝሞቱ ፡ከባቢ ፍርቂ ከምኡ ውን ሞት ብቕልጡፍ ናይ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ ብስለት ብሓደ ርብዑ።
en-mt: According to UNICEF, making hand washing with soap, before eating and after using the toilet a consistent habit saves more lives than vaccines or medical interventions than deaths from diarrhea , about half and death from rapid respiratory maturity by a quarter.

sourceString: Hand washing is usually integrated together with other sanitation interventions as part of water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) programmes.
targetString: ኢድ ምሕጻብ ምስ ካለኦት ናይ ጽርየት ተግባራት ከም ሓደ ክፋል ናይ ማይ ጽርየት (WASH) ጥዕናዊ መደባት ዝተተሓሓዘ እዩ።
en-mt: Hand washing is linked to other hygiene practices as part of WASH health programs.

sourceString: Hand washing also protects against impetigo which is transmitted through direct physical contact.
targetString: ኢድ ምሕጻብ ካብ ኢምፔቲጎ (impetigo) ብኣካላዊ ምትንኻፍ ዝማሓላለፍ ሕማም ይከላኸለልና።
en-mt: Hand washing protects against impetigo, a contact-borne disease.

sourceString: A small detrimental effect of hand washing is that frequent hand washing can lead to skin damage due to drying of the skin.
targetString: ንእሽቶ ኣሉታዊ ጽልዋ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ፡ ተደጋጋሚ ምሕጻብ ድርቀት ናይ ቆርበት ብምስዓብ  ሕማም ቆርበት ከኸትል ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: A small negative effect of hand washing: Repeated washing can cause skin disease due to dryness of the skin.

sourceString: A 2012 Danish study found that excessive hand washing can lead to an itchy, flaky skin condition known as hand eczema or hand dermatitis, which is especially common among health-care workers.
targetString: ኣብ 2012 መጽናዕቲ ደንማርከኛ ከምእተረኽበ ተወሳኪ ምሕጻብ ኢድ ናብ ዘሳሒ፡ኩነታት ምቅርራፍ ቆርበት ከም ናይ ኢድ መበላይ ወይ ናይ ኢድ ነድሪ ቆርበት ይባሃል።እዚ ብፍላይ ኣብ መንጎ ሰራሕተኛታት ክንክን ጥዕና ልሙድ እዩ።
en-mt: A 2012 Danish study found that additional hand washing to the skin, a condition called hand rash or hand inflammation of the skin, is especially common among healthcare workers.

sourceString: Too frequent hand washing is also seen as one of the symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
targetString: ኣዝዩ ተደጋጋሚ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ከም ሓደ ካብቶም ምልክታት ናይ ዝገደደ ስርዓት ኣልቦ (OCD) ሙኻን እዩ ዝረአ።
en-mt: Washing your hands too frequently is seen as one of the symptoms of OCD.

sourceString: There are five critical times during the day where washing hands with soap is important to reduce fecal-oral transmission of disease: after using the bathroom (urination, defecation), after cleaning a child's bottom (changing nappies), before feeding a child, before eating and before/after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: ኣብ መዓልቲ ሓሙሽተ ኣገደስቲ ግዚያትኣእዳው ብ ሳሙናን ብምሕጻብ ነቲ ምምሕልላፍ ናይ ምሕማም እነጉድለለን ኣለዋ፡ እዚ አን ድማ፡ ድሕሪ ካብ ሽቃቅ ምውጻእና (ሽንቲ ደገን ልሙድ ምሻንን)፡ ድሕሪ ን ቆልዓ ምጽራይ (ምቅያር ናይ ፓምፐር)፡ ቅድሚ ን ቆልዓ ምምጋብ፡ ቅድሚ ምብላዕ ቆልዓ ወይ ድሕሪኡ፡ ድሕርን ቅድሚን መግቢ ምስራሕ ወይ`ውን ጥረ ስጋ፡ ዓሳ ወይ ዝኾነ እንስሳ ምሓዝ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: There are five important times a day to reduce the transmission of infection by washing hands with soap: after using the toilet (outside urine and routine urination), after cleaning the baby (changing the pamper), before feeding the baby, before or after feeding the baby , after and before cooking or handling raw meat, fish or any animal.

sourceString: Other occasions when correct handwashing technique should be practiced in order to prevent the transmission of disease include before and after treating a cut or wound; after sneezing, coughing, or blowing your nose; after touching animal waste or handling animals; and after touching garbage.
targetString: ካልኦት መንገድታት ግቡእ ነዚ ምምሕልላፍ ናይ ሕማም ንምዕጋት ቅድምን ድሕርን ሕክምና ናይ ቁስሊ ምግባርካ፡ ድሕሪ ምስዓልካ፡ ምህንጣስካ ወይ ኣፍንጫኻ ምሓዝካ፡ እንስሳ ምሓዝካ፡ ወይውን ጎሓፍ ምሓዝካ፡  ኣጠቃቅማ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ክትግበሩ ዘለዎም፡ ነዞም ዝትጠቅሱ ኩነታት ኣብ ግምት ዘእተወ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Other ways to prevent the spread of the disease include the use of hand washing before and after wound treatment, after coughing, sneezing or handling nose, handling animals, or handling garbage.

sourceString: In many countries, there is a low rate of hand washing with soap.
targetString: ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ውሑድ መጠን ምሕጻብ ኢድ ብሳምና ኣሎ።
en-mt: In many countries, there is little hand washing with soap.

sourceString: A study of hand washing in 54 countries in 2015 found that on average, 38.7% of households practiced hand washing with soap.A 2014 study showed that Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; the United States near the middle with 77 percent; and China with the lowest rate of 23 percent.Several behaviour change methodologies now exist to increase uptake of the behaviour of hand washing with soap at the critical times.Group hand washing for school children at set times of the day is one option in developing countries to engrain hand washing in children's behaviors.
targetString: መጽናዕቲ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ኣብ 2015፡ ኣብ 54 ሃገራት ኣብ ዝተገብረ፡ 38.7% ናይ ገዛ ንጥፈታት ምስ ሳሙና ዝተሓሓዝ ኢዩ ኢሉ። ናይ 2014 መጽናዕቲ ድማ፡ ስዕዲ ዓረብ ዝበዝሐ ቁጽሪ ናይ ሞት 97 ሚእታዊት፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ማእከላይ ደረጃ 77 ሚእታዊት፡ ቻይና እቲ ዝወሓደ መጠን 23 ሚእታዊት ተራእዩወን።  ገለ ገለ ናይ ባህርያት ለውጢ መንገድታት ክረ ኣዩ ጀሚሮም ኣለዉ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣእዳው ምሕጻብ ዘተቓለለ ኢዩ። ብ ጉጅለ ምሕጻብ ኣእዳው ኣብ ግዜ ዕረፍቲ ናይ ተመሃሮ፡ ቀንዲ ኣማራጺ ኣብ ዝምዕብላ ዘለዋ ሃገራት ልምዲ ምሕጻብ ናይ ኣእዳው ከተኣታትዋ ዕድል ዝፈጥር ኢዩ።
en-mt: The Hand Washing Survey in 2015, in 54 countries, found that 38.7% of household activities involved soap. According to the 2014 study, Saudi Arabia had the highest death rate at 97 percent, the United States at an average of 77 percent and China with the lowest at 23 percent. Some behavioral changes are starting to appear, including hand washing. Group hand washing during student breaks is a major option that provides an opportunity to introduce hand washing in developing countries.

sourceString: The "Essential Health Care Program" implemented by the Department of Education in the Philippines is an example of at scale action to promote children's health and education.
targetString: እቲ ``ኣገዳሲ ናይ ጥዕና መደባት``፡ ኣብ ፊሊፒንስ ክፍሊ ትምህርቲ ኣብ ግብሪ ዘውዓሎ ኣርኣያ ጥዕና ናይ ቆልዑት ንምውሳኽን ትምህርትን መለክዒ ተግባር እዩ።
en-mt: The ``Essential Health Programs`` is a measure of action for increasing children's health and education implemented by the Department of Education in the Philippines.

sourceString: Deworming twice a year, supplemented with washing hands daily with soap, brushing teeth daily with fluoride, is at the core of this national program.
targetString: ዳግመ- ሙማቕ  ኣብ ዓመት ክልተ ግዜ፡ ብ ኣእዳው ምሕጻብ ብምስናይ፡ ብ ፍሎራይድ ኣስናን ምሕጻይ መዓልታዊ፡ ናይዚ ሃገራዊ መደብ ቀንድን መሰራታውን ዕላማ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Re- heating twice a year, accompanied by hand washing, and brushing teeth with fluoride daily, is the main and fundamental objective of this national program.

sourceString: It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia.
targetString: ኣብ ኢንዶነዥያ ውን ብዓወት ተሰሪሕሎም ኢዩ።
en-mt: They have been successfully implemented in Indonesia.

sourceString: Removal of microorganisms from skin is enhanced by the addition of soaps or detergents to water.
targetString: ምእላይ ናይ ደቀቕቲ ታህዋስያን ካብ ቆርበት፡ ሳሙናን ካልኦት መጽረይቲን ብምጥቃም ከነመሓይሾ ንኽእል ኢና።
en-mt: We can improve the removal of microorganisms from the skin by using soap and other cleansers.

sourceString: The main action of soaps and detergents is to reduce barriers to solution, and increase solubility.
targetString: እቲ ቀንዲ ስራሕን ምጽራይን ሳምና፡ነቶም ከልከልቲ ምሕቃቕን ሓቓቕነቱ ምውሳኽን እዩ።
en-mt: The main function and cleaning of soap is to absorb the impurities and increase its purity.

sourceString: Water alone is an inefficient skin cleanser because fats and proteins, which are components of organic soil, are not readily dissolved in water.
targetString: ማይ ጥራይ በይኑ ንቆርበት ከጽሪ ኣይክእልን ኢዩ እዚ ድማ ህላውነት ናይ ስብሒን ፕሮቲንን ስለ ዘሎ ኢዩ፡ እዚኦም ክፋላት ናይ ኦርጋኒክ ሓመድ ኣብ ማይ ክሓቁ ኣይክእሉን ኢዮም።
en-mt: Water alone cannot cleanse the skin because of the presence of fats and proteins, which are parts of organic soil that cannot be absorbed in water.

sourceString: Cleansing is, however, aided by a reasonable flow of water..
targetString: ምጽራይ ውን እንተኾነ  ብዘየቋርጽ እኹል ምፍሳስ ማይ ተሓጊዙ።
en-mt: Cleaning was also aided by consistently adequate drainage.

sourceString: Solid soap, because of its reusable nature, may hold bacteria acquired from previous uses.
targetString: ድሩቅ ሳሙና፡ ከም እንደገና ክንጥቀመሉ ስለ እንኽእል፡ ካብቲ ቅድሜኻ ዝተጠቀመሉ ሰብ ባክተርያ ክጸንሖም ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Dry soap, because we can reuse it, can leave bacteria from the person who used it before you.

sourceString: A small number of studies which have looked at the bacterial transfer from contaminated solid soap have concluded transfer is unlikely as the bacteria are rinsed off with the foam.
targetString: ገለ ንኣሽቱ መጽናዕትታት፡ ኣብ ናይ ባክተርያ ምምሕልላፍ ኣብ ዝተበከለ ሳሙና፡ ኣብ ዝገበርዎ ምርምር ፡ እቶም ባክተርያበቲ ፊፍ ስለ ዝእለዩ ምልካፋት ኣይከኣልን ኢዩ።
en-mt: Some small studies, on the bacterial transmission of contaminated soap, have found that infections are not possible because the bacteriabeti fifs are removed.

sourceString: The CDC still states "liquid soap with hands-free controls for dispensing is preferable".
targetString: CDC ክሳብ ሕጂ ከምዝብሎ ፈሳሲ ሳምና ንኣእዳው ምጥቃም ተመራጺ ከምዝኾነ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The CDC still says that liquid soap is recommended for hands.

sourceString: Antibacterial soaps have been heavily promoted to a health-conscious public.
targetString: ጸረ ባክተርያ  (Bacteria)ዊ ሳምናታት ብህዝባዊ ንቕሓት ጥዕና ኣዝዩ ዝተተባበዐ እዩ።
en-mt: Antibacterial soaps are highly encouraged by public health awareness.

sourceString: To date, there is no evidence that using recommended antiseptics or disinfectants selects for antibiotic-resistant organisms in nature.
targetString: ክሳብ ሐጂ፡ዝተዋህበ ለበዋ ብምውካስ ፡ጸረ ረኹሲ ወይ ፈውሲ ረኹሲ ን ጸረ ነፍሳት ብ ባህሪ ተጻዋርነት ናኣሽቱ እንስሳታት ዝህብ መረዳእታ የለን።
en-mt: To date, based on recommendations, there is no evidence that disinfectants or disinfectants are resistant to antibiotics in small animals.

sourceString: However, antibacterial soaps contain common antibacterial agents such as triclosan, which has an extensive list of resistant strains of organisms.
targetString: ሽሕ'ኳ ጸረ ባክተርያ  (Bacteria) ሳምናታት ከምልሙድ ጸረ ባክተርያ  (Bacteria)ዊ ወኪል እዚ እንተዓቀበ ትሪክሎዛን ሰፊሕ ዝርዝር ጽኑዕ ተጻዋርነት ናይ ሂወታውያን ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Although antibacterial soaps retain this as a typical antibacterial agent, triclosan has a wide range of strong resistance to organisms.

sourceString: So, even if antibiotic resistant strains aren't selected for by antibacterial soaps, they might not be as effective as they are marketed to be.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ወላ`እካ እቶም ጸረ-ታህዋኣስያን ክጻወሩ ዝኽእሉ ኣብ ኽኝዲ ጸረ-ባክተርያ  ሳሙና ኣይመረጹ፡ ኸምቲ ኣብ ዕዳጋ ዝተነግረሎም ውጽኢታውያን ዘይክኾኑ ግን ይኽእሉ ኢዮም።
en-mt: Therefore, even if those who are resistant to antibiotics do not choose antibacterial soap instead, they may not be as effective as claimed on the market.

sourceString: Besides the surfactant and skin-protecting agent, the sophisticated formulations may contain acids (acetic acid, ascorbic acid, lactic acid) as pH regulator, antimicrobially active benzoic acid and further skin conditioners (aloe vera, vitamins, menthol, plant extracts).A comprehensive analysis from the University of Oregon School of Public Health indicated that plain soaps are as effective as consumer-grade anti-bacterial soaps containing triclosan in preventing illness and removing bacteria from the hands.
targetString: ጎኒ ናይቲ ባይታ ን ናይ ቆርበት-መከላኸሊ ኣካልን፡ እቲ ዝተሓላለኸ ፎርሙላታት (ኣሰቲክ ኣሲድ፡ ኣስኮርቢክ ኣሲድ፡ ላክቲክ ኣሲድ) ዝሓዘ ኢዩ፡ ከም ናይ PH መመዓራረዪ ፡ ኣንቲማይክሮባይሊ ኣክቲቭ በንዞኒክ ኣሲድ ን ከምኡውን ናይ ቆርበት ኮንዲሽነራትን ከም (ኣሎራ ቨራ፡ ቫይታሚናት፡ መንቶል፡ ናይ ተኽሊ ተረፍ) ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ ካብ ናይ ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ናይ ኦረጎን ቢት-ትምህርቲ ከም ዘነጽሮ፡ እቶም ልሙዳት ሳሙናታት ልክዕ ከምቶም ጸረ-ባክተርያ ተባሂሎም ዝስርሑ ዓይነታት ሳሙና፡ ትሪክሎሳን ናይ ሕማምን ባክተርያን መከላኸሊ ዝሓዙ፡ ሓደ ዓይነት ውጽኢታውነት ኢዩ ዘለዎም
en-mt: Alongside the base and skin-protection body, the complex contains formulas (acetic acid, ascorbic acid, lactic acid), as a PH balancer , antimicrobially active benzonic acid and also skin conditioners and as (alora vera, vitamins, menthol, of Plant residues) from the Oregon Public Health Bit-Lesson make it clear that the conventional soaps have the same effectiveness as the antibacterial types of soaps that contain triclosan for disease and bacterial protection

sourceString: Hot water that is comfortable for washing hands is not hot enough to kill bacteria.
targetString: እቲ ንመሕጸቢ ኣቕሑት ተባሂሉ ዝውዒ ማይ ን ባክተርያ ክቀትሎም ኣይክእልን ኢዩ።
en-mt: The heated water for washing utensils cannot kill bacteria.

sourceString: Bacteria grow much faster at body temperature (37 °C).
targetString: ባክተርያ  (Bacteria) (Bacteria) ኣብ 370 C ናይ ኣካላት ረስኒ ዝለዓለ ናይ ምብዛሕ ዓቕሚ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Bacteria have the highest replication potential at 370 C of body temperature.

sourceString: However, warm, soapy water is more effective than cold, soapy water at removing natural oils which hold soils and bacteria.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ምዉቕ፡ ሳሙና ዝተሓወሶ ማይ፡ ምስቲ ዝሑልን ሳሙና ዘለዎ ማይ ብምንጽጻር ኣዝዩ ውጽኢታዊ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ምጽራግ ናይ ባህርያውያን ዘይትታት፡ ባክተርያን ሑጻን ዝሓዙ፡ ኣዝዩ ጠቃሚ ኢዩ።
en-mt: However, lukewarm, soapy water is much more effective compared to cold, soapy water, which is very beneficial in the decontamination of essential oils that contain bacteria and sand.

sourceString: Contrary to popular belief however, scientific studies have shown that using warm water has no effect on reducing the microbial load on hands.
targetString: ሽሕ'ኳ ግኑን እምነታት እንተ ተጻረሮ፡ ስነፍልጠታዊ መጽናዕቲ ከምዘርእዮ ግን ዉዑይ ማይ ምጥቃም ኣብ ምጉዳል ማይክሮቢያል ጸዓት ኣብ ኢድ ጽልዋ የብሉን።
en-mt: Despite popular beliefs, scientific research shows that using hot water has no effect on reducing microbial energy in the hands.

sourceString: A hand sanitizer or hand antiseptic is a non-water-based hand hygiene agent.
targetString: ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘር ወይ መምከኒ ኣእዳው፡ ኣብ ማይ ዘይምርኮስ ናይ ኢድ መጽረዪ ኢይ።
en-mt: Hand sanitizer or hand sanitizer is a water-free hand sanitizer.

sourceString: In the late 1990s and early part of the 21st century, alcohol rub non-water-based hand hygiene agents (also known as alcohol-based hand rubs, antiseptic hand rubs, or hand sanitizers) began to gain popularity.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ 1990ታት ከምኡውን ኣብ መጀመርታ ናይ 21 ክፍለ ዘመን፡ ናይ ኣልኮል ማይ-ኣልቦ ናይ ኢድ መጽረዪ ኣካል (ኣብ ኣልኮል ዝተመርኮሰ ናይ ኢድ ራብ፡ ኣንቲሰፕትክ ናይ ኢድ መጽረዪ፡ ወይውን ናይ ኢድ መምከኒ ውን ተባሂሉ ይፍልጥ ኢዩ) ሽም ክረክብ ጀሚሩ።
en-mt: In the late 1990s and early 21st century, alcohol-based hand sanitizers (also known as alcohol-based hand rubs, antiseptic hand sanitizers, or hand wipes) began to gain popularity.

sourceString: Most are based on isopropyl alcohol or ethanol formulated together with a thickening agent such as Carbomer (polymer of acrylic acid) into a gel, or a humectant such as glycerin into a liquid, or foam for ease of use and to decrease the drying effect of the alcohol.
targetString: ዝበዝሑ ኣብ isopropyl ኣልኮል ወይ ethanol ምስ ረጊድ ተወካሊ ዝተሓወሱ ንኣብነት Carbomer (polymer ናይacrylic acid) ናብ ጀል ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ፡ ወይ`ውን ሁመክታት (humectant) ከም ግላይሰሪን (glycerin) ናብ ፈሳሲ ወይ`ውን ፊፍ ን ቅሉልነትን ነቲ ናይ ምድራቕ ጽልዋ ናይ ኣልኮል ንምእላይ የገልግሉ።
en-mt: Most can be mixed in isopropyl alcohol or ethanol with a solid agent such as Carbomer (polymer of acrylic acid) into a gel, or humectants such as glycerin into a liquid or fifth to easily remove the drying effect of alcohol .

sourceString: Adding diluted hydrogen-peroxide increases further  the antimicrobial activity.Hand sanitizers containing a minimum of 60 to 95% alcohol are efficient germ killers.
targetString: ምውሳኽ ዝተበረዘ ሃይድሮጀን ፔሮክሳይዳብ ንጥፈት ማይክሮብያል ይውስኽ። መጽረዪ ኢድ ብውሑዱ ናይ 60 ክሳብ 95% ኣልኮል ብዙሕ ጀርም ንምቕታል ይዕቅብ።
en-mt: Addition of denatured hydrogen peroxidab increases microbial activity. Hand sanitizer retains a minimum of 60 to 95% alcohol to kill a lot of germs.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers kill bacteria, multi-drug resistant bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tuberculosis, and some viruses (including HIV, herpes, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza, and hepatitis) and fungi.
targetString: ምፍሕፋሕ ባክተሪያ ብኣልኮልን ሳኒታይዘርን  ፡ከም ባዓል ብዙሕ ከኒና ዝጻወሩ ባክተርያ  (Bacteria)ታት፡ ዓባይ ሳዓል፡ከም ባዓል ኤቻኣይቪ፡ሀርፕስ፡ኣርኤስዩ፡ርሂኖ ቫይረስ፡ቫክሲንያ፡ኢንፍሉዌንዛ ፡ ወይቦን ዕጸን ይቐትል።
en-mt: Spraying bacteria with alcohol and sanitizer kills bacteria, such as multi-pill resistant bacteria, the common cold, such as HIV, herpes, RSU, rhinoviruses, vaccines, influenza, or herbs.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers containing 70% alcohol kill 99.97% (3.5 log reduction, similar to 35 decibel reduction) of the bacteria on hands 30 seconds after application and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 log reduction) of the bacteria on hands 1 minute after application.Hand sanitizers are most effective against bacteria and less effective against some viruses.
targetString: ብ ኣልኮል ዝስርሑ ሳኒታይዘራት 70% ዝሓዘ፡ 99.7%% (3.5 ሎግ ጎዶሎ፡ ተመሳሳሊ ምስ 35 ደሲበል ምጉዳል) ባክተርያ ኣብ ውሽጢ 30 ሰከንድታት ክቐትሉ ይኽእሉ፡  ከምኡ`ውን ካብ 99.99% to 99.999% (4 ክሳብ 5 ሎግ ምጉዳል) ናይ ባክተርያ ድሕሪ 1 ደቂቅ ክቀትሉ ይኽእሉ። ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ኣንጻር ባክተርያ እቶም ኣዝዮም ውጽኢታውያን ኢዮም፡ ኣንጻር ቫይረስ ግን ትሑት ውጽኢት ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Alcohol-based sanitizers containing 70% can kill 99.7%% (3.5 log deficiency, equivalent to a 35 decibel reduction) of bacteria within 30 seconds, and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 log reduction) of bacteria after They can kill minutes. Hand sanitizers are the most effective against bacteria, but less effective against viruses.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizers are almost entirely ineffective against norovirus (or Norwalk) type viruses, the most common cause of contagious gastroenteritis.Enough hand antiseptic or alcohol rub must be used to thoroughly wet or cover both hands.
targetString: ብ ኣልኮል ዝተሰርሑ ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይሰር ኣንጻር እቶም ኖሮ-ቫይረሳት (ወይ Norwalk) ዝበሃሉ ዓይነት ቫይረሳት፡ ዝኾነ ስራሕ ክሰርሕ ኣይክእልን፡ ካብቶም ቀንዲ ጠንቒ ናይ gastroenteritis። እኹል ናይ ኢድ ኣንቲሰፕቲክ (antiseptic) ወይ ናይ ኣልኮል መጽረዪ ነእዳው ጽቡቕ ጌሩ ክሽፍነንን ከጠልቅየንን ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Alcohol-based hand sanitizers cannot do any job against the noro-viruses (or Norwalk), one of the main causes of gastroenteritis. Adequate hand antiseptic or alcohol cleanser should cover and moisten hands thoroughly.

sourceString: The front and back of both hands and between and the ends of all fingers are rubbed for approximately 30 seconds until the liquid, foam or gel is dry.
targetString: እቲ ላዕለዋይን ታሕተዋይን ክፋል ናይ ኣእዳውን ጫፍ ናይ ኩሎም ኣጻብዕቲን፡ ክሳብ እቲ ፈሳሲ ወይ ጀል ዝደርቕ፡ ን 30 ሰከንድ ክማሰዉ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: The upper and lower parts of the hands and the tips of all fingers should be massaged for 30 seconds until the liquid or gel dries.

sourceString: Finger tips must be washed well too, rubbing them in both palms.The US Center for Disease Control and Prevention recommends hand washing over hand sanitizer rubs, particularly when hands are visibly dirty.
targetString: ኣጻብዕቲ ናይ ኢድ ውን ኣጸቢቆም ክሕጸቡ ኣለዎም፡ እዚ ድማ ኣጸቢቕካ ብምምሳው ኢዩ ዝግበር፡ ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ማእከል ናይ ምቁጽጻርን ምክልኻልን ሕማማት ነቲ መሕጸቢ ኢድ ኣብ ክንዲ ሳኒታይዘር ክንጥቀመሉ ይመክር፡ ብፍላይ ኣእዳው ርኡይ ዝኾነ ረስሓት ምስዝህልዎም።
en-mt: The fingers of the hands should also be washed thoroughly, which is done by rubbing them thoroughly. The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommends using the hand sanitizer instead of sanitizer, especially if the hands are noticeably dirty.

sourceString: The increasing use of these agents is based on their ease of use and rapid killing activity against micro-organisms; however, they should not serve as a replacement for proper hand washing unless soap and water are unavailable.
targetString: ብተደጋጋሚ ምጥቃም ናይዞም መሳለጥያታት ኣብ ናታቶም ቀሊል ኣጠቓቕማን ቅልጡፍ  ምጥፋእ ንጥፈታቶም ኣንጻር ደቀቕቲ ህዋሳውያን ዝተመርኮሰ ኮይኑ፡ እንተኾነ ግን  ወግዓዊ ምሕጻብ ኢድ ዘይኮነስ ዋላ`ውን ሳምናን ማይን ይረኸብ ን ዳግመ ምደባ ኣየገልግልን እዩ።
en-mt: Frequent use of these facilities is based on their ease of use and rapid loss of activity against microorganisms, but formal hand washing does not serve for reclassification even if soap and water are available.

sourceString: Frequent use of alcohol-based hand sanitizers can cause dry skin unless emollients and/or skin moisturizers are added to the formula.
targetString: ብብዝሒ ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘራት ምጥቃም፡ ናይ ኢድ ምድራቕ ከስዕብ ይኽእል፡ እዚ ግን ናይ ቆርበት መለምለምቲ ነገራት ብምውሳኽ ክፍታሕ ይከ ኣል።
en-mt: Using too many hand sanitizers can cause hand dryness, but this can be resolved by adding skin conditioners.

sourceString: The drying effect of alcohol can be reduced or eliminated by adding glycerin and/or other emollients to the formula.
targetString: ግሊቸሪን ወይ ካለኦት መላሳለሲታት ናብቲ መምርሒ ምውሳኽ ሳዕቤን ምድራቕ ናይ ኣልኮል ከጉድል ወይ ከወግድ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Adding glycerin or other softeners to the guide can reduce or eliminate the drying effects of alcohol.

sourceString: In clinical trials, alcohol-based hand sanitizers containing emollients caused substantially less skin irritation and dryness than soaps or antimicrobial detergents.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ክሊኒክ ፈተነታት፡ ብ ኣልኮል ዝተሰርሒ ሳኒታይዘራት መለሳለሲ ትሕዝቶ ዘለዎም፡ ካብ ሳሙና ወይ ደተጀንት ንታሕቲ ድርቀት ወይ  ነድሪ ዘስዕቡ።
en-mt: In clinical trials, alcohol-based sanitizers have softening properties that cause less dryness or inflammation than soaps or detergents.

sourceString: Allergic contact dermatitis, contact urticaria syndrome or hypersensitivity to alcohol or additives present in alcohol hand rubs rarely occur.
targetString: ኣለርጂካዊ ተንከፍቲ ደርማታይትስ (dermatitis)፡ ነቲ ኡርቲካላ (urticaria) ሲንድሮም ወይ ልዕል ጸቕጢ ናይ ኣልኮል ወይ`ውን ተወሰኽቲ ናይ ኣልኮል ፡ ዘለዎም ርክብት  ብውሑድ ይረኣዩ።
en-mt: Allergic sensitive dermatitis is rarely associated with the urticaria syndrome or hypertension of alcohol or alcohol additives

sourceString: The lower tendency to induce irritant contact dermatitis became an attraction as compared to soap and water hand washing.
targetString: ዝተሓተ ጽልዋ ዘለዎ ምትንኻፍ ንዝደፍእ ነድሪ ቆርበት ምስ ብ ሳምናን ማይን ምሕጻብ ኢድ ክነጻጸር  ከሎ ሰሓቢ ይኸውን።
en-mt: Minimal impact touch becomes attractive for pushing skin inflammation compared to washing hands with soap and water.

sourceString: Despite their effectiveness, non-water agents do not cleanse the hands of organic material, but simply disinfect them.
targetString: ሽሕ'ኳ ኣድማዕነቶም ማይ ዘይብሉ ኣገልግሎትን ኣብ ኢድ ዘሎ ርስሓትን እንተዘየጽረየ ግን ብቐሊሉ የምክኖም እዩ።
en-mt: Although their effectiveness does not clean waterless service and hand dirt, it easily destroys them.

sourceString: It is for this reason that hand sanitizers are not as effective as soap and water at preventing the spread of many pathogens, since the pathogens still remain on the hands.
targetString: እዚ ምኽንያት ኢዩ ከኣ፡ ናይ ኢድ መጽረይ  ከም ሳሙናን ማይን ኣብ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ሕማም ከስዕቡ ዝኽእሉ ታህዋስያን ናይ ምክልኽል ዓቅሙ ውጽኢታዊ ኣይኮነን፡ሕማም ዘስዕብ ታህዋስያን ገና ኣብ ኢድና ስለዝተርፉ።
en-mt: This is why hand sanitizers like soap and water are not effective in preventing the spread of disease-causing bacteria, because disease-causing bacteria still remain in our hands.

sourceString: Alcohol-free hand sanitizer efficacy is heavily dependent on the ingredients and formulation, and historically has significantly under-performed alcohol and alcohol rubs.
targetString: ካብ ኣልኮል-ናጻ (Alcohol-free) ዝኾነ ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘር ኣድማዕነቱ ኣብ ትሕዝቶን ኣሰራርሓን ዝተመርኮሰ እዩ፡  ከምኡ'ውን ብታሪኽ ትሑት ዝኾነ ብቅዓት ናይ ኣልኮልን ናይ ምፍሕፋሕ ኣልኮልን የርኢ።
en-mt: The effectiveness of alcohol-free hand sanitizers is dependent on content and processing, and exhibits historically low alcohol and rubbing alcohol efficiencies.

sourceString: More recently, formulations that use benzalkonium chloride have been shown to have persistent and cumulative antimicrobial activity after application, unlike alcohol, which has been shown to decrease in efficacy after repeated use, probably due to progressive adverse skin reactions.
targetString: ኣብዚ ቀረባ እዋን፡ ብቤንዛልኮንዩም ክሎራይድ ዝተሰርሑ ውጽኢታት ኣብ ጥቅሚ ምስዝውዕሉ ከም ኣልኮል ድሕሪ ደጋጊምካ ምጥቃም ዝጎድል ውጽኢት ዘይኮነስ ካብኡ ንላዕሊ ቀጻልን ተወሳኽን ጸረ-ንኣሽቱ ነፍሳት ዝኾነ ውጽኢት ከምዘለዎም ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Recently, it has been shown that when used, extracts made with benzalkonium chloride have a more sustained and additive antimicrobial effect rather than a diminishing effect after repeated use like alcohol.

sourceString: Many people in low-income communities cannot afford soap and use ash or soil instead.
targetString: ብዙሓት ሰባት ኣብ ድኻ ቦታታት ዝነብሩ ሳሙና ክገዝኡ ስለዘይክእሉ ንሓሙኹሽቲ ወይ ሑጻ ከም መጽረዪ ክጥቀሙሉ ይኽእሉ ኢዮም።
en-mt: Many people in poor areas cannot afford soap and may use ashes or sand as cleaners.

sourceString: Ash or soil may be more effective than water alone, but may be less effective than soap.
targetString: ሓሙኹሽቲ ወይ ሑጻ፡ ካብ ማይ ንላዕሊ ውጽኢታውነት ክህልዎም ይኽእል ኢዩ እንተኾነ ትሕቲ ሳሙና ኢዩ ውጽኢታውነት ዘለዎም።
en-mt: Ash or sand may be more effective than water but less effective than soap.

sourceString: One concern is that if the soil or ash is contaminated with microorganisms it may increase the spread of disease rather than decrease it.
targetString: ሓደ ካብቲ ሽግራት እቲ መሬት በቶም ማይክሮ-ኦርጋኒስም ስለ ዝተበከለ ፡ ነቲ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ሕማም ኣብ ክንዲ ዘጉድሎ፡ መሊሱ ክውስኸሉ ኢዩ
en-mt: One of the problems is that the soil is contaminated with the micro-organisms , which will increase the spread of disease instead of reducing it

sourceString: Like soap, ash is also a disinfecting agent because in contact with water, it forms an alkaline solution.
targetString: ልክዕ ከም ሳሙና፡ ሓሙኹሽቲ ውን ነቶም ተጋዳእቲ ታህዋስያን ክኣልዮም ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ በቲ ናይ ኣልካላይን ዝኾነ ባህሪኡ ብምጥቃም ኢዩ።
en-mt: Like soap, ash can remove harmful bacteria by taking advantage of its alkaline properties.

sourceString: WHO recommended ash or sand as alternative to soap when soap is not available.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO)፡ ሳሙና ኣብ ዘይትረኽበሉ ግዜ፡ ሓሙኽሽቲ ወይ ሑጻ ጌርካ ምሕጻብ ከም ኣማሪጺ ክንወስዶ አም እንኽእል ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends washing with ashes or sand when soap is not available.

sourceString: Correct handwashing technique recommended by the US Centers for Disease Control  for prevention of transmission of disease includes the following steps:
targetString: እቲ ቅኑዕ ኣገባብ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ብመሰረት ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ማእከል ምቁጽጽራትን ምክላኻላትን ተመሓላላፈቲ ሕማምን (US Centers for Disease Control  for prevention of transmission of disease) ዘውጽኦ ደረጃታት እዞም ዝስዕቡ ኢዮም፡
en-mt: The correct hand washing procedures according to the US Centers for Disease Control for prevention of transmission of disease standards are as follows:

sourceString: Wet hands with warm or cold running water.
targetString: ኢድካ ብ ምዉቕ ወይ ዝሑል ፈሳሲ ማይ ኣተርክሶ።
en-mt: Wash your hands with warm or cold water.

sourceString: Running water is recommended because standing basins may be contaminated, while the temperature of the water does not seem to make a difference.
targetString: ወሓዚ ማይ ክንጥቀም ይምክረ ኢዩ፡ ምኽንያቱ ዕቃር ማይ ተበኪሉ ክኸውን ስለ ዝኽእልን ወላ`ካ እቲ መቀት ናይ ማይ ፍልልይ ኣየምጽእ።
en-mt: He recommends using stream water because the reservoir may be contaminated and even the heat does not make a difference.

sourceString: Lather hands by rubbing them with a generous amount of soap, including the backs of hands, between fingers, and under nails.
targetString: ን ሙሉእ ኣእዳውካ፡ ብድሕሪት ኣብ መንጎ ኣጻብዕትኽን፡  መጠኑ ብዝሓለዉ ብዝሒ ዘለዎ ሳሙና ብምጥቃም ኣጸቢቕካ ኣማስዎ።
en-mt: Massage your entire hands, back between your fingers, thoroughly with a moderate amount of soap.

sourceString: Soap lifts germs from the skin, and studies show that people tend to wash their hands more thoroughly when soap is used rather than water alone.
targetString: ሳሙና ነቶም ጀርምስ ካብ ኣእዳው ይኣልዮም፡ ካብ ዝተገብረ መጽ ናዕቲ ድማ ሰባት ካብ ሳሙና ጥራይ በይኑ ሳሙና ኣብ ዝጥቀሙሉ ኣእዳዎም ጽቡቕ ጌሮም የማስውዎ።
en-mt: Soap removes the germs from the hands, and research has shown that people appreciate it on their hands when they use soap alone.

sourceString: Scrub for at least 20 seconds.
targetString: ን 20 ካልኢት ፋሕፋሓዮ።
en-mt: Knead for 20 seconds.

sourceString: Scrubbing creates friction, which helps remove germs from skin, and scrubbing for longer periods removes more germs.
targetString: ኣእዳው ምፍሕፋሕ ወይ ምድራዝ ፍሕፍሐ ስለዝፈጥር፡ ኣብ ቆርበት ዝርከቡ ጀርምታት ንኽእለዩ ይሕግዝ።ንንውሕ ዝበለ ግዜ ምድራዝ ወይ ምፍሕፋሕድማ ዝበዝሑ ጀርምታት ክኣሊ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Rubbing or rubbing your hands creates a lather, which helps to remove germs on the skin. Rubbing or rubbing your hands for a long time can remove most germs.

sourceString: Rinse well under running water.
targetString: ጽያቕ ሕብሪ ብ ማይ ክእለ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Dirty paint can be removed with water.

sourceString: Rinsing in a basin can recontaminate hands.
targetString: ኣብ መሕጸቢ ኢድ ምልቕላቕ ዳግማይ ከምዝብከል ይገብር።
en-mt: Soaking in the sink causes recontamination.

sourceString: Dry with a clean towel or allow to air dry.
targetString: ብንቑጽ ሽጎማኖ ምንቃጽ ወይ ብንፋስ ምድራቕ።
en-mt: Dry with a dry rubber band or blow dry.

sourceString: Wet and moist hands are more easily recontaminated.The most commonly missed areas are the thumb, the wrist, the areas between the fingers, and under fingernails.
targetString: ትርኩስ ወይ ጥሉል ኣእዳው ብቅልጡፍ ከም እንደገና ክብከል ይኽእል። መብዛሕትኡ እዋን ዝርሳዕ ወይ ዝሕለፍ ካብ ኣካላትና ዓባይ-ዓባይቶ ኢድ፡ ጉንቦ ኢድ፡ ኣብ ሞንጎ ኣጻብዕቲ ዘሎ ክፋላትን ትሕቲ ኣጽፋርን ኢዩ።
en-mt: Dirty or shady hands can quickly become contaminated again. Most often forgotten or overlooked are the thumb, wrist, between the fingers, and under the fingernails.

sourceString: Artificial nails and chipped nail polish may harbor microorganisms.
targetString: ሰብ ዝሰርሖ ጽፍርን ዝተጸርበ ኣዝማልቶ ዝተለኽየ ጽፍርን ናኣሽቱ ሂወታውያን ከዕቁብ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Man-made nails and polished azmalto-coated nails can harbor small organisms.

sourceString: Moisturizing lotion is often recommended to keep the hands from drying out; dry skin can lead to skin damage which can increase the risk for the transmission of infection.
targetString: ብዘለስልስ ቅብኣት ኢድና ካብ ምድራቕ ከምዝሕሎ ተነጊሩ።ድሩቕ ቆርበት ናብ ናይ ቆርበት ጉድኣት ከምርሕ ይኽእል፡ እዚ ኸኣ ንምትሕልላፍ ብቕዓት ምቅላዕ ከምዝውስኽ ይገብር።
en-mt: It was said that hand ointment protects against dryness.Dry skin can lead to skin damage, which increases the transmission efficiency of exposure.

sourceString: Various low-cost options can be made to facilitate hand washing where tap-water and/or soap is not available e.g. pouring water from a hanging jerrycan or gourd with suitable holes and/or using ash if needed in developing countries.In situations with limited water supply (such as schools or rural areas in developing countries), there are water-conserving solutions, such as "tippy-taps" and other low-cost options.
targetString: ማይ ወይ ሳምና አብ ቀረባ ወይ ብቀሊሉ ክርከበሉ አብ ዘይክእል ግዜ፡ ምሕጻብ ኣእዳው ከቃልሉ ዝኽእሉ ዝተፈላለዩ ትሑት ዋጋ ዘለዎም ኣማራጺታት ኣለዉ። ንኣብነት፡ ካብ ዝተንጠልጠለ ጀሪካን ማይ ምፍሳስ ወይ ሓምሓም ኣንኲልካ ምጥቃም ከምኡ’ውን አብ ምምዕባል ኣብ ዝርከባ ሃገራት ተሪር ናይ በረኻ ገረብ ምጥቃም ይከኣል። ድሩት ቀረብ ማይ ኣብ ዘለዎም ቦታታት(ከም ቤት-ትምህርትታት ወይ ናይ ገጠር ቦታታት)፡ ማይ ክዕቀበሎም ዝኽእሉ መፍትሒታት ከም ኣቅኒንካ ዝቅዳሕ ፈሳሲ ማይን ካልኦት ትሑት ዋጋ ዘለዎም ኣማራጺታትን አለዉ።
en-mt: When water or soap is not nearby or readily available, there are various low-cost options that can make hand washing easier. For example, you can pour water from a hanging jerrycan or use a hammock and in developing countries you can use a hard wild tree. In places with limited water supplies (such as schools or rural areas), there are water conservation solutions such as tap water and other low-cost options.

sourceString: A tippy-tap is a simple technology using a jug suspended by a rope, and a foot-operated lever to pour a small amount of water over the hands and a bar of soap.
targetString: ቲፕይቶፕ (tippy-tap) ዝቐለለ ቴክኖሎጂ ብገመድ ዝተንጠልጠለ ብራኳ ምጥቃም ኣብ ልዕሊ ኢድ  ማይ ንምፍሳስ ብእግሪ ዝጽቀጥ መሳርሕን መቐመጢ ሳምናን እዩ።
en-mt: Tippy-tap Simpler technology A device and soap dispenser that is pressed with the foot to pour water over the hands using a rope suspended bracket.

sourceString: Effective drying of the hands is an essential part of the hand hygiene process, but there is some debate over the most effective form of drying in public washrooms.
targetString: ከምዝድለ ምድራቕ ኢድ ኣገዳሲ ክፋል ናይ ኢድ መስርሕ ጽርየት እዩ። ግን ከኣ ኣብ ናይ ህዝቢ መሕጸቢ ክፍሊ ኣብ ልዕሊ ኣዝዩ ውጽኢታዊ ዝኾነ ኣነቓቕጻ ገለ ክትዓት ኣሎ።
en-mt: Proper hand drying is an important part of the hand hygiene process. But there is some controversy over very effective drying in a public bathroom.

sourceString: A growing volume of research suggests paper towels are much more hygienic than the electric hand dryers found in many washrooms.
targetString: እቲ ዝዓቢ ዘሎ ብዝሒ ናይ መጽናዕቲታት ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ናይ ኢድ ሽጎማኒ ካብቲ ብ ማሽናት ዝግባር ምድራቕ ኣእዳው ኣዝዩ ዝበልጽ ውጽኢት ከምዘለዎ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: A growing number of studies have shown that hand rubs are far more effective than mechanical hand drying.

sourceString: In 2008, a study was conducted by the University of Westminster, London, and sponsored by the paper-towel industry the European Tissue Symposium, to compare the levels of hygiene offered by paper towels, warm-air hand dryers and the more modern jet-air hand dryers.
targetString: ኣብ 2008 ብ ወስት ሚኒስተር ለንደን ዩኒቨርሲቲ፡ ብ ናይ ሽንቲ ቤት ሶፍት ፋብሪካ ኤውሮፓዉያን ሶፍት ሲምፖሲዩም፡ ዝተመወለ ናይ ጽሬት ደረጃ መንቀጺ ጨርቂ ወይ ሶፍት ፡ ብምዉቕ ኣየር ኢድ መድረቒታትን ዘመናዊ መድረቒ  ንምዉድዳር መጽናዕቲ ተኻይዱ።
en-mt: In 2008, a study was conducted by the University of Westminster London, funded by the Toilet Soft Factory European Soft Symposium, to compare the quality of drying cloth or soft , with warm air hand dryers and modern dryers.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with the warm-air dryer, the total number of bacteria was found to increase on average on the finger pads by 194% and on the palms by 254%.
targetString: ድሕሪ ኢድ ምሕጻብን ብምዉቕ ኣየር ኢድ ምንቃጽን፡ ጠቕላላ ቁጽሪ ባክተርያ  (Bacteria) ኣብ ውሽጢ ኣጻብዕቲ ብገምጋም ብ 194% ከምኡ'ውን ኣብ ከብዲ ኢድ ብ 254% ወሲኹ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: After hand washing and drying hands with mild air, total bacterial counts increased by an average of 194% in the fingers and 254% in the abdomen of the hands.

sourceString: Drying with the jet-air dryer resulted in an increase on average of the total number of bacteria on the finger pads by 42% and on the palms by 15%.
targetString: ድርቀትን በለልታ መድረቒ ኣየርን ብ ገምጋም ጠቕላላ ምውሳኽ ቁጽሪ ባክተርያ  (Bacteria) ኣብ ኣጻብዕቲ ብ 42% ኣብ ከብዲ ኢድ ብ 15% ይውስኽ።
en-mt: Dryness and air pollution increase the average total bacterial count on fingers by 42% and on the abdomen of hands by 15%.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with a paper towel, the total number of bacteria was reduced on average on the finger pads by up to 76% and on the palms by up to 77%.The scientists also carried out tests to establish whether there was the potential for cross contamination of other washroom users and the washroom environment as a result of each type of drying method.
targetString: ድሕሪ ምሕጻብ ኢድን ብሶፍት ምድራቅን ጠቅላላ ቁጽሪ ናይ ባክተርያ  (Bacteria)  ብገምጋም ብ76% ኣብ ውሽጣዊ ኣጻብዕቲ ከምኡውን ኣብ ከብዲ ኢድ ብ77% ጎዲሉ ተረኺቡ።ስነ ፍልጠታውያን ውጽኢት ናይ ነፍስ ወከፍ ዓይነት መንቀጺ መንገዲ ንምርኣይ ካብ ሓደ ናብ ሓደ ናይ ምብካል ተክእሎ እቶም ናይ ምሕጸቢ ተጠቀምትን ናይ ምሕጸቢ ቦታን፡ምንባሩን ዘይምንባሩን መጽናዕቲ ኣካይዶም።
en-mt: After hand washing and soft drying, the total number of bacteria was reduced by an average of 76% on the inner fingers and 77% on the abdomen of the hands location and,existence and non-existence.

sourceString: The jet-air dryer, which blows air out of the unit at claimed speeds of 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph), was capable of blowing micro-organisms from the hands and the unit and potentially contaminating other washroom users and the washroom environment up to 2 metres away.
targetString: እቲ መንቐጺ ኣየር፡ ነቲ ኣየር ብ ፍጥነት ናይ ንፋስ፡ ካብ 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph) ክኺዶ ዝኽእል፡ ነቶም ደቀቕቲ-ታህዋኣስያን ካብ ኢድ ክኣልዮም ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ ነቶም መሕጸቢ ንብረታት ድማ ክሳብ 2 መትሮ ንሪሒቖም ክሳብ ዘለዎ በቲ ቫይረስ ክብክሎም ተኽእሎታት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: The air dryer, which can move the air at wind speeds from 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph), can remove the microorganisms from hands and keep the washing utensils up to 2 meters away from the virus It has the potential to contaminate them.

sourceString: Use of a warm-air hand dryer spread micro-organisms up to 0.25 metres from the dryer.
targetString: ውዕይ ኣየር ዝጥቀሙ ናይ ኢድ መንቀጺ ምጥቃም ነቶም ቫይረስ ክሳብ 0.25 ሜትሮ ክብትኖም ተኽእሎታት ኣሎ።
en-mt: The use of hot air hand dryers is likely to disperse the viruses up to 0.25 meters.

sourceString: Paper towels showed no significant spread of micro-organisms.In 2005, in a study conducted by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt, different hand drying methods were evaluated.
targetString: ናይ ወረቐት መጽረዪ ዝኾነ ናይ ቫይረስ ምስግጋር ተኽእሎ ኣየር ኣዩን። ኣብ 2005፡ ብ TÜV Produkt und Umwelt ኣብ ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ፡ ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ኢድ መንቀጺ መንገድታት ተፈቲኑን ተጸኒዑን።
en-mt: Paper cleaners are not likely to transmit any viruses to the air. In 2005, in a study by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt, different hand drying ways were tested and studied.

sourceString: The following changes in the bacterial count after drying the hands were observed:
targetString: ድሕሪ ምንቃጽ ኣእዳው እዞም ዝስዕቡ ናይ ባክተርያ  (Bacteria) ቁጽሪ ለውጢ ተራእዩ።
en-mt: The following changes in bacterial counts were observed after hand drying.

sourceString: Many different hand dryer manufacturers exist, and hand driers have been compared against drying with paper towels.
targetString: ብዙሓት ናይ ኢድ መንቀጺ መሳርሒታት ተሰሪሖም ኣለዉ፡ እቲ ውጽኢታውነት ናይ ኢድ መንቀጺ ምስ ሽጎማኖ ውን ተነጻጺሩ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Many hand dryers have been developed, and the effectiveness of hand dryers has also been compared with tires.

sourceString: Hand washing using hand sanitizing wipes is an alternative during traveling in the absence of soap and water.
targetString: ብ ናይ መምከኒ ጨርቂ ጌርካ ኣእዳው ምሕጻብ፡ ከም ኣማራጺ ሳሙና ወይ ማይ ኣብ ዘይህልወካ፡ እትጥቀመሉ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Washing your hands with a damp cloth is an alternative when you don't have soap or water.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizer should contain at least 60% alcohol.
targetString: ብ ኣልኮል ዝተሰርሐ ናይ ኢድ መምከኒ ብውሑዱ 60% ኣልኮል ክህልዎ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Alcohol-based hand sanitizer must contain at least 60% alcohol.

sourceString: Medical hand-washing became mandatory long after Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis discovered its effectiveness (in 1846) in preventing disease in a hospital environment.
targetString: ሕክምናዊ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ግዴታዊ ዝኾነሉ ምኽንያት፡ ድሕሪ እቲ ሃንጋርያዊ ተመራማሪ ኢግናዝ ሰመልወስ (Ignaz Semmelweis)፡ ውጽኢታውነቱ ኣብ ሕክምና (ኣብ 1846) ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ ሙካኑ ዘጽነዓሉ እዋን ኢዩ።
en-mt: Medical hand washing became compulsory after the Hungarian researcher Ignaz Semmelweis (in 1846) studied its medical effectiveness.

sourceString: There are electronic devices that provide feedback to remind hospital staff to wash their hands when they forget.
targetString: ነቶም ናይ ሆስፒታል ኣባላት ኢዶም ምሕጻብ ምስ ዝርስዕዎ እተዘኻኽር መሳርሒት ናይ ኤለክትሮኒክ ኣላ።
en-mt: There is an electronic device that reminds hospital staff if they forget to wash their hands.

sourceString: One study has found decreased infection rates with their use.
targetString: ሓደ መጽናዕቲ፡ ናይ ምብካል ናህሪ ከምዝጎደለ ምስ ኣጠቓቕምኡ ረኺቡ።
en-mt: One study found decreased fouling rates with its use.

sourceString: Medical hand-washing is for a minimum of 15 seconds, using generous amounts of soap and water or gel to lather and rub each part of the hands.
targetString: ሕክምናዊ ምሕጻብ ኢድ ንዝወሓደ 15 ደቓይቕ፡ብዙሕ ማይን ሳምናን ብምጥቃም ወይ ብብዙሕ ዓፍራ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ክፋል ኢድ ይፍሕፋሕ።
en-mt: Medical hand washing For at least 15 minutes, rub each part of the hand with plenty of soap and water or with plenty of soap.

sourceString: Hands should be rubbed together with digits interlocking.
targetString: ኣእዳው ነሓድሕደን ኣመሳቂልካ ክማዘዋ ኣለወን።
en-mt: Hands should be crossed and massaged.

sourceString: If there is debris under fingernails, a bristle brush may be used to remove it.
targetString: ኣብ ትሕቲ ጽፍሪ ኣጻብዕቲ ሰብን ጸጉሪ ብራሽን ክጠቅም ዝኽእል ፍርስራስ ኣሎ።
en-mt: There is debris under human fingernails and brush hairs that could be useful.

sourceString: Since germs may remain in the water on the hands, it is important to rinse well and wipe dry with a clean towel.
targetString: ናይ ማይ ጀርምታት ኣብ ልዕሊ ኣእዳው ክሳብ ዝጸንሑ፡ጽቡቕ ጌርካ ምሕጻብን ደሪዝካ ብጽሩይ ሽጎማኖ ምንቃጽን የድሊ።
en-mt: As long as water germs remain on hands,wash them thoroughly and dry them with a clean towel.

sourceString: After drying, the paper towel should be used to turn off the water (and open any exit door if necessary).
targetString: ድሕሪ ምንቃጽ፡ እቲ ሶፍቲ ነቲ ማይ ጠጠው ንምባል ክንጥቀመሉ ኣሎና (ከምኡውን መውጽኢ ምኽፋት ናይ ዝኾነ ካብቶም   መዕጸዊ ማዕጾ)።
en-mt: After drying, the softener must be used to stop the water (and the outlet opening of any of the door locks).

sourceString: This avoids re-contaminating the hands from those surfaces.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ነቲ ከም ብሓድሽ ዝመጽእ ምብካል ኣእዳው ይከላኸሉ።
en-mt: This prevents the reoccurring contamination of the hands.

sourceString: The purpose of hand-washing in the health-care setting is to remove pathogenic microorganisms ("germs") and avoid transmitting them.
targetString: እቲ ዕላማ ናይ ኢድ መሕጸቢ ኣብ ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን መወከሲ፡ ነቶም ሰበብ ሕማም ዝኾኑ ደቀቕቲ ``ጀርምታት`` ምእላይን ካብ ምምሕልላፍ ድማ ደው ምባልን ኢዩ።
en-mt: The purpose of hand sanitizer in a health care setting is to remove the tiny ``germs`` that cause disease and stop them from being transmitted.

sourceString: The New England Journal of Medicine reports that a lack of hand-washing remains at unacceptable levels in most medical environments, with large numbers of doctors and nurses routinely forgetting to wash their hands before touching patients, thus transmitting microorganisms.
targetString: ናይ ዓዲ እንግሊዝ ጆርናል ናይ ሕክምና ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ ኣብ ናይ ሕክምና ቦታታት መሕጸቢ ኣእዳው ዘውይምህላው ኻብቲ ዘይቅቡል ደረጃ ናይ ሕክምና ኢዩ ኢሉ፡ እዚ ድማ ብዙሓት ዶክተራትን ነርሳትን ኢደን ከይተሓጽባ ሕሙማት ክትንክፋ ኣብ ዝጂምራሉ እቲ ምትሕልላፍ ናይ ለበዳ ድማ ምስኡ ይውስኽ ሙኻኑ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The British Journal of Medicine said the lack of hand sanitizers in hospitals is one of the unacceptable standards of treatment, and that the transmission of the epidemic increases with it as more doctors and nurses start touching patients without washing their hands.

sourceString: One study showed that proper hand-washing and other simple procedures can decrease the rate of catheter-related bloodstream infections by 66 percent.The World Health Organization has published a sheet demonstrating standard hand-washing and hand-rubbing in health-care sectors.
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ ውድብ ጥዕና ግብራዊ መምዘኒ ምሕጻብ ኢድን ምፍሕፍሕ ኢድን ኣብ ክፋል ክንክን ጥዕና ኣሕቲሙ።ሓደ መጽናዕቲ ከምዘብርሆ ጉቡእ ኣተሓጻጽባ ኢድን ካለኦት ተወሰኽቲ ሜላታትን መጠን ናይ መተሓላለፊ ፈሳሲ ምስ ሰራውር ደም ዝተሓሓዝ ረኽስታት ብ 66 ሚእታዊት ክጎድለ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has published a practical guideline for hand washing and hand hygiene in the health care sector.

sourceString: The draft guidance of hand hygiene by the organization can also be found at its website for public comment.
targetString: እቲ ንድፊ ናይ ጽሬት ኣእዳው ብ ማሕበራት ኣብቲ ወብሳይታት ን ህዝባዊ ነቀፌታታት፡ ክርከብ ይከኣል፡
en-mt: The draft hand hygiene by associations can be found on the websites for public criticism,

sourceString: A relevant review was conducted by Whitby et al.
targetString: ዝመሳሰል መጽናዕቲ ብ ዊቲይን ካልኦትን (Whitby et al) ተተግቢሩ።
en-mt: A comparable study was implemented by Whitby et al.

sourceString: Commercial devices can measure and validate hand hygiene, if demonstration of regulatory compliance is required.
targetString: ናይ ዕዳጋ መሳርሒታት ነቲ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት ክምርምራን ከረጋግጻን ይኽእላ ኢየን፡ እዚ ድማ ኣገዳሲ ምትሕብባርን ናይ ተጠቃምነት እንተጌሩ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Marketing tools can check and verify the hand hygiene if it makes important cooperation and usefulness.

sourceString: The World Health Organization has "Five Moments" for washing hands:
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ ውድብ ጥዕና ንምሕጻብ ኣእዳው ሓሙሽተ ግዜ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization has five times to wash your hands.

sourceString: after exposure to blood/body fluids
targetString: ድሕሪ ናብ ደም/ኣካላት ፈሳሲ ምቕላዕ።
en-mt: After exposure to blood/body fluids.

sourceString: before an aseptic task, and
targetString: ቅድሚ ናይ ኣሰፕቲክ (aseptic) ስራሕ፡ ከምኡውን
en-mt: Before aseptic work, and

sourceString: after patient care.The addition of antiseptic chemicals to soap ("medicated" or "antimicrobial" soaps) confers killing action to a hand-washing agent.
targetString: ድሕሪ ናይ ተሓካሚ ምእላይ። ምውሳኽ ናይ ኣንቲሰፕቲክ (addition) ከሚካላት ናብ ሳሙና ("medicated" ወይ "antimicrobial" ሳሙናታት) ነቶም ኣብ ኢድ ዝርከቡ ተጋዳእቲ ታህዋስያን ክቕትል ተባሂሉ ኢዩ።
en-mt: After patient removal. The addition of antiseptic (addition) chemicals to soap ("medicated" or "antimicrobial" soaps) is meant to kill the infectious bacteria on the hands.

sourceString: Such killing action may be desired prior to performing surgery or in settings in which antibiotic-resistant organisms are highly prevalent.To 'scrub' one's hands for a surgical operation, it is necessary to have a tap that can be turned on and off without touching it with the hands, some chlorhexidine or iodine wash, sterile towels for drying the hands after washing, and a sterile brush for scrubbing and another sterile instrument for cleaning under the fingernails.
targetString: እዚ ዓይነት ናይ ሞት ንጥፈታት፡ ቅድሚ መጥባሕቲ ምናልባት  ክትግበር ይከኣል ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ እቶም ተጻረርቲ ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ኣዝዮም ብብዝሒ ስለ ዘለዉ ኢዮም። ን ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ኢድ ን መጥባሕቲ ኢልካ `ምጽራይ`፡ ኢዳካ ከይሓዝካ እትኽፈትን እትዕጾን ቡምባ፡ ገለ ክሎሮክሲዳይን (chlorhexidine) ወይ ናይ ኣዮዲን መሕጸቢ፡ መምከኒ ሽጎማኖ ን ምንቃጽ፡ ከምኡ`ውን መምከኒ ብሩሽ ንምእላይን ካልእ ናይ መምከኒ መሳርሒ ድማ ነቲ ኣብ ትሕቲ ጽፍቲ ዘሎ ርስሓት ንማእላይ ግድን፡ ክህሉ ግድን ኣልዎ።
en-mt: This type of euthanasia can probably be done before surgery because of the high number of antibiotic antagonists. For `cleaning` someone`s hand for surgery, a pump that opens and closes without holding your hand, some chlorhexidine or iodine rinse, a disinfectant for drying, and a disinfectant brush to remove and another disinfectant for the dirt under the nail To remove it must, it must exist.

sourceString: All jewelry should be removed.
targetString: ኩሎም መጋየጺታት ክእለዩ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: All decorations must be removed.

sourceString: This procedure requires washing the hands and forearms up to the elbow, usually 2–6 minutes.
targetString: እዚ መስርሕ እዚ ኣእዳው ን ቀላጽምን ክሳብ ጉምቦ ኢድ ካብ 2-6 ደቃይቅ ምምዛው ዘድልዮ ኣገባብ ናይ ምሕጻብ ኢዩ።
en-mt: This process is a method of washing hands and arms up to the wrist for 2-6 minutes.

sourceString: Long scrub-times (10 minutes) are not necessary.
targetString: ነዊሕ ናይ ምፍሕፋሕ ግዜ (10 ደቒቕ) ኣድላዪ ኣይኮነን።
