sourceString: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: ሓሳባዊ፡ ናይ ሕክምና ምክትታል ኣብቲ ናይ ውልቀሰብ መቀመጢ ቦታ ክቅጽል ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ ን ቤትትምህርትታትን ናይ ክንክን ቆልዑ መሳለጥያታትን ፡ CDC ፡ ካብ ዝተለክፉ ሰባት ዘለዉዎ ቤት-ትምህርቲ ምስዝምለስ ኣብ መዕጸዊ ንሓጺር ግዜ ምጽናሕን; መምከኒ ምጥቃምን ኣገዳሲ ሙኻኑ፡ ይመክር።
en-mt: Ideally, medical follow-up may continue at the individual's place of residence, for schools and child care facilities , CDC , and a short stay in lockdown upon return from a school with infected persons; and the importance of using excuses, he advises.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: ነቲ ናይ ኮሚኒቲ ምትሕልላፍ ዝወሓደ እኹል ቁጽሪ እንተደኣ ኣሎ፡ ማሕበራዊ ምርሕሓቕ ፡ ምቁራጽ ናይ ፊልድ ጉዕዞ፡ ምቁራጽ ኣኼባታትን ካልኦት ዓበይቲ ምትእኽኻባትን ከም ስፖርት ምትእኽኽብ ፡ ናይ መዝሙር ወይ ሙዚቃ ምትእኽኻብ ምቁራጽ፡ ኣብ መመገቢ ዝግበር ምትእኽኻብ ምቁራጽ፡ ዘየድልዩ ኣጋይሽ ካብ ምእታው ምክልካል፡ ከምኡውን ነቶም ምልክታት ሕማም ዘለዎም ቆልዑ ፍሉይ ክፍሊ ምድላውን ካልኦትን ክትግበሩ ዘለዎ ኣገደስቲ መስርሓት ምክልኻል ምስፍሕፋሓት ኢዮም
en-mt: If there is at least enough of the community transmission, social distancing , cancellation of field trips, cancellation of meetings and other large gatherings such as sports gatherings , cancellation of hymn or music gatherings, cancellation of dining gatherings, prevention of unwanted guests, and those symptoms Children with special classes and others are important preventive expansion processes that need to be implemented

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.
targetString: ኣብቲ ዞባዊ ኮሚኒቲ ሰፊሕ ዝኾነ ምትሕልላፍ ኣብዝህልወሉ፡ ከም ተወሳኺ ናይ ማሕበራዊ ምርሕሓቅ ስትራተጂታት፡ ዝተናውሐ ናይ ትምህቲ ቤታት ምዕጻው ውን ክህሉ ይኽእል ኢዩ። ን ናይ ሕጊ ተግባራውነት ፡ ውልቀሰባት መዓልታዊ ሂወቶም ዘካይዱን፡ ን ቅልጡፍ ናይ ጥዕና ሓደጋ ውሑድ ምቅላዕ ኣለዎም።እ
en-mt: Where there is widespread transmission in the regional community, there may also be extended school closures as additional social distancing strategies. For law enforcement , individuals who go about their daily lives, have less exposure to immediate health risks.e

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
targetString: እቶም ናይ ሕጊ ኣትግበርቲ ኣካላት ምስቶም ጥርጡራት ወይ ትሑዛት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ርክባት ኣብ ዝገብሩሉ፡ ነቲ መምርሒታት ብ ልክዕ ክኽተልዎን ከምኡውን ነቲ ናይ ውልቂ መከላኸሊ መሳርሒታት ብጉቡእ ክጥቀሙሉ ከም ዘለዎም ክንሕብር ንፈቱ
en-mt: Please note that law enforcement agencies should follow the instructions strictly and use personal protective equipment properly when dealing with suspected or infected persons

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: ኣብ ግዜ ምዝርራባት ኣዝዩ ምቅርራባት እንተደኣ ኣሎ፡ እቶም ሰራሕተኛታት ነቲ መሳርሒ ቁልፎም፡ ጊር ን ቅድሚ ካልኣይ ግዜ ምጥቃሞም ብ ስፕራይ ውይ ፊፍ ጌሮም ከምክንዎ ኣለዎም፡ ነቲ ናይ ምቁጽጻርን ናይ ምጉሓፍን ኣገባብ ወይ መስርሕ PPE ድማ ክስዕብዎ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: If there is excessive contact during conversations, employees must spray or spray their keys, gear and equipment before use a second time and follow the control and disposal procedures or PPE procedures.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: OSHA ነቶም ናት ክንክን ጥዕና ሰራሕተኛታትንክ ናይ መቃብር ሰራሕተኛታትን ፡ ኣብ ዝለዓለ ወይ ኣዝዩ ዝለዓለ ደረጃ ናይ ሓደጋ ተቃሊዖም ከም ዘለዉ ኢዩ ዝግምት።
en-mt: OSHA considers your health care workers and funeral workers , to be at a high or very high level of exposure.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: እቶም ኣዝዮም ቃልዓት ስረሓት ዝበሃሉ፡ ናይ ክንክን ጥዕና ምብጽጻሕ፡ ደገፍ፡ ላባራቶሪ፡ከምኡውን ነቶም ኣብ ኮቪድ-19 ቃልዕ ዝኾነ ኦታ ዝሰርሑ ናይ ሕክምና ሰራሕተኛታት ምብጽጻሕ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: The most vulnerable occupations may include health care visits, support, laboratories, and visits to medical staff working in OTA that is vulnerable to COVID-1

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: እዚኣቶም ኣዝዮም ን ሓደጋ ዝተቃልዑ ዝኾኑሉ እዋን፡ እቶም ሰራሕተኛታት ናይ ኣአረስቶል-መፍረዪ ነቲ ስርዓት ወይ ኣገባብ ብግቡእ እንተ ደኣ ስዒቦሞ፡ ወይ ውን ካብቶም ጥርጡራት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 እቲ ዘድሊ ቅምሶታት እንተደኣ ወሲዶም ፡ ኢዩ።
en-mt: These are most vulnerable when the Arestol-manufacturing staff follows the system or procedure properly, or if they take the necessary samples from the COVID-19 suspects

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ኣአረስቶል-ምፍራይ መስርሓት፡ ትቦ ምእታው፡ ምምሕዳር ናይ ሰዓል፡ ናይ ኣየር ምትሕልላፍ ኣ ሳንቡእ ምቁጽጻር፡ ገለ ናይ ስኒ ክንክን መስርሓትን ፈተነታትን ወይውን ዓቢ ናይ ቅምሶታት ምእካብ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: The arestol-production procedures may include intubation, cough administration, ventilation a lung control, some dental care procedures and tests or a large sample collection.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: ዓቢ ናይ ሓደጋ ምቅላዕ ዘለዉ ናይ ምቅባር ሬሳ ሰራሕተኛታት ፡ ኣብ ግዜ ሞቶም ብ ኮቪድ-19 ተለኺፎም ወይ ተጠርጢሮም ዝነበሩ ን ቀብሪ ዘዳልዉን ዝቀብሩን የጠቃልል፡ እዞም ሰባት ድማ እንተደ ኣ ኣኡቶስፓይ ኣካይዶም ን ሓደጋ ኣዝዮም ዝተቃልዑ ይኾኑ። ከም ተወሳኺ ድማ ናይ ኢንጂነሪንግ ምቁጽጻር ነዞም ናይ ሓደጋ ሰራሕተኛታት ነዞም ዝስዕቡ የጠቃልል፡ ብ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተለኽፉን ተለኺፎም ክኾኑ ተኽእሎታት ዘለዎምን፡ ነቶም ናይ ኣአረስቶል-መመንጨውቲ ኣገባባት ዘጠቃለለ ድማ ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Funeral workers at high risk include those who prepare and bury funeral workers who were infected or suspected of being infected with COVID-19 at the time of their death, and these people are at high risk if they conduct an autospy. In addition, engineering controls for these hazard workers include the following: infected and likely to be infected with COVID-19, and may include the Arestol-generating systems.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: ኣብ ገለ ናይ ጥዕና ማእከላትን መካነ-ሬሳ ን ፡ ፍሉይ ኣሉታዊ ጸቅጢ ናይ ንፋስ ምንብድባድ ምጥቃም ጽቡቕ ይመስል
en-mt: In some health centers and mortuaries , it seems good to use special negative pressure ventilation

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: እቲ ቅምሶታት ብ መሰረት መምርሒ ናይ ባዮሳፍቲ (ናይ ስነ-ሂወት ውሕስነት) ኣገባብ ክተሓዝ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: The samples must be handled in accordance with biosafety guidelines.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ከምዝሓበሮ፡ እቶም ክሕከሙ ኢሎም ዝመጹ ኣብ መጻበዪ ቦታ፡ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ቫይረስ ልኹፋት ከይኮኑ ዝተጠርጠሩ እንተኾይኖም ተፈላልዮም ክጽበዩ ኣለዎም ኢሉ ከም ተወሳኺ PPE, OSHA ፡ ነቶም ፡ ኣብ 6 ፊት ናይ ርሕቀት ኮይኖም ዝሰርሑን፡ ጥርጡራት ወይ ድማ ልኹፋት ናይ SARS-CoV-2ሰራሕተኛታት/ኣባላት ነቲ ናይ መተንፈሲ መሸፈኒ ክጥቀሙን፡ እቲ ናይ ኣአረስቶል መምርሒታት ክኽተሉን ይሕብር
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has said that those who come for treatment should wait separately in the waiting area if they are suspected of being infected with the COVID-19 virus as additional PPE, OSHA , for those who , work at a distance of 6 feet and suspected or infected of SARS-CoV-2recommends that employees/members wear the respirator mask and follow the Arestol instructions

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ (U.S.)፡ ብ NIOSH ዝተረጋገጸ N95 ኣጻራዪ መስተንፈሲ ናይ ገጽ ማስክ ወይ`ውን ካብኡ ዝበልጽ ዓይነት ማስክ፡ ኣብ ግዜ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ምክልኻል መደብ ን ናይ ብቁዕነት ፈተናታትን፡ ስልጠናታት ከምኡውን ናይ ሕክምና ፈተናታት፡ ክንጥቀመሎም ኣሎና
en-mt: In the United States (US), a NIOSH-approved N95 respirator face mask or better type of mask must be used during respiratory protection programs and fitness tests, training and medical examinations

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: እቶም ካል ኦት ዓይነት መስተንፈሲታት ፡ ዝተመሓየሸ ሓለዋን ምክልኻልን ናይ ስራሕ ምቹእነትን፡ ክህቡኻ ይኽእሉ፡፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO); ነቶም ምሉእ ብ ምሉእ ዝሽፍኑ ምጥቃም ኣየማኽርን፡ እዚ ድማ ውላ`ካ ኮቪድ-19 ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሕማም እንተኾነ፡ ካብ ምስትናፋስ ንላዕሊ ብ ነጠብጣብ ናይ ፈሰስሊ ስለ ዝመሓላለፍ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The Cal Oat type respirators can provide you with improved protection and comfort. World Health Organization (WHO); I do not recommend using those that fully cover, because although COVID-19 is a respiratory disease, it is transmitted by droplets of fluid rather than by breathing.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ንቲ ነጥቢ-ናይ-መእተዊ ንምክልኻል፡ ናይ መጥባሕቲ ማስክ/መሸፈኒ ክንጥቀም ይመክር።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends the use of a surgical mask/cover to protect the point-of-entry.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: ነቶም ኣብ ክንክን ዘለዉ፡ ኣብ ምስግጋር ናይ ቦታ ዘለዉ ልኹፋት ኮቪድ-19 ብዘይ ኣአረስቶ-ምፍራይ መስርሕ፡ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ቅምሶታት ትእክቡ ዘለኹም፡ ትከናኸኑ ዘለኹም፡ ወይ`ውን ኣብ ምስግጋር ሕሙማት ትሕግዙ ዘለኹም፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ናይ መጥባሕቲ ማስክ፡ መነጸር፡ ወይ መሸፈኒ፡ ጋውን፡ ከምኡውን ጋንቲ ክትጥቀሙ የተሓሳስብ።
en-mt: For those of you in care, collecting respiratory samples, caring for, or assisting in the transfer of patients without the arrest-production process, the World Health Organization (WHO) is providing surgical masks, goggles, or cover, gown, and gloves.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: እንተደኣ እቶም ናይ ኣአረስቶል-መፍረዪ ኣገባባት ተሰሪሖም፡ እቲ ናይ መጥባሕቲ ዝጥቀሙሉ ማስክ ብ N95 ወይ FFP2 መስተንፈሲ ፡ ክቅየር ኢዩ።
en-mt: If the Arestol-producing procedures are performed, the surgical mask will be replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: እቲ ዓለማዊ ናይ PEE ቀረብ እኩል እካ እንተዘይኮነ፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም WHO ብ ተለ-መዲስን፡ መከላኸሊ ከም ቬትሮ፡ ናብቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ክንክን ክፍሊ ዝኣትዉ ሰባት ምጉዳል፡ እቲ PEE ን ፍሉይ ስራሕ ጥራይ ምጥቃም፡ ነቲ ለቢስካዮ ዘለካ መስተንፈሲ ኣብ ግዜ ስራሕ ኣብ መንጎ ዘይምውጻእ ወላ`ውን ብዙሓት ተሓከምቲ ይምጹካ፡ ነቲ ናይ PEE ቀረባት ምቁጽጻርን ምውህሃድን፡ ከምኡውን እቲ ምልክታት ሕማም ዘይብሉ ሰብ ክጥቀመሉ ከም ዘይብሉ ምንጋር፡ ብምትግባር ነቲ ነቲ ድሌታት ናይ PPE ከጉድሉ ይኽእል ኢዩ.
en-mt: Although the global supply of PEE is inadequate, the World Health Organization (WHO) has recommended tele-medicine, protection such as vetro, reducing the number of people entering the COVID-19 care unit, using the PEE only for specific purposes Not going out even if you have many patients coming to you, controlling and coordinating the PEE supplies, and telling the person without symptoms not to use it, can reduce the the need for PPE by implementing it.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: ካብ፡ ካተሪን ማሀር፡ ዊኪመድያ (Wikimedia) መስራቲ ሓላፊ CEO
en-mt: From: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Founding CEO

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: ናብ፡ ኩሎም ናይ ዊኪመድያ (Wikimedia) መሰረት ሰራሕተኛታት
en-mt: To, all Wikimedia foundation staff

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: መስመር ኣርእስቲ፡ [ኮቪድ-19] ነቲ ጽዕነት/ጭንቀት ምብራህን ፡ ንመጻኢ ምድላውን።
en-mt: Subject line: [COVID-19] Lightening the burden/anxiety and , preparing for the future.

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: ስደዶ ዕለት/ግዜ፡ ኣብ 14 መጋቢት, 2020, 00:24 UTC
en-mt: Send Date/Time: March 14, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: ሕጋዊ ፍቓድ፡ CCO; ዝኾነ መሰል ዝተሓለወ ኢዩ
en-mt: legal license: CCO; Any rights reserved

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: ኣብዚ ከነታት እዚ ንነብስና ኣብ ጉሉሕ ኩነታት ረኺብናያ።
en-mt: In this situation, we found ourselves in a critical situation.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ ናይ ኮቪድ-19፡ ነዛ ዓለማዊ ሰብኣዊ ርክባት ዘነጽርን ነቲ ኣብ መንጎ ደቂ ሰባት ዘሎ ሓላፍነታዊ ምትእስሳር ዝድርዕን ኢዩ።
en-mt: This pandemic of COVID-19 clarifies this global human relationship and reinforces the responsible bond between human beings.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: ዝኾነ ነቲ መሰናኽል ዝከውን ኣብነት የብልናን፡ እንተኾነ ግን እቲ ናትና ዝበለጸ ግብረ-መልሲ ኣብቲ ናይ ዓለማዊ ምድንጋጽ ፡ ምትሕብባር፡ ከምኡውን ኣብ ማእከል ናይዚ ማሕበር ምትካል ኮሚኒቲ ገዛውቲ ፡ ዝተመርኮሰ ኢዩ
en-mt: We don't have any examples of the barrier, but our best response is based on global compassion, cooperation, and the establishment of community homes at the heart of this association

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: እቲ ዕርክነት ብጻይነትን ሓልዮትን ኣብ መንጎ ኩሎም መሳርሕትና፡ ብ ኢማኢል፡ ደወል ተለፎን፡ ከምኡውን ዝረኣናዮ ኣብ ዝርርብ ፡ ምስዞም መሳርሕቲ ኣብ ሓደ ቦታ ኮይና ንሰርሕ ምህላውናን ፡ ሰብኣውነቶም ድማ ክሳብ ኽንደይ ሓጋዚ ሙኻኑን መረጋገጺ ኢዩ
en-mt: The friendship, camaraderie and care among all our colleagues, by email, phone call, and what we saw in conversation , is proof that we are working in the same place with these colleagues and how helpful their humanity is

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: ነቶም ኩሎም መሳርሕተይ ኣመስጊነ ክጸግቦም ኣይከኣልኩን።
en-mt: I cannot thank all my colleagues enough.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን፡ ሓደ ሰብ ነዚ ስራሕና ዘለዎ ኣድናቆት ገሊጹለይ።
en-mt: Last week, someone expressed his appreciation for our work.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: ኣብዚ ሕጂ እዋን ዓለም ናይ ናይ ዊኪፐድያ ሓበሬታታት ክትጽጋዕ ከም ዘለዋ ን እዚ ድማ ክሳብ ክንደይ ሓይሊን ኣገዳስነትን ከም ዘለዎ ዘኪረ፡ እዚ ኣገዳሲ ምልክት ድማ ኣብ ናይ ኦንላይን መስመር ን ጠለብ ናይ ተጠቀምቱ ከማልእን ክጸንሕ ክሳብ ክንደይ ኣገዳሲ ምኻኑ ተረዲአ
en-mt: I remembered how powerful and important the world of Wikipedia's information is today, and how important it is for this important brand to remain online and meet the demands of its users

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: እቲ ናትካ ስረሓት ድማ ነዚ ነገር እዚ ከም ዝከናወን ይገብሮ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ትሰርሓሉ ቦታ ኣብ ስራሕ ከም ዝቕጽል ምግባርን ክኸውን ይኽእል፡ ወይድማ ነቶም መሳርሕትና ወይ ኮሚኒትና ደሞዞም ኣብ ትኸፍለሉ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Your job makes this happen, whether it is keeping your workplace in operation, or paying our colleagues or community members.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: ኣብዚ ሕጂ እዋን ዓለምና ዊኪፐድያ ዘዳለዎ ሓበሬታ፡ ካብ ካልእ ግዜ ንላዕሊ የገድሳ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Today, the world is more interested in the information provided by Wikipedia than ever before.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: ኣብሲ እዋን እዚ ከመይ ጌርና ነገራት ንገብሮም ጥራይ ዘይኮነ፡ እቲ ንገብሮ ዘለና ውን ሓደ ኣዝዩ ዓቢ ጽልዋ ኣብ ዓለምና ከምጽእ ይኽእእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Not only how we do things at this time, but what we are doing can have a huge impact on our world.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: ሳላ ኣገዳስነት ናይዚ ሚሽን፡ ካብ ዝመጽእ ሰሙን ጀሚርና፡ ኣብ ኣሰራርሓ ጉዳያትና ፡ ከመይ ኢልና ብሓባር ክንሰርሕ ከም ዘለናን፡ ኣዝዩ ዓቢ ለውጢታት ከነታኣታቱ ኢና።
en-mt: Thanks to the importance of this mission, starting next week, we will introduce major changes in the way we work together.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: ምቅይያራት ን ስራሕን መደባትን።
en-mt: Changes to work and programs.

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: ሮቢን ቅድሚ ሕጂ ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ እቲ ናይ C ጋንታ ትማሊ ተራኺባ ኔራ፡ እቲ ምርኻብ ድማ፡ ነዘን ናይ መጻኢ መዓልታትን ወርሓትን እንታይ ዓይነት መንገዲታትን መደባትን ክትግበር ከም ዘለዎ ንምዝርራብ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Robin previously reported that the C team met yesterday, and that meeting was to discuss what ways and plans should be implemented for these future days and months.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: ኣብዚ ዝርርብ፡ እቲ ንዛረቦ ዘለናን ነቲ ዝመጸና ዘሎ ግቡእ ግብረ-መልሲ ምኻኑ ኢና ንሓስብ፡ ናይዚ ውድብ ቀጻልነቱ ኣብ ምውሓስ ድማ፡ እዚ እቲ ዝበለጸ መንገዲ ኢዩ፡
en-mt: In this conversation, we think that what we are saying is the right reaction to what is coming to us, and this is the best way to ensure the continuity of this party:

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: ደስ እና በለና፡ ነቲ ዘሎ ጸቅጢ ክንኣሊን ነዚ ዝካየድ ዘሎ ነዊሕ ጠመተ ዘለዎ ተልእኾ ክንድግፍን ንደሊ ኢና።
en-mt: We are pleased to relieve the pressure and support this long-term mission.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: እንተደኣ ከም እንደገና ክትድውል ከለካ፡ ዘሸግር ኣይኮነን።
en-mt: If you call again, it's not a problem.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: ን ኩሎም ኣባላትን፡ ኮንትራክተራትን፡ ከምኡውን ሰራሕተኛታት፡
en-mt: To all members, contractors, and employees,

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: እቶም መዓልታዊ ናይ ስራሕ ተጽቢታት ኣብ መዓልቲ 4 ሰዓታት ኢዮም ፡ ወይውን 20 ሰዓታት ኣብ ሰሙን ክሳብ ሓዲሽ ሓበሬታ ዝመጻና።
en-mt: The daily work expectations are 4 hours per day , or 20 hours per week until further notice.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: ዕረፍቲ ኢልና ኣይንእውጅን ኢና- እንተደኣ ካብቲ ልሙድ ሰዓታት ንላዕሊ ክትሰርሕ ደሊኻ ፡ እዚ ተልእኾ ክጥቀመልካ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: We do not declare vacations – if you want to work longer than usual hours, this mission can be useful.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: እነትኾነ ግን ኣብዚ ሕጂ እዋን ናይ ዓለምና መጻኢ ኣይግመትን ኢዩ፡ ናቶም ትፈትዎም ክትከናኸን ምስ እትደሊ፡ ክትሽምት ምስ እትደሊ፡ ወይውን ናብ ዶክተር ክትከይድ ምስ እትደሊ፡ ናትካ ውሕስነት ኣዝዩ ኢዩ ዘገድሰና
en-mt: However, the future of the world is unpredictable right now, and if you want to take care of their loved ones, shop, or go to the doctor, we are very concerned about your safety

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: ነቲ ናትካ ግዜ ኣይንከታተሎን ኣሎና።
en-mt: We are not tracking your time.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: ሓሚምካ እንተለኻ ኣይትስራሕ።
en-mt: Don’t work if you’re sick.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: እዚ ከይተዘርበሉ ክኸይድ/ክጠፍእ ኢዩ ዘለዎ።
en-mt: This should go unmentioned/disappear.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: ዝኾነ ናይ ዕረፍቲ ግዜ ወይ PTO ኣየድልን- ነቲ ኣማሓዳሪ ጥራይ ሓብሮ፡ ከምኡውን እቲ ኣገዳሲ መዓልታት ናይ ስራሕ መታን ክሽፈን ነቶም ጉጅለኻ ነቲ ካላንደር ክፍትሽዎ ሓግዞም
en-mt: No vacation time or PTO is required- just inform the trustee, and help your group check the calendar so that the important days of work are covered

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (እንተደኣ ብ ኮቪድ-19 ተለኺፍካ ኣሎካ በጃኻ ብራያን ምስ T&C Ops ይፍለጥ ስለዚ T&C ነቲ ኩነታትካ ኣብ ምምዕርራይን ግቡእ ኣድህቦ ኣብ ምሃብን ክሕግዝዘካ ይኽእል )
en-mt: (If you are infected with COVID-19 please contact Brian with T&C Ops so T&C can help you adjust to your situation and give it proper attention.)

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: እቶም ናይ ሰዓታት ሰራሕተኛታት ሙሉእ ብ ሙሉእ ክኽፈሉ ኢዮም።
en-mt: The hourly workers will be paid in full.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: ከምቲ ኣቀዲምና ዝጠቀስናዮ፡ ነቲ ን ኮንታካራትናን ናይ ሰዓታት ሰራሕተኛታትናን ዝኣተናሎም መብጸዓ ከነተግብሮ ሙካንና ኢዩ።
en-mt: As mentioned earlier, we will keep our promises to our contractors and hourly employees.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: ኩሉ ሰብ ልክዕ ከምቲ ኣብ ካልእ ልሙድ ግዜ ብ ሰዓታት ዝኽፈሎ ዝነበረ ገንዘብ ክኽፈል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Everyone will be paid the same hourly rate as they would have been in other normal times.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ክትሓምም እንከለኻን፡ ምንቅስቃስ ክትስእን እንከለኻን ዘጠቃለለ ኢዩ።
en-mt: This includes when you are sick and, when you lose mobility.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: ክትሰርሕ እንተደኣ ደሊኻ፡ ክንሕግዘካ ንኽእል ኢና።
en-mt: If you want to work, we can help you.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: ዝበዝሑ ሰባት ን ስራሕ ከም መውጽኢ ጭንቀቶም ናብ ዓለምን ናባናን ይጥቀሙሉ።
en-mt: Most people use work as an outlet for their anxiety to the world and to us.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: ኣብዞም ግዚያት እዚኣቶም እንገብሮም ነገራት ኣዝዮም ጠቀምቲ ክኾኑ ከም ዝኽእሉ ይሕበር ኢዩ።
en-mt: It is said that what we do at these times can be very useful.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: እንደገና፡ እዚ ብዛዕባ ርእስኻ-ምክንኻን ኢዩ።
en-mt: Again, this is about self-care.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: እቲ ናትና ስራሕ ምስቲ ናትካ ማናጀር ምርካብ ኢዩ፡ ስለዚ ድማ እንታይ ይመጽእ ከም ዘሎ ፈሊጥና ምምዕርራያት ክንገብር።
en-mt: Our job is to meet with your manager, so we know what's coming and make adjustments.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ስረሓት ከም ኣዝዮም ኣገደስቲ ይቑጸሩ።
en-mt: Some tiles are considered very important.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ነገራት ኣለዉ ቀጻሊ ክንገብሮም ዘሎና
en-mt: There are some things we need to keep doing

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: እቶም SRE, HR Ops, Trust ን ampን; ናይ ውሕስነትን ምውጻእ ገንዘብን ጉጅለ፡ ተወሳኺ ደገፍ ዘድልዮ ኣዝዩ ወሳኒ ስረሓት የካይዱ።
en-mt: the SRE, HR Ops, Trust and amp; The underwriting and disbursement team perform critical functions that require additional support.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: ምስ ኩሎም ክፍሊታት ኮይንና ነቲ ናይ ሕጂ ዕላማታትን ነቲ ናትና ጉዳያት ደገፍቲ ዝኾኑ ነገራትን ክንማኸረኮም ክንጂምር ኢና።
en-mt: We will begin to consult with all departments on the current goals and the things that support our issues.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ ዝግበር ነገር ኣሎና፡ ኣብቲ ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ ጉዳይ ጥራይ ነድህብ።
en-mt: We have so much to do, let's just focus on the most important issues.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: ሕጂ ቀስ ብምባልካ ኣይትጉዳእን ኢኻ።
en-mt: Now you won't get hurt by slowing down.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ሓንሳብ ምስ ሓለፈ፡ ``ዕጽፊ ግዜ ን ምሓዝ`` ዝብል መደብ ኣይነተግብርን ኢና።
en-mt: Once the pandemic has passed, we do not implement a ``double time to catch up`` program.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: ነቶም ናይ መወዳእታ ሰዓታት ንክትበጽሖም ወይ ንኸተርክቦም ተወሳኺ ሰዓታት ክትሰርሕ ኣይክትግደድን ኢኻ።
en-mt: You will not have to work overtime to meet or meet those deadlines.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: ኩነታት ከም ዝተቀየረ እና ተረዳእና፡ ነዚ ብዝጥዕም ድማ ሓድሽ መደባት ዕላማታትን ዝሕዘ መምርሒ ከነውጽእ ሙኻና ንሕብር።
en-mt: We understand that circumstances have changed and will be issuing guidelines with new programs and objectives accordingly.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: ምስ APP (ዓመታዊ መደባት) እንታይ ኣጋጢሙ ፥
en-mt: What happened with the APP (annual plans),

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: ነቲ ሓድሽ ክውንነትን መዓልታዊ ትጽቢታት ናይ ስራሕ ሰዓታት ንምትዕርራይ፡ ነቲ ናይ 2020-2021 ዓመታዊ መደብ ናይ ምብጽጻሕ ከነተዓራርዮ መደብ ኣሎና
en-mt: We plan to adjust the 2020-2021 annual delivery schedule to adjust to the new reality and daily expectations of working hours

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: ቀንዲ ዕላማና ነቲ ናይ 2019-20 መደብ ንምንዋሕ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ባጀት ነዊሕ ግዜ ብምሃብ ናይ ሰራሕተኛታት ፡ቀዳምነታት ይሰርዕ፡ ነብሰ ምሕላው ክገብሩ ይመክር፡ ምስ ፈተውቶም ዘለዎም ርክባት ንምስፋሕ ድማ እኹል ናይ ዕረፍቲ ግዜ፡ ክሳብ ናይ መጻኢ 2 ሰሙን፡ ይሰርዕ
en-mt: Our main goal is to extend the 2019-20 program, which gives the budget a longer period of time to prioritize staff, advise them to take care of themselves, and provide enough vacation time, up to the next 2 weeks, to expand their relationships with friends

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ታይምላይን ምንዋሕ ነቲ ህሉው ናይ ናይ ስራሕ-ጽዕነት መደባት ከምዘቃልል ን ኣብ መንጏ እተን ማሕበራት ድማ ጸቕጢ ከም ዘጉድል ተፈሊጡ
en-mt: The timeline extension will ease the existing workload schedules and reduce pressure between the associations

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: ነቲ ናትና እማመ ፡ ዝመጽእ ሰሙን ናብቲ ቦርድ ከነቅርቦ ኢና ከምኡውን ነቶም ወከልትና ጋንታናን ፡ መረጋገጺ ክሳብ ዝረኸብና፡ ሓድሽ ሓበሬታ ክንቅርበሎም ኢና።
en-mt: We will present our proposal to the board next week and will update our representatives and team until we receive confirmation.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: ነቶም ናይ ኮምፒተር ፕሮግራም ዘዳልዉ ጉጅለ በቲ ናይ መሪሕነት ስራሕኩም ነመስግነኩም።
en-mt: We thank the computer programming team for your leadership work.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: ናይ ኦፊስ ሃለዋት፡ ምቅላዕ ን ምጽራይን።
en-mt: Office conditions, exposure and clearance.

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ሓደ ካብቶም SF-ተመርኮሶም ዝሰርሑ መሳርሕቲና ናብቲ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተባህለ ዓይነት ቫይረስ ተቃሊዑ ክኸውን ከም ዝኽእል ፈሊጥና።
en-mt: Last week we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን፡ ካብ ክቱር ምጥንቃቅ፡ ኣብ ናይ ሳን-ፍራንቺስኮ ኦፊስ ናይ ጸረ-ቫይረስ ምምካን ዝስርሖም ጉጅለ ንስራሕ ቆጺርና ኣሎና።
en-mt: However, out of extreme caution, we have hired an antivirus team in the San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: ነቲ ባይታ ንምምካን ፡ ናይ ሕክምና ደረጃ ዘለዎ ጸረ-ቫይረስ ተጠቂሞም፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ኮሮድዮ ፡ መሳልል ናይ ባንክ ዘዳሉ ባይታ ፡ ዘጠቃለለ ኢዩ።
en-mt: They used a medical-grade antivirus to disinfect the floor, which included the corodio, the floor that prepares the bank ladder.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: እዚ ገዛ ነቶም ሰራሕተኛታት ዝሕግዙ ፍርያት ብምጥቃም፡ ናይ በይኑ ስረሓት ናይ ክንክን ፕሮቶኮል ከፊሉ ይሰርሕ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The home is using products to help the workers, paying for its own care protocol.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: እቲ ኦፊስ ክንምለሰ ኣብ እንውስነሉ እዋን ንስራሕ ድሉው ምስ ዝኸውን ምቹእነት ይስመዓና ኢዩ።
en-mt: We feel comfortable when the office is ready to work when we decide to return.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: ናይ DC ኦፊስና ኣብ ዊ-ዎርክ ኢዩ ዝርከብ፡ ምሳናን ምስ ናይ DC ምርኩስ ኣባላትን ድማ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ፕሮቶኮል ተለዋዊጡ።
en-mt: Our DC office is located in Wi-Work and has exchanged COVID-19 protocols with us and DC dependent members.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን፡ ናይ ዋሺንግቶን ዲሲ (DC) ኦፊስና ናብቲ ሙሉእብ ሙሉእ ርሑቅ ዝተዳለወ ግዒዙ ፡ እዚ ድማ ምስቲ ናይ ሳን-ፍራንሲስኮ መምርሒታት ዝኸይድ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Last week, our Washington, DC office moved to a fully remote location , which is in line with San Francisco guidelines.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ካብቶም ናይ NYC-ዝተመርኮሱ መስርሕትና ኸም ዝፈልጥዎ፡ ኣብ ብሮክሊን ብዛዕባ ምክራይ ገዛ/ቦታ ከም ዝተዘራረብና ኢዩ።
en-mt: As some of our NYC-based processors know, we have discussed renting a house/space in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: እዞም ዝርርባት ቀጸልቲ ኢዮም ግን ክደናጎዩ ይኽእሉ ኢዮም።
en-mt: These conversations are ongoing but may be delayed.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ካብ መሳርሕትና ብ ርሑቅ ኮይኖም ን መጀመርያ ግዜ ምሳና ይሰርሑ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Some of our colleagues are working with us remotely for the first time.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: እቶም ናይ ነዊሕ ዓመታት መሳርሕትና እዚ ለውጢ ክኸውን ከም ዝኽእሉ ይፈልጡን፡ ከምኡውን ገለ ምኽርታት ክህቡ ይደልዩን።
en-mt: Our longtime colleagues know that this can be a change, and would like to offer some advice.

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: እቲ ለውጢ ናይ ኣኼባ ኣብ ሓደ ክሳብ ክልተ ሰዓታት ዝነውሐ፡ ከም ዝኸውን ግበሮ።
en-mt: Make the change of meeting in one to two hours longer, happen.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: እንተደኣ ዝነውሑ ግዚያት ተደልዮም፡ ኣብ ውሽጢ ገለ ግዚያት ከመይ ከምዝመቓቐሉ ተረዳእ።
en-mt: If longer periods are required, understand how they are divided over a period of time.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: እቲ ንጹርነት ነቲ ናይ ኣኼባ ኣጀንዳ ይውስኖ፡ ከምኡውን ናይ ምንባብ መሳርሒታት ከም መወሰኽታ ይሰድድ።
en-mt: The clarity determines the meeting agenda, and sends reading materials as add-ons.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: ነቲ ቪድዮ ብ ናይ ጎግልን ዙም ን ጌርካ ከም ዝኽፈት ጌርካ ነቲ ቀጥታ ምትሕብባርን ምምትሕግጋዝን ከተቀላጥፎ ይከኣል ኢዩ
en-mt: The video can be opened with Google and Zoom to speed up the live collaboration

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: ን ነፍሲ ወከፍ ኣኼባ ከተቃላጥፎ መርሕነት ሓዝ፡ ገሌኹም ድማ ነቲ ዝርርባት ሕቶታትን ንምምሕዳር ንጠፉ፡ ገሌኹም ውን ጸብጻብ ክትሕዙ (ወይውን ኣብ ጸብጻብ ምሓዝ ተሓጋገዙ።)
en-mt: Take the lead in speeding up each meeting, and some of you will be involved in managing the conversations and questions, and some of you will be keeping reports (or helping to keep reports.)

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: ምቹእ ናይ እዝኒ መስምዒ እንተደሊኻ፡ ናብቶም ናይ ተክኖሎጂ ደገፍ ዝህቡ ኢመይል ስደድ።
en-mt: If you need comfortable hearing aids, send an email to tech support.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: እቲ ህሉው ኩነታት ጥዕናካ ብምጥቃም ነቲ ቅርፍራፍ ናይ ቁስልኻ ኣሕውዮ።
en-mt: Use your current state of health to heal the crust of your wound.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: ምስቶም ዘለዉ መሳርሕትኻ ብዛዕባ እቲ ፋሕ ኢሉ ዘሎ ስረሓት ንምዝርራብ ናብ #remoties ቻነል ተወከስ
en-mt: Visit the #remoties channel to chat with your existing colleagues about the scattered tiles

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: እዚ ናይ HR ናይ ስራሕ ጉጅለ፡ ሓደ ኣብ ወቢናር ወይ ኣኼባ ዝተመርኮሰ ናይ ኤርጎኖሚካዊ (ስሉጥነት ንምስራጽን ዝተነድፈ) መምርሒ ክህብ ይዳሎ ኣሎ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ኣብ መሰረት ዘይተጠራነፈ ስራሓት ንምድጋፍ ኢዩ።
en-mt: This HR working group is preparing to provide a webinar or meeting-based ergonomic (designed to instill efficiency) guide to support the work that is not integrated into the foundation.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: ኣብዚ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን፡ ነቶም ኩሎም ናይ ኮሚኒቲ ሓገዝ ዝወሰዱ፡ ነቲ ናይ ዊኪመድያ-ደገፍ ናይ ህዝባዊ ፍጻሜታት ከቃርጽዎ ተሓቲቶም፡ እዚ ድማ ከም አዲታቶን፡ ክሳብ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) እዚ ለበዳ ተወዲ ኡ ኢሉ ዝእውጅ።
en-mt: This past week, all those who have received community assistance have been asked to suspend Wikimedia-supported public events, such as Aditaton, until the World Health Organization (WHO) declares the outbreak over.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: ነቲ ናይ ምቁራጽ ጠለብናን ካልእ ሕጽረታትናን ነቲ ዝተሰማምዑሉ ናይ ህያብ ንጥፈታት ን ንምፍጻም ኣዝዩ ኣሸጋሪ ክገብሮ ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ ከምኡ`ውን ዝኾነ ነዚ ዕላማታት እዚ ዘደናጎየን ዝቀየረን ክቅጻዕ ከም ዘይብሉ ዘጠቃልል ጠለብ ኢዩ ኔሩ
en-mt: It included that our termination requirement and other deficiencies could make it very difficult to carry out the agreed gift activities, and that anyone who delayed or altered these objectives should not be punished

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: ኣብ ዝመጽእ ሰሙን፡ ብ ሓደሽቲ መምርሒታት ኣብ ዊኪመድያ (Wikimedia) ን ካልኦት ናይ ዞባ ኣነቃቃሒ ኮንፈረንሳትን ጌርና፡ ክንሕብርን ክንስዕብ ኢና ።
en-mt: Next week, we will be informing and following up with new guidelines on Wikimedia and other regional motivational conferences

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: እቲ ሓፈሻዊ ስምዒት ካብ ከባቢ ዓለምና ኮሚኒቲ፡ በቲ ሓደ ወገን ምርባሽ ዘምጸኦ ሓዘን ክኸውን እንከሎ፡ በቲ ካልእ ወገን ድማ በቲ ኣብ ናይ ግሎም ኮሞኒቲ፡ዊኪመድያ (Wikimedia) ን ካልኦትን ዝገብርዎ ኣተኩሮ ብምርኣይ ተዛማዲ ቅሳነት ይስምዕም።
en-mt: The overall feeling from the community around the world is one of sadness over the disturbance on the one hand, and relative calmness on the other, given their focus on their own community, Wikimedia and others.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: ንቅድሚት ብምኻድ፡ CRT ነቲ ናይ ገጽ ሰታፕ መታ-ዊኪ (Meta-wiki)በቲ ኮሞኒቲ ክመሓደርን ክጽሎን ከምኡውን ምስኦም ዘለና ርክባት ክሰዓብ ይገብር።
en-mt: Going forward, CRT will have the page setup meta-wiki managed and influenced by the community and track our interactions with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: ምስ ኣብ ጥቃ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተቃልዐ ቦታ ምጽናሕ ዘሎ ጸገማት
en-mt: with the difficulties of staying near a COVID-19 exposed area

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: ናብቲ ናትካ ካላንደር ክሳብ ዝመጽእ ሓሙስ ሰዓት 14.00 UTC/07.00 PT ፡ን ፍሉይ ናይ ጉዳያት ርክባት ፡ ናይ ዕድመ ወረቀት ክንሰደልካ ኢና።
en-mt: We will send you an invitation to your calendar by next Thursday at 14.00 UTC/07.00 PT, for special issues contacts.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: ተወሳኺ ለውጢ ንምሕባር፡ እዚ ግዜ እዚ ክንጥቀም ኢና፡ ሕቶታትኩም ክንምልስን ከምኡውን ነሓድሕድኩም ክትራኸቡ ባይታ ክንፈጥርን ኢና።
en-mt: We will use this time to notify you of further changes, answer your questions and provide a platform for you to meet with each other.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: ኣብዚ ዘለና ኩላትና ብሓደ ሓሳብ ኣሎና፡ ምህላውና ድማ ክሳብ ዝከኣለና ክንተሓጋገዝ ኢዩ
en-mt: We are all here with the same idea, and our existence is to help each other as much as we can

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: ክሳብ ዝኾነ ዝኸውን ግን፡ ካብዚ ኢመይል ሓበሬታ ክትረክብ ትኽእል፡ ካልኦት ኣገደስቲ ሓበሬታ ምስ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተሓሓዝ ድማ ኣብ ኦፊስ ካብ ዊኪ (wiki) ክትረክብ ይከኣል።
en-mt: In the meantime, you can get information from this email and other important information related to COVID-19 in the office from the wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: እዚ CRT ነቲ ገጻት ከሐድሶን ፡ ን ኩሎም ሓበሬታታት ድማ ኣብ ሓደ ቦታ ከቀምጦምን ኢዩ።
en-mt: This CRT will refresh the pages , and put all the information in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: ምስተን ብ ከቢድ ዝተጸልዋ ሃገራት ምስ ዝነብሩ ኣባላት ፡ ነቲ ስርዕ ርክባትና ንምዕቃብ ንሰርሕ ኣሎና።
en-mt: With members living in the countries severely affected , we are working to maintain our orderly communications.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: ዝኾነ ይኹን ሕቶ ናይ ጉዕዞ፡ ኣጋጣሚታት፡ ዓበይቲ ናይ ስራሕ ምክትታላት ወይ ናይ ሸፈነ ሽግር፡ ወይ`ውን ዝኾነ ካልእ ዝደለኻዮ ሓገዝ፡ በጃኻ ን CRT ምሕባርን ፡ ብሓባር ኮንካ ምስራሕን ኣይትሕመቅ።
en-mt: Any questions about travel, opportunities, major work follow-ups or coverage problems, or any other help you need, please don`t hesitate to let CRT know and , work together.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: ሓገዝን ምትሕብባርን ክንህበካ ኢና ኣብዚ ዘለና።
en-mt: We are here to provide you with help and assistance.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: እንተደኣ ምስጢራዊ ወይ ተኣፋፊ ነገር ኣሎካ፡ በጃኻ ን ብርያን ጁዳን፡ ዳይረክቶር ናይ ዓለምለኻዊ መስርሓት ፡ ኢመይል ጸሓፈሉ።
en-mt: If you have something confidential or pressing, please email Brian Judan, Director of Global Processes

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: ካብዞም ለውጢታት ዝኾነ ከም ምቁራጽ ናይ ስራሕ ሕጋጋትና ክረኣዩ የብሎምን።
en-mt: None of these changes should be viewed as a termination of our employment laws.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: ግናኸ፡ ኣብዚ እዋን እዚ ከም መፍለጢ ኢዮም፡ እቶም ስረሓትናን ግቡኣትናን ቅድሚ ሕጂ ብሰይ ተራእየ መልክዕ ክወሃሃዱ ኣለዎም
en-mt: However, they are now a reminder that our duties and responsibilities must be coordinated in the way that has already been seen by me

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: እዚ ደረጃ እዚ እቲ ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ ደረጃ ኢልና እንኣምነሉ ደረጃ ኮይኑ፡ ነሓድሕድና ክንተሓጋገዘሉ ዘለና ደረጃ`ውን ኢዩ፡ ስለዚ ድማብሓንሳብ ኣብ እንሰርሓሉ ን እንንቀሳቀሰሉ ግዜ እቲ ኣድላዩ ደገፋትን ሓገዛትን ዓለም ኣባኢ ሕጂ እዋን ደልያቶ ዘላ ከነብርክት ኢና
en-mt: This is the stage we believe is the most important stage and it is also the stage where we must help each other, so as we work and move together we will provide the necessary supports and assistance that the Abai world needs right now

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: እቲ ዝተመደበ ስራሕ ፡ ክሳብ ግዜ ዝመጽእ ኣብ ቦትኡ ይጽበየና ኣሎ።
en-mt: The assigned work , is waiting in place until the time comes.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: ንሕጂ ፡ ነሓድሕና እናተሓጋገዝና ነቲ ኣብ ዝመጽእ ሰሙናትን ወርሓትን ዝመጽእ እገዳሲ ስረሓት ቦታን ግዜን ክንገድፈሉ ኣሎና።
en-mt: For now , we need to help each other and leave space and time for the important work that comes in the coming weeks and months.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: ን ኩላትኩም ነገር እዚ ክትፍጽምዎ ንደልዮ ኢና፡ ስለዚ ድማ ኩላትኩም ን ነፍስኹምን ስድራኹምን ክትከናኸኑ ንደሊ ኢና፡ በዚ መልክዕ ድማ ኣብ ትድለዩሉ ግዜ ጽቡቕ ስራሕ ክትሰርሑ ትኽእሉ።
en-mt: We want you all to accomplish this thing, so we want you all to take care of yourselves and your families, so that you can do a good job when you are needed.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: ሕጂ፡ በጃኻ-- ኣእዳውካ ተሓጽብ፡ ገጽካ ድማ ፈጺምካ ኣይትሓዝ!
en-mt: Now, please-- wash your hands, and never touch your face!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: ካተሪነ፡ እታ CRT (ኣማንካ ክ፡ ልያነተ ለ፡ ርያን መ፡ ከምኡውን ቶኒ ሰ)፡ ከምኡውን እቶም ዝተረፉ ናይ መሪሕነት ጉጅለ (ግራንት ሀዘር ወ፡ ጃይም ቨ፡ ጃነን የ፡ ሊሳ ሰ፡ ሮቢን ኣአ፡ ሪያን መ፡ ከምኡውን ቶኒ ነ)
en-mt: Katerine, the CRT (Amanka K, Liannette B, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the leadership team (Grant Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen Y, Lisa S, Robyn AA, Ryan M, and Tony N)

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: b'Angiotensin-ዝልውጥ ኢንዛይም 2 (ACE2) ፡ ኤንዛይም ኮይኑ ናብቲ ደጋዊ ገጽ (cell membranes) ዋህዮታት ናይ ሳንቡእ፡ ኣርተሪ፡ ልቢ፡ ኩሊት ከምኡውን መዓንጣ ዝተጣበቀ ኢዩ፡፡
en-mt: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the cell membranes of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidneys, and intestines.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ሸየጥቲ  ACE2 ንጥፈታት ናይ ዝምድና  ACE ብምጉዳል ዓቐን ናይ ኣንጊተንሲን-ⵊⵊ ን ብምዉሳኽ ኣንጊተንሲን(1-7)፡ ትስፉው መድሃኒት ንሕማማት ካርድዮቫስኩላር ንምፍዋስ ይስራሕ።ንገለ ኮሮናቫይረሳት ACE 2 ከም መእተዊ ነጥቢ ናብ ወሃዮ የገልግል።
en-mt: ACE2 vendors reduce the activity of the ACE relationship by increasing the levels of angitensin-A and angitensin(1-7), a promising drug for the treatment of cardiovascular diseases.For some coronaviruses, ACE 2 serves as an entry point into the cell.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: ናይ ሰብ ዓይነት ምራቅ ዝበዝሕ ግዜ ከም hACE2 ይጥቀስ።
en-mt: Human-type saliva is often referred to as hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: ኣንጆተንዚን ኮንቨርቲን ኢንዛይም 2 ማለት ዚንክ ኣብ ዉሻጡ ሓጺናዊ ምራቕ ዝሓዘ ባእታ ኮይኑ ኣብ ንጽል ጽፍሒ ቀጸላ ዋሃዮን ካልኦት ዋሃዮታትን ይርከብ።
en-mt: Angiotensin converting enzyme 2 is an iron-containing zinc-containing enzyme found in single layers of cell membranes and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: ACE2 ፕሮቲን N-ተርሚናል ፐፕቲሳይድ M2 ዶመይን ከምኡውን C-ተርሚናል ኮለክትሮን ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ ኣማሃላላፊ ዶመይን፡ ዝሓዘ ኢዩ
en-mt: The ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptide M2 domain and a C-terminal collectron amino acid transfer domain

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 ሓደ ሲንግለ-ፓስ ዕይነት 1 ፕሮቲን ኮይኑ ፡ ምስቲ አንዛይማዊ ንጡፍ ዶመይን ፡ ኣብቲ ባይታ ናይ ሳንቡእ ዋህዮታትን ቲሹታትን ዝተቃልዐ ኢዩ
en-mt: ACE2 is a single-pass type 1 protein , with the enzymatically active domain, exposed on the substrate of lung cells and tissues

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: ደግያዊ ግዝኣት ዋህዮ ናይ ኤይ ሲ ኢ ክልተ( ACE2) ካብ ትራንስመምብረይን ዶመይን(transmembrane domain) ብ ሸድ ዳሰ ዝብሃል ኤንዛይም ይፍንጨል፣ እቲ ሓቓቒ ፕሮቴን ውጽኢት ድማ ናብቲ መስመር ደም ይልቀቕ ንከም ሽንቲ ኮይኑ’ውን ይወጽእ።
en-mt: The cellular territory of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by an enzyme called Shed Dase, and the digestive protein product is released into the bloodstream and excreted as urine.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2  ኣብ ዝበዝሐ ኣካላት ይርከብ እዩ፡ ACE2  ምስ ዋህዮ መምብሬን ናይ ቀንዲ ሳንቡኣዊ ታይፕ ⵏⵏ ትንሓጋዊ ዋሃዮ ተታሒዙ አሎ።ኢንተሮቺሲትስ ናይ ቀጢን መዓንጣ ፡ኣርተርያልን ቨይናዊ ኢንዶዘልያል ወሃዮታትን ኣርተርያል ሉሙጽ ጭዋዳ ዋሃዮታት ኣብ ብዙሓት ኣካላት።
en-mt: ACE2 is found in most organs, ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of the main lung type 4. Enterocysts of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in many organs.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: ACE2 mRNA መግለጺ’ውን ኣብ ሓንጎላዊ ሽፋን፡ ስትራይቱም፡ ሃይፖታላሙስን ብሬንስቴም ተረኺቡ እዩ።
en-mt: ACE2 mRNA expression has also been detected in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: እቲ ቀንዲ ስራሕ ናይ ACE2 ከም ናይ ACE መመጣጠኒ ፡ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The main function of ACE2 is as an ACE equivalent.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE ንኣንጊተንሲን ⵊ ነዝዒ መፍረ (cleaves angiotensin I hormone)ናብ ቫሶኮንስትሪክቲንግ ኣንጊተንሲን II (vasoconstricting  angiotensin II) ይልሕግ።
en-mt: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone to vasoconstricting angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2 ንካርቦክሲል-ተርሚናል ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ ፐናይላላናይን(carboxyl-terminal amino acidphenylalanine) ካብ ኣንጊኦተንሲን II(angiotensin II) (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) ይፍንጭሎን ናብ ቫዞዳያሌተር ኣንጊኦንሲን(vasodilator angiotensin (1-7)) ህይድሮላይዝ ይገብሮን(H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH)።
en-mt: ACE2 cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acidphenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and converts it to the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7) ) hydrolyzes and(H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 ን ብዙሓት ፐፕታይድስ ክቆርጾም ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ ከም ኣብነት፡ [des-Arg9]-ብራድይኪን፡ ኣፐሊን፡ ኒውሮተንሲን፡ ዳይኖርፊን A ከምኡ’ውን ገርሊን።
en-mt: ACE2 can cleave many peptides, such as, [des-Arg9]-bradykin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A and gerlin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 ነቲ ኢውትራል ናይ ኣሚኖ ኣሲድ መሰጋገሪ ሽፋን SLC6A19 ይቆጻጸሮ፡ ኣብ ሃርንታፕ ዝበሃል ሕማም ውን ክረኣይ ይኽእል ኢዩ
en-mt: ACE2 regulates the eutral of the amino acid transition membrane SLC6A19, which can also be seen in Harntap disease

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: ከም ትራንስመምብሬን ፕሮቲን፡ ACE2 ከም ቀንዲ መእተዊ ነጥቢ ናብ ገለ ክፋል ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ዋህዮ የገልግል፡ ዘጠቃሊሎም ድማ HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV(ሳርስ ዘስዕብ ቫይረስ) ከምኡ’ዉን SARS-CoV-2(ኮቪድ 19 ዘስዕብ ቫይረስ)
en-mt: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as a major entry point into parts of the coronary cell, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV(virus that causes SARS) and SARS-CoV-2(virus that causes COVID-19)

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: ኣዝዩ ብዝተፈልየ፡ እዚ መሸፈኒ ናይ S1ፕሮቲን ናይ SARS-CoV ን ሳርስ-ኮሮናቫርስ2 ናብ ነዝዓዊ ግዝኣት ናይ ACE2ኣብ ላዕለዋይ ሽፋን ናይ ዋህዮታት ዉጺኢቱ endocytosis ንምግዓዝ መኣዛ ናይ ክልቲኡ ቫይረስን ነዝዕን ናብ ዉሽጢ ኢንዶሶምስ ዝርከበሉ ኣብ ዉሽጢ ዋህዮታትን እዩ።
en-mt: Very differently, this envelope of the S1protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-Coronavirus2 to the secretory domain of ACE2on the cell surface results in endocytosis to move the flavor of both virus and secretion into the endosomes and inside the cells.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ምእታው መስርሕውን መጀመሪ ናይ ኤስ ፕሮቲን ብመዕቆቢ ሰሪን ፕሮቲዝ TMPRSS2፡ ይጠልብ።እዚ ፍርሒ ኣብ ትሕቲ እዋናዊ መርመራ ከም ክኢላዊ ቅድመ ፍወሳ እዩ።እዚ ብግምት ዝቀርብ ሓሳብ ምጉዳል ደረጃ ናይ ACE2 ኣብ ዋሃዮታት መሪሑ።እዚ ን ቃልሲ መልከፍቲ ክሕግዝ ይኽእል።
en-mt: This entry process also requires the initiation of S protein by the harboring serine protease TMPRSS2, which is feared under contemporary examination as an expert pretreatment.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ኣዝዮም ብዙሓት ክ ኢላታት ናይ ሕብረተ-ሰባት ን ኣስተኻኻሊ ኣካላትን ነቲ ናይ ACE ምክልካልን ናይ ARB ተራፒን ክጥቀም የማኽሩ ኢዮም።
en-mt: However, very many community groups and regulatory bodies recommend the use of ACE prevention and ARB therapy.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: ስይስተማቲካዊ ትንታነን መታ-መግለጺን ኣብ ሓምለ 11፡ 2012 ዝተሓትመ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ነቶም ናይ ACE ከልከልቲ ምጥቃም፡ ነቲ ናይ ነሚንዮ ክሕዘካ ዘሎ ተኽእሎታትን ሓደጋን ብ 34% ምን ምቁጽጻር ክነጻጸር እንከሎ ፡ የግድሎ፡፡
en-mt: A systematic analysis and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that using the ACE inhibitors reduced the odds and risk of developing neoplasms by 34% compared to no control

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: ሓደጋ ምኽሳት ኒሞንያ ተነክዩ ኣብ ተሓከምቲ ናይ ኤይ ሲ ኢ( ACE) ተቐማጦ ተጋላጽነት ዝነበሮምን ኒሞንያ፣ ማህረምቲ ንድኻም ልቢ ዘለዎምን ብፍሉይ ማለት’ዩ።
en-mt: The risk of pneumonia is reduced, especially in patients with exposure to ACE residents and those with pneumonia, stroke and heart failure.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: ዋላ'ኳ እቲ ውጽኢት ካብ ናይ ፐኑሞንያ ስግኣት ዝተሓተ ብርተዐ ይሃልዎ፡ጥቕሚ ናይዞም ኣሰከፍቲ ACE  ውን ምስ ምጉዳል ፐኒሞንያ ሓቢሮም ኔሮም፡ እዚ ኸኣ ምስ ሞት ዝተተሓሓዘ እዩ።
en-mt: Although the effect is less severe than the risk of pneumonia, the benefits of these ACE agents have also been associated with a reduction in pneumonia, which is associated with mortality.

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ምትሕውዋስ ናይ ጀነቲክስ( ስነውርሻ) ACE2 (rhACE2) ከም ዝግመት ሓቀኛ ፍወሳ ንንጡፍ ዝተጎድአ ሳንቡእ። ኣብ ሳንባዊ ዑደት ደምን ምልኣት ኦክስጅን ኣብ ንኣሽቱ ሓሰማታት ብከሚካላዊ ምትእስሳር ኣብ ሞንጎ ስብሕን መጠን ሽኮርን ንጡፍ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ዘርኣዩ ጽቡቕ ምዕባለ ኣርእዩ።
en-mt: Fusion of genetics( heredity) ACE2 (rhACE2) as a putative true therapy for actively injured lung. Pulmonary circulation and oxygen saturation improved in miniature pigs exhibiting active respiratory function by chemical interaction between adiposity and glucose levels.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: እቲ ፍርቂ ዕድመ ናይ rhACE2 ኣብ ደቂ-ሰባት 10 ሰዓታት ኢዩ፡ እቲመበገሲ ናይተግባራዊ ምንቅስቃስ ድማ 30 ደቂቅ ኢዩ፡ ከም ተወሳኺ ነዚ ናይ 24 ሰዓታት (ግዝያት) ናይ ዝልዋ ማለት ኢዩ።
en-mt: The half-life of rhACE2 in humans is 10 hours, and the starting point of functional activity is 30 minutes, in addition to this 24-hour (period) of Zlva.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ርኽበታት ከም ዘነጽርዎ፡ ምናልባት rhACE2 ዝበለጸ ውጽኢት ነቶም ትሑት ናይ ምጽዋር ን፡ ክላሲክ ረኒን-ኣንጊዮተን ሲስተም ከልከልቲ (RAS inhibitors)፡ ሕማም ዘለዎም ወይ`ውን ኣብቶም ዘወርቲ ኣንግዮኒስቲን II ሕማማት ዘለዎም እቶም ዝሰረጹ rhACE2፡ ኣብቲ ናይ ክሊኒካዊ መፈተኒታት ፡ ናይ ከበድቲ ምስትንፋስ ጸቅጢ ስይንድሮም ዘምጽኡ ምክንኻናት፡ ተገምጊሞምን ተቀሚሮምን ኢዮም
en-mt: Some findings suggest that rhACE2 may work best for those with low resistance to, classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors), disease or those with circulating angionistin II diseases that have embedded rhACE2, in the clinical trials , of difficult breathing Care for stress syndrome, were evaluated and combined

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: b'ኮቪድ-19 ኣፕስ(ናይ ኮምፒተር ፕሮግራም) ሞባይል ረቂቕ ንዋት ምዉዓልን እዩ፡ እዚ ከኣ ንሓገዝ መርከቢ ሕማም ናይ 2019-2020 ኮሮናቫይረስ ተመዲቡ፡ እዚ መስርሕ ናይ እቶም ምስ ዝተለኽፈ ዉልቀሰብ ለጊቡ ከምዝጸንሐካ ተለሊ።
en-mt: b'COVID-19 is the use of apps(computer programs) and mobile hardware, which is assigned to help the ship disease of the 2019-2020 coronavirus, this process of identifying those who have been attached to an infected individual.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: ኣዝዮም ብዙሓት ናይ ኮምፒተር ፕሮግራማት ብ ወግዓዊ ሓገዝ ናይ መንግስቲ ኣብ ገለ ገለ ቦታታት ፡ ማዕቢሎም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: A great many computer programs have been developed with the official help of the government in some places.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: ብዙሕ ስርዓታት ንምምዕባል መከታተሊ ዓሚል ዝሕግዙ ኣፕስ(apps) ማዕቢሎም እዮም።
en-mt: Many systems have developed apps(apps) for developing customer tracking.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: ኣድህቦ ብሕታዉነት ክብ ኢሉ፡ ብፍላይ ብዛዕባ ኣገባባት ከመይ ጌርካ ነቲ ጀግራፊካዊ ቦታ ተጠቀምቲ ኣፕ(ናይ ኮምፒተር ፕሮግራም)) ትረኽቦ።
en-mt: The focus on privacy has increased, especially about how to access the geographical location of app users.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: ብዙሕ ዘይርብሕ ኣማራጺታት ከም ምጥቃም ብሉቱዝ ሲግናል ንምእታው ናይ ዓሚል ናብ ካልእ ቴሌፎን
en-mt: Less profitable options like using a Bluetooth signal to import the customer's to another phone

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: ኣብ ሚያዝያ 10, 2020 ጎግልን ኣፕልን ንከም በዓል ብሉቱዝ አፕስ ዝተመርኮሰ ናይ ኣንድሮይድን iOS  ስርዓታት መስርሕ ንምድጋፍ ብተግባር ክሓብሩ ምኻኖም ኣፍሊጦም።
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple announced that they will be working together to support processing for Android and iOS systems based on Bluetooth apps.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ምስ ኣሊፐይ ብምትሕብባር ሓደ ኣፕ (ናይ ኮምፒተር ፕሮግራም) ኣማዕቢሉ። እዚ ከኣ እቲ ዜጋ ምስ ኮቪድ-19 ዘለዎም ሰባት ተራኪቦም ከይኾኑ ዝሕብር እዩ።
en-mt: In China, the Chinese government developed an app (computer program) in partnership with Alipay. This suggests that the citizen may not have been in contact with people with COVID-1

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: ኣብተን 200 ናይ ቻይና ከተማታት ተጠቃምነት ረኺቡ ኣሎ። ኣብ ሲንጋፖር ድማ TraceTogether ዝተባህለት ናይ ኮምፑተር ፕሮግርም ተጠቃምነት ረኺባ ኣላ።
en-mt: It has been used in the 200 Chinese cities. In Singapore, a computer program called TraceTogether has been used.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ኮምፑተር ፕሮግራም፡ ብ ናይ ከባቢ IT ኮሚኒቲ ዝማዕበለ ኮይኑ፡ ከም ክፉት ምንጪ ኮይኑ መንግስቲ ክጥቀመሉ ተዘርጊሑ ኣሎ፡፡ ሰሜን መከዶንያ ኣብ ናይ ብሉቱዝ ምርኻብ ዝተመርኮሰ "StopKorona!" ዝበሃል ናይ ኮምፒተር ፕሮግራም፡ ነቶም ኣብ ዙርያ ዘለዉ ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት ፈሊጣ፡ ነቶም ናይ ጥዕና ሰብ መዚን ፡ ሓላፍነታውያን ሰባትን ድማ ሓበሬታ ብምልኣኽ፡ ቅልጡፍ ስጉምቲ ንክወስዱ ትሕግዝ ኢያ።
en-mt: The computer program, developed by the local IT community, has been released as open source for government use. Northern Macedonia has launched a Bluetooth-based "StopKorona!" A computer program that identifies the infected people around and sends information to the health authorities , responsible people, to help them take immediate action.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: እዚ አፕ(ናይ ኮምፒተር ፕሮግራም) ብሚኒስትሪ ርክብን ቴክኖሎጂን ከምኡ ዉን ብሚኒስትሪ ጥዕና ዝማዕበለ እዩ ነይሩ።
en-mt: This app(computer program) was developed by the Ministry of Communications and Technology and the Ministry of Health.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: ኣብ ሚያዝያ 14,2020 እዚ አፕ(ናይ ኮምፒተር ብጎጉል ፕለይ ስቶርን ኣፕል ኣፕ ስቶርን ተቀባልነት ክረክብ ይጽበ ነይሩ።
en-mt: On April 14,2020, this app(PC) was waiting to be accepted by Google Play Store and Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: ኣብ ሚያዝያ 12፡ መንግስቲ ከምዚ ኢሉ ገሊጹ፡ ንሕማም ዘለልያ ኣፕ ኣብ ልዑል ደረጃ ምዕባለ ነይሩ። ከምኡ'ውን ወፈራ ኣብ ዉሽጢ ሰሙናት ክርከብ ነይርዎ።ኣብ ኣየርላንድን ፈረንሳን ተመሳሳሊ ኣፕ (“ደው-ኮቪድ”) ዝብል ተወጢኑ።
en-mt: On April 12, the government stated that a disease detection app was in advanced stages of development. And the campaign was supposed to be available within weeks.Similar apps (“Dow-Covid”) were planned in Ireland and France.

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: ክልቲኤን ሃገራት ኣውስራልያን ኒውዝላንድን ናይ ሲንጋፖር ትረይስ ቱገዘር ኣፕሊኬሽንን (TraceTogether app) ከም ኡውን ቡሉትሬይስ ፕሮቶኮል (BlueTrace protocol) ኣብ ግምት የእቴንኦ እየን። ሩስያ እውን ጂኦፈንሲንግ ኣፕሊኬሽን ንሕሙማት ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ሞስኮ ዝነብሩ ካብ ገዝኦም ንኸይወጹ ዝሕብር ከተኣታቱ ሓሲባ እያ።
en-mt: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering Singapore's TraceTogether app and the BlueTrace protocol. Russia also plans to introduce a geofencing application that will tell COVID-19 patients in Moscow not to leave their homes.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: ሮዝ ኣንደርሰን ፕሮፌሰር ሓለዋ ናይ ኢንጅነሪንግ ካምፕሪጅ ዩኒቨርስቲ ገለ-ገለ ጸገማት ምስ ኣፕሊኼሽን ዝተሓሓዝ ገሊጹ ነይሩ ነኣብነት ዘይብልካ ኮለኻ ከም ዘለካ ምሕባር ከምኡ’ውን ኣብ ዉሑዳት ህዝብታት ዝተሓጽረ እዩ
en-mt: Rose Anderson, Professor of Security at the University of Cambridge, explained some of the problems associated with the application

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: ብዛዕባ ምዝርጋሕ ጌጋ ወይ ጎዳኢ ኮሮናቫይረስ ምዉዐላ ጸቒጡ የመልክት። አፕል ኣበየናይ ዓይነታት ዉደባ ምስ ኮሮናቪይረስ ዝዛመድ ምዉዐላ፡ንመክዘን ምዉዐላ ክዉስክ ከም ዝክእል ገደባት የቅዉም።ናብ ወግዓዊ ጥራይ ዘይኮነ ናብ ዝናዊ ዉዱባት ይግድብዎ።
en-mt: It emphasizes the use of the wrong or harmful coronavirus. Apple sets restrictions on which types of organizations it can increase its storage related spending.They restrict it to reputable organizations, not just official ones.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: ጎግልን ኣማዞን (Google and Amazon) ተመሳሳሊ ደረታት ገረን ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Google and Amazon have similar limits.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: ጎስጋስ ብሕታዊ ኣድህቦኦም ኣብ ትግባረ ናይ ሓፈሻዊ ጽኑዕ ሓለዋ ብኮሮናቫይረስ አፕስ ብምጥቃም ኢሎም ድምጾም  ኣስሚዖም፡ ብፍላይ ብዛዕባ ጽኑዕ ሓለዋ ምስ ምልባዕ ኮሮናቫይረስ ተጠቂምካ፡እዚ እቲ ኣስጋእነት ምስ ሓለፈ የቋርጽ።
en-mt: The campaign voiced their sole focus on the implementation of overall robust protection using coronavirus apps, especially about robust protection using coronavirus outbreaks, which stops when the threat passes.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: ኣምነስትይ ዓለምለኻዊ ን ካልኦት 100 ማሕበራትን ፡ ነዚ ዝግበር ዘሎ ጽኑዕ ሓለዋታት ገደብ ክግበረሉ ዝጽውዕ ወግዓዊ መግለጺ ሂበን ኣለዋ
en-mt: Amnesty International and 100 other organizations have issued official statements calling for a limit to these strict protections

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: ኣብ ናይ መንግስታዊ ትልምታትውድባት፡ ሸሞንተ ኣድላዪ ኩነት ኣዊጆም።
en-mt: In government planningparties, they declared eight necessary conditions.

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: ጽኑዕ ሓለዋ “ሕጋዊ፡ ኣገዳሲ፡ተመጣጣኒ" ክኸውን ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Strict protection must be “legal, relevant,reasonable”.

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: ንምዝርጋሕ መቆጻጸርን መከታተልን ኣብ ግዜ ዕራርቦ።
en-mt: To deploy controls and monitors at dusk.

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: እዚ ምጥቃም ናይ ጸብጻባትን ስኑድ ሓበሬታታትን ን ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዕላማታት ጥራይ ኵዕል ኣለዎ
en-mt: This use of reports and documentary information should be limited to COVID-19 purposes only

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: ናይ ሓበሬታ ውሕስነትን ሽም ምቅያርን ኣብ ጭብጢ ብምምርካስ ክሕሎን ንመጻኢ ድማ ድማ ኽዕቀብን ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Information security and anonymity must be evidence-based and maintained in the future.

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: ዝበኣሰ ኣሃዛዊ ጽኑዕ ሓለዋ፡ ምፍልላይን ጉስያን ከርሕቅ ነይርዎ።
en-mt: The worst numerical tight security should have avoided segregation and gusia.

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ PEPP-PT ምትእስሳር ናይ ጻዕርታት ብ ኣእከላዊን ዘይ-ማስእከላዊ ን መንገዲ ክኸውን ይኽእል፡ ሓደ ወግዒ/መገዲ ውን ኣይኮነነ ዘይ-ማስእከላዊ መንገዲ፡ ዘይ-ማስእከላዊ ናይ ውሕስነት-ዕቃበ ናይ ቅርበት ምክትታል (DP-PPT/DP-3T) ዝሓዘ ኮይኑ፡ ግዚያዊ ናይ መራኸቢ ቁጽርታት (TCN, fka መራኸቢ ናይ ኩነታት ቁጽርታት, CEN)፡ ናይ ውሕስነት መቆጻጸሪ ወግዒ/መገዲ ከምኡውን መስርሕ ናይ ተንቃሳቃሲት ተለፎን ምክትታት (PACT) ን ፡ ዘጠቃለለ ኢዩ

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: ኣብዘን ወግዕታት፡ ክርከብ ዝልለ  ዉልቃዊ ሓበሬታ ብፍጹም ነዚ መሳርሒን ምስኡ ዝወዳደር ፍጻመ ካልእ መሳርሕን  ኣይገድፎን።
en-mt: In these formats, the available personal information never leaves this device and any other device that competes with it.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: ብሕታዊ ትካላት MIT ምርምር ዉሑስ ዝኮነ መንገዲ የማዕብል። ጥጡሕ ቴክኒክ ንምእካብን ንምዕዛብን ዝርገሐ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ብሓበሬታን ቦታን ርክባትን ባይታ የዳሉ።
en-mt: Private institutions develop MIT research in a safe way. Solid techniques provide the basis for collecting and monitoring the spread of COVID-19 through information, location and communications.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: ኣብ ዋይትፐፐር (whitepaper) ናይ መጽናዕቲ ወረቀት ዝተመርኮሰ፡ ``ኣፕስ ጎን ሮግዩ፡ ነቲ ናይ ውልቂ ሓበሬታ ኣብ ግዜ ለበዳ የውሕስ`` ኣብ 2020 ዝተቃልሐ። ካልእ ተመሳሳሊ ጻዕሪ ድማ፡ ነቲ ውሑስ ዝኾነ ናይ ምክትታል ባይታ ብ ኤንጂማ MPC (Enigma MPC) ትካል ዝተገብረ ኢዩ፡ እዛ ትካል ነቲ ኣብ MIT ናይ መድያ ውን ላባራቶሪ ዝተረኽበ ናይ ውሕስነት ቴክኒሎጂ ተማዕብል።
en-mt: Based on the whitepaper research paper, ``Apps Gone Rogue: Secures the Privacy During an Outbreak,`` released in Another similar effort was made by Enigma MPC, which develops the security technology found at MIT's Media Laboratory.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: ውሑሳት ናይ ምክትታል ነቲ ናይ ሃርድወይር ተክኖሎጂታት፡ ነቶም ተጠቀምቲ ተነቀፍቲ ዝኾኑ ሓበሬታታት ናይ ቦታን ጥዕናን፡ ምስ ካልኦት ተጠቀምቲን በዓል መዚታትን፡ ክካፈሉ ውሕስነት ዘለዎ ባይታ ይፈጥር፡ እዚ ድማ ብዘይ ዝኾነ ናይ ሓበሬታ ናይ ውሕስነት ምጥርጣር የካይዶ።
en-mt: Secure monitoring of the hardware technologies creates a secure environment for users to share sensitive location and health information with other users and authorities, without any information security concerns.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: ኣብ ሓሙሽተ ሚያዝያ 2020 ዓለማዊ ቲ ሲ ኤን(TCN) ስምረት ብጉጅለ ሓደ ኣረኣእያን ዓቢ ተደራራቢ ዉዕል ንምንካይ ምፍንጫል ዕላማን ዓለማዊ ኣህጉራዊ ዉህደት ንምክትታልን ዝሕብራ ኣፕሊኬሽንን ምክኣል፡ መፍትሕ ምጭባጥ ናይ ዓለማዊ ዝርግሐ ተቀባሊነት ኢዩ።
en-mt: On April 5, 2020, the Global TCN (TCN) Simret is the key to achieving global acceptance.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: ኣብ 9 ሚያዝያ 2020 መንግስቲ ሲንጋፖር ኩፉት ምንጪ ምክትታል ብወግዓዊ መንግስቲ ኣፕሊኬሽን ከም ዘተኣታተወ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: On April 9, 2020, the Singapore government announced the introduction of open source monitoring by an official government application.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: ጎግልን አፕልን፡እዘን ትካላት ን ኣንድሮይድን ኣይኦኤስ ጽፍሒ ሞባይል ዝቆጻጸር፡ ኣብ ሚያዝያ 10, 2020 ዘታባብዕ ንዓሚል ዝደሊ ኣዉጁ። ብመሰረት ምትሕዉዋስ ናይ ብሉቱዝ ትሑት ሓይሊ ተኽኖሎጂን ብሕትዉና ዝዕቅብ ክርይፕቶግራፍ ክዕቅብ ነይርዎ።
en-mt: Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile density, announced on April 10, 2020 an encouraging customer requirement. It had to maintain a combination of Bluetooth low-power technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: ዝርዝር ናይቲ ቀንዲ ተክኖሎጂታት ኣብ ሲስተም ድማ ሓቲሞም።
en-mt: They published a list of the main technologies in the system.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ ኣፕልን ጎጉልን ሃቀናታት፡ እቲ ሲስተም ኣብ ሰለስተ ደረጃታት ጌሩ ግርያቱ ከቕርብ ኢዩ።
en-mt: According to Apple and Google's plans, the system will deliver its services in three stages.

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: ምምጻእ ናይዚ ሓድሽ መሳርሒ ን መንግስቲ ወግዓዊ ናይ ውሕስነት-ምዕቃብ ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረስ መከታተሊ ናይ ኮምፒተር ፕሮግራማት ንምፍጣር ክኽእል
en-mt: The advent of this new tool will enable the government to create official security-preservation coronavirus monitoring computer programs

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: ምጥርናፍ ናይዚ ትግባረ ብቀጥታ ናብ ኣይኦኤስ ን ኣንድሮይድ ጎግልን አፕ ንምልዓል ቀጻሊ ጸገም ጽኑዕ ሓለዋን ከመልክት ወጢኑ። እዚ ድማ ብመጀመርያ ነዚ ስርዓት ብመገዲ ኣሓደስቲ ስርዓት መስርሕ ብምዝርጋሕን ጸኒሕካ እቲ ዘስግእ ምስ ሓለፈ ብሓደ ዓይነት ኣገባብ ተጠቂምካ ምእላይ እዩ።
en-mt: The integration of this implementation directly to iOS and Android Google planned to point out the continued problem of lifting apps and tight protection. This is done by first deploying this system through process updates and later removing it using the same methods once the threat has passed.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: ቢ መድሃኒት ዳግም ቦታ ዝሓዘ (ዳግም ዕላማ ዝተዋህቦ ተባሂሉ’ውን ይጽዋዕ፡ ዳግም ቅርጺ፡ ዳግም ዕማም ወይ ድማ ፍወሳዊ መቐይሮ) ዝበሃል ሓደ ዳግም ዕላማ ን ሓደ ፍቁድ መድሃኒት ናይ ዝተፈላለዩ ሕማማት ወይ ድማ ሕክምናዊ ኩነት ካብቲ መበቖላዊ ዝማዕበለሉ ዝፍውስ እዩ።
en-mt: B A repositioned drug (also called a repurposed, reformulated, repurposed or therapeutic modification) is a repurposing of an approved drug to treat a variety of diseases or medical conditions from which it was originally developed.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: ሓደ መንገዲ ናይ ሰለ-ፍልጠት ተመራመርቲ ዉሑስን ውጽኢታውን መድሃኒት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ንምስራሕ እዩ
en-mt: One way is for scientists to develop a safe and effective cure for COVID-1

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: ካልኦት ናይ መጽናዕቲ ኣንፈታት ድማ እዚ ይመስል፡ ን ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ክታበት ምምዕባል ን ጸማልያዊ ፕላስማ ምምሕልላፍ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ፡ እዚ ድማ 66 ናይ መድሃኒታት ፕሮቲናት ዝሓዘ ኮይኑ፡ ነፍሲ ወከፎም ድማ ዝተባዝሐ ሊጋንድ ከም መላግቦናይ ሳይት ይሕዙ
en-mt: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine for the shadow plasma delivery of SARS-CoV-2, which contains 66 drug proteins, each of which contains a replicated ligand as a binding site

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: ነዞም ቦታታት መሸፈኒ ምምርማር፡ናይ ምምዕባል ዉጺኢታዊ ጸረ-ቪራል መድሃኒት ኣንጻር ኮቪድ-19 ፕሮቲናት ምክንያታዊ ፕሮጀክት የቕርብ።
en-mt: Examining these coverage sites offers a rational project for the development of effective antiviral drugs against COVID-19 proteins.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: ካብ ኩሉ ኣገዳሲ ሳርስ-ኮቭ -2(SARS-CoV-2) ዕላማ ዝኾ ኑ ፕሮቲናት ፓፐይን ዓይነት ፕሮቴዝ፣ ኣርኤንኤይ(RNA) ጽግዕተኛ፣ኣርኤንኤይ(RNA) ፖሊመረዝ፣ ሀሊኬዝ፣ኤስ ፕሮቲን፣ኤዲፒ ( ADP)ሪቦፎ ስፌት
en-mt: Among the most important SARS-CoV -2(SARS-CoV-2) target proteins are papain type protease, RNA dependent,RNA polymerase, helicase,S protein,ADP ( ADP)ribofo tailor

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: ሑሴን ን ካልኦትን (Hussein A A, et al) ብዙሓት ድርብራብ ተወዳዳሪ፡ ካብ ሽኡ ን ኣስከሬኑ ተመሳሳሊ ኣዕጋቢን ኣጽናኦ። እዚ ዝላዓለ ተመሳሳሊ ተቀባልነት ዘሎዎ መድሃኒት፡ ምእንቲ ኣንጸር-SARS-CoV-2 መድሃኒት ምምዕባል ቅድመ ክሊኒካል መጽናዕቲ ከፍልጥ ኣብ ክሊኒካል መጽናዕቲ ስርሓቱ ተማሕጺኑ።
en-mt: Hussein et al (Hussein AA, et al) studied many competitive throws, since then and his body similarly satisfactory. This highly similarly accepted drug has been urged in its clinical research work to inform preclinical studies in order to develop an anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: ክሎሮኪን ናይ ዓሶ መድሃኒት ኢዩ፡ ካብ ነብሰ መጥቃዕቲ ሕማም’ዉን ንጥቀመሉ ኢና።
en-mt: Chloroquine is a tuberculosis drug, and we use it from self-inflicted diseases.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 18፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ክሎሮኲንን ምስ ሃይድሮክሲክሎሮኲን (hydroxychloroquine) ዝተሓሓዝን ኣብ መንጎ እቶም ኣርባዕተ ዝተጸንዑ ኣፋዉስ  ከም ክፋል ናይ ሕብረት ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነ  ክኾኑ ከም ዝኽእሉ ኣዉጁ።
en-mt: On March 18, the World Health Organization (WHO) announced that chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine-related drugs could be among the four studied drugs as part of a joint clinical trial.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: ኣማሓዳሪ ኒው-ዮርክ ኣንድሪው ኩሞ ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ ናይ ነው-ዮርክ ፈተነ ናይ ክሎሮኪን ንህይድሮጽዮክሎሮኪን ፈተነታት ካብ 24 መጋቢት ጀሚሩ ክትግበር ኢዩ። ኣብ 28 መጋቢት፡ FDA ን ተጠቃምነት ናይ ንህይድሮጽዮክሎሮኪን ሱልፋይትን ክሎሮኪን ፎስፈይትን፡ ኣብ ትሕቲ ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ጥቕሚ ናይ ፍቃድ (EUA)፡ ኣብ ጥቕሚ ኵዕሉ ከም ዝጂምሩ ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo said the New York trial of chloroquine and hydrothiochloroquine tests will begin March On March 28, the FDA announced that it would begin using hydrothiochloroquine sulfite and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: እዚ ክንክን ሕክምና ብ FDA ናይ ክሊኒክ መፈተኒ መስርሕ ፍቓድን ኣፍልጦን ኣይረኸበን፡ ኣብ ትሕቲ EUA ጥራይ ከም ናይ መፈተኒ ናይ ሕክምና ክንክን ን ቅልጡፍ ረድኤት ዝደልዩ ተሓከምቲ ናይ ሆስፒታል ኢዩ ዝወሃብ፡ ኣብ ክሊኒካት ግን ኵአሃብ ኣይፍቀድን ኢዩ።
en-mt: This treatment has not been approved and recognized by the FDA clinical trial process, and is only provided under the EUA as trial medical care for emergency hospital patients, but is not allowed to be provided in clinics.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: ሲዲሲ(CDC)፡ ዓቀንን ንዉሓትን ሃይድሮክሲክሎሮኪን ንፍወሳ ሳርስ ኮቭ ክልተ(SARS-COV_2) ለበዳ መልእኽቲ ኣየማሓላለፈን ዘሎ።
en-mt: The CDC has not communicated the dose and duration of hydroxychloroquine for the treatment of SARS-COV_2 pandemic.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: ሓካይም ነቲ መድሃኒት ኣማራጺ ክንስእን ከለና ንጥቀመሉ ኣለና ኢሎም።
en-mt: Doctors said they are using the drug when they have no alternative.

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: ናይ ቱርኪ ተመራመርቲ ኣብ ኢስታንቡል ንእሽተይ መጽናዕቲ ክሎሮኪን ምስ ዚንክ፡ ቫይታሚን ኤይ፡ ሲን፡ ዲ፡ ሓዊሶም ኣካዪዶም።
en-mt: Turkish researchers in Istanbul conducted a small study of chloroquine combined with zinc, vitamins A, C, and D.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: ኣብ ኦክስፎርድን ዱክ ዩኒቨርሲቲ፡ሰፊሕ መጽናዕቲ ይካየድ ኣሎ።
en-mt: At Oxford and Duke University, extensive research is underway.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: NYU ላንጎን ቤት ትምህርቲ ሕክምና ፈተነ ኣብ ዉሕስነትን ኣድማዕነትን ናይ ተኸላኸሊ ጥቕሚ ሃይድሮሲክሎሮኪ (hydroxychloroquine)ን ፈተነ ኣካይዱ።
en-mt: NYU Langone School of Medicine conducted a trial on the safety and efficacy of the preventive benefits of hydroxychloroquine.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: ኣብ ዉሃንን ሸንዝህንን ናይ ቻይና ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነታት ፋቪፒራቪር “ብዘይዉሉዉል ዉጺኢታዊ” ከም ዝነበረ ከርኢ ጠሊቡ።
en-mt: It required Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen to show that favipiravir was “invariably effective”.
