sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: 35 ተሓከምቲ ኣብ ሸንዘን ብ ኣሉታ ተመርሚሮም ኣብ ውሽጢ 4 መዓልታት፡ ወላካ እቲ ንውሓት ግዜ ፡ናይቲ ሕማም ኣብቶም ዘይተቀበሉ ፡ 11 መዓልታት ኣብ 45 ተሓከምቲ እንተነበረ።
en-mt: 35 patients tested negative in Shenzhen within 4 days, although the duration, of the disease in those who did not receive it, was 11 days in 45 patients.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: ኣብ ዉሃን 240 ሕሙማት ኒሞንያ ፍርቆም ፋቪፕራቪር( Favipiravir) ፍርቆም ድማ ኡሚፈኖቪር (Umifenovir) መድሃኒት ከም ዝተዋሃቡ ይፍለጥ።
en-mt: In Wuhan, 240 pneumonia patients were given half favipiravir and half umifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: ናይ ዓዲ ጣልያን ናይ ፋርማሲ ወኪል፡ እዚ ወጽዩ ዘሎ መረጋገጺ ን መድሃኒት መጠቀሚ ኣዝዩ ውሑድን ፡ ጀማሪ ዙርያ ሙኻኑ ነቶም ህዝቢ ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: The Italian pharmaceutical representative informed the public that the released certification for drug use is very limited and , a starting round.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ኣብ 02 ሚያዝያ ጀርመን ካብ ጃፓን መድሃኒት ገዚኣ ከም ዝኣከበት ወተሃደራዊ ሰርዊት ገይራ ድማ ናብ ዪኒቨርሲቲ ሕክምና ከም ዘብጽሓቶ፡ ንሱ ድማ ፈዉሲ ናይ ኮቪድ 19 ከምዝኮነ ሕቢራ ነይራ።
en-mt: On April 2, Germany announced that it had purchased and collected medicine from Japan and delivered it to the University of Medicine as a military service, which is a cure for COVID-1

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: ጋዜጣ ደቡብ ቻይና ከምዘመልክቶ, ሺንዞኣበ (Shinzo Abe) ን ናይ ምምሕዳር ዕደጋ መድሃኒት ዝኸውን መኽፈቲ ሙዚቃ ጥሩምባ ነፊሑ ወይ ድማ ፍቃድ ሂቡ፡ ቫይረስ ኣቐዲሙ ስለዝተባዘሐ እቲ መድሃኒት ንጽንኩር ኩነታት ሕማም ዘይውጽኢታዊ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: According to the South China News Agency, Shinzo Abe blew the opening trumpet or gave permission for the administration's drug purchase, which may be ineffective for severe cases because the virus has multiplied earlier.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: ብ ጥንስቲ ሰበይቲ ምጥቃም ወይ ንምጥናስ  ዝፍትኑ ዉሑስ ከይከውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: It may not be safe for use by a pregnant woman or those trying to conceive.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: ሓደ መጽናዕቲ ናይ ላፒናቪር/ሪቶናቪር (Kaletra)፡ ምትሕውዋስ ናይ ጸረ-ቫይረስ ላፒናቪርን ሪቶናቪር ን ``ዝኾነ ጥቅሚ ከም ዘይሃበ`` ደምዲሙ።
en-mt: One study of lapinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra) concluded that a combination of the antivirals lapinavir and ritonavir ``provided no benefit.

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: እዚ መድሃኒታት ን HIV  ምእንቲ ከይባዛሕ ብምእሳር ንፕሮቲዝ ክኽልክል ተመስሪሑ ነይሩ።
en-mt: These drugs were designed to inhibit proteases by binding HIV to prevent it from replicating.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: ኣብ ኮሎራዶ ዪኒቭርሲቲ ሓንቲ ናይ መጽናዕቲ ጋንታ ነቲ መድሃኒት ንምምሕያሽን ከምኡውን መታሓውስቲ (compound) ዘዐውር ምስኣብቲ ናይ ሳይንሳዊ ኮሚኒቲ ድማ ነቀኤታታት ኣሎ፡ ነቲ ዝፈሪ መድሃኒታት ናብ ዘይመዓሉኡ ብዝብል ጥርጣረ ኣብመጎ እቶም መጽናዕቲ ካብ ዘካይዱ ክኢላታት ናይቲ ላባራቶሪታት
en-mt: A research team at the University of Colorado is working to improve the drug and also compound blinds and there are criticisms in the scientific community, among the experts in the laboratories who conduct the research on suspicion of misuse of the drugs produced

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: ዉዱብ ጥዕና ዓላማት(WHO) ኣብ ተወሳኺ ዓለምለኻዊ ሎፒናቪር( lopinavir /ራይቶናቪትር( ritonavir) ገሮም እዮም።
en-mt: The World Health Organization(WHO) has made in additional international lopinavir ( lopinavir /ritonavir).

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: ረምደሲቪር (Remdesivir) ብ ጊልኣድ ስነ-ፍልጠታት ከም ክንክን ንሕማም ኢቦላ ቫይረስን መልከፍቲ ማርበርግ ቫይረስ ተማሂዙን ማዕቢሉን።ጊልኣድ ስነ-ፍልጠት ኣስዒቡ ኣንቲቫይራል ንጥፈት ኣብ ቪትሮ ኣንጻር ብዙሕ ፊሎ-፡ፕኑዩሞ-፡ፓራሚሶ-ን ኮሮና-ቫይረሳት ዳህሲሱ።
en-mt: Remdesivir was developed and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infection.Gilead Sciences further explored antiviral activity in vitro against multiple philo-, pneumo-, paramiso- and corona-viruses.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: ሓደ ጉዳይ ምስ ጸረ-ቫይራል ፍወሳ ናይ ምዕባለ ተጻዋርነት ብመገዲ ልዉጠት ናብ ብዙሕ ክብድ ዝበለ ሕማም ንምትሕልላፍን ክመርሕ ዝክእል እዩ።
en-mt: One issue with antiviral therapy is the development of resistance that can lead to mutations and transmission to many serious diseases.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: ገለ ናይ ቅድም ናይ ፕረተርያል መጽናዕቲ ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ረምደሲቪር (remdesivir) ናይ ምጽዋር ጀነቲካዊ ሽግራት ኣለዉ ይብል። ገለ ገለ መጽናዕታት ብ ክለቨላንድ ኡኒቨርሲቲ ሆስፒታል ዝተኻየዱ ክልተ ዓይነታት ዝጠርነፈ ፡ ሓደ ነቶም ተዛማዲ ደሓን ናይ ጥዕና ኩነታት ዘልውዎም፡ ካልኣይ ድማ ነቶም ከቢድ ናይ ሕማም ሽግራት ዘለዎም።
en-mt: Some previous preterm studies suggest that there are genetic problems with remdesivir resistance. Some studies conducted by Cleveland University Hospital combined two types , one for those with relatively good health, and the other for those with severe disease problems.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: ሰለስተ ሕክምና ፈተነታት ናይ ኢንትራቨኖስ ቫይታሚን ሲ ንኣብ ሕክምና ብ ከቢድ ሕማም ኮቪድ 19 ዘለዉ ይካየድ ኣሎ፡ ክልተ ናይ ኣእምሮ ቁጽጽር (ቻይና፣ካናዳ)፡ ሕንቲ ብዘይ ቁጽጽር (ጥልያን)።
en-mt: Three clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C are underway for those in treatment with severe COVID-19: two mental controls (China,Canada), one without controls (Italy).

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 24, 2020፡ መንግስቲ ኒው ዮርክ ፈተነታትን ጸረ-ባልዕ ኣዚትሮምሲን ጀሚሩ።
en-mt: On March 24, 2020, the New York government began trials and the pesticide azithromcin.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: ናይ ጃፓን ሃገራዊ ማእከል ን ዓለማዊ ናይ ጥዕናን መድሃኒትን (NCGM) ሓደ ናይ ክሊኒክ ፈተነ ን ተኡጂንስ ኣልቨስኮ (ciclesonide) ፡ ናይ ኣዝማ ዝስትንፈስ ኮርቲኮስተሮኢድ፡ ን ቅድመ-ሕማም ናይ ተሕከምቲ ናይ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ንምሕካም ፡ ክገብር ይምድብ ኣሎ፡፡
en-mt: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is scheduling a clinical trial of Teujins alvesco (ciclesonide), an asthma inhaled corticosteroid, to treat pre-existing patients with the coronavirus.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: ሓደ መልክዕ ኣንግዮተንዝን ኮንቨርቲን ኢንዛይም ክልተ (angiotensin-converting enzyme 2) ካልኣይ መድረክ ፈተና 200 ተሓከምቲ ካብ ተኣፋፊ ኩነታት ሓውዮም ደነማርክ፡ ጀርመን፡ ኣውስትርያ ድማ ዕውትነት ናይቲ መድሃኒት ይገልጻ
en-mt: One form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 Phase II trial 200 patients recovered from critical conditions Denmark, Germany and Austria report the success of the drug

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ ሞንትርያል ካናዳ ፡ናይ ልቢ ኢንስቲቱት ዝርከቡ ፡ ናይ መጽናዕቲ ግሩፕ፡ እዚ ሰልቺኒ (colchicine) ኣብ ምጉዳል ነድሪ ናይ ጎሮሮ ፡ ኣብቶም ብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕልኽላኽ ናይ ሕማም ዝሳቀዩ ፡ መጽናዕቲ ይገብር ኣሎ።
en-mt: A research group at the Heart Institute in Montreal, Canada, is studying colchicine in reducing sore throat in people suffering from a complication of the disease.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: መጽናዕቲ ኮልኮሮና (COLCORONA) ዝባሃል ፡ 6000 እኹላት ሰባት ዕድመ 40ን ልዕሊኡን ኮቪድ-19 ዝተረክቦም ይኸትብ ኣሎ።ፈኩስ ምልክታት ሕክምናዊ  ፍወሳ ኣየድልዮን።
en-mt: The COLCORONA study is vaccinating 6,000 adults aged 40 and older who test positive for COVID-19.Mild symptoms do not require medical treatment.

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: ጥኑሳት ደቂ-ኣንስትዮ ፡ ዘጥብዋ፡ ወይ ውን ዝኾነ ግቡእ መከላኸሊ ዘይጥቀማ ደቂ-ኣንስትዩ ብቁዓት ኣይኮናን።
en-mt: Pregnant women , breastfeeding women, or women who do not use any proper protection are not eligible.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: ብዙሓት ጸረ-ምርጋእ ጽልዋ ዘለዎም ኣብ ሃገረ ጣልያን ይፍተኑ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Many anti-settling agents are being tested in Italy.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: ውሑድ ዓቐን ሀፓሪን( heparin) ብሰፊሑ ኣብ ምሕካም ሕሙማት ንጥቀመሉ እዩ፣ ብመሰረት ናይ ኢጣልያ መድሃኒት ኤጀንሲ ኣገባባት ኣጠቓቅማ።
en-mt: Small doses of heparin are widely used in the treatment of patients, according to the Italian Medicines Agency guidelines.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: ኣብ 14 ሚያዝያ ማእከላዊ መጽናዕቲ ኣብ 300 ሰባት እኖዛፕሪን ሶዲዩም ኣብ ኣቀዲምካ ምክልካልን ስነ ፈዉሲ ዓቀንን ከምዝተካየደ ይፍለጥ።
en-mt: On April 14, a central study of 300 people was conducted on enozaprine sodium in early prevention and therapeutic doses.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 (SARS-CoV-2) ቫይረስ ስለ ዝኾነ ምጡን ስነ-ፍልጠታዊ ኣቓልቦ ናብ ዳግመ ምጥቃም ዝተኣመነሎም ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት ኣቐዲሞም ዝማዕበሉ ቅድሚ ምስፍሕፋሕ መርስ፣ሳርስን ምዕራባዊ ናይል ቫይረስን (MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus)።
en-mt: Because SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, appropriate scientific attention should be directed to the use of approved antiviral drugs developed earlier before the spread of MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: ሪባቭሪን (Ribavirin)፡ ብ መሰረት ናይ ቻይና 7ይ ሕታም መምርሒታት፡ ሪባቭሪን (Ribavirin)፡ ን ኮቪድ-19 ፍወሳ ክኸውን ከም ዝኽእል ተጻሒፉ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Ribavirin: According to the 7th edition of China's guidelines, ribavirin is listed as a possible treatment for COVID-1

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: ብመሰረት 7ይ ቻይናዊ ሕታም ኣምፈኖቪር(umifenovir) ንኮቪድ-19 ሕክምና ይምከር።
en-mt: According to the 7th Chinese edition, amfenovir(umifenovir) is recommended for treatment of COVID-1

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: ገለ ጸረ  ኣካላት ንኽንክን ኮቪድ-19 ዳግመ ዕላማ ከምዘለዎም ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: Some antibodies have been repurposed for the treatment of COVID-1

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: ቶሲሊዙማብ (ጸረ--IL-6 ተቀባሊ) (Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor))፡ ብ ቻይና ዝተረጋገጸ።
en-mt: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor), approved by China.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: ከምኡ’ውን ፈተናታት ኣብ ጥልያንን ቻይናን። ከምኡውን ርአsee Tocilizumab#COVID-19።
en-mt: and tests in Italy and China. See alsosee Tocilizumab#COVID-1

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: ክታበት b"A ኮቪድ-19 ጽንሰ-ሓሳባዊ ክታበት ኣንጻር ሕማም ኮሮናቫይረስ 2019 (ኮቪድ-19) እዩ።
en-mt: The b"A COVID-19 vaccine is a conceptual vaccine against the 2019 coronavirus (COVID-19).

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: ወላካ ክሳብ ሕጂ ናይ ክሊኒክ ፈተናታት ሓሊፉ ዝተወድአ ክታበት ኣይሃሉ፡ ክሳብ ሕጂ ግን ኣዝዮም ብዙሓት ፈተነታት ኣብ ምምዕባል ዘለዉ ናይ ክታበት መስርሓት ይካየዱ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Although no vaccine has yet passed clinical trials, there are still many vaccine trials in development.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ ለካቲት 2020 ዓለምለኻዊ ዉዱብ ጥዕና (WHO) ክታበት ኣንጻር SARS-CoV-2እቲ ጠንቃዊ ቫይረስ ኣብ 18 ኣዋርሕ  ዘይመልእ ክርከብ ኣይተጸበናን ኢሉ።
en-mt: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2the causative virus to be available in less than 18 months.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት ፡ ሓሙሽተ ካብቶም ናይ ክታበት ሕጹያት ወይ ተወዳደርቲ ኣብ ናይ ደረጃ I ኔሮም።
en-mt: In March , five of the vaccine candidates or competitors were in Tier I.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ታሕሳስ 2019 ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: COVID-19 was discovered in December

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ 2020 ቀንዲ ለብዒ ናብ ሙሉእ ዓለም ተዘርጊሑ፡ብብዝሒ ምውፋር ንመጽናዕታዊ ንጥፈታትን ክታበት ምምዕባልን ይመርሕ።
en-mt: By 2020, a major pandemic will spread worldwide, leading to massive deployment of research activities and vaccine development.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ብዙሓት ዉዱባት ዝተሓትመ ጀኖም ንምምዕባል ክታበት ኣንጻር SARS-CoV-2 ይጥቀሙ ኣሎዉ።
en-mt: Many organizations are using printed genomes to develop vaccines against SARS-CoV-2

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: ኣብ ሚያዝያ ከም ዝተጠቅሰ ዘሀውኽ ጉዳይ ሲ ፒ ኢ (CEPI) መበገሲ ናይ ምዕባለ ክታበት ቅልጡፍ ዕብየት፡ መስርሕ ክእለት፡ ምዉፋር ዓቅሚ ዓለማዊ ዝርግሐ ኣርእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: As mentioned in April, the disturbing case of CEPI, the origin of vaccine development, has shown rapid growth, skills processes, and capacity deployment globally.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ ሚያዝያ CEPI ተመራመርቲ 10 ዝተፈላለዩ ቴክኖሎጂ ባይታታት ኣብ ምርምርን ምዕባለን 2020 ውጺእታዊ ክታበት ኮቪድ-19 ከምዘለው ሓቢሮም ነይሮም።
en-mt: In April, CEPI researchers reported 10 different technology platforms in the research and development of a 2020 effective vaccine.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: እቲ ቀንዲ መድረኽ ሸቶ ኣብ ዝበለጸ ናይ ገጽ ⵏ ዉሕስ መጽናዕትታት የማእክል።
en-mt: The main stage goal centers on the best face ⵏ safe studies.

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: ኒክሊክ ኣሲድ (DNA ን RNAን)(ገጽ 1 ምምዕባል ናይ ክታበት ምውድዳር፡ ሞደርና፡ mRNA-1273)
en-mt: Nickleic Acid (DNA and RNA)(p. 1 Development of Vaccine Comparison, Moderna, mRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: ቫይረሳዊ ቨክቶር (ገጽ 1 ኣማዕባሊን ናይ ክታበት ውድድርን፡ ካንሲኖ ባዮሎጅካዊ፡ ኣደኖ-ቫይረስ ዓይነት 5 ቨክቶር)
en-mt: Viral Vector (p. 1 Developer and Vaccine Competition, Cansino Biological, Adeno-Virus Type 5 Vector)

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: ኣብ ሚያዝያ ብ CEPI  ሰነ-ፍልጠታውያን ከምዝሓበርዎ ሓፈሻዊ ድምር 115 ሕጹያት ክታበት ኣብቲ መጀመርያ ደረጃ ናይ ምዕባለ ኣለዉ። እቶም 78 ንጥፋት ፕሮጀክት እዮም(ብመሰረት ሚልከን ትካል ከኣ 79)።ከምኡዉን ካልኦት 37 ተሓቢሩ፡ ግን ምስ ዉሑድ ህዝባዊ ሓበሬታ ዝርከቦ።
en-mt: In April, CEPI scientists reported that a total of 115 vaccine candidates were in the early stages of development. Those 78 are active projects(and 79 according to the Milken Institute).And another 37 were reported, but with little public information.

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: እቲ ደረጃ ናይ I-II ፈተነታት ፡ ናይ መጀመርታ ውሕስነታትን ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቅሚን ፈተነ ይገብር፡ እዚ ድማ ብዘይስሩዕ ፡ ክኸውን ይኽእል፡ ሰንጋሊ-ፈውሲ መቆጻጸሪ፡ ከምኡውን ዝተፈላለየ ቦታታት ዘጠቃልል ኢዩ፡ ኣዝዩ ፍሉጥ ዓቀን ከም መፈተንታ ድማ ይወሃብ
en-mt: The stage of I-II trials tests initial safeguards and immunity, which includes irregular, possibly, sengal-healing controls, and various locations, and a very specific size is given as a test

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: ገጽ ⵏⵏⵏ ፈተናታት ብባህሪኡ ብዙሓት ተሳተፍቲ የጣቓልል፡ ጉጅለ ተቆጻጻሪ የማእክል። እዚ ንናይ ክታበት ሕማም  ክከላኸል ኣድማዕነት ይፍትን፡ ኣብዚ ግዜዚ  ንናይ ኣሉታ ጽልዋ ኣብቲ ዝላዓለ ዓቀን ፈውሲ ይቆጻጸር።
en-mt: Page 50 Tests inherently involve multiple participants, group supervisor moderates. This tests the effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent disease, while controlling the negative effects at the highest dose of treatment.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: ካብ 79 ሑጹያት ናይ ክታበት (ኣብ መጀመርታ ሚያዝያ 2020) 74 ኣብ ደቂሰባት ገምጋም ኣይበጽሑን(ኣብ ቅድመ ምርምር እዮም ዘለዉ)።
en-mt: Of the 79 vaccine candidates (as of early April 2020), 74 have not reached human evaluation(they are in pre-research).

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: ኣብ ኣዉስትራልያ ክዊንስላንድ ዩኒቨርስት አብ ከባቢ ጥሪ 24, 2020፡ ነቲ ብቕዓት ክታበት ናይ ሞለክዮል መቀርቀር ክምርምር ኣዉጁ፡ እዚ ንጀነቲካል ናይ ቪራል ፕሮቲን የተዓራሪ፡ ካብ ሕማም ነጻ ናይ ምዃን ግብረ መልሲ ምእንቲ ከነቓቕሕ።
en-mt: The University of Queensland in Australia announced around January 24, 2020, that it will test the vaccine's efficacy of a molecular structure that modifies the genetics of a viral protein to stimulate a disease-free response.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢ 24 ጥሪ 2020 ኣብ ካናዳ ማእከል ኣህጉራዊ ክታበት (VIDO-InterVac) ኣብ ዩኒቨርስቲ ሳስካችዋን ምጅማር ስራሕ ናብ ደቂ ሰባት ዝዓለመን ፈተነ ኣብ 2021 ከም ዝጅምር ይሕብር።
en-mt: Around January 24, 2020, the International Vaccine Center (VIDO-InterVac) in Canada at the University of Saskatchewan announces that a human trial will begin in

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: ትልሚ ምዕባለ ክታበት ኣብ ቻይና ማእከላይ መቆጻጸሪ ሕማም፡ምክልኻል ኣብ 26ጥሪ 2020፡ ኣብ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ሆንግኮንግ ኣብ ጥሪ 28 ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The vaccine development plan at the China Center for Disease Control,Prevention was announced on January 26, 2020, at the University of Hong Kong on January

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢ 29 ጥሪ 2020፡ ጀንሰን ናይ ፋርማሲ ካምፓኒ፡ ብ ሃንኪ ሻትመከር ዝምራሕ፡ ኣብ ምምዕባል ክታበት ስራሕ ከም ዝጀመረ ብዕሊ ነጊሩ።
en-mt: Around January 29, 2020, Jensen Pharmaceutical Company, led by Hanky Schattmaker, officially announced that it had begun work on vaccine development.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: ጀንሰን ሓደ ተሓባባሪ ናኡ ኣፋዊ መድሃኒት ኮይኑ ምስቲ ናይ ቢዮ-ተክኖሎጂ (biotechnology) ዓርኩ ድማ ይሻረኽ።
en-mt: Jensen is an associate of his oral medicine and partners with his biotechnology friend.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: ብ መጋቢት 18, 2020, ሓዲሽ ባዮሶልሽን ንናይ ስናዓ ሽርክነት ምስ ቫዛርት(Vaxart) ንክታበት ከም ዝጀመረ ኣፍለጠ።
en-mt: On March 18, 2020, New BioSolutions announced the launch of its vaccine partnership with Vaxart.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: ኣብ 8 ለካቲት 2020 ምርምር ኦንሶጀን(OncoGen) ኣብ ሮማኒያ ብዛዕባ ንድፈ ክታበት ብዝተማሳሰለ ምዕባለ ምስ ኣቀዲሙ ዝጥቀሙሉ ዝነበሩና ካንሰር ኔኦኣንቲጂን ክታበት ኣሕቲሙ ኢዩ።
en-mt: On February 8, 2020, OncoGen Research in Romania published a cancer neoantigen vaccine with similar developments in vaccine design.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 25፡ ሓላፊ ናቲ ናይ መጽናዕቲ ጉጅለ፡ እቲ ምምስራሕ ናይ ክታበት ከምዝወድእዎን ኣብ ፈተነ ከም ዝርከቡን ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: On March 25, the head of the Nati research team announced that they had completed the development of the vaccine and were in trials.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት 27, 2020 ጀነረክስ ተወሳኺ ኩባንያ ጁነረክስ ኢሙኒ-ኦንኮሎጂይ ክታበት ከምዝጀመሩ ኣዋዓዊዑ።እቲ ናይ ክታበት ትልሚ ሊ-ከይ  ፐፕሲ ናይ ክታበት  ኣንጻር ኮቪድ19 እዩ።
en-mt: On February 27, 2020, Generex announced the launch of an additional Generex Immuno-Oncology vaccine.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: ኣብ ውሽጢ 90 መዓልታት ኣብ ሰባት ዝፍተን ዓይነት ክታበት ከፍርዩ ይብገሱ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: They are set to produce a vaccine that will be tested on humans within 90 days.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 5, 2020 ኣብ ቅዱስ ሎኢስ ዋሽንግተን ዩኒቨርስት ናይ ክታበት ክትመታቶም(ፕሮጀክት) ከምዘማዕብሉ ኣፍሊጦም።
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, they announced that they will develop their vaccine vaccine(project) at St. Louis University in Washington.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ 5 መጋቢት ናይ 2020፡ ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ወተሃደራዊ ናይ መጽናዕቲ ጉጅለ ምስ ናይ ንብረት ኣማሓዳሪ ጉጅለ ኣብ ፎርት ደትሪክ ከምኡውን ዋልተር ረአድ ወተሃደራዊ ናይ መጽናዕቲ ጉጅለ ኣብ ሲልቨር ስፕሪንግ፡ ኩሎም ክታበት ከማዕብሉ ብሓንሳብ ይሰርሑ ከም ዘለዉ ነጊሮም።
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, the U.S. Military Research Team, along with the Property Management Team at Fort Detrick and the Walter Read Military Research Team in Silver Spring, said they were all working together to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: ኣብ ከባቢ 10 መጋቢት 2020፡ ኢመርጀንት ባይ ሶሊሽኝ ፡ምስ ናቫቫክዝ Inc ከም ዝተሓወሰ ነጊሩ
en-mt: Around March 10, 2020, Emergent by Solutions , announced that it had merged with Navavacz Inc

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ ምዕባለን ምህዞ ናይ ክታበት።
en-mt: In the development and invention of vaccines.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: እቶም ተሻረኽቲ ክንዮ እቲ  መደባት ን ቅድመ ክሊንካዊ ፈተናንን ኣብ ገጽ1 ክሊኒካዊ መርመራ ብ ነሓሰ 2020 ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: The partners announced beyond the programs and preclinical trials in the Page1 clinical trial in August

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ 12 መጋቢት 2020 ሚኒስትሪ ጥዕና ህንዲ ምስ 11 ዝተነጸሉ ሰባት ከም ዝሰርሑ ሓቢሩ።እቲ መስርሕ ክታበት ቀልጢፉ ተባሂሉ ድማ ዓመትን ፈረቃን ወይ ክልተ ዓመት ከም ዝወስድ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, the Indian Ministry of Health said it was working with 11 isolates.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: ኣብ 12 መጋቢት 2020 መድካጎ ስነ ሂወት ምርምር ቴክኖሎጂ ካምፓኒ ኣብ ኩበክ ከተማ ቦታ ኩበክ ብካናዳ ምርምር ጥዕና ኢኒስቲቱት ብዝተዋህበ ገንዛባዊ ደገፍ’ኮሮና ቫይረስ-መሰል ነገር ከማዕብሉ ከምዝጀመሩንን ውጺት ውን ከም ዝረኸበን ተፈሊጡን ተሓቢሩን ኣሎ
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, the Medkago Biological Research Technology Company began developing a coronavirus-like thing in Quebec City, Quebec, with financial support from the Canadian Institutes of Health Research

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: ናይ ክታበት ሕጹያት ኣብ ላባራቶሪ ምርምር እዮም ዘለዉ። እቲ መደብ ንሓምለ ወይ ጥቕምቲ 2020 ኣብ ደቂሰባት ፈተነ ንምጅማር እዩ።
en-mt: Vaccine candidates are in laboratory research. The plan is to start human trials in July or October

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: ኣብቲ መጀመርያ ሰሙን ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስትታት ኣሜሪካፕረዚደንት ዶናልድ ትራምፕ ክዩርቫክ”ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ ገንዘብ” ንምእታው ክታበት ኮቪድ 19 ንምረኻብ ከምዝወፈየ ጋርዲያን ኣመሓላሊፉ፡ መንግስቲ ጀርመን ከኣ ተቃዊሙዎ።
en-mt: Earlier this week, the Guardian reported that US President Donald Trump had donated “a lot of money” to get a vaccine, but the German government opposed it.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 17, 2020፡ ኣመሪካዊ ናይ ፋርማሲ ትካል ፕፊዘር ምስ ናይ ጀርመን ትካል ባዮተክ ዝምድና ከም ዝገበረ ነጊሩ፡ ዕላማ ኡ ድማ ነቲ ኣብ mRNA-based ዝምርኮስ ክታበት ንምምዕባል ኢዩ።
en-mt: On March 17, 2020, US pharmaceutical giant Pfizer announced that it had entered into a partnership with a German biotech company to develop an mRNA-based vaccine.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: ኣብ mRNA ዝተመርኮሰ ክታበት ናይ BNT162 ግዝያዊ ሕጹይ  ቅድመ ክሊኒካዊ መርመራ ምስ ክሊኒካዊ መርመራ ኣብ ሚያዝያ 2020 ክጅመር ትጽቢት ይግበረሉ።
en-mt: Preclinical testing of an mRNA-based vaccine of BNT162 interim candidate with clinical testing is expected to begin in April 2020.

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: ኣብ 17, መጋቢት 2020፡ ታኪስ ባዮ-ተክ ዝተባህለ ናይ ጣልያን ናይ መድሃኒት ዝምስርሕ ትካል፡ ቅድመ-ክሊኒካዊ ውጽ ኢት ኣብ መጋቢት 2020፡ እቲ ናይ መወዳእታ ናይ ክታበት መወዳደሪ ውጽ ኢት ድማ ኣብ ከባኢ ምጅማር መስከረም ኣብ ሰባት ክፍትን ክጅምር ከም ዝኾነ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: On March 17, 2020, Taquis Bio-Tech, an Italian pharmaceutical company, announced that it will begin testing preclinical results in March 2020 and the final vaccine competitive results in humans around the beginning of September.

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: ኣብ ፈረንሳ፡ ኣብ 19 መጋቢት ናይ 2020፡ ውህደት ን ምልባዕ ናይ ምድላው ምሕዳስ (CEPI)፡ $4.9 ሚልዮን ዶላር ፡ ን ምምዕባል ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ክታበት ዝውዕል ኣብ ምርምር ኣዳልዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ፓስተር ኢንስቲቱት፡ ተሚስ ባዮ-ሳይንስ (ቬና ኣውስትራልያ)፡ ፒተስበርግ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዘጠቃለለ ኮይኑ፡ ናቲ ናይ CEPI ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ናይ ክታበት ምምዕባል ድምር ወፍሪ ናብ $29 ሚልዮን ዶላር ኣዕብይዎ
en-mt: In France, on March 19, 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Renewal (CEPI) provided $4.9 million for research into the development of a COVID-19 vaccine at the Pasteur Institute, Thames Bio-Science (Venna, Australia), Pittsburgh Including the University, Natty increased CEPI’s total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to $29 million

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: ናይ CEPI ካልእ ናይ ወፍሪ ኣዕሩኽ ን ኮቪድ-19 ክታበት ንምምዕባል እዞም ዝስዕቡ ኢዮም፡ ሞዴራ፡ ኩረቫክ፡ ኢኖቪኦ፡ ናቫቫክስ፡ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ሆን ኮንግ፡ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ኦክስፎርድ፡ ከምኡውን ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ክዊንስላንድ ኢዮም
en-mt: CEPI's other investment partners for the development of a COVID-19 vaccine are Modera, Kurevac, Inovio, Navavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: ኣብ 20 መጋቢት 2020 ተመራመርቲ ጥዕና ሩስያ ወግዓዊ ከምዝሓቦሮ ሹድሽተ ዓይነት ክታበት እንስሳ ፈተነ ጀሚሮም።
en-mt: On March 20, 2020, Russian health researchers officially announced that they have begun testing six animal vaccines.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ ኢምፐርያል ኮለጅ ናይ ሎንዶን ናይ መጽናዕቲ ጉጅለ፡ ኣብ 20 መጋቢት 2020፡ ነብሰ-ብርትዐ ዝውስኽ ሓደ ናይ RNA ክታበት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 የዳልዉ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: A research team at Imperial College London is developing an RNA vaccine for COVID-19 that boosts immunity on 20 March

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: ናይ ክታበት ሑጹያት ኣብ ውሽጢ 14 መዓልታት ካብ ቻይና እቲ መስርሕ ምስ ተቀበሉ ምዕባለታት ኣርእዮም።
en-mt: Vaccine candidates made progress within 14 days of receiving the process from China.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ መጋቢት መንግስቲ ካናዳ 275 ካናድያን ዶላር ን96 ምርምር ፕሮጀክትታት ሕምናዊ ኣንጻር ኮቪድ-19 ከምኡ’ውን ንቡዙሓት ናይ ክታበት ሑጺያት ትካላትን ዩኒቨርስታትን ከም በዓል መዲካጎን(Medicago) ዩኒቨርስቲ ናይ ሳስካቹዋን ከም ዝመወለ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: In late March, the Canadian government announced that it had funded C$275 for 96 research projects against the virus, as well as for several vaccine candidates and universities, such as Medicago University of Saskatchewan.

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: ኣብ ሓደ ግዜ መንግስቲ ካናዳ ናይ c$192 ሚልዮን ዝኸውን ክታበት ኮቪድ-19 ንምፍላይ ኣዊጃ።እቲ መደብ ከኣ ሃገራዊ "ክታበት ባንኪ "ንምምስራት እዩ።ከም ተወሳኺ ካልእ ክታበታት ከኣ ንመጻኢ ዝኾና ሓዲሽ ኮቪድ ንኸየጋጥም።
en-mt: At one point, the Canadian government announced the isolation of a c$192 million vaccine for COVID-19.The plan is to establish a national "vaccine bank.

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: ኣብ ሚያዝያ 2, 2020 ኣብ  ዩኒቨርሲቲ ፒትስበርግ ናይ ቤት ትምህርቲ መድሃኒት ዝለዉ ኣጽናዕቲ ናይ ፒትኮቫክ (PittCoVacc) ፈተነ ተክእሎታት ክታበት ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ኣናጹ ፈቲኖሞ። ከምዚ ኢሉ “MNA SARS-CoV-2 S1 ኣብጺሑክታበት ንኡስ ኣሃዱ ብቑዕ ኣንቲጀን ብፍሉይ ግብረ መልሲ ጸረ-ኣካላት ኣብ ኣናጹ ኣፍሊጡ።ክልተ ሰሙን ድሕሪ ዘይምጽያን መጅመርያ መርትዖ እዩ ነይሩ።
en-mt: On April 2, 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine tested the feasibility of the PittCoVacc trial of a COVID-19 vaccine in mice. “MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1vaccine subunit identified competent antigen with specific antibody response in mice.

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: ኣብ 16 መጋቢት 2020, ኣብ ካናዳ፡ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ዋተርሎ ናይ ፋርማሲ ቤትትምህርቲ፡ DNA-ዝተመርኮሰ ንድፊ ናይ ክታበት ንድፊ፡ ተወዳደርቲ ኣቕሪባ።
en-mt: On March 16, 2020, in Canada, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy presented a DNA-based vaccine design to competitors.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: ባክተርዮፌጅ (bacteriophages) ብምጥቃም፡ እቲ DNA ኣብ ውሽጢ ናይ ወዲ ሰብ ባክተርያ ኮይኑ ሓደ ዘይጋዳእ ቫይረስ ዝዓይነቱ ነገር ከፍሪ ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ስርዓተ ምክልኻል ብምልዓል ጸረ-ነፍሳት ኣንጻር SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስ፡ ዝዓለመ ከፍሪ ድማ ተኽእሎታት ኣሎ
en-mt: Using bacteriophages, the DNA can be inside a human bacterium to produce a harmless virus-like substance that is likely to stimulate the immune system to produce antibiotics against the SARS-CoV-2 virus

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020፡ መንግስቲ ኣሜሪካ፡ ትካል፡ ከምኡ’ውን 3 ዩኒቨርሲታት ካብ IBM ነተን ኣዝየን ቅልጡፋት ኮምፒተራት ክጥቀሙ ፍቃድ ረኺቦም፡ እዚ ድማ ብምትሕብባር ምስ ናይ ክላውድ ኮምፒቲንግ ማእከል ካብ ሃዋለት ፓካርድ ኢንተርፕሪሰ፡ ኣማዞን፡ ማይክሮሶፍት፡ ከምኡ’ውን ጎግለ፡ ዝተገብረ ኢዩ
en-mt: In March 2020, the US government, an organization, and three universities received permission from IBM to use the fastest computers in collaboration with cloud computing centers from Hawalet Packard Enterprises, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: ገለገለ ክታበታት ሕውስዋስ ጽልዋ ወይንጹር ዘይኮነ ጽልዋ ዝብሃል ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Some vaccines have what is called a mixed effect or an unclear effect.

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ካብቲ ዝከላኸሎ ሕማም ሓሊፉ፡ ክልቲኦም ጥቅሚታት ይለዋወጡ ኢዮ።
en-mt: This goes beyond the disease it prevents, and the two benefits are interchangeable.

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: እቲ ካልእ ብሃውሪ ዝግበር ፈተነ ኣብ ኣውስትራልያ ድማ፡ 4170 ሰራሕተኛታት ናይ ጥዕና ይደሊ
en-mt: The other urgent trial in Australia requires 4,170 health workers

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: እቶም ክታበታት ኣብ ምዕባለታት ለውጢ ዘይከምጽኡ ተኽእሎታት ከም ዘለዎም ድማ ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The vaccines are likely not to change developments.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: ኣቀዲሙ ዝነበረ ምርምር ናይ ክታበታት ርክበታት ቅማረ ብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ፍሉያት ሞደል ክኾኑና ዝኽእሉ እንስታት፡ ተሞርኪሶም ከም ACE2 ናብ ኣናጹ ብምትሕልላፍ፡ ካልኦት ምርምር እንስታትን ከምኡዉን ሰባት ዘይኮኑ መጥበዉትን፡ ከም ዝሕብርዎ ስነሂወታዊ-ውሕስነት ደረጃ 3 ናይ ምቁጽጻር መስርሕ ነቶም ብሂወት ዘለዉ ቫይረስን ከምኡውን ዓለማዊ ምትሕብባር ደረጃ ዝሓለወ ናይ ውሕስነት ምድላው ኣንፈት ከም ዝህብ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Previous research of vaccine contacts combined with animal models of COVID-19, such as ACE2, has been transferred to mice, and other animal research and non-human mammals have suggested a biological-safety level 3 control process for live viruses and global cooperation that it provides direction for a standardized security arrangement.

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: ክታበት ኣንጻር ሳርስ መርስን ኣብ ሰባት ዘይኮኒ እንስሳታት ተፈቲኑ።
en-mt: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animals.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: ክሳብ 2020፡ ዝኾነ ን ደቂ-ሰባት ውሑስን ውጽኢታዊን ዝኾነ ፈውሲ ወይ መከላኸሊ ክታበት ናይ SARS የለን
en-mt: Until 2020, there is no cure or vaccine for SARS that is safe and effective for humans

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: ብመሰረት እቲ ኣብ 2005 ን 2006 ዝተገብረ ን ዝተሓትመ መጽናዕቲ፡ እቲ ምፍላጥን ምምዕባልን ናይ ኖቨል ክታበትን መድሃኒታትን ን ምፍዋስ SARS፡ ን መንግስታት ን ናይ ህዝቢ ጥዕና ማእከላትን ኣብ ዓለም ቀዳምነተን ኢዩ ኔሩ ከም ተወሳኺ ን MERS ተባሂሉ ዝተሰርሐ ዝተረጋገጸ መድሃኒት የሎን
en-mt: According to the study published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and drugs to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health centers around the world

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: MERS  ልሙድ ምስ ኮነ ናይ SARS መጽናዕቲ ምክያዱ ንምዕባለ ክታበትን ኣንጻር መልከፍቲ MERS-CoV  ኣዝዩ ሓጋዚ ብልሒ ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Conducting SARS research when MERS becomes common may be a very helpful intelligence for vaccine development and against MERS-CoV infection.

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: ካብ መጋቢት 2020 ጀሚሩ ሓደ (ኣብ ዲ ኤን ኤ ዝተሞርከሰ) መርስ( MERS) ክታበት ቀዳማይ ገጽ ናይ ክሊኒካዊ ፈተነ ዝዛዘመ ኣብ ወዲ ሰብ ንካልኦት ሰለስተ ቫይራል-ቬክቶርድ ክታበት(viral-vectored vaccines) ዝኾኑ (ክልተ ኣደኖቪራል ቬክቶርድ(adenoviral-vectored)) (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac)፣ሓደ ድማ ኤም ቪ ኤ(MVA) ቬክቶርድ(MVA-MERS-S) ኣብ መስርሕ ነበሩ
en-mt: Since March 2020, a (DNA-based) MERS vaccine has completed the first phase of clinical trials in humans for three other viral-vectored vaccines (two adenoviral-vectored) ( ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac),and one MVA vector (MVA-MERS-S) were in process

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: ማሕበራዊ ማዕከናት ንውዲት ክልሰ-ሓሳብ እዚ ቫይረስ ብድሕሪት ኮቪድ-19 ዘሎ ከም ዝተፈልጠ ንክታበት’ውን ከም ዘሎ ኣፍሊጠን።
en-mt: Social media has announced that the conspiracy theory behind COVID-19 has been discovered and there is a vaccine.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: እቶም ምስክራት ብብዙሕ ዝርጉሕ ማሕበራዊ መራከቢታት ዝጠቀሱ ዝነበሩ ምስክራት ናይ ተኸታታሊ ዉርሻዊ ከምኡ’ዉን መድሃኒታት ናይ ዝተፈላለዩ ዝተዳከሙ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ከም በዓል ሳርስ ኮሮና ቫይረስ።
en-mt: The testimonies were quoted by many widespread social media testimonies of a series of hereditary as well as drugs of various weakened coronaviruses such as SARS coronavirus.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: ሕማም ኮሮና ቫይረስ(ኮቪድ-19) ብብርቱዕን ቅጽበታውን እስትንፋሳዊ ምልከት ሕማም ኮሮና ቫይረስ 2 ወይ SARS-CoV-2 ተባሂሉ ብዝጽዋዕ ቫይረስ ዝስዕብ ተላባዒ ወይ ተመሓላላፊ ሕማም ኢዩ።
en-mt: Coronavirus disease(COVID-19) is an infectious or communicable disease caused by a virus called coronavirus 2 or SARS-CoV-2 with severe and immediate respiratory symptoms.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: ልሙዳት ምልክታት ረስኒ፡ ሰዓል ከምኡውን ሕጽረት ምስትንፋስ የጠቃልሉ።
en-mt: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: ካለኦት ምልክታት እዞም ዝስዕቡ የጠቓልል፡ ብርቱዕ ድኻም፡ቅርጥማት ፡ውጽኣት፡ መቑሰልቲ ናይ ጎሮሮ፡ ሽታ ዘይምልላይ፡ ቕርጸት።
en-mt: Other symptoms include the following: extreme fatigue, cramping ,vomiting, sore throat, loss of smell, rash.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: እቲ ካብታ ቫይረስ ናብ ነብስኻ ዝኣቱ ናብቲ ምክታት ዝጂምረልካ ዝወስደልካ መ ዓልታት ክሳብ ሓሙሽተ መዓልታት ሙኻኑ ይግምገም፡ እንተኾነ ካብ ክልተ ክሳብ ዓሰርተ-ኣርባዕተ መዓልታት ከኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: The days it takes from the virus entering your body to the time you start fighting is estimated to be up to five days, but it can range from two to fourteen days.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: ዝበዝሕ ውጽኢት ድኹም ምልክታት ኣብ ዝኮነሉ ፡ዉሑድ ዕቤት ቫይራል ኒሞንያን ብዙሓት ህዋሳትን የዳኽምን።
en-mt: Where most results are weak symptoms , less growth of viral pneumonia and weakening of many senses.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: ክሳብ 17 ሚያዝያ 2020፡ ልዕሊ 2.24 ሚልዮን ግዳያት ናይ 210 ሃገራትን ግዝኣታትን ጸብጻብ ተጌሩ ካብዚ ድማ ልዕሊ 153,000 መጠነ ሞት ተራእዩ።
en-mt: As of April 17, 2020, more than 2.24 million victims from 210 countries and territories have been reported, with more than 153,000 deaths.

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: ልዕሊ 568,000 ሰባት ጥዕናኦም ናብ ንቡር ተመሊሱ። እዚ ቫይረስ ብ ብቀዳምነት ኣብ መንጎ ሰባት ዝስፍሕፋሓሉ ርሕቀት ኣብ ዘይብሉ ሞት እክብካብ ብዓል ምስዓል፡ ምሕንጣስ፡ ምዝርራብን ዝፍጠሩ ኣዝዮም ደቀቅቲ ማይ መሰል ነጠብጣብ መገዲ ኣቢሉ።
en-mt: More than 568,000 people have recovered. The virus is primarily spread between people through death clusters such as coughing, sneezing, and talking through very tiny water droplets.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: እዚ ንጣባት ክሳዕ ዝፈረየ፡ትንፋስ ኣብ ዝወጻሉ ኩሉ ግዜ፡ ተለኺፉ ከሎ ነዊሕ መገዲ  ከይከደ ኣብ ምድሪ ወይ ኣብ ልዕሊ ምድሪ ይወድቕ።
en-mt: Until these droplets are produced,every time they breathe out, they fall to the ground or surface without going a long way when they are infected.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: ሰባት ምናልባት ነቲ ዝተበከለ ኣከባቢ ብምሓዝ ጸኒሖም ኣፎም፡ ኣፍንጫኦም ወይ ኣዒንቶም ብምሓዝ ክብከሉ ይኽእሉ ኢዮም።
en-mt: People may become contaminated by touching the contaminated environment and later by touching their mouth, nose, or eyes.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብ ባይታ ክሳብ 72 ሰዓታት ክጸንሕ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The virus can stay on the ground for up to 72 hours.

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: ካብቲ ምልክታት ክ ኣይ  ዝጂምር ክሳብ ሰለስተ ማዓልታት ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ ንምምሕልላፍ እቲ ኣዝዩ ዝመቸአ ግዜ ኢዩ፡ ወላካ እቲ ምምሕልላፍ ምልክታት ከይጀመረ ክትግበር እንተኸኣለ። እቲ ደረጃ ኡ ዝሓለወ ናይ ሕክምና ኣገባብ እዚ real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) ካብ ናይ ጎሮሮ ቅምሶ ብምውሳድ ዝግበር ኢዩ።
en-mt: Up to three days from the onset of symptoms is the best time to transmit, even if the transmission can be done before symptoms start. The standard treatment is this real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) by taking a throat sample.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: ነቶም በዚ ቫይረስ ዝተለኽፉን ነቶም ተኸናኸንቶምን ፡ ማስክ ክጥቀሙ ኣገዳሲ ኢዩ።
en-mt: For those infected with the virus and their caregivers , it is important to wear masks.

sourceString: Recommendations for mask use by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use, and others requiring their use.
targetString: ኣብ ኣጠቓቕማ ኣፍ መሸፈኒ ዘሎ ኣተሓሳስባ ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ይፈላለ እዩ፡ ገለ በዓል መዚ ኣንጻር ዘይምጥቃም፡ገለ ምጥቃም፡ገለ`ውን ጥቕሙ ይሓቱ።
en-mt: Attitudes toward the use of masks vary from person to person, with some authorities against not using them, some using them, and some asking for their benefits.

sourceString: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: ክሳብ ሕጂ ፍሉጥ ጸረ ቫይራል ክንክን ወይ ክታበት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ኣይተረኽበን።
en-mt: There is no known antiviral treatment or vaccine for COVID-1

sourceString: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.
targetString: ውሽጣዊ ምምሕልላፍ  ሕማም ኣብ ዝበዝሓ ሃገራትን ሽዱሽተ ዓለምለኻዊ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ዞባታትን ብምውሳኽ ተመዝጊቡ።
en-mt: Internal transmission was recorded in more countries and six World Health Organization (WHO) regions increasingly.

sourceString: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or develop flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.
targetString: እዞም በዚ ቫይረስ ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት ኣሲምፕቶቲክ (ምልክት ናይ ሕማም ዘይብሎም ግዳያት ኣመሓላለፍቲ ሕማም) ወይ ድማ ሰዓል ዝመስል ምልክታት ከም ረስኒ፡ ምስዓል፡ ድኻም፡ ከምኡውን ሕጽረት ምስትንፋስ ዝኣመሰሉ ምልክታት ከርእዩ ይኽእሉ ኢዮም።
en-mt: These infected people may show asymptotic (symptoms of asymptomatic infectious disease victims) or fever-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.
targetString: ህጹጽ ምልክታት ከም በዓል ብርቱዕ ሕጽረት ምስትንፋስ፡ብርቱዕ ቃንዛ ኣፍልቢ፡ወይ ጸቕጢ፡ዕግርግር፡ናይ ምንቅስቓስ ጸገም፡ምጽምላው ገጽን ከንፈርን፡እዞም ምልክታት እዚኦም እንተተራእዮም ብቕልጥፍ ሕክምናዊ ኣቓልቦ ክግበረሎም ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Emergency symptoms such as severe shortness of breath, severe chest pain, or pressure, agitation, difficulty moving, darkening of the face and lips, should seek immediate medical attention if these symptoms occur.

sourceString: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be seen.
targetString: ኣብ ሓጺር ግዜ ናይ ላዕለዋይ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ ምልክታት፡ ምዕንጣስ፡ ጸረርታ ኣፍንጫ፡ ድርቀት ጎሮሮ ክረአ ይከኣል።
en-mt: Upper respiratory symptoms, sneezing, runny nose, and dry throat may soon appear.

sourceString: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea have been observed in varying percentages.
targetString: ናይ ከብዲ/ስቶማኮ ምልክታት ከም ዕግርግር ምባል፡ ተምላስ፡ ውጽኣት፡ ብብዙሕ ሚእታዊት ተራእዩ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Abdominal/stomach symptoms such as nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, were seen in a large percentage.

sourceString: Some cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.
targetString: ገለ ግዳያት ኣብ ቻይና ካብ መጀመርያ ናይ ኣፍልቢ ቃንዛን ጸቕጢን ዝነበሮም ኔሮም።
en-mt: Some victims in China had chest pain and pressure from the beginning.

sourceString: In some, the disease may progress to pneumonia, multi-organ failure, and death.
targetString: ኣብ ገለ፡ እቲ ሕማም ናብ ኒሞንያ ክሰጋገር ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ በዚ ድማ ብዙሓት ህዋሳት ካብ ስራሕ ወጻኢ ክኾኑን ሞት ውን ከስዕብ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: In some, the disease can progress to pneumonia, causing many senses to become dysfunctional and death.

sourceString: This is called the incubation period.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ናይ ምጭጫሕ ጊዜ ይባሃል።
en-mt: This is called the hatching period.

sourceString: The incubation period for COVID-19 is typically five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.
targetString: ከም ልሙድ ኮቪድ-19 ዝዓኮሉ ግዜ ካብ 5 ክሳብ 6 ማዓልታት ወይ ውን ካብ 2 ክሳብ 14 ማዓልታት ክወስድ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Typically, the incubation period for COVID-19 can take 5 to 6 days or 2 to 14 days.

sourceString: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection.Reports indicate that not all who are infected develop symptoms.
targetString: መብርሂታት ከም ዘመልክቶ ኩሎም እቶም ዝተለኽፉ ምልክታት ምዕባለ የርእዩ ማለት ኣይኮነን፡ 97.5% ምልክታት ምዕባለ ዘለዎም ሰባት ኣብ ውሽጢ 11.5 ማዓልታት መልከፍቲ ይረአ።
en-mt: Explanations indicate that not all infected people show symptoms, 97.5% of people with symptoms develop within 11.5 days of infection.

sourceString: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not yet fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.
targetString: እቲ ግደ ናይዞም ኣሲምፕቶቲክ (ምልክት ናይ ሕማም ዘይብሎም ግዳያት ኣመሓላለፍቲ ሕማም) ኣማሓላለፍቲ ኣብ ግዜ ምምሕልላፍ ክሳብ ሕጂ ምሉእ ብ ምሉእ ኣይተፈልጠን፡ እንተኾነ ቀዳማይ መረጋገጺ ከም ዝሕብሮ ኣብቲ ምምሕልላፍ ኢድ ክህልዎም ከም ዝኽእል ኢዩ፡
en-mt: The role of these asymptotic (asymptomatic victims of infectious disease) vectors during transmission is still not fully understood, but preliminary evidence suggests that they may be involved in transmission:

sourceString: The proportion of infected people who do not display symptoms is currently unknown and being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remained asymptomatic during their hospital stay.
targetString: መጠን ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት ግን ከኣ ምልክታት ናይዚ ሕማም ዘየርእዩ ክሳብ ሕጂ ዘይተፈልጠን ኣብ መጽናዕቲ ዘሎን ኮይኑ፡ ኣብ ኮርያ ዝመደበሩ ማእከል ምክልኻል ሕማማት (KCDC) 20 ሚእታዊት ናይ በዚ ሕማም ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት አብ ሆስፒታል አብ ዝነበርዎ ግዜ ዝኾነ ምልክታት ናይዚ ሕማም ከምዘየርኣዩ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: The number of people infected but asymptomatic is still unknown and under study, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) saying 20 percent of infected people showed no symptoms while in hospital.

sourceString: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on 1 April; of the 166 infections on that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.
targetString: ቻይና ዓለምለኻዊ መዚ ጥዕና፡ ምልክት ሕማም ዘለዎ ማዓልታዊ ጉዳይ ዘማእከለ ኣብ ሚያዝያ 1 ጀሚሩ። 166 ልኹፋት ኣብዛ ማዓልቲ እዚኣ፡ 130 ( 78%) ኣብ ግዜ መርመራ ምልክት ሕማም ኔርዎም።
en-mt: China's World Health Authority launched a symptomatic daily case center on April 166 infected on this day, 130 ( 78%) had symptoms at the time of diagnosis.

sourceString: Both sputum and saliva can carry large viral loads.
targetString: ዓኽታን ጥፍጣፍን ሰፊሕ ናይ ቫይረስ ዝርግሐ ከመሓላልፉ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: Coughs and sneezes can transmit a wide range of viruses.

sourceString: Loud talking releases more droplets than normal talking.
targetString: ሃተውቶው ምባል  ካብ ልሙድ ኣዘራርባ ዝበሐ ነጠብታ ይፍኑ።።
en-mt: Hate speech releases more drops than ordinary speech.

sourceString: A study in Singapore found that an uncovered cough can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 meters (15 feet).
targetString: ኣፍካ ከይሸፈንካ ምስዓል ክሳብ 4.5 ሜትሮ ወይ 15 ጫማ ክጉዓዝ ዝኽእል ነጠብጣብ ከምዘስዕብ ኣብ ሲንጋፖር ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ የረጋግጽ።
en-mt: Coughing without covering your mouth can cause droplets that can travel up to 4.5 meters or 15 feet, according to a study in Singapore.

sourceString: Though the virus is not generally airborne, the National Academy of Science has suggested that bioaerosol transmission may be possible and air collectors positioned in the hallway outside of people's rooms yielded samples positive for viral RNA.
targetString: ሽሕ'ኳ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ኣየር ዘንሳፍፍ እንተዘይኮነ ዓለምለኻዊ ኮለጅ ስነ-ፍልጠት ብያሮዛል ምትሕልላፍ ከምዝከኣልን መብርሂ ሂቦም።ኣከብቲ ኣየር ካብ ቤት ወጻኢ ኣብ ኮሮድዮታት ኮይኖም ናይ ቫይራል RNA ኣወንታዊ ምስክርነት ሂቦም።
en-mt: Although the virus does not float in the air, the International College of Science explained that it can be transmitted by yarozal.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolised and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ናይ ሕክምና መምርሒታት፡ ከም intubation (ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጸገም ንዘለዎም ሰብ ዝሰርሖ ትቦ ናይ ኣካላቶም ናይ ምእታው መስርሕ) ከምኡ`ውን ካርድዮ-ፓልሞናሪ ረሱሲሽን (cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR))፡ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሽግራት ከስዕብን ኣብ ምምሕልላፍ ናይ ብ ኣየር ዝመሓላለፉ ሕማማት ኣወንታዊ ሓገዝ ክግብርን ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Some medical instructions, such as intubation (the process of inserting a man-made body tube for people with breathing problems) and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), can cause respiratory problems and positively help in the transmission of airborne diseases and can be implemented.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread via feces, this risk is believed to be low.The virus is most contagious when people are symptomatic; while spread may be possible before symptoms emerge, the risk is low.
targetString: ወላካ ብ ቀልቀል ክመሓላለፍ ከም ዝኽእል ስክፍታ እንተሎ፡ እቲ ሓደጋ ኣዝዩ ውሑድ ኢዩ። እቶም ሰባት ሲምፕቶቲክ (ምልክታት ከለዎም ሕማም ዘመሓላልፉ) ኣብ ዝኾኑሉ እቲ ቫይረስ ተጋዳኢ/ተመሓላላፊ ኣይኮነን፡ እንተኾነ ወላ`ውን ቅድሚ ምልክታት ምጅማር እቲ ምትሕልላፍ ተኽእሎታት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Although there are concerns that it can be transmitted by roots, the risk is very low. When the people are symptomatic, the virus is not contagious, but there is a possibility of transmission even before symptoms start.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: ማእከል ምቁጽጻርን ምክልኻልን ሕማማት ኤውሮጳ ኢሲዲሲ ((ECDC))  ከምዝበሎ፡ ምስፍሕፋሕ እዚ ሕማም ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ብምንታይ ከምዝመሓላለፍ እንተዘይ ተፈሊጡ፡ሓደ ሰብ ብሓፈሻ ክልተ ወይ ሰለስተ ክልክም ይኽእል። እዚ ቫይረስ ካብ ሰዓታት ክሳብ ማዓልትታት ኣብ መሬት ክገብር ይኽእል።
en-mt: According to the European Center for Disease Control and Prevention (ECDC), if the outbreak is not fully known, a person can infect two or three people in total. The virus can stay on the ground for hours to days.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for one day on cardboard, for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and for up to four hours on 99% copper.
targetString: ብንጹር ቫይረስ ኣብ ካርቶን ኣብ ሓደ ማዓልቲ ተለልዩ፡ኣብ ፕላስቲክን ((polypropylene)) ኣብ መንቅብ ዘይብሉ ኣቻዮን ን ((AISI 304),) ሰለስተ ማዓልቲ፡ኣብ ነሓሲ ን ኣርባዕተ ሰዓታት 99%ተረኺቡ.
en-mt: Clearly virus was detected in cartons in one day, 99% in plastic and ((polypropylene)) in flawless acheo for ((AISI 304),) three days, and in copper for four hours.

sourceString: This, however, varies depending on the humidity and temperature.
targetString: እንተኾነ እዚ ኣብቲ ጠሊን ሙቐትን ይምርኮስ።
en-mt: However, this depends on the dew and temperature.

sourceString: Soap and detergent are also effective if correctly used; soap products degrade the virus' fatty protective layer, deactivating it, as well as freeing them from skin and other surfaces.
targetString: ሳሙናን መጽረይቲን (detergent)፡ ብጉቡእ ኣብ እንጥቀመሎም እዋን ኣዝዮም ውጽኢታውያን ኢዮም፡ ውጽኢት ናይ ሳሙና ነቲ ስብሒ ዘለዎ ሽፋን ናይ ቫይረስ ብቀሊሉ ክኣልይዎ ዝኽእል ሙኻኑ ኢዩ፡ በዚ ድማ ወይ ካብ ኣእዳው ብቀሊሉ ይኣልይዎም ወይ ድማ ይቀትልዎም።
en-mt: Soap and detergent are very effective when used properly. The result of soap is that they can easily remove the greasy coating of viruses, thus either removing them from the hands or killing them.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical disinfectant), are less effective.In a Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken a median of two days after the start of hospitalization.
targetString: ካልኦት ሕውስዋሳት፡ ከም ኣብነት፡  benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (መምከኒ ናይ መጥባሕቲ)፡ ትሑት ዝኾነ ውጽኢት ኣለዎም፡ ኣብ ሆንግ ኮንግ ኣብ ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ፡ ናይ ጥፍጣፍ ቅምሶትት ንምምርማር ድሕሪ ናይ ሕሙም ሕክምና ኣገልግሎት ምጅማር ብውሓዲ 2 መዓልታት ወሲዱ።
en-mt: Other compounds, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical anesthetic), have lower effectiveness, and in a study in Hong Kong, it took at least 2 days after the patient started treatment to test cotton swabs.

sourceString: In five of six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day tested.
targetString: ካብቶም ሽዱሽተ ሕሙማት እቶም ሓሙሽተ፡ እቲ ቀዳማይ ቅምሶ ብዝሒ ዘለዎ ቫይረስ ተራእይዎ፡  እቲ ሻዱሻይ ግዳይ/ሕሙም ድማ ኣብቲ ናይ ካልኣይ መዓልቲ መርመራ ዝበዝሐ ቫይረስ ተራእይዎ።
en-mt: For five of the six patients, the first sample showed a large amount of virus, and the sixth victim/patient showed the most virus on the second-day test.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: ቢድ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሲንድሮም ኮሮናቫይረስ ክልተ (Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2  (SARS-CoV-2)) ኖቨል ከቢድ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሲንድሮም ኮሮናቫይረስ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብ ዉሃን ካብ ዝተረክቡ ሰለስተ ግዳያት ናይ ኒሞንያ ዝተፈልየ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Bid Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe respiratory syndrome coronavirus that is isolated from three pneumonia victims in Wuhan.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.
targetString: ኩሎም ባህርያት ናይ ኖቨል SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ካልኦት ዓይነት ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ይርከቡ ኢዮም።
en-mt: All characteristics of the novel SARS-CoV-2 are found in other strains of the coronavirus.

sourceString: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: ካብ ኣካላት ሰብ ወጻኢ፡ እዚ ቫይረስ በዚ ናይ ገዛ መሳርሒ ክጠፍእ ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ምስቲ ቀንዲ SARS-CoV ዝምድና ዘለዎ SARS-CoV-2 መሸፈኒ ብምእላይ ኢዩ ዝትግበር።
en-mt: Outside the human body, the virus can be destroyed by this household device by removing the SARS-CoV-2 mask that is related to the main SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The lungs are the organs most affected by COVID-19 because the virus accesses host cells via the enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is most abundant in the type II alveolar cells of the lungs.
targetString: ሳናቡእ እተን ብ ኮቪድ-19 ክትንከፋ ዝኽእላ ተነቀፍቲ ኣካላት ኮይነን፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ቫይረስ ነቶም ኣኣንገድቲ ዋህዮታት ብ ኢንዛይም ኣንጎተሲ-ቀያሪ ኢንዛይም 2 (ACE2)፡ እቲ ኣዝዩ ዓብላሊ ኣብ ዓይነት II ኣሎቨር ናይ ሳምቡእ ዋህዮ፡ ጌሩ ስለ ዝቀጻጸሮ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The lungs are the most vulnerable organs to be affected by COVID-19 because the virus controls the host cells by the enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), the most dominant type II lung cell allover.

sourceString: The virus uses a special surface glycoprotein called a "spike" (peplomer) to connect to ACE2 and enter the host cell.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ ነቲ ፍሉይ ግልይኮፕሮቲን (glycoprotein) "spike" (peplomer) ዝበሃል ባይታ ብምጥቃም፡ ናብ ACE2 ከላገብን ናብቲ ኣኣንጋዲ ዋህዮ ኽኣቱን ይኽእል።
en-mt: The virus uses a special glycoprotein called a "spike" (peplomer) to bind to ACE2 and enter the host cell.

sourceString: Acute cardiac injury was found in 12% of infected people admitted in hospital in Wuhan, China, and is more frequent in severe disease.
targetString: ከቢድ ናይ ልቢ መዱዳእቲ ኣብቶም 12% ናይቶም ዝተለኽፉን ናብ ሕክምና ናይ ዉሃን፣ ቻይና፡ ዝኣተዉን ተራእዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ከበድቲ ሕማማት ብብዝሒ ዝረአ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Severe cardiac arrest was seen in 12% of those infected and admitted to the Wuhan, China, hospital, which is more common in serious illnesses.

sourceString: Rates of cardiovascular symptoms is high, owing to the systemic inflammatory response and immune system disorders during disease progression, but acute myocardial injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.
targetString: ኣብ ግዜ ምዕባለ ሕማም ብዝርአ ተኣፋፊ ግብረ-መልስን ናይ ስርዓተ-ምክልኻል ምምዝባልን፡ ደረጃ ናይ ልቢ ምልክታት ልዑል እኳ እንተኾነ፡ ንጡፍ ናይ ማዮካርዲያል (myocardial) ጉድኣት ግን ምስ አብ ልቢ ዝርከቡ ACE2 ዝተባህሉ ተቀበልቲ ክተኣሳሰር ይኽእል’ዩ።
en-mt: Although the level of cardiac symptoms is high due to the acute reaction and immune dysfunction during disease progression, active myocardial damage may be associated with ACE2 receptors in the heart.

sourceString: ACE2 receptors are highly expressed in the heart and are involved in heart function.
targetString: ተቀበልቲ ACE2 ኣብ ልቢ ብብዝሒ ይርከቡ፡ ኣብ ናይ ልቢ ስረሓት ድማ ብብዝሒ ይሳተፉ።
en-mt: ACE2 receptors are abundant in the heart and are heavily involved in cardiac function.

sourceString: A high incidence of thrombosis (31%) and venous thromboembolism (25%) have been found in ICU patients with COVID-19 infections and may be related to poor prognosis.Autopsies of people who died of COVID-19 have found diffuse alveolar damage (DAD), and lymphocyte-containing inflammatory infiltrates within the lung.
targetString: ኣብ ህጹጽ ረዲኤት ተዓቊቦም ኣብ ዘለዉ ሕሙማት ኮቪድ-19፡ ልዑል ጽልዋ ርግኣት ደምን(31%) ቨይናዊ ጸቅጥን(25%) ኣብ ክፍሊ ኢመርጀንሲ ወይ (ICU) ከምዘሎ ተረኺቡ፡ እዚ ድማ ምስ ድኹም ዝኾነ ቅድመ-ገምጋም ክተኣሳሰር ይኽእል ኢዩ። ብኮቪድ-19 ተለኺፎም ኣብ ናይ ዝሞቱ ሰባት ሬሳታት አብ ዝተገብረ መርመራ ዝተበተነ ውስጠ-ግርጻናዊ ጉድኣት( DAD)ን ዝነደረ ዛዕጒ ሊምፍ ኣብ ሳምቡእን ከምዝተረኽበ የነጽር።
en-mt: Among COVID-19 patients admitted to the emergency department, there is a high incidence of blood clots (31%) and venous pressure (25%) in the emergency department or (ICU), which may be associated with poor prognosis. Autopsies of people who died of COVID-19 revealed diffuse intracranial damage ( DAD) and inflamed lymph nodes in the lungs.

sourceString: Although SARS-COV-2 has a tropism for ACE2-expressing epithelial cells of the respiratory tract, patients with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hyperinflammation.
targetString: ዋላካ SARS-COV-2 ን ACE2-ገላጺ ናይ አፒተልያል ዋህዮ ኣብ መተንፈሲ ትቦ፡ ክጠውዮ ይኽኣል፡ እቶም ከቢድ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ሕማም ዘለዎም ናይ ስይስተማቲክ ብርቱዕ ናይ ነድሪ ምልክታት ዘለዎም ተሓከምቲ ኢዮም።
en-mt: Although SARS-COV-2 can infect ACE2-expressing epithelial cells in the respiratory tract, patients with severe COVID-19 disease have systemic severe inflammatory symptoms.

sourceString: In particular, pathogenic GM-CSF-secreting T-cells were shown to correlate with the recruitment of inflammatory IL-6-secreting monocytes and severe lung pathology in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ብፍላይ ድማ፡ ሰበባት ሕማም GM-CSF-ዝዓቆሩ T-cells፡ ምስቲ ምምዳብ ናይ ነድሪ IL-6-መዕቆሪ ሞኖሳይት (monocytes) ከቢድ ናይ ሳንቡእ ሰበባት ሕማምን፡ ምትሕግጋዝ ከምዘርኣዩ ተፈቲሹ።
en-mt: Specifically, it was examined whether pathogenic GM-CSF-storing T-cells showed synergy with the classification of inflammatory IL-6-secreting monocytes and severe lung pathology.

sourceString: Lymphocytic infiltrates have also been reported at autopsy.
targetString: ዛዕጊ ልይምፕሆክይቲክ (Lymphocytic) ውን ካብ መርመራ ሬሳ ተማሕላሊፉ።
en-mt: Lymphocytic tumors were also transmitted from autopsy.

sourceString: The WHO has published several testing protocols for the disease.
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ ውድብ ጥዕና (WHO) ዝተፈላለየ መርመራ ብዛዕባ ኮሮናቫይረስ ኣብ መንጎ ሰብ መዚ ኣሕቲሙ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has published a variety of tests on the coronavirus among authorities.

sourceString: The standard method of testing is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: እቲ ግቡእ ኣገባባት ናይ መርመራ real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) ኢዩ።
en-mt: The proper methods of testing are real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: The test is typically done on respiratory samples obtained by a nasopharyngeal swab; however, a nasal swab or sputum sample may also be used.
targetString: እቲ መርመራ በቲ  ቅምሶ ናይ ጎሮሮ ዓኽታ ካብ መስተንፈሲ ጎሮሮ ብምውሳድ ኢዩ ዝግበር፡ እንተኾነ ናይ ኣፍንጫ ቅምሶ ወይ ጥፍጣፍ ውን ነቲ ቅምሶ ክትክኦ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: The test is done by taking a throat sample from a throat breathing tube, but a nasal swab or cotton swab can also replace the sample.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to two days.
targetString: ብሓፈሻ ውጽኢታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ውሑዳት ሳዓታት ክሳብ ክልተ ማዓልትታት ክርከብ ዝከኣል እዩ።
en-mt: Results are generally available within a few hours to two days.

sourceString: Blood tests can be used, but these require two blood samples taken two weeks apart and the results have little immediate value.
targetString: ናይ ደም መርመራ ክጥቀም ይከኣል ኢዩ፡ ናይ ክልተ ሰሙን ርሕቀታት ዘለዎ ናይ ደም ቅምሶ ብምውሳድ መርመራ ክግበር ይከኣል ኢዩ፡ እቲ ውጽኢት ድማ ቁሩብ ማእከላይ ደረጃ ክህልዎ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Blood tests can be used, blood samples can be taken at two-week intervals, and the results can be slightly average.

sourceString: Chinese scientists were able to isolate a strain of the coronavirus and publish the genetic sequence so laboratories across the world could independently develop polymerase chain reaction (PCR) tests to detect infection by the virus.
targetString: ቻይናውያን ተመራመርቲ ስነ-ፍልጠት፡ ዓይነት ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ፈልዮም ጀነቲካዊ ኣሰራርዕኡ ከጽንዑ ክኢሎም ኣለዉ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝርከባ ላባራቶሪታት ነናተን PCR ዝተባህለ ልበዳ ሕማም ከለሊ ዝኽእል መርመራታት ከማዕብላ የኽእለን።
en-mt: Chinese scientists have been able to identify the strain of the coronavirus and study its genetic makeup, allowing laboratories around the world to develop their own PCR tests that can detect an outbreak.

sourceString: As of 4 April 2020, antibody tests (which may detect active infections and whether a person had been infected in the past) were in development, but not yet widely used.
targetString: ክሳብ መጋቢት 4, 2020፡ ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት መርመራ (ነቶም ንጡፋት ምልካፋት ክጸልዎም ዝኽእል፡ ከምኡ`ውን ነቶም ቅድሚ ሕጂ ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት) ኣብ ምምዕባል ኔሩ፡ እንተኾነ ክሳብ ሕጂ ብዙሕ ተጠቃምነት ኣይረኸበን ዘሎ።
en-mt: As of March 4, 2020, antibiotic testing (which can affect active infections, as well as previously infected people) was in development, but has not yet been widely used.

sourceString: The Chinese experience with testing has shown the accuracy is only 60 to 70%.
targetString: ናይ ቻይና ተመክሮ ኣብ መርመራ ካብ 60 ክሳብ 70% ልክዕነት ኣርእዩ።
en-mt: The Chinese experience in diagnosis showed an accuracy of 60 to 70%.

sourceString: The FDA in the United States approved the first point-of-care test on 21 March 2020 for use at the end of that month.Diagnostic guidelines released by Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University suggested methods for detecting infections based upon clinical features and epidemiological risk.
targetString: ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ FDA፡ ናይ መጀመርያ ነጥቢ ናይ ክንክን ኣብ 21 መጋቢት 2020 ኣረጋጊጹ።  ናይ መሐከሚ መሳርሒታት ካብ ዞንጋንሆስፒታል ናይ ዉሃን ዩኒቨርሲቲ፡ ኣብቲ ናይ አፒዶሞሎጂ ኣገባባትን ክሊኒካዊ መንገድታትን ብምሙርካስ ነቲ ልኹፍ ክፍለጠሉ ዝኽእል ኣገባብ ፈጢሮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: The US FDA approved the first point of care on March 21, Treatment devices from Zhongan Hospital of Wuhan University have developed a method to identify the infected person based on epidemiological methods and clinical pathways.

sourceString: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution are common in early infection.
targetString: ክልተኣዊ ጎድኒ ብዙሕ ገልበዳዊ ታሕቲ-መረጼን ብርሃን ጋራድነታት ምስ ወሰናይ፡ ዘይማዕረን ናይ መቀመጫ ዝርግሐ ኣብቲ ፈለማ ረኽሲ ልሙዳት እዮም።
en-mt: Bilateral multilateral under-selective light guardrails with marginal, uneven seat distribution are common in the initial infection.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving (lobular septal thickening with variable alveolar filling), and consolidation may appear as the disease progresses.
targetString: እቲ ሕማም እናማዕበለ ክኸይድ ከሎ፡ ሓውሲ ዓብላሊ ነድሪ ናይ ሽፋን ቆፎ ኣፍልቢ፡ ዘይንቡር ጽርገት(ምርቃቅ ናይ ክባዊ ቲሹ ምስ ሓውሰ-ግርጻናዊ ምምላእ)ን ብርታዐን ክርአ ይኽእል።
en-mt: As the disease progresses, mixed dominant inflammation of the chest cavity lining, abnormal clearance(thickening of circular tissue with mixed laryngeal filling) and severity may be seen.

sourceString: Few data are available about microscopic lesions and the pathophysiology of COVID-19.
targetString: ብዛዕባ ናይ ሚክሮስቾፕ ጉድኣት ን ፓቶፊሶሎጂ (pathophysiology) ናይ ኮቪድ-19ን ኣዝዩ ውሑድ  ውሑድ ሓበሬታ ኣሎ።
en-mt: There is very little information about microscope damage and the pathophysiology of COVID-1

sourceString: The main pathological findings at autopsy are:
targetString: እቲ ቀንዲ ናይ ኣመዓባብላ ሕማም  ውጽኣት ኣብ መመርመሪ።
en-mt: The primary developmental disorder of diarrhea on diagnosis.

sourceString: Macroscopy: pleurisy, pericarditis, lung consolidation and pulmonary oedema
targetString: ማይክሮስኮፓዊ (Macroscopy) ነድሪ ሽፋን ሰደራ፡ፐሪካርዲቲ (pericarditis)፡ውህደት ናይ ሳምቡእን ሳምቡኣዊ ኦዴማን
en-mt: Macroscopy Inflammation of the septum, pericarditis, combination of pulmonary and pulmonary edema

sourceString: Four types of severity of viral pneumonia can be observed:
targetString: ኣርባዕተ ዓይነታት ሓደጋታት ናይ ኒሞንያ በዚ ክትንተኑ ይኽእሉ፡
en-mt: Four types of pneumonia risks can be analyzed as follows:

sourceString: mild pneumonia: pulmonary oedema, pneumocyte hyperplasia, large atypical pneumocytes, interstitial inflammation with lymphocytic infiltration and multinucleated giant cell formation
targetString: ፎኪስ ኒሞንያ፡ ናይ ፑልሞናሪ ኦደና (pulmonary oedema)፡ ኒሞሳይት ሃይፐርፕላሳ (pneumocyte hyperplasia)፡ ዓብይቲ ኒሞሳይት (large atypical pneumocytes)፡ ናይ መዓንጣ ነድሪ ምስ ሊምፎሳይት ምዙራቕ (lymphocytic infiltration) ከምኡ`ውን ዝተባዝሐ ኒክለታይድ ዋህዮ (multinucleated giant) የጠቃልል።
en-mt: Focal pneumonia, pulmonary edema, pneumocyte hyperplasia, large atypical pneumocytes, intestinal inflammation with lymphocytic infiltration and multinu cleated giant) includes.

sourceString: severe pneumonia: diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) with diffuse alveolar exudates.
targetString: ከቢድ ኒሞንያ፡ ዝተዘርገሐ ናይ  alveolar መጉዳእቲ (DAD) ምስ ዝተዘርገሐ ናይ  alveolar አክሱደይት።
en-mt: Severe pneumonia, diffuse alveolar injury (DAD) with diffuse alveolar exudate.

sourceString: DAD is the cause of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and severe hypoxemia.
targetString: DAD ቀንዲ ጠንቂ ናይ acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS)ን ከቢድ hypoxemia ን ኢዩ።
en-mt: DAD is a major cause of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and severe hypoxemia .

sourceString: healing pneumonia: organisation of exudates in alveolar cavities and pulmonary interstitial fibrosis
targetString: ምፍዋስ ኒሞንያ፡ ኩነት ናይ ነዝዒ ኣብ ትንሓጋዊ ጓንጓታትን መንጎ ቋቁራዊ ጸሕጎትን።
en-mt: Treatment of pneumonia, a condition of discharge in the laryngeal cavities and between the larynx.

sourceString: Blood: disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC); leukoerythroblastic reaction
targetString: ደም፡ ውሽጠ ሱርደማዊ ምርጋእ (DIC) ልኮሪትሮብላስቲክ (leukoerythroblastic) ግብረ መልሲ ዘርጊሑ
en-mt: Blood: Diffuse intracranial coagulation (DIC) leukoerythroblastic reaction

sourceString: Preventive measures to reduce the chances of infection include staying at home, avoiding crowded places, washing hands with soap and water often and for at least 20 seconds, practising good respiratory hygiene and avoiding touching the eyes, nose or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: ንምጉዳል ዕድል፡ እዞም ዝስዕቡ መከላኸሊ ስጉምትታት እዮም፡ ካብገዛ ዘይምውጻእ፡ካብ እኩብ ሰባት ምርሓቕ፡ብሳሙናን ማይን ብውሑድ 20 ካልኢት ብተደጋጋሚ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ፡ ጽቡቕ ዝኾነ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ልምዲ ምጥራይ ፡ ዓይኒ፡ኣፍንጫ፡ኣፍ ብዘይተሓጽበ ኢድ ዘይምትንካፍ።
en-mt: To reduce the chance, the following preventive measures are: stay at home, stay away from crowds, wash your hands frequently with soap and water for at least 20 seconds , develop good breathing habits , avoid touching eyes, nose, mouth with unwashed hands.

sourceString: The CDC recommends covering the mouth and nose with a tissue when coughing or sneezing and recommends using the inside of the elbow if no tissue is available.
targetString: CDC ኣፍንጫናን ኣፍናን ፡ ክንህንጥስ እንከለና፡ ብ ሶፍት ወይ ጨርቂ ክንሽፍኖ ይመኽረና፡ እንተደኣ እዚ ዘይረኸብና ግን ብ ጉምቦ ኢዳና ጌርና ክንሽፍኖ ኣሎና።
en-mt: The CDC recommends covering our nose and mouth , when we cough, with a soft tissue or cloth, but if this is not available, we should cover it with a handkerchief.

sourceString: Proper hand hygiene after any cough or sneeze is encouraged.
targetString: ጉቡእ ጽሬት ኢድ ድሕሪ ምስዓል ወይ ምዕንጣስ ዝተተባበዐ እዩ።
en-mt: Proper hand hygiene is encouraged after coughing or sneezing.

sourceString: The CDC has recommended the use of cloth face coverings in public settings, in part to limit transmission by asymptomatic individuals.Social distancing strategies aim to reduce contact of infected persons with large groups by closing schools and workplaces, restricting travel and cancelling large public gatherings.
targetString: ኣብ እኩብ ህዝቢ ኣብ እንህልወሉ እዋን፡ CDC ነቲ ምሉእ ገጽ መሸፈኒ ክንጥቀመሉ ይመክር፡ ነቲ በቶም ኣሲምፕቶቲክ (ምልክት ናይ ሕማም ዘይብሎም ግዳያት ኣመሓላለፍቲ ሕማም) ሰባት ዝመሓላለፍ ውን ከጉድሎ ይኽእል። ናይ ማሕበራዊ ምርሕሕቅ መደባት ነቲ ምርካባት ናይ ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት ብዓቢ ቁጽሪ ቁጽሪ ከጉድሎ ይኽእል፡ እዚ ድማ ብ ምዕጻው ቤት-ትምህርትታትን ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታትን፡ ምሕጻር ጉዕዞን ከምኡውን ዓበይቲ ናይ ህዝቢ ምትእክካባት ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: When in crowds, the CDC recommends wearing the full face mask, which can also reduce transmission by asymptotic people. Social distancing programs can significantly reduce the number of infections, which can be through the closure of schools and workplaces, shortened travel and large public gatherings.

sourceString: Distancing guidelines also include that people stay at least 6 feet (1.8 m) apart.
targetString: ናይ ርሕቀት መምርሒታት፡ ሰባት 6 ፊት (1.8 ሜትሮ) ካብ ነንሕድሕዶም ክረሓሓቁ ከም ዘለዎም ይሕብር።
en-mt: Distance guidelines say people should stay 6 feet (1.8 meters) away from each other.

sourceString: There is no medication known to be effective at preventing COVID-19.As a vaccine is not expected until 2021 at the earliest, a key part of managing COVID-19 is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as "flattening the curve".
targetString: ኣድማዒ ዝኾነ ፍሉጥ መከላኸሊ ኮቪድ-19 የለን።ከም ክታበት ክሳብ መጀመርያ 2021 ትጽቢት ኣይግበረሉን።እቲ መፍትሕ ክፋል መቆጻጸሪ ኮቪድ-19 ልዕልና ለብዒ ከተጉድሎ ምፍታን እዩ፡ እዚ ኸኣ ``ምዕጻፍ ጸፍሒ`` ይባሃል።
en-mt: There is no known effective vaccine against COVID-1

sourceString: The CDC also recommends that individuals wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty, before eating and after blowing one's nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: CDC ፡ ውልቀሰባት መብዛሕኡ ግዜ ኣእዳዎም ብሳምናን ማይን ክሕጸቡ፡ ብፍላይ ሽንቲቤት ድሕሪ ምኻድ ወይ ኣእዳው ረሲሖም ምስ ዝረኣዩ፡ ቅድሚ ምምጋብ፡ድሕሪ ኣፍንጫ ፊጥ ምባልን  ድሕሪ ምስዓል ወይ ምዕንጣስ ብዉሑዱ ን 20 ካልኢታት ክሕጸቡ ይምሕጸን።
en-mt: The CDC recommends that individuals wash their hands often with soap and water, especially after going to the toilet or if their hands are dirty, before eating, after blowing their nose, and for at least 20 seconds after coughing or sneezing.

sourceString: It further recommends using an alcohol-based hand sanitiser with at least 60% alcohol, but only when soap and water are not readily available.For areas where commercial hand sanitisers are not readily available, the WHO provides two formulations for local production.
targetString: ነቲ ካብ ኣልኮል ዝተሰርሐ ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘር (60% ኣልኮል) ክትጥቀመሉ ምስ እትደሊ፡ ሳሙናን ማይን ክትረኽበሉ ኣብ ዘይትኽእል እዋን ጥራይ ክኸውን ኣለዎ። ኣብቶም ናይ ኢድ ሳኒታይዘር ክትረኽበሎም ዘይትኽእል ቦታ ምስ ትህሉ ድማ፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ነዚ ሳኒታይዘር ንምምስራሕ ክልተ መንገድትታት የማኽር።
en-mt: If you want to use the alcohol-based hand sanitizer (60% alcohol), it should only be done when soap and water are not available. And if you are in a place where you cannot get hand sanitizer, the World Health Organization (WHO) recommends two ways to process it.

sourceString: In these formulations, the antimicrobial activity arises from ethanol or isopropanol.
targetString: ኣብዚ ምምስራሕ ጸረ ደቀቕቲ ህዋሳውያን ዝግበር ንጥፈታት ካብ ኢታኖል (ethanol) ወይ ኢዞፕሮፓኖል (isopropanol) ይጅምር።
en-mt: The antimicrobial activity in this process starts with ethanol or isopropanol.

sourceString: Hydrogen peroxide is used to help eliminate bacterial spores in the alcohol; it is "not an active substance for hand antisepsis".
targetString: ሃይድሮጅን ፐሮክሳይድ ኣብ ኣልኮል ንዘለዉ ናይ ባክተርያ  (Bacteria) ዘርኢ ንምውጋድ ሓጋዚ ኮይኑ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: Hydrogen peroxide has been found to be helpful in eliminating bacterial species in alcohol.

sourceString: Glycerol is added as a humectant.
targetString: ግሌሴሮል ዝተባህለ ዓይነት ኣልኮል፡ ኣብ ምዕቃብ ጠሊ ልዑል ተራ ከም ዘለዎ ሳብስታንስ ተለልዩ አሎ።
en-mt: Glycerol, a type of alcohol, has been identified as a substance that plays a significant role in dew retention.

sourceString: People are managed with supportive care, which may include fluid therapy, oxygen support, and supporting other affected vital organs.
targetString: ሰባት ብ ሓገዝቲ ክንክን ምሕዱራት እዮም፡ከም ባዓል ፈሳሲ ብዘይመድሃኒት፡ ኦክስጂናዊ ሓገዝን ፡ሓገዝ ካለኦት ቀንዲ ህዋሳትን ክኾኑ ይኽእል።
en-mt: People are addicted to auxiliary care, such as over-the-counter fluids, oxygen assistance and ,assistance with other vital senses.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that those who suspect they carry the virus wear a simple face mask.
targetString: ምሕጽንታ ሲዲሲ ፡ነቶም ጥርጡራት ቫይረስ ተሰኪሞም ከም ልሙድ ናይ ገጽ ማስኬራ ዝገብሩ እዩ።
en-mt: The CDC recommends that suspected carriers wear face masks as usual.

sourceString: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) has been used to address the issue of respiratory failure, but its benefits are still under consideration.
targetString: ኤክስትራኮርፖራል መሸፈኒ ናይ ኢክሲጅን (Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO))፡ ነቲ ጸገም ናይ ምስትንፋስ ንምፍውስ ተፈቲኑ ኢዩ፡ እቲ ጥቕምታቱ ግን ኣዝዩ ትሑት ኢዩ።
en-mt: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) has been tried to treat the breathing problem, but the benefits are very limited.

sourceString: Personal hygiene and a healthy lifestyle and diet have been recommended to improve immunity.
targetString: ግላዊ ጽርየትን ጡዑይ ኣሰራርሓ መግብን ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ  ከም ዘመሓይሽ ተማሕጺኑ።
en-mt: He urged personal hygiene and healthy diet to improve immunity.

sourceString: Supportive treatments may be useful in those with mild symptoms at the early stage of infection.The WHO and Chinese National Health Commission have published recommendations for taking care of people who are hospitalised with COVID-19.
targetString: ደጋፊ ናይ ሕክምና ክንክን ኣብቶም ፈኪስ ምልክታት ዘለዎም ኣዝዩ ጠቓሚ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ግን ኣብቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ደረጃ ግዚያት ምልካፍ ኢዩ። ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO)ን ናይ ቻይና ሃገራዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኮሚሽንን፡ በዚ ሕማም ኮቪድ-19 ንዝተለኽፉ ሰባት ንዝከናኸኑ እንታይ ዓይነት ጥንቃቐ ክገብሩ ከም ዘለዎም ዝነግር ጽሑፍ ኣሕቱም።
en-mt: Supportive medical care is very useful in those with mild symptoms, but this is in the early stages of infection. The World Health Organization (WHO) and China's National Health Commission have published a leaflet on precautions for those caring for people infected with the virus.

sourceString: Intensivists and pulmonologists in the U.S. have compiled treatment recommendations from various agencies into a free resource, the IBCC.
targetString: እቶም ኢንተንሲቪስትን  ፑልሞኖሎጂስትስን (Intensivists and pulmonologists in) ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ነቲ ካብ ብዙሓት ትካላትን ወኪላትን ዝረኸብዎ  ናይ ሕክምና ኣግባባት ናብቲ ናይ ነጻ ምንጪ ሓበሬታ (IBCC) ኣእትዮሞ ኢዮም።
en-mt: Intensivists and pulmonologists in the United States have incorporated treatment methods from many institutions and agencies into the Independent Source of Information (IBCC).

sourceString: As of April 2020, there is no specific treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: ክሳብ ሚያዝያ 2020፡ ዝኾነ ዝተፈልጠ ሕክምና ናይ ኮቪድ-19 የልቦን፡.
en-mt: As of April 2020, there is no known cure for COVID-19,.

sourceString: For symptoms, some medical professionals recommend paracetamol (acetaminophen) over ibuprofen for first-line use.
targetString: ገለ ሕክምናዊ ሞያተኛታት ዝምሕጸንዎ ፓራስታሞል (acetaminophen)  ኣብ ልዕሊ ኢቡፕሮፈን (ibuprofen) ጥቕሚ መጀመርያ መስመር መርኣያታት እዩ።
en-mt: Paracetamol (acetaminophen) over ibuprofen benefits recommended by some medical practitioners are first line indicators.

sourceString: Precautions must be taken to minimise the risk of virus transmission, especially in healthcare settings when performing procedures that can generate aerosols, such as intubation or hand ventilation.
targetString: ምምሕልላፍ ቫይረስ ንምቕናስ መጠንቀቕታ ናይ ግድን ክውሰድ ኣለዎ።ብፍላይ ከኣ ኣብ ከባቢ ክንክን ጥዕና፡ ኣቀራርባ ኣገባብ ፍሊት ከመንጩ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Precautions must be taken to reduce virus transmission. Especially in the health care environment, approaches can generate fees.

sourceString: For healthcare professionals caring for people with COVID-19, the CDC recommends placing the person in an Airborne Infection Isolation Room (AIIR) in addition to using standard precautions, contact precautions and airborne precautions.The CDC outlines the guidelines for the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) during the pandemic.
targetString: ን ናይ ጥዕና ተኸናኸንቲ ሰብ ሞያ ብ ኮቪድ-19 ዝሓመሙ ዝከናኸኑ ማእከል ምቁጽጻር ሕማም (CDC) እዚ ዝስዕብ ይመክር፡ እቲ ሰብ ኣብ ኣየር-ወለድ መልከፍቲ  ዘይብሉ ክፍሊ ክፍለ ((AIIR))፡ ከም ተወሳኺ ናይቲ ስሩዕ ቅድመ ጥንቃቐ ናይ ምትንኻፍ ጥንቃቐ፡ ከምኡውን ናይ ኣየር ወለድ ጥንቃቐ ዘጠቃለለ ኢዩ፡፡ ማእከል ምቁጽጻር ሕማማት (CDC) ግላዊ መከላኸሊ መሳርሒ (PPE) ኣብ ግዜ ዓለምለኻዊ ምስፍሕፋሕ ሕማም ንኽጥቀሙ መርሖታት ኣውጺኡ።
en-mt: For health care professionals caring for patients with COVID-19, the Centers for Disease Control (CDC) recommends that the person be placed in an air-borne infection-free room ((AIIR)), in addition to regular precautions of contact precautions, and of Air interest involves caution. The Centers for Disease Control (CDC) has issued guidelines for the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) during a global outbreak.

sourceString: The recommended gear is: PPE gown, respirator or facemask, eye protection, and medical gloves.When available, respirators (instead of facemasks) are preferred.
targetString: እቲ ቀንዲ ከም መምርሒ ዝምከረሉ፡ግላዊ መከላኸሊ መሳርሒታት ጋውን፡መተንፈሲ ወይ ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ፡ዓይኒ መከላኸሊ፡ናይ ሕክምና ጓንቲ፡ እንተተረኺቡ (ኣብ ክንዲ ናይ ገጽ መሸፈኒ) ምዕቡል መስተንፈሲ መሳርሒ ይምረጽ።
