en-mt: The main recommended as a guideline are personal protective equipment gowns, respirators or face masks, eye protection, medical gloves, and if available (instead of face masks) an advanced respirator is preferred.

sourceString: N95 respirators are approved for industrial settings but the FDA has authorised the masks for use under an Emergency Use Authorisation (EUA).
targetString: N95ናይ ምስትንፋስ ማስክን ኢንዱስትርያዊ ቦታታት ክጥቐሙ ቅቡል ኮይኑ፡ ግና FDA ነዚ ማስክ ኣብ ትሕቲ ህጹጽ ኣጠቓቕማ ባዓል ስልጣን (EUA) ክጥቀሙ ኣፍቂዱ።
en-mt: N95respiratory masks are acceptable for use in industrial areas, but the FDA has approved the use of these masks under the Emergency Use Authority (EUA).

sourceString: They are designed to protect from airborne particles like dust but effectiveness against a specific biological agent is not guaranteed for off-label uses.
targetString: ካብ ኣብ ኣየር ዘንሳፍፉ ነገራት ንኽሕልዉ እዮም ተሰሪሖም።ከም ባዓል ዶሮና ግን ኣድማዕነት ኣንጻር ንጹር ስነሂወታዊ ወኪል ንጥቕሚ ኦፍ-ሌበል ውሕስነት የብሉን።
en-mt: They are designed to protect against airborne objects. However, like chickens, effectiveness against a clear biological agent is not guaranteed for off-label use.

sourceString: When masks are not available, the CDC recommends using face shields or, as a last resort, homemade masks.
targetString: ናይ ኣፍ መሸፈኒ ኣብ ዘይህልወሉ ማእከል ምቁጽጻር ሕማም፡ ምጥቃም ናይ ገጽ መከላኸሊ ከም ናይ መጨረሻ ኣማራጺ ኣብ ገዛ ዝተሰርሑ ማስክ ክንጥቀም ይመክር።
en-mt: Where masks are not available, the Centers for Disease Control recommends using homemade masks as a last resort.

sourceString: Most cases of COVID-19 are not severe enough to require mechanical ventilation or alternatives, but a percentage of cases are.
targetString: ዝበዝሑ ኮቪድ-19 ግዳያት ክሳብ ናይ ቨንቲሌተር ሓገዝ ዘሕትት ሓደጋ ናይ ሕማም የብሎምን፡ እንተኮነ ገለ ሚእታዊት ካብ ሕሙማት ነዚ ሓገዝ ይሓቱ።
en-mt: Most COVID-19 victims are not at risk of illness to the point of requiring ventilator assistance, but a small percentage of patients request this assistance.

sourceString: The type of respiratory support for individuals with COVID-19 related respiratory failure is being actively studied for people in hospital, with some evidence that intubation can be avoided with a high flow nasal cannula or bi-level positive airway pressure.
targetString: እቲ ዓይነት ናይ ምስትንፋስ ደገፋት፡ ነቲ ኮቪድ-19 ዘለዎ ውልቀሰብ፡ ኣብቶም ኣብ ሆስፒታል ዘለዉ ተሓከምቲ ብንጡፍ ኢዩ ዝጽናዕ፡ እዚ ድማ ምስ ገለ መረጋገጺታት ናይ ምክልኻላት ከም ብ ልዑል ናይ ኣፍንጫ ምስዛዕ ብ bi-level ኣወንታዊ ናይ ኣየር ጸቅጢ፡ ክኽልከል ይኽእል።
en-mt: The type of ventilatory supports is actively studied in hospitalized patients for the individual with COVID-19, and may be prevented with some evidence of prevention such as high nasal congestion with bi-level positive air pressure.

sourceString: Whether either of these two leads to the same benefit for people who are critically ill is not known.
targetString: ነዞም ኣዝዮም ዝሓመሙ፡ ካብዞም ክልተ ገለ ሓገዝ ክህብዎም ዝኽእል እንተ ኮይኖም ዝፍለጥ ነገር የለን።
en-mt: It is not known if either of these two can provide any help to those who are seriously ill.

sourceString: Some doctors prefer staying with invasive mechanical ventilation when available because this technique limits the spread of aerosol particles compared to a high flow nasal cannula.Severe cases are most common in older adults (those older than 60 years, and especially those older than 80 years).
targetString: ዉሑዳት ሓካይም ምስ ህላወ ምስፍሕፋሕ መካኒካዊ  ነፋሻነት ምጽናሕ ይመርጹ።ምኽንያቱ ጥበብ እቲ  ምዝርጋሕ ናይ ኤሮሶል ነገራት፡ምስ ልዑል ዋሕዚ  ሻምብቆታት ኣፍንጫ ይግደብ። ጽንኩር ጉዳያት ኣብ ሽማግለታት ልዕሊ ሱሳን ሰማንያን ዕድመ ዘለዉ ልሙድ እዩ።
en-mt: Few physicians choose to stay with the presence of expansion of mechanical ventilation.Because the wisdom of the distribution of aerosol substances, is limited with high nasal flow. Difficult cases are common among elders over the age of sixty and eighty.

sourceString: Many developed countries do not have enough hospital beds per capita, which limits a health system's capacity to handle a sudden spike in the number of COVID-19 cases severe enough to require hospitalisation.
targetString: ብዙሓት ዝማዕበላ ሃገራት፡ እኹል ዝኾነ ቁጽሪ ናይ ሆስፒታላት የብለንን ምስ ቁጽሪ ናይ ነበርተን ኣተሓሓዚካ ድማ ነቲ ናይ ጥዕና ሲስተም ዓቀን ዓቢ ቁጽሪ ግዳያት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ዝተራእየሉ እዋን፡ ካላእ መሐከሚ ባይታ ክፈጥራ ገዲድወን።
en-mt: Many developing countries do not have enough hospitals and the size of their health systems has forced them to create alternative treatment facilities when the number of victims of COVID-19 has increased.

sourceString: One study in China found 5% were admitted to intensive care units, 2.3% needed mechanical support of ventilation, and 1.4% died.
targetString: ሓደ ኣብ ቻይና ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ከምዝሕብሮ፡ 5% ን ህጹጽ ክንክን ከምእተወስዱ፡ 2.3% መካኒካል ሓገዝ ናይ ኣየር ተዋሂቦም፡ ከም ኡውን 1.4% ሞይቶም።
en-mt: One study in China found that 5% were taken to emergency care, 2.3% were given mechanical air assistance, and 1.4% died.

sourceString: In China, approximately 30% of people in hospital with COVID-19 are eventually admitted to ICU.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፡ እቶም ዳርጋ 30% ናብ ሆስፒታል ዝኣተዉ ግዳያት ኮቪድ-19 ናይ ICU ወይ ኢመርጀንሲ ሓገዝ ረኺቦም ኢዮም።
en-mt: In China, nearly 30% of hospitalized COVID-19 victims received ICU or emergency care.

sourceString: Mechanical ventilation becomes more complex as acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) develops in COVID-19 and oxygenation becomes increasingly difficult.
targetString: መካኒካዊ ሓገዝ ምስትንፋስ ኣዝዩ ዝተሓላለኸ ኮይኑ፡ ሓዲሽ ናይ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ ጸገም (ARDS)  ምልክት ብ ኮቪድ-19 ምስ ዝምዕብል ምስትንፋስ ኣዝዩ ሸጋሪ  ይኸውን።
en-mt: Mechanical ventilation is very complex, and breathing becomes very difficult when a new symptom of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) develops with COVID-1

sourceString: Ventilators capable of pressure control modes and high PEEP are needed to maximise oxygen delivery while minimising the risk of ventilator-associated lung injury and pneumothorax.
targetString: እቶም ናይ ጸቕጢ መቆጻጸሪ ዘለዎም ቨንቲሌተራት (PEEP)፡ ነቲ ናይ ኦክሲጅን ግቡእ ኣጠቃቅማ ኵውስኸሉን ነቲ ልዕለ ተጠቃምነት ድማ፡ ሳምቡእ መታን ከይህሰ ወይ`ውን pneumothorax  ከየስዕብ፡ ክጉድል ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Pressure-monitored ventilators (PEEP) must increase the proper use of oxygen and reduce the overuse to prevent lung damage or pneumothorax.

sourceString: High PEEP may not be available on older ventilators.
targetString: ልዑል PEEP ኣብተን ቨንትሌተራ ዘይክህሉ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: High PEEP may not be present on the ventilators.

sourceString: Research into potential treatments started in January 2020, and several antiviral drugs are in clinical trials.
targetString: ዓበይቲ መደባት መጽናዕትታት መድሃኒትን ምስራሕ ፡ ኣብ ጥሪ 2020 ተጀሚሮም፡ ብዙሓት ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት ውን ኣብ ናይ ክሊኒካላት ፈተነታት ይርከቡ።
en-mt: Major drug research and development programs , began in January 2020, and many antiviral drugs are also in clinical trials.

sourceString: Remdesivir appears to be the most promising.
targetString: ረሚድሲቪር (Remdesivir) ካብቲ ኣዝዩ ውጽኢታዊ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Remdesivir is one of the most effective.

sourceString: Although new medications may take until 2021 to develop, several of the medications being tested are already approved for other uses or are already in advanced testing.
targetString: ሓድሽ መድሃኒት ንኽምዕብል ክሳብ 2021ዓ.ም. ክጸንሕ ተኽእሎ እኳ እንተሃለወ ፡ካብቲ ዝፍተን ዘሎ መድሃኒታት መብዛሕትኡ አብ ካልእ ጥቅሚ ንኽውዕል ዝተረጋገጸ ወይ ድማ አብ ምዕቡል ፈተነ ዘሎ ኢዩ።
en-mt: New drugs to be developed by Although likely to last, most of the drugs being tested have been proven for other uses or are in advanced trials.

sourceString: Antiviral medication may be tried in people with severe disease.
targetString: ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት ኣብቶም ከቢድ ዝክነ ደረጃ ናይ ሕማም ዘለዎም ክፍተን ይከኣል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Antiviral drugs can be tried in those with severe stages of the disease.

sourceString: The WHO recommended volunteers take part in trials of the effectiveness and safety of potential treatments.The FDA has granted temporary authorisation to convalescent plasma as an experimental treatment in cases where the person's life is seriously or immediately threatened.
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ ውድብ ጥዕና (WHO) ለበዋ ናይ ኣወንታውያን ኣብ ክፋል ፈተና ናይ ኣድማዕነትን ክእለታዊ ኣተሓሕዛን ወሲዱ።ኣብ ጽንኩር ሂወት ሰብ ወይ ብቐጥታ ኣብ ዝተፈወሰሉ FDA ዉሑስ ዝኾነ ግዝያዊ ፍቓድ  ንጸማልያ ፕላዝማ ከም ፈተናዊ ክንክን ኣለዎ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) took the recommendation of positives in part of the trial of effectiveness and treatment skills.

sourceString: It has not undergone the clinical studies needed to show it is safe and effective for the disease.
targetString: ነቲ ሕማም ዉሑስን ኣድማዕን ከምዝኾነ ንኸርኢ ዘይሓለፎ ክልኒካዊ መጽናዕቲ የድሊ።
en-mt: Unpassed clinical studies are needed to show the disease is safe and effective.

sourceString: In February 2020, China launched a mobile app to deal with the disease outbreak.
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲቲ 20, 2020፡ ቻይና፡ ነቲ ምስፍሕፋሕ ኣብ ምግታእ ክሕግዝ ዝኽእል ናይ ሞባይል ፐሮግራም ኣዳልያ።
en-mt: On February 20, 2020, China developed a mobile program that could help curb the spread.

sourceString: Users are asked to enter their name and ID number.
targetString: ተጠቀምቲ ስሞምን ናይ ID ቁጽሮምን ከእትዉ ይሕበሩ።
en-mt: Users are prompted to enter their name and ID number.

sourceString: The app is able to detect 'close contact' using surveillance data and therefore a potential risk of infection.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ሞባይል ፕሮግራም ነቶም `ናይ ቀረባ ርክባት` በቲ ናይ መከታተሊ ሓበሬታ ብምጥቃም ክረኽቦ ይኽእል፡ እዚ ድማ ነዚ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ሕማም ብምግታእ ናይ ልኹፋት ቁጽሪ ከጉድል ይኽእል።
en-mt: This mobile program can locate the `close contacts` using the tracking information, which can curb this spread of the disease and reduce the number of infected.

sourceString: Every user can also check the status of three other users.
targetString: ነፍሲ ወከፍ ተጠቃሚ ን ካልኦት ሰለስተ ተጠቀምቲ ይቖጻጸር።
en-mt: Each user controls three other users.

sourceString: If a potential risk is detected, the app not only recommends self-quarantine, it also alerts local health officials.Big data analytics on cellphone data, facial recognition technology, mobile phone tracking and artificial intelligence are used to track infected people and people whom they contacted in South Korea, Taiwan and Singapore.
targetString: ዓቕሚ ውሕስነት እንተዳኣ ተረኺቡ፡እቲ ወኸሳ ገዛእ ርእስኻ ምውሻብ ጥራይ ኣይኮነን ዝምህጸን፡ ወግዓዊ ንናይ ውሽጢ ጥዕና ውን የነቓቕሕ እዩ።ምምርማር ዓበይቲ ሓበሬታታት ኣብ ሞባይል ቴሌፎን ዳታ፡ገጻዊ ምልላይ ቴክኖሎጂ፡መስመር ቴሌፎን፡ሰብ ዝሰርሖ ብልሕነት፡ዝተለኽፈ ሰብ ንምርካብን ሰባት ኣብ ደቡብ ኮርያ፡ ታይዋን፡ሲንጋፖር፡ዝቕመጡ ንምርካብ ይጠቅም።
en-mt: If the capacity for safety is available, the charge not only urges self-quarantine, but also triggers official internal health.Examining big information on mobile phone data, facial recognition technology, phone lines, man-made intelligence, and people in South Korea, Taiwan ,Singapore,residents.

sourceString: In March 2020, the Israeli government enabled security agencies to track mobile phone data of people supposed to have coronavirus.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020፡ መንግስቲ እስራኤል ነቶም ኮሮናቫይረስ ዘለዎም ስባት ናይ ሞባይል መከታተሊ ሲስተም ፈጢሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ውሕስነት ናይቶም ዘይተለኽፉ ንምርግጋጽ ኢዩ።
en-mt: In March 2020, the Israeli government created a mobile tracking system for people with the virus to ensure the safety of those who are not infected.

sourceString: The measure was taken to enforce quarantine and protect those who may come into contact with infected citizens.
targetString: እቲ እገዳታት ነቲ ውሽባ ንምግዳድ ዝተወስደ ኢዩ ኔሩ፡ ከምኡ`ውን ነቶም ምስቶም ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት ርክባት ዝገበሩ`ውን ንምክልኻል።
en-mt: The sanctions were imposed to enforce the quarantine, as well as to protect those who had contact with the infected people.

sourceString: Also in March 2020, Deutsche Telekom shared aggregated phone location data with the German federal government agency, Robert Koch Institute, in order to research and prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: ከምኡ ውን ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 ዲዩች (Deutsche) ቴሌኮም እኩብ ተሌፎን ናይ ቦታ ሓበሬታ ምስ ወኪል ፈደራል መንግስቲ ጀርመንን ትካል ሮበርት ኮች ፡ምስ እዚ'ውን  ምእንቲ መጽናዕትን ምክልኻልን ምዝርጋሕ ናይዚ ቫይረስ ተኻፊሉ።
en-mt: Also in March 2020, Deutsche Telekom shared telephone collection of location information with the representative of the German Federal Government and the Robert Koch Foundation , with which also for the purpose of research and prevention of the spread of the virus.

sourceString: Russia deployed facial recognition technology to detect quarantine breakers.
targetString: ሩስያ ነቲ ናይ ገጽ መለለዪ ሲስተም  ተክኖሎጂ ፡ ነቶም ናይ ውሸባ ሕጊ ዝጥሕሱ መፍለጢ ወይ መለለዪ ሰሪሓ።
en-mt: Russia developed the facial recognition system technology , which identifies or identifies those who violate quarantine rules.

sourceString: Italian regional health commissioner Giulio Gallera said he has been informed by mobile phone operators that "40% of people are continuing to move around anyway".
targetString: ጉልዮ ጋሌራ ዝተባህለ ኢጣልያዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኮሚሽነር፡ 40 ሚእታዊት ካብ ሰባት ብሸለልትነት ምንቅስቃስ ይቅጽሉ አለዉ ብምባል ብናይ ቴሌፎን ኦፕሬተራት ከምዝተሓበረ ተዛሪቡ።
en-mt: Italian health commissioner Guglio Galera said 40 percent of people were reported by telephone operators to be reckless.

sourceString: German government conducted a 48 hours weekend hackathon with more than 42.000 participants.
targetString: መንግስቲ ጀርመን 48 ሰዓታት ቀዳምን ሰምበትን ሃካቶን ምስ ልዕሊ 42,000 ተሳተፍቲ መሪሑ።
en-mt: The German government led a 48-hour Saturday and Sunday hackathon with more than 42,000 participants.

sourceString: Also the president of Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid, made a global call for creative solutions against the spread of coronavirus.
targetString: ከምኡ ውን ፕረዚደንት ናይ ኢስቶንያ፡ከርስቲ ካፒጁላኢድ (Kersti Kaljulaid) ኣንጻር ዝርግሐ ኮሮናቫይረስ፡ን ፈጠራዊ መፍትሒታት ዓለምለኻዊ ጻውዒት ጸዊዑ።
en-mt: And Estonian President, Kersti Kaljulaid, has called for a global appeal for innovative solutions against the spread of the coronavirus.

sourceString: Individuals may experience distress from quarantine, travel restrictions, side effects of treatment or fear of the infection itself.
targetString: ውልቀሰባት ፡ ምውሻባት፡ ናይ ጉዕዞ ምዕጻዋት፡ ናይ ሕክምና መድሃኒታት ሳዕቤናት፡ ዝጠንቁ ጭንቀት ክገብሩ ይኻሉ ኢዮም።
en-mt: Individuals , quarantines, travel restrictions, medication side effects, can cause anxiety.

sourceString: BBC quoted Rory O'Connor in saying, "Increased social isolation, loneliness, health anxiety, stress and an economic downturn are a perfect storm to harm people's mental health and wellbeing."
targetString: BBC ሮርይ ኦኮኖር ዝተረቑሐ ኣብ ዝተዛረቦ ኣመልኪቱ፡ምውሳኽ ተነጽሎ ናይ ሰብ፡ጽምዋ፡ጥዕናዊ ሻቕሎት፡ጽቕጥን ቁጠባዊ ምንቁልቋልን ኣኣምሮኣዊ ጥዕና ሰብን ሓጎስን ንኽጎድእ ሙሉእ ማዓት እዩ።
en-mt: BBC Rory O'Connor quoted in his speech as saying that increased isolation, loneliness, health concerns, stress and economic recession are a complete scourge for mental health and happiness.

sourceString: The disease may take a mild course with few or no symptoms, resembling other common upper respiratory diseases such as the common cold.
targetString: ናይዚ ሕማም ምዕባለታት ትሑት ኮይኑ ምስ ዉሑድ ወይ ምልክታት ዘይብሉ ምስ ካለኦት ልሙዳት ናይ ላዕለዋይ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ ሕማማት ከም ባዓል ሳዓል ይመሳሰል።
en-mt: The severity of this disease is mild and similar to other common upper respiratory diseases such as the common cold with few or no symptoms.

sourceString: Mild cases typically recover within two weeks, while those with severe or critical diseases may take three to six weeks to recover.
targetString: ድኹም ጉዳይ ከም ልሙድ፡ኣብ ውሽጢ ክልተ ሰሙን ይሓውዩ  እዮም፡ ብርቱዕ ወይ ሓደገኛ ሕማማት ግን ንኽሓውዩ ክሳብ ሽዱሽተ ሰሙን ይወስድ።
en-mt: Weak cases typically,recover within two weeks, but severe or dangerous cases take up to six weeks to recover.

sourceString: Pregnant women may be at higher risk for severe infection with COVID-19 based on data from other similar viruses, like SARS and MERS, but data for COVID-19 is lacking.In some people, COVID-19 may affect the lungs causing pneumonia.
targetString: ጥንስቲ ጋል-ኣንስተይቲ፡ ኣብቲ ሓበሬታ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ንካልኦት ተመሳሰልቲ ቫይረሳትን ብምሙርካስ ከም SARS ን MERSን (ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ጸብጻብ ግን ምሉእ ኣይነበረን)፡ ኣብ ሓደገኛ ኩነታት ክትህሉ ትኽእል ኢያ። ኣብ ገለ ሰባት ኮቪድ-19 ን ሳንቡእ ብምጥቃዕ ግዳይ ኒሞንያ ክገብራ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: A pregnant woman may be at risk, depending on the transmission information of COVID-19 and other similar viruses such as SARS and MERS (but the COVID-19 report was incomplete). In some people, COVID-19 can attack the lungs and cause pneumonia.

sourceString: In those most severely affected, COVID-19 may rapidly progress to acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) causing respiratory failure, septic shock or multi-organ failure.
targetString: ብጽኑዕ አብ ዝተጠቅዑ ሰባት፡ ኮቪድ-19 ናብ ጽኑዕ ጸቅጢ ምስትንፋስ ወይ (ARDS) ክምዕብል ይኽእል፡ እዚ ድማ ድኽመት ምስትንፋስ፡ ረኽሳዊ ነውጺ ወይ ድማ ብዝሐ-ኣካላዊ ወይ ብዝሐ-ኦርጋናዊ ድኽመት ከስዕብ ይኽእል።
en-mt: In severely infected people, COVID-19 can develop into acute respiratory distress syndrome or (ARDS), which can cause respiratory failure, infectious seizures or multi-physical or multi-organ weakness.

sourceString: Complications associated with COVID-19 include sepsis, abnormal clotting and damage to the heart, kidneys and liver.
targetString: ምስ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተሓሓዙ ሕልኽላኻት ከም ባዓል፡ረኽሲ፡ዘይንቡር ምርጋእ፡ ናይ ልቢ መጉዳእቲ፡ ኩሊት፡ጸላም ከብዲ፡ዝጎድእ እዩ።
en-mt: Complications associated with COVID-19 such as fever, infection, abnormal sedation, heart damage, kidney, liver, damage.

sourceString: Clotting abnormalities, specifically an increase in prothrombin time, have been described in 6% of those admitted to hospital with COVID-19, while abnormal kidney function is seen in 4% of this group.
targetString: ካብ ንቡር ወጻኢ ኣሰራርሓ ኩሊት 4% ኣብዚ ጉጅለ ተራእዩ።ካብ ንቡር ወጻኢ ምርጋእ ብፍላይ ፕሮትሮምቢን (prothrombin) ኣብ ዝውስኸሉ ግዜ 6% ኣብዞም ዝተኣመነሎም ኣብ ሕክምና፡ኮቪድ-19 ከምዝጸንሖም ይዝረብ።ኩሊት ዘይንቡር ኣብ ትሰርሓሉ 4% ኣብዚ ጉጅለ ይረኣዩ።
en-mt: Abnormal kidney function was seen in 4% of this group.Abnormal stabilization, especially when prothrombin is increased, 6% of these believed in treatment, are said to have had COVID-19.Abnormal kidney function is seen in 4% of this group.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of people who present with COVID-19 demonstrate elevated liver enzymes (transaminases).
targetString: ከባቢ 20-30 ሚእታዊት ናይ ብኮቪድ-19 ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት ዝለዓለ ኢንዛይም ጸላም ከብዲ( transaminases) የርእዩ።
en-mt: About 20-30 percent of people infected with COVID-19 show elevated liver enzymes ( transaminases).

sourceString: According to the same report, the median time between onset of symptoms and death was ten days, with five being spent hospitalised.
targetString: ብመሰረት ሓደ ዓይነት ጸብጻብ፡ እቲ ገምጋማዊ ቁጽሪ ናይ መዓልታት ካብ ምልክታት ናይ ሕማም ዝጂምረሉ ክሳብ ሞት ዓሰርተ መዓልታት ኮይኑ እቲ ሓሙሽቱ መዓልታት ኣብ ሕክምና ትእለየሉ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: According to one report, the average number of days from the onset of symptoms to death may be ten days and five days in hospital.

sourceString: However, patients transferred to an ICU had a median time of seven days between hospitalisation and death.
targetString: እንተኾነ'ግን ሕሙማን ናብ ጽኑዕ መእለዪ ሕሙማን ዝሰጋገሩ ብገምጋም ሸውዓተ ማዓልቲ ዝኸውን ግዜ ኣብ መንጎ ሕክምና ምእታውን ሙማትን ኔርዎም።
en-mt: However, patients transferred to intensive care had an average of eight days between admission and death.

sourceString: In a study of early cases, the median time from exhibiting initial symptoms to death was 14 days, with a full range of six to 41 days.
targetString: ኣብ ቀረባ ግዜ ካብ ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲታት፡ እቲ ማእከላይ ገምጋም ካብቲ ምልክታት ሕማም ዝረኣየሉ እዋን ጀሚሩ ክሳብ እቲ ናይ ሞት ዘሎ ግዜ ኢዩ፡ ካብ 14 ክሳብ 41 መዓልታት ድማ ድማ ይዝርጋሕ።
en-mt: From recent studies, the average is the time from the onset of symptoms to the time of death, and ranges from 14 to 41 days.

sourceString: In a study by the National Health Commission (NHC) of China, men had a death rate of 2.8% while women had a death rate of 1.7%.
targetString: ኣብ መጽናዕቲ ዓለምለኻዊ ወኪል ጥዕና (NHC) ቻይና  ደቂ ኣንስትዮ  1.7% ክሞታ ኸለዋ ደቂ ተባዕትዮ ከኣ 2.8% ይሞቱ።
en-mt: According to the World Health Organization (NHC) of China, women die at 1.7% and men at 2.8%.

sourceString: Histopathological examinations of post-mortem lung samples show diffuse alveolar damage with cellular fibromyxoid exudates in both lungs.
targetString: ሂስቶፓቶሎጂካል (Histopathological) መርመራታት ናይ ድሕረ መርመራታት ቅምሶትት ከምዘኣይዎ፡ ምብታን ናይ ትቦ መጉዳእቲ ምስ ዋህዮ ኣዊ ፋይብሮሚክሰድ አክሲደይት (fibromyxoid exudates) ኣብ ክልቲኡ ሳንቡእ ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Histopathological examinations of post-mortem samples showed dispersion of tubular injury with fibromyxoid exudates in both lungs.

sourceString: Viral cytopathic changes were observed in the pneumocytes.
targetString: ቫይረሳዊ ሲቶፋቲክ ለውጢ ኣብቲ ኒሞሳይትስ ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Viral cytophatic changes were observed in the pneumocytes.

sourceString: The lung picture resembled acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: ናይ ሳንቡእ ስእሊ ከም ዘነጽሮ፡ ከቢድ ዲስትረስ ሲንድሮም (resembled acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS)) ከም ዘሎ ኢዩ።
en-mt: A chest x-ray reveals resembled acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).

sourceString: In 11.8% of the deaths reported by the National Health Commission of China, heart damage was noted by elevated levels of troponin or cardiac arrest.
targetString: ብ ሃገራዊ ጥዕና ኮሚሽን ጥዕና ቻይና ከምዝተማሕላለፈ ኣብ ውሽጢ 11.8% ምዉታት፡ናይ ልቢ ጉዱኣትን ልዑል መጠን ናይ ትሮፖኒን (troponin) ወይ ወቕዒ ልቢ ምዃኑ ተረጋጊጹ።
en-mt: According to the National Health Commission of China, 11.8% of deaths, heart injuries and high levels of troponin or heart attack were found.

sourceString: According to March data from the United States, 89% of those hospitalised had preexisting conditions.Availability of medical resources and the socioeconomics of a region may also affect mortality.
targetString: ብመንጽር ናይ ሕቡራት ሃገራት ኣብ መጋቢት ዝሃቡዎ ሓበሬታ፡ 89% ካብቶም ኣብ ሕክምና ዝኣተዉ ሕሉፍ ናይ ጥዕና ሽግራት ኣለዎ። ህላውነት ናይ ጥዕና መሳርሒን ማሕበረ ቁጠባዊ ኩነታት ናይቲ ዘለዉዎ ኣከባቢ ድማ ነቲ መጠነ ሞድን ደደብ ሞትን ክጸልዎ ይኽእል።
en-mt: According to the UN in March, 89% of those admitted to treatment have past health problems. The availability of health facilities and the socio-economic status of the environment can affect the rate of sudden death.

sourceString: Estimates of the mortality from the condition vary because of those regional differences, but also because of methodological difficulties.
targetString: ጸብጻባት ናይ ሞት ኣብ ዝተፈላለየ  ኩነታት፡  ኣብቲ ናይ ከባብያዊ ፍልልይ ይሙርኮስ፡ ብዘይካ እዚ ኣብቲ ኣገባባት ዘጋጥም  ሽግራት ውን ይምርኮስ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Reports of death in different circumstances depend on local differences, as well as problems with methods.

sourceString: The under-counting of mild cases can cause the mortality rate to be overestimated.
targetString: ነቶም ብዙሕ ምልክታት ዘይብሎም ኣብ ጸብጻብ ናይ ቁጽሪ ብዘይ ምእታው፡ እቲ መጠነ ሞት ልዕሊ-ግምት ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢይ።
en-mt: By not including those without many symptoms in the count report, the mortality rate may be overestimated.

sourceString: However, the fact that deaths are the result of cases contracted in the past can mean the current mortality rate is underestimated.
targetString: ሽሕ'ኳ እቲ ሓቂ ውጽኢት ዝሞቱ ሕሉፍ ሕማም ዝጸንሖም እንተኾኑ፡መጠን እዋናዊ መዋትነት ግን ትሑት ግምት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Although the fact is that deaths are the result of past illness, the current mortality rate is underestimated.

sourceString: Smokers were 1.4 times more likely to have severe symptoms of COVID-19 and approximately 2.4 times more likely to require intensive care or die compared to non-smokers.Concerns have been raised about long-term sequelae of the disease.
targetString: ኣትከኽቲ ምስ ዘየትክኹ ክወዳደር ከሎ ብ 1.4 ግዜ ተመሳሳሊ ጽንኩር ምልክታት ናይ ኮቪድ19 ኣለዎ። ብገምጋም 2.4 ግዜ ዓቢ ምምስሳል  ጽዑቕ ናይ ምክትታል ሓላፍነት ወይ ሞት የኸትል።ምስ ዘየትክኹ ብምንጽጻር እቲ ሕማም ምስኦም ነዊሕ  ይጸንሕ።
en-mt: Smokers have 1.4 times the same severe symptoms of COVID19 compared to nonsmokers. An average of 2.4 times greater attribution results in intensive surveillance responsibilities or death.The disease lasts longer with them compared to non-smokers.

sourceString: The Hong Kong Hospital Authority found a drop of 20% to 30% in lung capacity in some people who recovered from the disease, and lung scans suggested organ damage.
targetString: ናይ ሆንግኮንግ ሕክምና በዓል ስልጣን ከም ዝረኸብዎ ካብ 20% ክሳብ 30% ናይ ሳምቡእ ዓቕሚ ኣብ ውሑዳት ሰባት ሓሚሞም ዝሓወዩ ከምዝጎደለን ናይ ሳምቡእ ስካን ኣብ ህዋሳት ዕንወት ከምዘርኣየን ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: Hong Kong medical authority found that 20% to 30% of lung capacity was reduced in a small number of people who got sick and recovered and lung scans showed sensory damage.

sourceString: This may also lead to post-intensive care syndrome following recovery.
targetString: እዚ'ውን ናብ ድሕረ ጽኑዕ ክትትል ምልክት ድሕሪ ምሕዋይ ከስዕብ ይኽእል።
en-mt: This can also lead to post-acute follow-up symptoms after recovery.

sourceString: As of March 2020, it was unknown if past infection provides effective and long-term immunity in people who recover from the disease.
targetString: ክሳብ መጋቢት 2020፡ እቶም ቅድሚ ሕጂ ዝተለኽፉን ሓዲሽ መልከፍቲ ናይ ምክልኻል ስርዓቶም ክሳብ ክንደይ ውጽኢታዊ ሙኻኑ ኣይተፈልጠንን።
en-mt: As of March 2020, I don't know how effective the immune systems of previously infected and new infections are.

sourceString: Immunity is seen as likely, based on the behaviour of other coronaviruses, but cases in which recovery from COVID-19 have been followed by positive tests for coronavirus at a later date have been reported.
targetString: ናይ ምክልኻል ሲስተም፡ ምስቲ ናይ ካልኦት ኮሮናቫይረሳት ባህርያት ይቀያየር፡ እንተኾነ ኩሎም እቶም ካብ ኮቪድ-19 ዝሓወዩ ግዳያት ጸኒሑ ኣብ ዝተገብረ ጸብጻብ ተደጋጋሚ ብ ኣወንታዊ ከም ዝተመረመሩ ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: The immune system varies with the characteristics of other coronaviruses, but all recovered victims tested positive repeatedly in later reports.

sourceString: These cases are believed to be worsening of a lingering infection rather than re-infection.
targetString: እዞም ግዳያት ነቲ ዝተረፈ ምልካፍ መሊሶም ከግድድዎ ኢዮም ካብቲ ካልኣይ-መልከፍቲ ንላዕሊ።
en-mt: These victims will force the remaining infection again rather than the second-infection.

sourceString: The virus is thought to be natural and have an animal origin, through spillover infection.
targetString: ቫይረስ ባህርያዊ ንኽኸውን፡ናይ እንስሳ መበቆል ዘለዎ እንዳለሓመ ዝኸይድ መልከፍቲ ምዃኑን ተዘሪቡ።
en-mt: To make a virus natural, it is said to be a spreading infection of animal origin.

sourceString: The actual origin is unknown, but by December 2019 the spread of infection was almost entirely driven by human-to-human transmission.
targetString: እቲ ቀንዲ መበገሲኡ ፍሉጥ እንተዘይኮነ፡ኮይኑ ግን ብ ታሕሳስ-2019 ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይዚ ብከላ ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ምትሕልላፍ ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ መጺኡ።
en-mt: The main origin is unknown, but by December-2019 the spread of this contamination from person to person came complete.

sourceString: A study of the first 41 cases of confirmed COVID-19, published in January 2020 in The Lancet, revealed the earliest date of onset of symptoms as 1 December 2019.
targetString: ኣብቶም ናይ መጀመርታ 41 ጉዳያት መልከፍቲ ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ፡ ኣብ “ዘ-ላንሰት” ከምዝተገልጸ፡ እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ምልክታት ናይዚ ቫይረስ ካብ ዕለት 1 ናይ ወርሒ ታሕሳስ 2019 ጀሚሩ ከምዝተራእየ የነጽር።
en-mt: A study of the first 41 cases of COVID-19 infection, reported in The Lancet, showed that the first symptoms of the virus appeared on December 1,

sourceString: Official publications from the WHO reported the earliest onset of symptoms as 8 December 2019.
targetString: ወግዓዊ ጸብጻብ ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ እቲ ዝቀልጠፈ ምዝጉብ ናይ መጀመርያ ምልክታት ዝተራእየሉ ኣብ 8 ታሕሳስ 2019 ኢዩ ኔሩ።
en-mt: According to the official World Health Organization (WHO) report, the earliest recorded first symptoms were reported on December 8,

sourceString: Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ተበግሶታት ነቲ ሞራል መምዘኒ ይጠቕሙ ኢዮም።
en-mt: Some initiatives use the morale criterion.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak and population characteristics such as age, sex and overall health.
targetString: እዞም ቁጽርታት ብኣከባቢ ወይ ዞባ ይፈላለዩ፡ በቲ መጠን ናይ መርመራ ፡ ፡ ናይ ጥዕና ሲስተም ብቅዓት፡  ኣተሓካክማ ኣገባብ፡ ናይ ምሕካም ኣማራጺታት፡ ካብቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ምስፍሕፋሕ ዝተራእየሉ እዋን ዘሎ ግዚያት፡ ዕድማ፡ ጾታ፡ ከምኡ`ውን ሓፈሻዊ ናይ ጥዕና ዓይነታት ካብቶም ኣዝዮም ጸለውቲ ረቃሒታት ኢዮም።
en-mt: These numbers vary by area or region, with the amount of testing , , health system efficiency, treatment methods, treatment options, time since the first outbreak, age, gender, and overall health types being among the most influential factors .

sourceString: In late 2019, WHO assigned the emergency ICD-10 disease codes U07.1 for deaths from lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection and U07.2 for deaths from clinically or epidemiologically diagnosed COVID-19 without lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ 2019 ፡ዓለምለኻዊ ውድብ ጥዕና (WHO) ነዞም ህጹጽ ሕማም ICD-10 ዘለዎም ኣብ ክፍሊ መርመራ ዝተረጋገጸ ልኽፈት SARS-CoV-2  ንዝሞቱ ኣብ ኮድ U07.1 መዲብዎም።ኣብ ክሊኒካዊ ወይ ስነለበዳዊ  ፍወሳ ኮቪድ-19 ብዘይ ናይ ክፍለ መርመራ ርጉጽነት ልኽፈት SARS-CoV-2 ንዝሞቱ ኣብ ኮድ U07.2 መዲብዎም።ሬሾ ሞትን መልከፍትን፡ቁጽሪ ዝሞቱ  ክምቀል ን ዝተለኽፉ ምስ ዝተዋህበ ግዜ ከምዝኾነ የንጸባርቕ።
en-mt: In late 2019 , the World Health Organization (WHO) assigned these acute ICD-10 deaths from department-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection to code U07.1.In clinical or epidemiological treatment of COVID-19 without department-confirmed SARS infection -CoV-2 assigned deaths to code U07.2.The death-to-infection ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the time given to infections.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) as of 17 April 2020.
targetString: ኣብቲ ናይ ጆን ሆፕኪንስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ጸብጻብ ብምሙርካስ፡ ዓለማዊ መጠነ ሞት ምስ ቁጽሪ ግዳያት ክነጻጸር እንከሎ  6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) ኢዩ፡ እዚ ጸብጻብ ክሳብ 17 ሚያዝያ 2020 ዝትገብረ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Based on the Johns Hopkins University report, the global mortality rate is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) as of April 17,

sourceString: The number varies by region.Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed individuals who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected individuals (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: እዚ ቁጽሪ እዚ ብ ዞባ ይፈላለ። ካልኦት ስገምትታት ነዞም ዝስዕቡ የጠቃልል፡ ናይ ሞት መጠን (CFR)፡ ነቲ ብሕማም ዝሞተ ክሳብ ክንደይ ናይ ሕክምና ኣገልግሎት ብ ሚእታዊት ከም ዝረኸቡ ፡ ከምኡውን ነቲ ምምሕልላፍ ናይ መጠነ ሞት (IFR)፡ እዚ ድማ ሚእታዊት ናይ ዝተለኽፈ ውልቀሰብ (ዝተሓከመን ዘይተሓከመን) ከምኡውን ብሰንኩ ዝሞቱ ዝሓቆፈ ኢዩ።
en-mt: This number varies by region. Other measures include the following: the mortality rate (CFR), the percentage of people who died of the disease who received medical care , and the transmission of the mortality rate (IFR), which includes the percentage of infected individuals (treated and untreated) and deaths It is.

sourceString: These statistics are not time bound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: እዞም ዝርዝራት ብ ቁጽሪ ዝድረቱ ኣይከኑን፡ ካብቲ ምልካፍ ክሳብ ምፍታሕ ሽግራት ኣብ ዘሎ ጉዳያት ድማ ጸብጻብ ይገብሩ።
en-mt: These lists are not limited to numbers and report on issues ranging from infection to troubleshooting.

sourceString: While not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies may provide information about how many people have been infected.
targetString: ዋላ`ካ ኩሎም ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት ጸረ-ቫይረስ ኣየማዕብሉ፡ ህላውነት ናይ ጸረ-ቫይረስ ክንደይ ሰባት ከም ዝተለኽፉ ሓበሬታ ክህበና ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Although not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies can tell us how many people are infected.

sourceString: In the epicentre of the outbreak in Italy, Castiglione d'Adda, a small village of 4600, 80 (1.7%) are already dead.
targetString: ኣብ ማእከል ናይቲ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ጥልያን፡ ኣብ ጥልያን ካብ ዝርከባ ነኣሽቱ ዓድታት ካስቲሎጃ ጅ ዳዳ (Castiglione d'Adda)፡ 4600፡ 80 (1.7%) ብሰንኪ እዚ ቫይረስ ሞይቶም።
en-mt: In the midst of the Italian expansion, 4,600, 80 (1.7%) of the small villages of Castiglione d'Adda in Italy died from the virus.

sourceString: In Gangelt, the disease was spread by Carnival festivals, and spread to younger people, causing a relatively lower mortality, and not all COVID-19 deaths may have been formally classified as such.
targetString: ውሽጣዊ ምምሕልላፍ ሕማም ኣብ ዝበዝሓ  ሃገራትን ኣብ ሽዱሽቲኤን ዓለምለኻዊ ውድብ ጥዕና ዞባታትን ተመዝጊቡ።ኣብ ጋንገልት እቲ ሕማም ብ ምርኢት ናይ ጽምብላት ናብ መንእሰያት ተዘርጊሑ። ብተዛማዲ ዉሑድ ዓቐን ሞት ኣምጺኡ። ግን ከኣ ብ ኮቪድ-19 ከምዝሞቱ ወግዓዊ ክምደቡ ኣይከኣሉን።
en-mt: Internal transmission has been recorded in most countries and in all six WHO regions. It caused relatively low mortality. But they could not be officially classified as having died of COVID-1

sourceString: Furthermore, the German health system has not been overwhelmed.
targetString: ካብዚ ሓሊፉ ናይ ጀርመን ጥዕናዊ ስርዓት ዓብላሊ ኣይጸንሐን።
en-mt: Furthermore, the German health system has not been dominant.

sourceString: In the Netherlands, about 3% may have antibodies, as assessed from blood donors.
targetString: ኣብ ነዘርላንድ፡ ካብ ወሃብቲ ደም ካብ ዝተገብረ ዳህሳስ 3% ጸረ-ነፍሳት ክህልዎም ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: In the Netherlands, 3% of blood donors surveyed may have antibiotics.

sourceString: 69 (0.004% of the population) have been confirmed to have died from COVID-19.
targetString: 69 (0.004% ናይ ህዝቢ)፡ ብ ኮቪድ-19 ሞይቶም ክኾኑ ከም ዝኽእሉ ተገሚቱ።
en-mt: 69 (0.004% of the population), were estimated to have died of COVID-1

sourceString: The impact of the pandemic and its mortality rate are different for men and women.
targetString: ጽልዋ ናይዚ ተላባዒን መጠን ሞት ደቒ ተባዕትዮን ደቂ ኣንስትዮን ዝተፈላለየ እዩ።
en-mt: The impact of this infection and mortality rates vary between men and women.

sourceString: Mortality is higher in men in studies conducted in China and Italy.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይናን ጥልያንን፡ ኣብ ዝተገብሩ መጽናዕትታት መጠነ ሞት ካብ ኣወዳት ንላዕሊ ኣብ ኣዋልድ ይውሕድ።
en-mt: In China and Italy, the mortality rate in studies is lower among girls than among boys.

sourceString: The highest risk for men is in their 50s, with the gap between men and women closing only at 90.
targetString: እቲ ዝዓበየ ሓደጋ ን ደቂ-ተባዕትዮ ኣብ 50ታት ኢዩ፡ እቲ ፍልልይ ኣብ መንጎ ደቂ-ተባዕትዮን ደቂ-ኣንስትዮን ኣብ 90ታት ዝተቀራረበ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The greatest risk is for men in their 50s, with the gap between men and women closer in their 90s.

sourceString: In China, the death rate was 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፡ መጠን ሞት ኣብ ደቂ ተባዕትዮ 2.8 ሚእታዊት፡ አብ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ድማ 1.7 ሚእታዊት ኢዩ።
en-mt: In China, the mortality rate is 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.

sourceString: The exact reasons for this sex-difference is not known, but genetic and behavioural factors could be a reason.
targetString: እቲ ልክዕ ምኽንያት ናይዚ ሽዱሽተ ፍልልያት ኣይተፈልጠን፡ እንተኾነ ጀነቲካዊን ባህርያውን ለቃሒታት ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: The exact reasons for these six variants are unknown, but genetic and behavioral lenders are possible.

sourceString: Sex-based immunological differences, lesser prevalence of smoking in women and men developing co-morbid conditions such as hypertension at a younger age than women could have contributed to the higher mortality in men.
targetString: ኣብ ጾታ ዝምርኮስ ናይ ምክልኻል ኣካላት ፍልልይ፡ እቲ ውሑድ ተጠቃምነት ናይ ሽጋራ ኣብ ደቂ-ኣንስትዮን ደቂ-ተባዕትዮን፡ ነቲ co-morbid ዘማዕበሉ (ከም ጸቕጢ ኣብ ንኡስ ዕድማናይ ደቂ-ተባትዕዮ ካብ ናይ ደቂኣንስትዮ)፡ ዝበዝሐ ናይ ሞት ሓደጋ ኣብ ደቂ-ተባትዕዮ ኣስዒቡ።
en-mt: Sex-dependent immune differences: The lower use of cigarettes in women and men who developed the co-morbid (such as stress in younger men than in women) resulted in a greater mortality risk in men.

sourceString: In Europe, 57% of the infected individuals were men and 72% of those died with COVID-19 were men.
targetString: ኣብ ኤውሮጳ፡ 57% ካብቶም ዝተለኽፉ ውልቀሰባት ደቂ-ተባዕትዮ ኢዮም ፡ ካብቶም ብ ኮቪድ-19 ዝሞቱ ድማ እተን 72% ደቂ-ኣንስትዮ ኢየን ኔረን ።
en-mt: In Europe, 57% of infected individuals were men , and 72% of those who died from COVID-19 were women.

sourceString: As of April 2020, the US government is not tracking sex-related data of COVID-19 infections.
targetString: ኣብ ሚያዝያ 2020, መንግስቲ ሕቡራት መንግስትታት ምስ ናይ መልከፍቲ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተሓሓዝ ምልክት ጾታዊ-ርክብ ሓበሬታ ኣይረኸበን።
en-mt: In April 2020, the United Nations government did not receive information on sexually transmitted diseases (STDs) associated with COVID-19 infection.

sourceString: Research has shown that viral illnesses like Ebola, HIV, influenza and SARS affect men and women differently.
targetString: ቫይረሳዊ ሕማም ከም ባዓል ኢቦላ (Ebola)፡ HIV ፡ ሳዓል፡ SARS ን ደቂ ተባዕትዮን ደቂ ኣንስትዮን ብዝተፈላለየ መንገዲ ከምዝጸልዎም መጽናዕትታት የርእዮ።
en-mt: Studies show that viral diseases such as Ebola, HIV , influenza, and SARS affect men and women differently.

sourceString: A higher percentage of health workers, particularly nurses, are women, and they have a higher chance of being exposed to the virus.
targetString: ዝለዓለ ሚእታዊት ናይ ጥዕና ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ሰራሕተኛታት ብፍላይ ነርሳት ብ ቫይረስ ዝተቓልዓ እየን።
en-mt: A higher percentage of female health workers, especially nurses, are exposed to the virus.

sourceString: The World Health Organization announced on 11 February 2020 that the official name of the disease would be "COVID-19".
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ኣብ 11 ለካቲት 2020 ፡ ወግዓዊ ስም ናይዚ ሕማም ``ኮቪድ-19`` ከም ዝበሃል ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) announced on February 11, 2020 , that the official name of the disease is ``COVID-19``.

sourceString: WHO chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus explained that CO stands for corona, VI for virus, D for disease, and 19 for when the outbreak was first identified: 31 December 2019.
targetString: መራሒ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO)፡ ኣድሓኖም ገብረየሱስ፡ CO ነቲ ኮሮና ዝበሃል ቫይረስ ከም ዝውክል ገሊጹ፡ 19 ድማ እቲ ምስፍሕፋሕ መዓስ ከም ዝጀመረ ይነግር፡ 31 ታሕሳስ 2019።
en-mt: World Health Organization (WHO) chief Adhanom Gebreyesus says CO represents the coronavirus and 19 tells when the spread began, December 31,

sourceString: The name had been chosen to avoid references to a specific geographical location (e.g. China), animal species or group of people, in line with international recommendations for naming aimed at preventing stigmatisation.The virus that causes COVID-19 is named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: እዚ ስም እዚ ነቲ ፍሉይ ጀኦግራፍያዊ ቦታ ከም መወከሲ ክይጥቅም (ቻይና ከም ኣብነት)፡ ናይ እንስሳ ዓሌት ወይ እኩባት ሰባት፡ እዚ ድማ ምስቲ ዓለምለኻዊ ሕጊ ካብ ምውራድ/ዓሌትነት ናይዞም ዝተጠቕሱ ዓሌት ሰባት ወይ ቦታታት ዝተመርኮሰ ኢዩ። እዚ ነዚ ኮቪድ-19 ዝበሃል ሕማም ዘስዕብ ቫይረስ severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ይበሃል።
en-mt: This name should not be used as a reference to the specific geographical location (China as an example), of an animal species or group of people, which is based on international law from the descent/ethnicity of these species of people or places. The virus that causes this disease is called severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The WHO additionally uses "the COVID-19 virus" and "the virus responsible for COVID-19" in public communications.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ኣብ ህዝባዊ ርክባት ዝጥቀመሉ ኣጸዋውዓ ኮቪድ-19 ወይ ድማ ንኮቪድ-19 ዘስዓበ ቫይረስ ዝብል ኢዩ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) uses the term in public relations as COVID-19 or the virus that caused it.

sourceString: Both the disease and virus are commonly referred to as "coronavirus".
targetString: ክልቲኦም እቲ ሕማምን ቫይረስን ``ኮሮናቫይረስ`` ተባሂሎም ይጽውዑ።
en-mt: Both the disease and the virus are called ``coronaviruses.

sourceString: During the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China, the virus and disease were commonly referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus".
targetString: ኣብቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ምስፍሕፋሕ ኣብ ዉሃን ቻይና፡ እቲ ቫይረስ ``ኮሮናቫይረስ`` እቲ ሕማም ድማ ``ዉሃን ኮሮናቫይረስ`` ተባሂሎም ይፍለጡ ኔሮም።
en-mt: In the first outbreak in Wuhan, China, the virus was known as ``coronavirus`` and the disease as ``Wuhan coronavirus.

sourceString: In January 2020, WHO recommended 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease as interim names for the virus and disease in accordance with 2015 guidance against using locations in disease and virus names.
targetString: ኣብ ጥሪ 2020፡ ዓለምለኻዊ ውድብ ጥዕና ክልቲኡ 2019-nCov ን 2019-nCoV ን ከቢድመተሓላለፊ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሕማምን፡ ከም ግዝያዊ ኣስማት ናይዞም ዝተጠቅሱ ዓይነት ቫይረስን ሕማምን ክኸውን፡ ብመሰረት መምርሒ 2015 ኣንጻር ምጥቃም ናይ ሕማም ቦታታትን ኣስማትን ምሕጽንታ ሂቡ።
en-mt: In January 2020, the World Health Organization recommended that both 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV and severe transmissible respiratory disease be used as provisional names for these viruses and diseases, in accordance with the 2015 guidelines against the use of disease locations and names.

sourceString: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were issued on 11 February 2020.
targetString: ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ን SARS-CoV-2  ወግዓዊ ኣስማት ብ ለካቲት 11,2020 ተዋሂቡ።
en-mt: The official names of COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were given on February 11,2

sourceString: Due to capacity limitations in the standard supply chains, some digital manufacturers are printing healthcare material such as nasal swabs and ventilator parts.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ግቡእ ናይ ጠለባት ምምላእ ዘይምህላዉ፡  ገለ ዲጂታላዊ መሳርሒ ዝጥቀማ ትካላት ናይ ጥዕና ክንክን መሳርሒ ከም ናይ ኣፍንጫ መጽረዪን ናይ ቨንቲለተር ክፋላትን ይሓትማ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Due to lack of proper requirements fulfillment, some digital device companies are printing healthcare device such as nasal wipes and ventilator parts.

sourceString: In one example, when an Italian hospital urgently required a ventilator valve, and the supplier was unable to deliver in the timescale required, a local startup reverse-engineered and printed the required 100 valves overnight.
targetString: ኣብ ሓንቲ ኣብነት፡ ናይ ኢጣልያ ሆስፒታል ሃንደበት ቨንትሌቶር ምስደለዩ፡ እቲ ኣፍራዪ ድማ ኣብ ግቡእ ግዜ ከብጽሖ ስለዘይከኣለ፡ ኣብቲ ከባቢ ዝነበረ መመስርሒ ክሳብ 100 ሓባ ዝኣክል ትቦታት ናይ ቨንትሌተራት ኣብ ውሽጢ ሓደ ምሸት ከፍሪ ክኢሉ።
en-mt: In one example, when an Italian hospital suddenly needed a ventilator and the manufacturer could not deliver it on time, a local processor was able to produce up to 100 tubes of ventilators overnight.

sourceString: After the initial outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracy theories, misinformation and disinformation emerged regarding the origin, scale, prevention, treatment and other aspects of the disease and rapidly spread online.
targetString: ኮቪድ-19 ድሕሪ ምብጋሱ፡ ብዙሕ ናይ ተንኮል ክልሰ-ሓሳባት፡ ጌጋን ሓቀኛ ዘይኮነን ሓበሬታ ብዛዕባ መበቆል፡መጠን፡ ምክልኻል፡ ክንክንን ካልእ ገጻት ናይዚ ሕማምን ተቀላቂሉን ብቅልጡፍ ኣስፋሕፊሑን።
en-mt: After the outbreak of COVID-19, many conspiracy theories, false and untrue information about the origin, extent, prevention, care and other aspects of the disease have emerged and spread rapidly.

sourceString: Humans appear to be capable of spreading the virus to some other animals.
targetString: ደቂ ሰባት ነዚ ቫይረስ ናብ ካልኦት እንስሳታት ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ብቅዓት ወይ ዓቅሚ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: Humans have the ability to transmit the virus to other animals.

sourceString: The study failed to find evidence of viral replication in pigs, ducks, and chickens.
targetString: እቲ መጽናዕቲ ምብዛሕ ናይ ቫይረስ ኣብ ሓሰማታት፡ ማይ-ደርሆታት ከምኡውን ደርሆ ፡ ከምዘየርኣየ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The study did not show replication of the virus in pigs, waterfowl and chickens , he said.

sourceString: No medications or vaccine is approved to treat the disease.
targetString: ነዚ ሕማም ንምፍዋስ ዝጸደቐ ፍወሳ ወይ ክታበት የለን።
en-mt: There is no approved treatment or vaccine for this disease.

sourceString: International research on vaccines and medicines in COVID-19 are underway by government organisations, academic groups and industry researchers.
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ መጽናዕቲ ኣብ ክታበታትን መድሃኒታትን ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ብ ናይ መንግስቲ ማሕበራት፡ ናይ ትምህርቲ ትካላት ከምኡ`ውን ናይ ዓበይቲ ትካላት ናይ መጽናዕቲ ጉጅለታት፡ ዝግበር ዘሎ ይቕጽል ኣሎ።
en-mt: International research on COVID-19 vaccines and drugs continues to be conducted by government associations, academic institutions and large corporate research teams.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ነቲ ናይ ``ሓድነት ፈተነ`` ጀሚርዎ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቶም ዝተራእዩ ኣርባዕተ ዓይነት ጸረ-ቫይረሳት መሐከሚ ኢዩ፡ ዕላማኡ ውን ውጽኢታውነት ንምውሳኽ ኢዩ።
en-mt: In March, the World Health Organization (WHO) launched the ``unity trial,'' which is a treatment for the four types of antivirals that have been identified, and aims to increase efficacy.

sourceString: There is no available vaccine, but various agencies are actively developing vaccine candidates.
targetString: ክሳብ ሕጂ ርጉጽ ዝኾነ ክታበት የሎን፡ እንተኮነ ብዙሓት ትካላት ናይ ክታበት ፍርያት  ውድድራት ይገብራ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: There is no definitive vaccine yet, but many companies are competing for vaccine products.

sourceString: Previous work on SARS-CoV is being utilised because SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.
targetString: ናይ ቅድም ስራሕ ናይ SARS-CoV ኣብ ትግባረ ውዒሉ፡ምኽንያቱ ክልቲኦም SARS-CoV ሳርስ SARS-CoV-2  ን ናብ ናይ ወዲ ሰብ ዋሃዮ ንምእታው ACE2 ስለዝጥቀሙ።
en-mt: Previous work of SARS-CoV was applied, because both SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 use ACE2 to enter human cells.

sourceString: There are three vaccination strategies being investigated.
targetString: ሰለስተ ዝተመርመሩ ናይ ክታበት ኣገባባት ኣለዉ።
en-mt: There are three investigated vaccine approaches.

sourceString: First, researchers aim to build a whole virus vaccine.
targetString: ብመጀመርያ ተመራመርቲ ናይ ሙሉእ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ክታበት ንምስራሕ ዓሊሞም።
en-mt: Initially, researchers aimed to develop a full-blown coronavirus vaccine.

sourceString: The use of such a virus, be it inactive or dead, aims to elicit a prompt immune response of the human body to a new infection with COVID-19.
targetString: ጥቅሚ ናይዚ ቫይረስ፡ ዝሞተ ወይ ድማ ዘይሰርሕ ክኸውን ይኽእል፡ ኣብ ግዜ ሓዲሽ መልከፍቲ ኮቪድ-19 ን ኣካላት ወዲ ሰብ  ቅልጡፍ ዝኾነ ናይ ምክልኻል ስጉምቲ ንዅአስድ ይሕፍዞ።
en-mt: The benefit of this virus, which can be dead or inactive, is that it makes it easier for the human body to take immediate immune action during a new infection.

sourceString: A second strategy, subunit vaccines, aims to create a vaccine that sensitises the immune system to certain subunits of the virus.
targetString: እቲ ካልኣይ መደብ፡ ንኡስ-ክፋል ናይ ክታበት፡ ነቲ ክታበት ኣብ ምፍጣር ዝዕለመ ኮይኑ፡ ነቲ ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቅሚ ድማ ክሳብ ገለ ደረጃ ናይ ምክልኻል ብቅዓት ን ቫይረስ ኸርኢ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: The second category, a subset of vaccines, is aimed at creating the vaccine, and the immune system must demonstrate some degree of immunity to the virus.

sourceString: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such research focuses on the S-spike protein that helps the virus intrude the ACE2 enzyme receptor.
targetString: ኣብ ጉዳይ SARS-CoV-2፡ እዚ መጽናዕቲ ኣብ ለዕሊ ፕሮቲን ዝጸቐጠ እዩ።እዚ ከኣ ነቲ ቫይረስ ግሂሱ ንተቐባሊ ምራቕ ACE2 ይሕግዝ።
en-mt: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, this study focused on the protein.

sourceString: A third strategy is that of the nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a novel technique for creating a vaccination).
targetString: እቲ ሳልሳይ ስትራቴጂ ናይ ኣሲድ ሕመረት-ዋሃዮ ክታበት DNA ወይ RNA ክታበት፡እቲ ቀንዲ ናይ ክታበት ናይ መፍጠሪ መገዲ)።
en-mt: The third strategy is acid core-cell vaccine DNA or RNA vaccine,the main vaccine manufacturing pathway).

sourceString: Experimental vaccines from any of these strategies would have to be tested for safety and efficacy.On 16 March 2020, the first clinical trial of a vaccine started with four volunteers in Seattle.
targetString: ብ ምርምር ዝተሰርሑ ክታበታት፡ ን ውጽኢታውነት ናይ ደረጃ ብቕዓትን ብግቡእ ክምርመሩ ኣለዎም። ኣብ መጋቢት 16, 2020፡ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ክሊኒክ ክታበት ብ ኣርባዕተ ወለንተኛታት ኣብ ሲያትል ተጀሚሩ።
en-mt: Research-based vaccines must be properly tested for effectiveness and efficacy. On March 16, 2020, the first clinic vaccination was launched by four volunteers in Seattle.

sourceString: The vaccine contains a harmless genetic code copied from the virus that causes the disease.Antibody dependent enhancement has been suggested as a potential challenge for vaccine development for SARS-COV-2, but this is controversial.
targetString: ክታበት ዘይጓዳእ ጀነቲካዊ ስርዓት ዝዕቅብ እዩ፡ ካብ ቫይረስ ዝተዳቐለ ግን ጠንቁ  ሕማም እዩ። ጸረ ኣካል ጽግዕተኛዊ ዕዙዝነት ስለዘለዎ ን ክታበታዊ ምዕባለ ኣብ SARS-COV-2ዝብድህ ዓቕሚ ከምዘለዎ ኣመልኪቱ፡እዚ ግን ኣካራኻሪ እዩ።
en-mt: Vaccines preserve harmless genetic code, but grafted from viruses cause disease. It has the potential to challenge vaccine development in SARS-COV-2 because of its antibody dependence, but this is controversial.

sourceString: There are more than 300 active clinical trials underway as of April 2020.
targetString: ክሳብ መጋቢት 2020 ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ፡ ክሳብ 300 ዝበዝሑ ናይ ክሊኒክ ፈተነታት ተኻይዶም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: By March 2020, up to 300 more clinical trials have been conducted.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating already approved treatments for malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.
targetString: ሸውዓተ ፈተነታት ናይ ዓሶ ምፍዋስ መድሃኒታት ቅድሚ ሕጂ መረጋገጺ ወረቀት ረኺቦም ኢዮም፡ ካብ ኣቶም ድማ እቶም ኣርባዕተ ክሎሮኪንን ሃይድሮ ክሎሮኪንን (chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine) ዝተመርኮሱ ኢዮም።
en-mt: Eight trials of tuberculosis drugs have already been approved, four of which are based on chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with nine phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: ዝበዝሕ ናይ ጸረ  ቫይራል መድሃኒታት፡ ቻይና መጽናዕቲ ናይ ዳግመ ምደባ ጌሮሙሉ። ትሽዓተ ገጻት 111 ፈተነታት ረመደሰቪር (remdesivir) ዝተፈላለያ ሃገራት ብምሕላፍ ምኽንያት ምምሕልላፍ ጸብጻብ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሚያዝያ እዩ።
en-mt: Most of the antiviral drugs, China did a study of reclassification. Nine pages 111 trials of remdesivir passed through various countries due to the transmission of the report in late April.

sourceString: A dynamic review of clinical development for COVID-19 vaccine and drug candidates was in place, as of April 2020.Several existing antiviral medications are being evaluated for treatment of COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and lopinavir/ritonavir combined with interferon beta.
targetString: ዝተዓጻጸፍ ትንታነ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ክሊኒካዊ ምዕባለ ክታበትን ናይ መድሃኒት ምምዕባልን ክሳብ ሚያዝያ 2020 ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ ይቕጽል ኣሎ። ብዙሓት ዝጸንሑ ናይ ጸረ ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት ን ኮቪድ-19 ሕክምና ይምርመሩ ኣለዉ፡ እዚ ድማ ነዞም ዝስዕቡ የጠቃልል፡  ረሚድሲቪር (remdesivir), ክሎሮኪንን ሃይድሮ ክሎሮኪንን (chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine)፡ ላፒኖቪር/ሪቶኖቪር ( lopinavir/ritonavir) ከምኡውን  ሪቶኖቪር/ላፒኖቪር  (lopinavir/ritonavir)፡ ምስ ጣልቃ-ኣታዊ ቤታ (Beta) ብምሕዋስ።
en-mt: Multiple analysis of COVID-19 vaccine clinical development and drug development continues through April Many existing antiviral drugs are being tested for the treatment of COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and ritonovir/lapino Vir (lopinavir/ritonavir ), mixing it with intervening Beta.

sourceString: There is tentative evidence for efficacy by remdesivir, as of March 2020.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 ግዝያዊ መረጋገጺ ኣድማዒ ውጽኢት ብ ሪምደሲቪር (remdesivir)ተዋሂቡ።
en-mt: In March 2020, interim confirmation of effectiveness with remdesivir was provided.

sourceString: Clinical improvement was observed in patients treated with compassionate-use remdesivir.
targetString: ብ ረምደሲቪር (remdesivir) ብምጥቃም ካብ ዝተሓከሙ ናይ ክንሊኒክ ምምሕያሻት ክገብሩ ተራእዮም።
en-mt: They showed clinical improvements from those treated with remdesivir.

sourceString: Phase III clinical trials are being conducted in the US, China and Italy.Chloroquine, previously used to treat malaria, was studied in China in February 2020, with preliminary results.
targetString: ሳልሳይ ደረጃ ሕክምናዊ ፈተነ ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስትታት ፡ቻይና ፡ጥልያን፡ እንዳተተግበረ እዩ። ኣብ ቻይና ኣብ ለካቲት 2020 ክሎሮኪን ኣቐዲሙ ናይ ዓሶ፡ መድሃኒት ዝነበረ ናይ መጀመርያ ውጽኢት ሒዙ ተጸኒዑ።
en-mt: Phase III clinical trials are underway in the United States, China, and Italy. In China in February 2020, chloroquine was studied with the first results of a previous tuberculosis drug.

sourceString: However, there are calls for peer review of the research.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ናይቶም መጽናዕታት ምርግጋጽ ክግበር ጻውዒት ይግበር ኣሎ።
en-mt: However, there are calls for verification of those studies.

sourceString: Korean and Chinese Health Authorities recommend the use of chloroquine.
targetString: ኮርያን ቻይናን ናይ ጥዕና ባዓል ስልጣናት ክሎሮኲዩን (chloroquine) ክጥቀሙ መኺሮም።
en-mt: Health officials in Korea and China have recommended the use of chloroquine.

sourceString: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a daily dose of one gram, notes that twice that dose is highly dangerous and could be lethal.
targetString: እንተኾነ ግን ፡ውሃን ትካል ናይ ቪሮሎጂይ መዓልታዊ ዓቐን ናይ መድሃኒት ሓደ ግራም ክኸውን ተማሕጺኖም፡ ክልተ  ዕጽፊ ናይቲ ዓቐን ብጣዕሚ ሓደገኛን ቀታልን ክኸውን ከምዝኽእል ኣዘኻኺሮም።
en-mt: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology recommended a daily dose of one gram, reminding that twice that dose can be very dangerous and deadly.

sourceString: On 28 March 2020, the FDA issued an emergency use authorisation for hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine at the discretion of physicians treating people with COVID-19.The Chinese 7th edition guidelines also include interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir for use against COVID-19.
targetString: ኣብ 28 መጋቢት 2020፡ናይ FDA ህጹጽ ሓገዝ ፍቓድ ን ሃይድሮክሲክሎሮኪንን (hydroxychloroquine) ክሎሮኪንን (chloroquine) ኣብ ድርሳን ሓካይም ነቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ክንክን ጥዕና ሰባት መከላኸሊ፡ሪባቪሪን (ribavirin) ፡ ወይ ኡሚፈኖቪር (umifenovir) ንጥቕሚ ኣንጻር ኮቪድ-19፡ ቻይና 7ይ ሕታም ሓፈሻዊ መምርሒ ኣሕቲማ።
en-mt: On March 28, 2020, the FDA emergency aid to Hydroxychloroquine Chloroquine Chloroquine (Chloroquine) in physician essays, COVID-19 prevention, Ribavirin , or Umifenovir (umifenovir) for the benefit of COVID-19, China published an edition of the General Guide.

sourceString: Preliminary data indicate that high doses of ribavirin are necessary to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.
targetString: ናይ መጀመርያ ሓበሬታ ከም ዘመልክቶ ልዑል ዓቐን መድሃኒት ናይ ሪባቪሪን (ribavirin) ንሕፍረት ሳርስ SARS-CoV-2  ኣብ ቪትሮ ኣገዳሲ እዩ።
en-mt: Preliminary data indicate that high doses of ribavirin are essential for SARS-CoV-2 neutralization in vitro.

sourceString: Nitazoxanide has been recommended for further in vivo study after demonstrating low concentration inhibition of SARS-CoV-2.Studies have demonstrated that initial spike protein priming by transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) is essential for entry of SARS-CoV-2 via interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: ኖቲክዞሳንደ (Nitazoxanide)፡ ህይወታውያን (VIVO) ትሑት ምክልኻል ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ዘርእይሉ እዋን፡ ክንጥቀመሉ ይመኽሩ።  መጽናዕቲ ከም ዝሕብርዎ እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ስፓይክ ፕሮቲን (spike protein)፡ ብ  ፕሮቲስ ሰሪነ ክልተ (protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2)) ዝተሰርሐ፡ ነቲ ምእታው ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ብ ምትእትታው ናይ ACE2 ተቀባሊ፡ ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Nitazoxanide is recommended for use when organisms (VIVO) show low immunity to SARS-CoV-2 Studies have shown that the first spike protein, made by protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2), is critical for the entry of SARS-CoV-2 by introducing the ACE2 receptor.

sourceString: The studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with or without azithromycin have major limitations that have prevented the medical community from embracing these therapies without further study.Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no known role in COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: መጽናዕትታት ናይ ክሎሮኮንን ሃይድሮክሎሮኢንን (chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine) ብ azithromycinንን ብዘይ ብኡን፡ነቲ ናይ ሕክምን  ስድራ-ቤት ካብዚ ክንክን ናይ ሕክምና ክኽልክሎም ዘኽእል  ዓበይቲ ሓጹራት ኣለዎ፡ እዚ ግን ብዘይ ዓሚቕ መጽናዕቲ ዝተገብረ ገምጋም ኢዩ። Oseltamivir ን SARS-CoV-2ኣብ ቪትሮ (vitro) ክኽልክሎ ኣይክእልን ኢዩ፡ ኣብ ሕክምና ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ድማ ዝኾነ ተራ የብሉን።
en-mt: Studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with and without azithromycin have major barriers that prevent the clinician and family from this medical care, but this is a poorly studied assessment. Oseltamivir cannot inhibit SARS-CoV-2in vitro and has no role in the treatment of COVID-1

sourceString: Cytokine storm can be a complication in the later stages of severe COVID-19.
targetString: ሲቶኪንስ (Cytokine) ስቶርም ካብቶም ኣብ ዝኸፈአ ደረጃ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝኽሰት ሳዕቤን እዩ።
en-mt: Cytokine storm is one of the most severe side effects of COVID-1

sourceString: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine storm properties.Tocilizumab has been included in treatment guidelines by China's National Health Commission after a small study was completed.
targetString: ሃይድሮክሲ-ክሎሮኪን ጸረ ሳይቶኪን ዝኾኑ ማዕበላዊ ጠባያት ክህልዎ ከምዝኽእል ዘረድእ መርትዖ ኣሎ። ሃገራዊ ኮሚሽን ጥዕና ቻይና ቶሲሊዙማብ ንዝተባህለ መድሃኒት ኣብ ናይ ክንክን ቅርጽታት ኣእትይዎ ኣሎ።
en-mt: There is evidence that hydroxy-chloroquine may have anti-cytokine wave characters. The National Health Commission of China has placed tocilizumab in care formulations.

sourceString: It is undergoing a phase 2 non randomised test at the national level in Italy after showing positive results in people with severe disease.
targetString: ድሕሪ ኣብቶም ከበድቲ ሕማማት ዘለዎም ሰባት ዝተገብረ ፈተነ ውጽኢታውነት ምሃቡ፡ ገጽ 2 ሓፈሻዊ መርመራታትታ ኣብ ኢጣልያ ብ ሃገራዊ ደረጃ ክትግበር ይትግበር ኣሎ።
en-mt: After a trial in people with serious diseases showed efficacy, Page 2 its general tests are being implemented nationally in Italy.

sourceString: Combined with a serum ferritin blood test to identify cytokine storms, it is meant to counter such developments, which are thought to be the cause of death in some affected people.
targetString: ምስ ናይ ቅምሶ ደም ናይ ፈሪቲን (serum ferritin blood) ዝተሓወሰ መርመራ ነቲ ናይ ሲይቶኪን ነድሪ (cytokine storms) ንምልላይ፡ ነቲ ተራኽቦታትን ምዕባለታትን ንምክልኻል፡ ኣብ ገለ ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት  ጠንቂ ናይ ሞት ኮይኖም ዝሕሰቡ ኢዮም።
en-mt: Tests combined with serum ferritin blood samples are used to identify the cytokine storms, to prevent the contacts and progressions, which are considered to be the cause of death in some infected people.

sourceString: The interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA based on retrospective case studies for treatment of steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome induced by a different cause, CAR T cell therapy, in 2017.
targetString: ናይ interleukin-6  ተቃዋሚ ተቀባሊ፡ ብ FDA  ተረጋጊጹ፡ እዚ ድማ ብ ናይ ኣብ ረትሮሰፕቲቭ (retrospective) ናይ ግዳያት መጽናዕቲ ን ሕክምና ናይ ስተሮይድ ረፍራክቶሪ ሲይቶኪን (steroid refractory cytokine) ዝነስዖ ሲንድሮም (ብ ዝተፈላለየ ጠንቅታት CAR T ዋህዮሕክምና)፡ ኣብ 2017 ብዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA in 2017 in a retrospective victim study for the treatment of steroid refractory cytokine induced syndrome (CAR T cell therapy for various causes). .

sourceString: To date, there is no randomised, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is an efficacious treatment for CRS.
targetString: ክሳብ ሕጂ፡ቶሲሊዙማብ ን ሲኣሬስ ኣፍማዒ ፍወሳ (CRS) ከምዝኾነ ቅዩድ መርትዖ ብ ሃንደበት ኣይተሰርዐን።
en-mt: To date, there is no conclusive evidence that tocilizumab is a treatment for CRS.

sourceString: Transferring purified and concentrated antibodies produced by the immune systems of those who have recovered from COVID-19 to people who need them is being investigated as a non-vaccine method of passive immunisation.
targetString: ምምሕልላፍ ጽሩይን ጽዑቕን ጸረ ኣካላት ብ ስርዓተ- ብይነት ካብ ኮቪድ-19 ዝሓወዩ ይፈሪ። ነዚ ዝደልዩ ከም ዘይክታበታዊ ኣገባብ ናይ ልኡም ዘይምጽያን ይፍለጡ።
en-mt: Transfusion of pure and intense antibodies is produced by the system- judgment of those who have recovered from COVID-1 Those who seek this are known as non-vaccine methods of mild abstinence.

sourceString: This strategy was tried for SARS with inconclusive results.
targetString: እዚ መደባት ን SARS፡ ብዘየዕግብ ውጽኢት ተፈቲኑ ኢዩ።
en-mt: These programs have been tested for SARS, with unsatisfactory results.

sourceString: Viral neutralisation is the anticipated mechanism of action by which passive antibody therapy can mediate defence against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ቫይራል ርግኡነት ማለት  ኣካላትና ልኡም ጸረ-ነፍሳት ፈውስ ን SARS-CoV-2 ንምክልኻል ዝገብሮ ስራሕ ንጽበየሉ  መገዲ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Viral stability is the body's way of waiting for mild antibiotic therapy to work to protect against SARS-CoV-2

sourceString: Other mechanisms however, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, may be possible.
targetString: ካልኦት መንገድታት ከም ኣብ ጸረ-ነፍስት ዝምርኮሱ cytotoxicity ከምኡ`ውን/ወይ phagocytosis ምጥቃም ውን ተኽእሎታት ኣሎ።
en-mt: The use of other pathways such as antibiotic-dependent cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis is also a possibility.

sourceString: Other forms of passive antibody therapy, for example, using manufactured monoclonal antibodies, are in development.
targetString: ካልኦት ቅርጽታት ናይ ልኡም ጸረቭይረስ ሕክምና፡ ከም ኣብነት፡ ዝተመስርሑ ሞኖሎካል ጸረነፍሳት ምጥቃም ኣብ ምዕባለ ከም ዘሎ ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Other forms of mild antiviral therapy, such as the use of processed monolocal antibiotics, have been reported in development.

sourceString: Production of convalescent serum, which consists of the liquid portion of the blood from recovered patients and contains antibodies specific to this virus, could be increased for quicker deployment.
targetString: ጸረ ኣካል ዝቆጻጸር ብፍላይ ከኣ ን ቫይረስ ቅልጡፍ ወፍሪ ከምጽእ ክኢሉ። ጥዕና፡ጸማልያ(ፈሳሲ ክፋል ደም ዝሓዘ) ካብ ዝሓወዩ ሕሙማት እዩ።
en-mt: Antibody control, especially for viruses, brought about a rapid campaign. Health: Leprosy(containing liquid part of blood) is from recovered patients.

sourceString: Coronavirus diseases, a group of closely related syndromes
targetString: ኮሮናቫይረስ ጉጅለ ናይ ብቐረባ ዝምድና ዘለዎም ሕማማት እዩ።
en-mt: Coronaviruses are a group of closely related diseases.

sourceString: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Central Hospital of Wuhan, who later contracted and died of COVID-19 after raising awareness of the spread of the virus.
targetString: ሊ ወንሊኣንግ (Li Wenliang)፡ ሓኪም ኣብ ማእከላይ ሕክምና ናይ ውሃን ብዛዕባ ቫይረስ ድሕሪ ምንቅሑ ኣብ መወዳእታ ተወዓዒሉ ብ ኮቪድ-19 ሞይቱ።
en-mt: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Wuhan's Central Medical Center, died of COVID-19 after becoming aware of the virus.
